title: really bad
review: I went to this place in 1997 or 1998. This used to be very clean and we had fun below and above the Kempty falls. Now the place is highly commercialized and the vendors/local administrators have destroyed the beauty of the fall.

title: Natural swimming pool
review: This place is a natural swimming pool with a hill on the back and have a water coming from top of the mountain and water is very cold and best time to visit this place is in summers and person with medical conditions should avoid this place as we need to walk down a lot of stairs. Children’s and youngsters enjoy this place a lot

title: Nature's beauty thin and narrow
review: The serpentine Road journey was worth the beauty...... But if you have bigger, wider, huge water falls.. Then think twice... It's too thin and narrow... May be worth going for a selfie or maximum to be able to tell that you visited it.....

title: Nature at its best
review: Neverthless a hidden beauty in the hearts of mussorie.Once you r travelling from mussorie to dehradun,this falls is a stop point must.Relax,enjoy the nature,climb the rocks and even there is a ropeway to get on.You can fill your heart with memories of this place.

title: Must Visit Spot in Mussourie
review: The fall is 14km from Mussoorie.  The parking is paid.  You need to climb down 100 stairs to reach the first fall.  The fall is surrounded by shops offering facility of clothes, locker,  changing room and eatables.  The stairway too is full of shops.The water is clean being the first fall.  The surface below water is bumpy however nothing much can be done about it.  Falls below the first fall does not have much  water and also are dirty due to human interference.  The bridge is a nice spot to click pics.  Kempty lake offers few adventure activities.

title: Natural Beauty
review: Kindly visit these falls before the water stops flowing down. The flow of the water has reduced from early days.The water is cold. However many shops have opened from road till the falls. One can take cable car or take stairs. With Cable car also one has to take stairs. One can have Maggi, Tea/coffee, omelette and cold drinks. Shop sells wooden souvenirs (bargain if you can).

title: Disappointment
review: The natural beauty of any waterfall can never be disappointing and the same holds true for kempty falls, but the environment in which the falls is ensconsed is a big eye sore. Plastic waste everywhere around, shopkeepers shouting out their services and products, men bathing in the water in their underwears are enough to turn you off.

title: Not Worth it
review: I have visited this place again with kids and was been forced to go there

title: Huge, beautiful waterfalls
review: Huge & beautiful waterfalls which are the one of the biggest attractions & tourist points of Mussoorie. There's a small pond at the pond, which isn't very deep also. So most tourists just laze around and enjoy their time. There are shops which offer clothes on rent and changing rooms along with basic food options like maggi & eggs.

title: Nice view but cleanliness to be maintained
review: Nice place to enjoy with family but cleanliness near water fall and other area need to be maintained

title: Kempty fall
review: Nice location, one of the must visit places in mussoorie. Best time to visit this place is Summer season.

title: Dip in winters
review: It’s chilllllly but fun , the water level is low. So you can dip in if you want “Aaj Kuch toofani karte hai”

title: Good overall exprience
review: The place is not too far from mall road with loads of hairpins n amazing mountain views.

title: Beautiful Waterfall
review: The one of the biggest attraction & Tourist Point in Mussoorie.It is really awesome but best time is summer to visit there.We enjoyed and see the Waterfall, A hug water falling down from the height.

title: Not very impressive
review: Sure, it's one of the top attractions of Mussoorie, but the place is too commercialized and crowded. The place would look more beautiful sans the shops and vendors all around it.

title: Mesmerizing falls
review: Been there multiple times and always gets mesmerized by its beauty. Nicely maintained..a must visit if you are in Mussourie

title: Fun place even in December
review: It is very good warer fall with facility to go through rope way as well. Local shoping market at fall will keep you going while you climb down to fall

title: Waste of time
review: It's waste of time to visit at campty fall . Only good side is the view and the curvy roads that reach at the fall. We enjoyed view of Himalayan mountains.

title: How to reach kempty fall from mussoorie by UK, Roadways
review: How to reach kempty fall from mussoorie by UK, Roadways. I need place of maximum availability of buses in Mussoorie and bus timing.

title: Big and beautiful
review: Clean water and clean premises. No hawkers around. You may sit and relax. Sit on a rock and dip your feet in chilled water. Water is chilled even in peak summers.

title: Nice multi-level waterfalls
review: Kempty falls is around 20 kms from Mall road, Mussoorie. Kempty falls is a multi-layered water fall near Mussoorie. One can walk around 300 steps down or take a rope car for Rs.120 per person. We opted to walk as the counter could open 1 hour from when we reached there. Getting down was good as we could see all levels as we traversed by foot, stop, enjoy and then move on. The steps are well laid to the bottom most level while others are sort of dilapidated. The falls is very picturesque and is a time killer for people with cameras. We spent close to 1 hour in the water falls and reached back to parking area by 10:45 AM.

title: Breath taking
review: A great fall, but could have maintained well. The government need to look after the natural beauty of Mussorie. The road to the falls is difficult, but once you get there you forget all the troubles.

title: It is not as majestic as in the past
review: I had visited Kempty Falls many years back, and still remember the awe-inspiring view of the falls. But commercialization and the crowd has taken away the charm.I will not recommend a visit.

title: A Hugh Waterfall but don't expect much.
review: I like the place but as much as i heard about this place it's not that much happening.

title: My visit to Kempty falls
review: It is worth visiting. Most interesting is the cable car ride. We took the stairs to go down and used cable car to go up.

title: deception
review: We came to this place after big waters, place was distroyed, dirty, only interest for indian people was to visit the restaurants, café places and shops. Nothing nice about the nature.

title: It’s the wow
review: The real nature can be seen here... it was really awesome at this place...enjoyed a lot ...trip was splendid

title: Amazing Feel But Cowded
review: It's really very nice place to enjoy and see the waterfall. Huge water coming down there. But now it's too crowded

title: Kempty Falls
review: Wonderful place to visit. osum experience. full of thrill and joy. water falling from a height is a unique experience to watch.

title: Construction all around!
review: A beautiful fall in the valley spoiled and damaged by construstion all around. It is just not possible to appprecite beauty of fall.

title: Too commercial, lost its natural beauty
review: Place is now full of shops and artificial pool which just takes away its natural beauty.  It is like watching a waterfall from middle of a market place

title: A must visit when you’re travelling to Mussoorie
review: Kempty Falls is a place that promises wonderful memories for you and your friends/family. It will be hard to get your eyes off the mesmerizing Kempty falls. You can step into the pool formed by the beautiful falls and can enjoy the scenic beauty

title: weekend trip
review: 17 km from mussorie, too many curves, can be quite giddy. nice place to see the nature, but not very well maintained and clean.

title: Average
review: Its a good place if you want to hang out with friends but this has been commercialized far more than the reality. You have to go down very much using the stairs to really the chilled water. Rope way is there to reach downhill.

title: Absolute beauty
review: We took a Mussoorie darshan bus which took us round trip to 3 places including Kempty fall in Rs 350. They are available at bus stand near Library Chowk.

title: Outstanding memorable visit
review: A must must must do picnic when in a large group !!! DEEPAK RANA WAS FABBB... the food..They managed...the dessert...the help to go down to the stream

title: Reviews of tourists spot
review: It is a good tourists spot in Missouri...the place is located a little distances from the main city ..

title: Waterfall in Mussoorie
review: Kempty falls is one of the most popular tourist spots in Mussoorie. It is located at 18 kms from Mall road.

title: Kempty falls Mussoorie
review: A must place to visit in Mussoorie. Young ones can take the stairs to reach the fall bed. Alternatively, walk down around 25 stairs, having gift shops on either side and then take trolley to get to the bottom of the falls. Sound of falling water is so refreshing.

title: Beautiful Waterfall
review: It is a very beautiful waterfall and probably the most popular in India. Went in off season so there was less rush.. Had a great experience. Must visit!

title: Amazing
review: Kempty falls is worth visiting. The view is amazing. You can reach there by stairs orelse you csn go by cable car.

title: Administrative failure
review: During my last visit here some 30 years back, it was a heaven. But now dirty unkempt commercial stalls have been allowed next to the remnants of a once upon a time mighty & beautiful falls. Kempty lake next to the  falls is a really bad idea. Cable car rides over piles of rubbish. Queen of hills has been robbed of its pride & beauty by local administration. Private parking spaces nearby are owned by ruffians, be cautious.

title: Hardly impressive
review: you imagine water fall and what you see here is very depressing. lot of plastic and waste . number of shops on road as well approach to fall. What i feel one should visit here without any great expectations.

title: Proximity Falls
review: When we approached Kempty Falls we expected it to be a damp squib but the climb and close proximity to the gushing waterfalls made for some great visuals and clicks as well. There is an option of a cable car ride as well, which we did not exploit, but the climb, which was not very tiring, was enjoyable !

title: water falls
review: good to visit. one can use rope way to reach if not interested to climb. good falls and clean water, can have some shopping and street food eating as well.

title: Good to experiece
review: Its Amazing but highly populated and commertialised by business n local people..still fascinating place. We got the falls full almost even in November 18 end...for those who dont want to climb up stairs roapways will serve the best..but remember only till 4 pm..must visit place. Nature should by untouched by commertialisation what is felt after reaching the place.

title: Must visit
review: When I visited Mussoorie with family I stayed in sangam guest house which was very pleasant stay you can review. After staying we visited kempty falls. It is huge falls. We ate snacks and drink tea near falls. I will suggest to use public transport over there as their was huge problem of parking and traffic. But you definitely go once.

title: Good scenic view
review: Visited with family on 20 Dec 2018. The water fall is too good to see and enjoy. Must see for everyone.

title: Wonderful waterfall <3
review: It’s 13 km from Mall Road mussorie,

title: Kempty Falls - Fall in Love wt Nature
review: Ropeway to get down to the Falls make it a Hassle free affair !! Enjoy Maggi and Tea at local food stalls near the falls and enjoy the view !! Monkeys are notorious here make a note to keep ur eatables out of sight for them..

title: Disappointed!
review: The waterfall in it self is pretty. But the surroundings are very tourist imprinted since there are shops everywhere even right by the waterfall, so it is difficult to see the beauty and the full view of the waterfall.

title: Perfect family destination
review: This has been one of the most perfect destination over the last so many years. It has good facilities and best during June month

title: Beautiful
review: Very beautiful natural view, very nice local shops & people are very friendly, love to visit again and again

title: Kempty falls..
review: Worthless...no use going all the way just to c a stupid fall..

title: Must go if your going to Mussorie or Dehradun
review: Kempty Falls is a waterfall in Ram Gaon and is approximately 2 hours drive from Dehradun clock tower…some 47 kms. The Kempty Falls itself is a beautiful water fall. However, this place has become highly commercialized and has lost its charm which was there some 20 years back. The climate is pleasant in November and worth going to enjoy the natural beauty of mountains and fresh breeze.

title: Nice view
review: Good place to visit if you want to take bath... It is a crowded place... Nice view of the water fall

title: Just a commercialized waterfall
review: It's just water fall with Soo many shops around it, there are two way to reach to waterfall , there are stairs around 250 or you can go by ropeway which will cost 120 per head.. as I have visited in November month water was very cold to be in , Soo we just clicked pictures and returned. Not that worth is because there is lot of crowd

title: Must visit if you're in Mussoorie
review: The kempty falls is one of those places that live upto the reputation it has built for itself down these years. It's basically nothing but a 70 ft high waterfall, the base of which has developed into a pool of sorts where tourists can take a dip. Swimming trunks or suits are available right next to the location with provision for lockers. The highlight for us however was having the most delicious egg maggi perched up on one of the shacks overlooking the falls! If you want something more wholesome, there are tons of restaurants on the road where your vehicle would have dropped you off.

title: Nice place
review: Except for the litter that had been spread by the tourist it was an enjoyable experience. More so as the No. of visitors was less. Nevertheless this gif not help With the parking problem. To enjoy the falls do climb up to the higher points as that will give better options since not many people climb up from the first point itself

title: Very nice and safe place to play in water
review: We visited this place in mid oct 2018. This place has 3 different falls level and we can enjoy in every level. You can carry a pair of cloth if you want to get wet and enjoy with the kids as it is very safe to play even with the smallest kids. You can also take awesome pics near this place. Totally loved the time we spent never realised it was more than 3 hours as we got in to the water in the last level.

title: Similar to other water falls, but well developed
review: Well developed, similar to other water fall, can bathe easily pressure is high height is also good, adventurous

title: Destination which is not to be forgotten on a trip to Mussoorie
review: Kempty falls in Mussoorie is one of the main destinations to visit. It has remarkable view when the visitors look at the water dropping from 50 feet height through different cascading falls towards the downstream. The water falling from the mountain stream  is crystal clear and in the form of two main falls. More popular is the lower waterfall that attract huge crowds. This the destination that should never be forgotten by the visitors  on a tour to Mussoorie.

title: Disappointed
review: Visited this place after a almost 20 years and was too disappointed to see the level of commercial construction around the fall, they have literally covered the whole place with shops and establishment's.  Still a must visit place once

title: Place in mussoorie
review: It is one of the places to be visit in mussoorie. Water in the this lake is as cold as it is just bring out from fridge.

title: Far from the Mussorie city, visit if you love falls
review: If you are a waterfall lover and want to enjoy the fall, visit this place with 2-3hrs in hand. There are multiple places wherein you can enjoy the fall at your convenience. There are multiple vendors providing cloths in rent. Also, they have changing rooms in place, but not so great.  I would recommend you to carry your own clothes.

title: good place to visit
review: Its a good place to visit take photographs and take a good bath in the pristine and clear water of the falls that come directly from the mountains.

title: Okay
review: This is like one of the tourist destinations in Mussorie which all families visit .It's an okay place to visit .On a personal front,I found this to be avaerage .

title: Disappointing
review: As I am from North-east India, the place could not surprise me anything. Most of the place is artificial. For nature lovers, one should come to Cherrapunjee-Meghalaya which have much better water falls than the Kempty.

title: Visit just for the sake of it
review: Nothing great about this fall anymore. Commercial outlets, excessive tourist footfall has killed it.

title: Must visit
review: With the ropeway, now it is very easy to approach.

title: Natural and Nice
review: Good place to see... doesn't need a long visit time unless one wants to stay  and take a dip at a particular level of the falls.

title: Liked the place
review: Place is nice. It's in Mussorie about 40 km. from Dehradun city. Nice place to visit. I enjoyed a lot over there.

title: Unique & awsome
review: Oh...what a view

title: Average Place
review: There Are 2 falls one is Above the Road and 1 in valley. I suggest to visit above the road falls as it has multiple layer. you can swim there, take a bath, there changing rooms too.

title: Terrible experience
review: Crowded, dirty, and dinghy. It's a small, uninspiring falls that opens into an artificial pool-like area where people splash around. The traffic leading up to the sight is terrible too.

title: Overcrowded. Not maintained properly
review: One of the famous view points but is overcrowded and is not maintained properly. Encroachment has robbed the place of its beauty. Visit only if you have spare time.

title: Not worth visiting
review: There is nothing much to do as the cable car is currently not working.  The area is strewn with plastics all around. No clean toilets. The tourism department needs to review and improve this tourist spot.

title: Overated
review: Very expensive to reach and after paying almost 1500 from mussoorie, you get to see waterfall in a very bad shape. It is sad to see kempty falls with full of filth and plastic around.

title: visit while entering or leaving mussoorie
review: it is a famous outing in mussoorie the falls are worth only when there is heavy flow in monsoon , the cabel car to reach down was closed for repairs due to heavy rains in August 2018, we were a group of 21 & hence a good outing for 1/2 day.

title: Don’t visit
review: Kempty falls was simply shocking!

title: Beautiful fall but still disappointed
review: There are no proper directions nor any proper platform to see the falls. You have to stand on the side of the road and bend over the railings to see the falls... we looked around the fall but couldn’t find a single spot which provided a top to bottom view of the fall.

title: Tourists killed this place.
review: Too many tourists and commercial shops have killed this beautiful fall and its beauty.

title: Goosing waterfall
review: We went to kempty fall it was crowded but understood every body wants to enjoy how we feel too.

title: GOOD VIEW OF KEMPTY FALL
review: We visited Kempty Fall On 24.09.2018 from Mussoorie by Taxi which charged Rs.1550. Though it was raining we enjoyed our trip..

title: Fun falls awsham
review: If like advanture visit kempty falks. You can do----Flying fox, Ropeway, Burmabridge ect. And you can buy souvenir also......

title: Kempty falls Mussorie
review: Enroute to Yamunotri we got a chance to stop at kempty falls and take pictures. You can also get drenched in the falls if you have the energy to climb the stairs which takes you closer to the origin of these falls we climbed a dozen odd steps and lo behold there is a pool of water where you can relax with your legs dipped in these cold water pool and watch the water fall from great height

title: A place with destroyed nature.
review: The place would be a marvellous one, but the constructions ruined the natural beauty.

title: Fully commercialized place now
review: This place has lost its beauty compared to earlier times. Lots of shops have been opened at upper levels which restrict view of the waterfall. It is ofcourse not allowed to stand on the bridge and view it for longer minutes. It is very much crowded now. In short if you are in mussourie,its fine to visit it once but don't expect it to ve a fun visit

title: Worth the long walk
review: You have to walk quite a distance to reach the bottom of the waterfalls and the route is amazing. The view of cascading water is peaceful and you can enjoy your quiet time here

title: Awesome fun... Worth visit
review: Visiting kempty falls again after 30 years now along with my Kid's is fun... Even my grand mother aged 91 old came with to enjoy the beauty of kempty falls.. Water is very cold still kids enjoy with floating rings..you can get towel, swimming costume on rent from nearby stores.changing rooms available at same shops for changing clothes.

title: amazing experience but extremely unsafe
review: we visited the place on the 2nd September morning and saw news in the night that there we flash floods in the evening while tourists were still enjoying the falls and had to run for the life as the water level suddenly started falling heavily with no local warnings, place also has alot of stones and loose railings in the water, so its better to wear floaters. but nonetheless the falls in itself is a great place to enjoy if ones careful themselves.

title: Terrible
review: Disappointing.... False smells, rush.... Watch it some 12 kms away from any hill.. It will look beautiful from there.... But it was extremely spoiled by local vendors, tourists

title: Best Location and Thrilling Place among Mussoorie
review: One of the best place I have ever visited. It is most thrilling and stunning place among Mussoorie. Unfortunately Rope-way (Cable car) was shutdown due to unknown reason/s. We could not feel the thrill of it. Though we stepped down stairs and reached to Kempty Falls. It was amazing experience for us.

title: Beuatiful falls !!!!
review: This one is a pure blessing of nature, but overcrowded by local vendors and slowly getting spoiled by unplanned construction works. local governing bodies should implement the regulation to maintain serenity and sanctity of the natural resources.

title: over rated place
review: kempty falls near mussoorie is a very over rated

title: Too crowded during holiday season
review: It was too crowded, taxi charges were really high, way was blocked. Please plan your visit in non peak season to enjoy the view

title: Totally Avoidable
review: The place has been commercialized to a ridiculous extent. Yes, there is a waterfall ending in a small pool, *AND* surrounded by shops and construction all around. Imagine a waterfall.. any waterfall. The Kempty Falls is nothing like any waterfall that you can imagine. You have to walk a long way from the main road through unending shops on the side. Even at the end, it's just a dirty pool with a small waterfall on one side. There are shops renting out bathing suits and tubes for frolicking in the small pool, alongside the waterfall.

title: Wonderful falls
review: one of the best falls to see in mussoori , the water is very clean and very cold. it is pure like Ma Ganaga Water.

title: Overhyped
review: This place is around 17km far from Mussoorie and a good drive on hills. No parking place, you need to pay heavily for parking. a downhill is not convenient for kids and senior citizens.

title: If you want quiet there is a better place to go!
review: The main part is very commercial and built up and busy- we wanted a bit of peace and quiet

title: Gorgeous spot spoiled
review: We came twice and and were deeply disgusted to see that this very nice place was scattered with rubbish...

title: Big waterfall
review: This is very big and beautiful waterfall. This place is good for bath. Water is very cold. Fall looks very beautiful.

title: Hyped
review: It is far apart from city center and once you reached you will get just an artificial pond with lots of shop selling Maggi, tea etc. Nothing much to do here, even water is not clean.

title: Must visit place around Mussorie
review: It's a must for every one going to Mussoorie it's a place always full of tourists except for rain because there is a danger of stones coming in Fall but there's a lot to do and enjoy with good street food

title: Worst sight seeing place
review: There are no maintenance in this place. This place does not have neatness. Peoples enjoying in kempty falls. But they don't know whether it is good or ugly bad water. It will cause side effects like skin decease. So I kindly request you don't bath if water is ugly. Thank you

title: The view from the top are beautiful
review: The place can be seen from top above. Good place for seeing and this is more comfortable for the family and kids

title: Dr Paramjit
review: Commercials established units are playing havoc with natural beauty of the place.At places it has started stinking

title: Beautiful Waterfall
review: We visited this place 2nd time last year. A beautiful waterfall where one can easily spend 2 hours. There are too many stairs before you can enjoy this natural waterfall.

title: the coldest place to have bath
review: coming to kempty fall , this place is a must visit and most visited place by tourist in mussoorie. Every year around 1000 's of people come here to witness the cold water and have a dip under the waterfall. The most suitable time is april to aug when the water is cold but then people have the spirit of going inside the pool but during winters everyone is just enjoying the fall and have some pictures and get back home. But when i was here i went under the fall that too in december month. There is no extra money for getting into the pool.. Enjoy the fall when ever u visit this place rather than just clicking the pictures from outside..

title: Nice Waterfall destroyed by commercialization
review: Around 15 years back it was one of the best waterfall. These days it is just waste of time. It's beauty has been ruined by localites by opening shops, eating outlets... very dirty... I will not recommend visiting this....

title: Nature and Artificial combination
review: Very crowdy place. DONT GO THERE IN SUMMER or RAINY season. You need minimum 3 to 4 hours to visit this place. Having very heavy traffic to reach the place.

title: Amazing waterfall
review: An amazing waterfall and a wonderful selfie point. Had a great time there with maggie and water splash. There are few swimming pools under the kempty falls to enjoy in crystal clear water. The only bad thing is have to go from about 100 stairs to reach there.

title: Overhyped. Will not visit again!!
review: We visited this waterfall on 30/07/2018. First of all it is located around 15 kms from Mall Road in Mussoorie. The road is twisty throughout. We had to pay Rs.40/- on the way as charges to visit the waterfall. Parking charges were Rs.100/-. There are local food joints around the place and one has to descend about 200 staircases to reach the main waterfall. There are shops around the staircases. The prices are inflated for almost everything, as expected. Upon reaching the falls we discovered, it was more like a swimming pool with waterfall overhead. There are shops around the pool selling snacks and offering clothes on rent for taking a dip into the pool. We were not at all impressed and felt the place is overhyped. We took a dip and spent hardly 45 minutes after paying Rs.140/- for almost nothing and driving up and down for around one hour. One can use the cable car to ascend and descend to the waterfall, if walking down the stairs is difficult. Cable car charges Rs.120/- for both ways and Rs.100/- for one way. Overall it is worth a skip and we will not visit this place again.

title: Good for first timers
review: Nothing new for regular visitors. The entire picnic spot has turned costly commercial hub

title: Kempty fall a place to view for first timers
review: I went there in the month of July with my two collegues. The cab driver charged 1500 from mall road to kempty fall. We reach their in the evening so we go down through stairs. The water was very chilled there. My friends & me really enjoyed it. For first time visitors, you should visit.

title: Go only if you want to tkae a bath!
review: The falls are great but the access unless you take the rope way is through a narrow steep steps with shops on either side that sell affordable goods and food.

title: Kempty Fall
review: Good hangout place. There is also a ropeway arrangement for all. You must use it for a lifetime experience.

title: Over exploited
review: This used to be one of the best falls, but now its over exploited. shops have come nearby and it gets too crowded to enjoy.

title: very much commercialized and congested
review: i did not like it because of highly commercialization and congestion....very dirty also at places and i found it little risky...though once a visit is during the stay must be made as it is very much historic place.

title: Water fall
review: Not good very dirty. water is clean but where water is collected is very unhygienic  and everywhere cleaning is required

title: Probably the best thing in mussoorie
review: As we stay at a walking distance from the falls we visit there quite often. Love the gushing water ... thats clean , pristine & chilled...

title: No big deal...
review: Being one of those tourist spots  nearer to Mussoorie, it attracts far too many visitors than it deserves. Definitely a highly overrated attraction. Sure, the water falls during late summer, early monsoon is a beautiful sight and nice to enjoy the bath. But the hassle of finding a parking space, jostling through the crowd and the touts chasing you for photography etc etc is a big putoff. Not worth all the efforts to get here. Incase you are driving upto Yamnotri or Purola or beyond, and you have all the time on the earth, may be you can venture into this falls.

title: The place is extremely crowded
review: The place is extremely crowded and practically no place to properly stand to view this fall and take a snap. The base of the pond is full of persons taking bath.

title: waste of time
review: not a good place to visit , dirty water and nearby shops have encroached the area.natural beauty is lost .looks more like a pond -a dirty pond

title: Not worth visiting
review: It is over hyped. The falls are very ordinary. You would definitely get stuck in  traffic. The traffic jam sometimes lasts for 3-4 hours.

title: Big pond
review: Nothing to enjoy here. It is not a fall but seems to be a big pond. Over crowded with people, contemplated water, heaps of garbage near about no natural beauty. Sorry for this site.

title: It was good
review: It is good and the month which i prefered is completely perfect as on my view.

title: Too dirty and not worth visiting
review: We visited this place during our family visit to Mussoorie. The car journey and the weather was extremely good due to the Monsoon seasons to the Kempty. It was about 17 KM from Mussoorie Mall road. Once you reach Kempty, there is an option to use stairs of around 200-250 or rope way with a ticket of 120 per person. Once we reached Kempty it was unbelievable to see that natural waterfall has been encroached and surrounded by eateries. There was a small dirty and unhygienic pond and that was too crowded. The dirty pond was full of garbage, people have thrown Corn, bottles, wastes, food waste. The surrounding are of Waterfall was encroached with shops. People were taking bath in the dirty pond which was man made with concrete and nothing natural about it. The visit could be avoided as it is poorly maintained too.

title: bliss of nature.
review: TO be Frank visit here in the cold season i bet you would like it again warning DONT GO THERE IN SUMMER or RAINY season!!!

title: Main attraction but Average
review: This is one of the popular destination of Mussoorie but my experience was average.. Very crowdy place with dirty water..

title: Crowded and no management
review: This place is so crowded, all over there are shops covering the fall. You even can not get proper view of fall. So much dirt in the water.

title: Overrated, unhygienic
review: Too crowded, unhygienic place. Overrated

title: Refreshing
review: We visited this falls as a part of our Uttarakhand visit in august-september 2017. We had heared a lot about the place and were very excited to visit it and we were really happy after visiting it. It's amazingly clean cold water flowing naturally from the peaks and it's very refreshing. It was rainy season so the flow was bit fast so had to take care. No changing room facility installed currently so be prepared that way. One must visit restaurant located near the falls which sevres good coffee and Maggie. All in all a must visit place.

title: Too commercial...feels like artificial fall
review: Had Visited this place about 10 years early and had great memories of the spot.

title: soul refreshing
review: Its soul refreshing and in the month of december did swimming...n it was an adventurous experience for us.

title: Annoying
review: Is this a waterfall? Lol...too many construction all arround...from hill too to bottom...completly loss of natural beauty...like a mini swimming pool with huge crowd. Doesnt lookes like a fall...I was wondering why KF is such famous.

title: kempty falls
review: Though the fall is good to view but it is too congested and too much surrounded by the shops and vendors. Also the number of people bathing in the water was too much and could not enjoy the view of the fall.

title: There was a diaper and poop floating in the pool where people were bathing
review: Just below the fall there is a small pool. This is the place where North Indians who could not go to Simla or Nainitaal converge to get relief from scorching summer. For a moment, ignore the unruly crowd. Or you may pay upto 1500 bucks for parking. And everything else. There was poop floating in the pool. Why would someone want to get into a pool with poop? I noped. Avoid this place.

title: Good place for a Family outing
review: Kempty Falls is a good place for family outings. The waterfall is something one can enjoy amidst music and a huge crowd that gathers during the weekend.

title: Terrible
review: You do not see beauty of Kempty Fall anymore as the waterfall is surrounded with legal/illegal construction from all sides. I have been to Kempty falls 15 years back and it was a natures beauty which you could see every inch while coming down from every staircase. Today the stairs are fully encroached and you could see glimpse of falls only after coming down

title: Refreshing fall but crowded and dirty
review: The waterfall is very refreshing but the place has become one of the 'must dos' during a trip to mussorie. The effect can be seen around the place. There was a huge traffic jam and when we finally reached the place, it was seen to be overcrowded.Plastics were seen all around on the road.

title: Paradise lost
review: It is located 13 km away from the Mussoorie. The much hyped fall lost all its charm which was 20 years ago.But trip to Mussoorie is incomplete without visiting here. If you really want to enjoy its beauty ,then reach here before 8 am. Be prepare to shell out extra money to parking mafia. There is a facility of changing room and rented bathing costumes.

title: Attractive but crowdy
review: Place is attractive but someway the potholes and plunge pools are cemented and made like water park  place is crowdy and u will face traffic for hours to visit this place

title: HORRIBLE
review: I was shocked to see how unhealthy / unhygienic / unplanned  this place could be .

title: overcrowded.. !!
review: You travel 20 kms from mussorie and then walk almost 1000 steps and then find a small pool with 400-500 people in it...  would you jump into it ?  i did not.. as the feel wasn't good there.  too commercial and badly managed. could be a better place if there would have been more space for nature rather shops all around the pool.

title: Not worth the visit
review: Kempty falls has been commercialized to that extent that it does not look like a waterfall. It looks like a swimming pool and  is totally a waste of time travelling from Mussourie to this place wasting money for the cab and your precious time.

title: KEMPTY FALLS IS NOT GOOD AS IT WAS
review: Basis on our recent list to Empty Falls in mussorie, the falls are still there but people are not using our nature as it supposed to use. So much crowd making nature beauty dirty. It always better to go in off season when people are less so that you can have comfortable visit to falls and enjoyment will be at full fledge.

title: Crowded like a city
review: Waterfall is not so bad, but the crowd  steals the beauty & mens engineering almost killed the natural beauty.

title: Everyone is falling for it but i didnt like it that much
review: Didn't like it much. People are just pouring in. Take Hindola ride (Rope way) if you are going there with kids or elderly members. Though it's available on rent at the point but still carry your own costumes and towel.

title: Awesome Place for refreshment
review: Kempty Falls really a place , where you will enjoy , cool place with awesome water falls, surrounded by mountains .

title: Kempty falls Mussorie
review: Visited Mussoorie and first thing was told “must visit Kempty falls”.So on first morning after night rest engaged a taxi for Kempty falls.It was expensive by all standards,Rs 3000/ for 40 kms round trip.And the expensive taxi really pinched when we reached the so called FALLS!! It was one of the biggest let downs ever of my all travels(and I have travelled the world).It reminded of a six inch tubewell dispensing water!!! And the traffic was horrible.It was a total waste of an excellent day with beautiful weather .My sincere advice is to enjoy the weather and scenery rather than wasting your time and money on a worthless Water Fall .Have a nice trip.

title: Amazing & Natural
review: It's very amazing. Being here makes your heart very light and calm. Although, it's little crowded, but when you come into splash, you will forget all your sorrows and tensions. Beautiful and must visit place.

title: Wow an interesting trip
review: I want to suggest people go in May last or June 1st week. It would be definitely a great family trip, your children would definitely praise your this decision, there are many other things in Mussoorie near it.

title: Interesting ice water 💧
review: The Kempty Falls are on the hilly tracks of Uttarakhand, India, 15 km (9.3 mi) from Mussoorie along Kempty Fall Road. This place is nearly 1,364 m (4,475 ft) above sea level at 78°-02’ East longitude and 30° -29’ North latitude.

title: Major tourist attraction
review: Major tourist attraction

title: One of best places at Mussoorie
review: We have visited this place 2 times in past 4 years during our stay at Club Mahindra Mussoorie resort. It is located at scenic location and beautiful place to visit which should not be missed when one goes to Mussoorie.

title: Tourist spot
review: Very good place to enjoy falls. Best time to visit is under rainy season and after 3 pm. The place is easily accessible

title: Kempty Fall Visit with family and friends
review: Visited Kempty Fall on 20th June, Thursday expecting reasonable crowd.

title: Overrated crowded place
review: Waterfall is not so great but one can chill out in the water in hot days. Cloak rooms are costumes are available on rental basis.

title: Overrated.
review: Instantly regretted our decision to visit this place.

title: Missing natural beauty
review: Very crowded place, Never go with your vehicle. Prefer to hire local taxi as there was lots of traffic in peak season.

title: "Kempty Fall" is Turing into "Empty Fall"
review: I wanted my daughters to see this place as I had great memories when I visited this place way back in 1998. Almost everybody was cursing why I brought them here. My daughters first words "papa it looks like an Emtpty Fall" now.

title: Good
review: If you are in mussorie you must visit this place. Very nice water fall. When we reach there weather was awesome. You can have lot of fun with your friends

title: Attraction of Mussoorie
review: Kempty falls is one of the best attraction of Mussoorie, but you can not enjoy because of verymuch crowded in the vacations,

title: Bad, Dirty and crowded
review: We went there with family in our car after a long hilly and tired journey. We saw a organised loot everywhere. Followings are the charges there

title: Very Crowded, getting dirtier. Attraction going down every year
review: Kempty fall is around 20 km from the Mall road and on a reasonably good road. Now, there is a one way road created (maybe because of season rush), so while coming back, you have to take a different road, which definitely is not that good. Lots of paid parking who charge up to Rs 200 (depending upon how close you park your car to the fall).

title: Dirty. Polluted
review: The area surrounding the falls is very polluted and dirty. Local authorities must do something for cleanliness.

title: Very Crowded, getting dirtier. Attraction lost its natural beauty
review: Very Crowded, getting dirtier. Attraction lost its natural beauty.

title: Crowded
review: About 15 kilometers from Mussoorie,  Kempty Falls are situated.  It is about 1400 meters above sea level. The falls are  surrounded by high mountain ranges.  It is a good place for picnic and spending some time. Many tourists were taking  bath under the falls.  Falling  water splits into five falls and goes down 40 ft. on the rocks below.   There are many guest houses, restaurants and shops  selling souvenirs. Facility of fishing is there and permits are given by Forest Officer, Mussoorie.  We had our  photo taken in traditional Uttaranchal dress. Try to return to Mussoorie before sun set to avoid difficulty in driving on curvy roads.

title: Sudden Mussoorie
review: Nice place to spend a few hours. Waterfall nothing great. Okay experience... The cable car ride is a tourist attraction.

title: Dirty and overcrowded
review: Highly overrated place.

title: All the crowd
review: Kempty fall is not for gathering of water it is for gathering of delhites crowd and traffic.

title: Kempty falls.
review: Not a good place anymore. Its hugely crowded nowdays. You need to go down to see the waterfall by ropeway but its a pure wastage of money. There is so much crowd down there that you can’t even see the fall any kore. Tourists have degarded the place badly.

title: greta waterfall, spoilt by humans - shops, taxis etc
review: SOme government agency should just get the number of shops and taxis reduced to a tenth ASAP. a beautiful place ruined by locals who have no idea of how they are spoiling their treasure

title: Crowded
review: Very very owner crowded. Go to Jharipani falls and bhatta falls water is crystal clear and no crowd.

title: A bubbly place
review: The heart of Mussoorie tourism is the kempty falls. People from all parts of the country throng to have a shower in this fall. Huge rush and lots of stairs going down with shops aligned left and right of the stairs is the scene of every day.people who don't like walking can take a rope way down but have to wait a lot .overall a good getaway

title: Pathetic and overrated place!
review: We left for kempty falls early morning to avoid traffic and crowd.. climbed so many stairs and finally when we reached we were highly disappointed as the falls are surrounded by hundreds of shops and the water is extremely dirty..it looked like  sewage water, the crowds rush to this place in huge numbers causing long traffic jams..if you are a sensible Traveller avoid this mad rush as you will only end up getting frustrated.

title: Average experience
review: This place not for family only for boys.for my advice this don't go this place east of money.waste of energy.i am unhappy

title: This is not a waterfall but a public toilet
review: I have never seen a waterfall so bad, dirty and so overrated. The water is dirty and murky. There are way too many shops in the vicinity of the falls and they sell/rent swimming wear so that people can swim. The amount of people who go there to swim is insane and it has made the place more like a public toilet than a waterfall.

title: So so
review: I had visited kempty falls last month with family it was good experience till we reach kempty fall when we reach there it was looks like a pool we advise to care taker remove the all shop to view the nature

title: Very Crowded and in Pathetic condition
review: I visited Mussoorie in May 2018 and this was our first stop. First there is huge traffic jam near the falls and its very difficult to find parking. You should park before the stairs going down to falls otherwise you'll have to travel a 7KM extra to go back as after stairs it is one way traffic. Now to go to the falls, you can either take stairs or trolley. Issue with trolley is that while coming back you'll have to wait in a long line for around 20-30 mins. Now after everything once you reach the falls, its a very big disappointment. Falls is there which come down in an artificial swimming pool. That pool is surrounded by shops offering clothes and lockers. You feel like you do not have any peace of mind. And to add to that, the water in the pool is dirty because of so many people. I could not put my feet in the water forget about taking bath. You can go to any regular swimming pool better than that. This was a very pathetic.

title: Adventure trip to Kempty falls
review: Kempty falls is a must visit to enjoy the natural beauty, beautiful waterfall and interaction with mother nature. We visited this place in June, during monsoon, as rains added to our enjoyment. Water was so cold, kinda muddy, but we can take bath. I'd recommend one to take a bike trip from dehradun - mussoorie - kempty falls.

title: Beautiful waterfalls, but we have destroyed it
review: The falls by themselves are beautiful, but the surroundings are crowded with all kinds of shops and eateries. The natural beauty is completely lost, was really disappointing. Not an inch of greenery is preserved, everything was covered with shops and the place was very crowded.

title: Ultimate Fall
review: wonderful fall, we enjoyed lots, step wise step some small pool organised by nature where me with my family and friends took a shower

title: Enjoyable place for kids.
review: Kempty falls is the best place for children to enjoy in a natural way..lots of entertainment with natural water.full day picnic spot...excited to visit again.

title: Nice place, but over crowded
review: One of the best waterfalls maybe that we have. Too crowded and commercialised for one's satisfaction. Once you are in the water, feels like a small swimming pool where everyone is wanting to jump in

title: Nice view but one need to be advanced prepared
review: The Kempty fall was at the Hill and it was just for view.  if anyone wants to enjoy waterfall they need to go down with ropeway to the actual fall.  there various facility providers offering swimming cloths, slipper and pool to enjoy fall

title: Terrible
review: There is nothing great about this place. It is extremely dirty. You don't get to enjoy nature at this place. Better skip it.

title: Reach here early morning if you are travelling in Holiday season time.
review: Nice place will beautiful natural pools and small waterfalls (streams actually). It is formed on different levels and you can choose any one of the many pools to just take a dip and have some fun, It will be most beautiful when in full flow. Suggest you go on the higher levels, rather than the base pools (where you have an option to go by rope-way or stairs). Most importantly, if you are travelling in the holiday season, then make sure that you reach here early morning, or else it becomes too crowded and then there is lot of problem for parking as well.

title: Horrible experiance
review: Not worth a visit..too crowded and dirty

title: Not worth it
review: Had heard a lot about this place, being one of the major attractions of Mussoorie but turned out to be a good waterfall but very dirty, not maintained by the local authorities. Instead head to the other local waterfall which the locals suggest.

title: Average
review: Water falling in a small pond. Nothing great. No point visiting if the place is crowded. Very cramped and small place.

title: overcrowded
review: Its a small place and always remains crowded, as it is among the main attractions of mussoorie. People used to bath and enjoy there in pond. One can easily get changing room, floating tyres there.

title: Too much commercialization
review: I have visited the place earlier and at that time the place had its natural beauty. But now they have added so many commercial earning points that the natural beauty is lost and it appears to be a big swimming pool rather than a waterfall.

title: Kempty fall
review: A must visit place near Mussoorie.

title: Not a good place anymore
review: Poor management of the place especially by policewalas. All standing idle. This place can be easily managed without making it one way traffic. But that demands efforts by traffic police which is Zero. If you have to drive back 100 mts, you will have to cover 7 kms extra. They have not even mentioned this information on road. So better take a parking before the "stairs to ropeway". By doing this, you can pick your family from stairs after you pick your car back from parking.

title: Best
review: Best place I like there , nice water fall with water ,really had fun with friends.they can make a bit organised place in terms of parking and stalls

title: Kempty  fall - heavily crowded -  huge trafffic jam
review: We planned to visit the fall in mussorie .  But there is huge traffic jam and heavily crowded .... so we went ahead with out stopping .   This is one of the famous place in mussorie .... but huge traffic .... so kindly plan accordingly

title: Waste of time
review: Did not like the place ..as it was way to crowded ...and water level was not much ...its very dirty also.

title: Water
review: The place is quiet beautiful but is also isolated. We stay for some time took some nice pics and then moved on.

title: Great place, but overcrowded
review: Beautiful falls, with Ropeway ride ( chargeable - 120 rs per head ) to go in .. you can carry a change of clothes or buy in rent. Enough paid changing room. Water is cold. Overcrowded on weekends and in summers. A little dirty water from all the people bathing. A big market enroute- bargain n buy things.

title: Holiday
review: Great place for family or friends

title: Never visit waste of time.
review: It's a waste visiting this place. This place is no more worth visiting. No water only garbage everywhere.

title: Feel
review: Weather was perfect and coming from top of hill we saw a fall from car window that we knew as kempty fall good but it's steep flow from up is unique.

title: Extremely commercial place with beautiful waterfall
review: It's a very high waterfall with a water park type pool activity .highly commercialized ..not a gud place for nature lovers who come for such things in a hill station .

title: Most Famous attraction of Mussoorie
review: Kemtpy Falls is the most famous attraction. The falls are not BIG but, they have setup all the facilities for the tourist which makes a good place to visit. One can walk up the falls or use ropeway to go downhill at the Kempty lake. A good time is spent at this point.

title: Good but over rated
review: Place is crowdy...it is a artificial pond developed...the base of pond is rough full of stones,I will suggest carry waterproof slippers will help. You can feel suffocated.

title: Superb
review: Must visit in Mussoorie. Clean water n great view. Note: if u don't want to rent swimwear pls carry it.

title: Highly overated
review: Not worth the long drive as the waterfall is just about ok. Add to that the crass commercialization, the traffic and the unruly crowd a strict no no

title: TERRIBLE
review: It's not Kempty falls, but Kempty shops.It is a classic example of how unplanned commercialisation can kill the natural beauty of a place. There are shops selling various stuff and a ropeway but no natural beauty. We went excited but came back disappointed with the falls.

title: Wonder
review: Again a good place to visit. Must .visit place. Recommend to visit this place lot of recreational activities are there and a good market is also there .

title: Nice place to chill with family and friends
review: One can enjoy the waterfall as long as they like. Swimming costumes like t-shirt and shorts can be rented there as well

title: Intresting place to visit
review: I liked lot this place to visit for chill with family and friends but avoid to go in Indian holidays because of crowd. cold water.

title: Not as good as expected
review: Kempty fall is a overrated place with so much crowd, didn't meet expectations, better to do some other places visit

title: Good but highly commercialised
review: We went to this place with very low expectations. But actually found it good. There are basically two sections from the main road, one way is going below and it has a ropeway to go down. Boating is also available at that point along with the bathing area. But we chose to go upwards using stairs and we found it to be right choice as at the top most location, it was a natural view of the fall. Downwards it is highly commercialised.

title: Much better to avoid
review: It was a highly recommended sightseeing by our local guide so we had expectations from the place but on reaching we were highly disappointed. It has a small distance ropeway leading to a small waterfall which accumulates water in a small pool type of place and everyone is taking bath in it. People are not appropriately dressed while taking bath which is a very ugly sight. Overall disappointed with the place.

title: Crowded
review: Waterfall pool congestion. Salesman worry you peddling some stuff.  Rope way offers good view but huge waiting time. Of course it was peak season.

title: Nice place
review: Ensure a early morning visit before the crowds come in. The place is reasonably well developed for tourism

title: Overhyped attraction
review: With lower levels of retained rainfall, the falls, which are really a cascade,are measly. In addition, the high number of people in a small area make a visit underwhelming. Added to this is the heavy traffic to and fro from Mussoorie.

title: crowded place
review: View of fall from top / midway road is beautiful. It is a very crowded place.

title: Beautiful falls
review: The most heard point of mussoorie. The falls are beautiful and safe to bathe in. But too crowded.  You can see people more than tha pond below the falls. I would suggest to avoid weekends if planning to go for a bath at the falls.

title: Crowdy place
review: The falls is good. But the place is very crowdy. Lots of people are found to take bath in the pool at the foot of the water fall. There is a rope way also.

title: Swimming Pool not worthy of its fame
review: Kempty falls was highly disappointing, especially when i looked back to pics of our first trip there from 1994.

title: Good experience
review: I visited this place just yesterday. First of all I would like to inform you that this place has nothing to do with nature. No good scene from the place. It's a place with a chilled water spring which has been converted into a swimming pool. Here are too many concretes in the pool which will make your legs uncomfortable. I will never recommend this place to old aged people. But it's OK for a one time visiting.

title: Awesome
review: One should not miss this place if they visit Mussoorie, this is what us called as gift of nature. Just awesome!!

title: Destroyed by rampant commercialization
review: The waterfall now lands in a cemented pool, surrounded by concrete structures which house changing rooms.  On the side the trash thatvis generated in this narrow place is visibly an eyesore.

title: A natural wonder ruined
review: Kempty falls could have been a real beauty but unfortunately people, buildings and over commercialisation have ruined it. A filthy man made pool at the bottom is full of howling people and the area surrounding the falls is full of litter. If only the local government had control and could preserve natural parks and wonders this waterfall would have been so much better.

title: Review
review: Best place for family budger outing. Heavenly atmosphere, blissful stay with peaceful environment in the lapse of nature.

title: A nice place
review: A nice place to unwind. But has been cluttered as of now with construction going on at site. The old wooden bridge is a charm. Cold water soothes you down.

title: It was nice experience
review: nice water fall , fully enjoy , water was cold but it was very nice .. awesome location and from main road just 10 minute distance  of water fall..for old people there is cable car facility too..

title: Overcrowded, overexploited and a bit overhyped
review: I have been to the Kempty falls a couple of times now and I feel this place is just exploited to the extreme without due attention to maintenance and amenities. Crowd on weekends is just insane and you may easily get stuck for 2 hours before you could reach the entrance to the falls. There should definitely be better management of traffic at the approach road.

title: Excellent waterfall
review: This is very big and beautiful waterfall. Water is very cold. This is approx. 13km from mall road. We enjoyed bathing in this fall.

title: Good enough
review: One thing for enjoying in mussorie is kempty fall .....It's a very good experience .....every thing their is awesome....their you can enjoy swimming ,ride also

title: Kempty Falls
review: When we arrived at the Kempty Falls it wasn’t what we expected as the falls are divided by the road , but we went down through the shop/stalls and were surprised at what we found , the falls are nice and at the bottom of the falls there is a pool for people to  swim in. On the high side of the road there are a couple of smaller falls , all very nice.

title: An average place to visit
review: Though we had been in the month of February hence the waterfall is not at its peak. But one can certainly spend gud times at the waterfall. it all depends on the traveler what he oe she likes to visit or enjoy. For a nature lover person its a good place to visit.

title: Much a do about nothing.
review: One off the main attraction near mussoorie, this is on the way to chardham yatra( Hindu pilgrimage) this use to be a clean beautiful falls when I visited some 15 years back. Now with everything else it has become more popular  blut it could be maintain better for the visitors.

title: Nice water fall but needs make over
review: It was a nice water fall but there were lot of people on the bottom were they had made it as a swimming pool.  It needs to be a bit better so that people with family can enjoy.

title: Milky
review: just like the life things in here are in continuous flow and harmony with the universe, loved the surroundings and calm cool surroundings

title: Safe waterfall with scenic beauty
review: This is a must visit point in Mussoorie. You can carry swimming costumes if you want to enjoy waterfall. Safe for Kids also.

title: Wasting natural beauty
review: A natural beauty which has been overcast by the crowd . Poor parking and crowded rows of stalls enroute make it more difficult to enjoy. The natural waterfall seems to be affected by manual interference. Nonetheless the chilliness of water is refreshing. A great detiring natural spa.

title: Very Entertaining
review: The fall is very beautiful. there was a great rush, We were lucky that we reached there around 10.00 before the rush started. One should enjoy the bath at the water fall streams at above the  road also  though main fall is down the hill. rope was is interesting.

title: Cascading Falls
review: During morning time we visited the famous Kempty falls area of mussorrie. We have to use small cable car to get the point.

title: AVERAGE VISIT
review: Not Much Worth as it was before because it had been made so commercialised that the beauty of the Falls have deteriorated. I had been to Kempty Falls so many times but this time I was not satisfied.The Water Fall is as good as it was before but human activities has increased so much over there that it is losing its beauty.

title: Superb
review: Excellent palace to visit here.

title: Awesome Mussoorie
review: Well, to start with Kempty falls is the most imperative place during your stint with mussoorie. Place is quite well managed with rope way and other necessary requisites for old age people and children.

title: Just ok kind of waterfall
review: If you have got time then you can visit, otherwise you can skip. Earlier when I had gone in 2006, it was such a wonderful waterfall in Mussoorie but now it is not a worth visit.

title: Nothing much to do...
review: Frankly speaking I did not like the Falls at all. But one can visit if you have nothing to do and have ample time to spend. As Kempty Falls is far away from Mussoorie. There's a rope way to go down & come up. Charge is hefty. Mind you roads are very curvy. So be light Stomach when you are going.

title: Too crowded and having lot of garbage lying near falls
review: It was a good fall earlier but now this is very crowded place and not a worth visit. It is not well maintained therefore have lot of garbage lying near the falls. Can be avoided and visit another better place.

title: Excellent water falls on the hills
review: This is around 20kms from Mussorie town and amazing place to spend time with kids . Pools are available for swim and have fun, many traditional dressing photo shops and restaurants enroute.

title: Lovely view and place
review: Kempty fall is too cool and nice place ...... the place is too cool in December-March,..,, rain was there recently with snow fall..... nice place to trip with couple and family

title: Good place to visit in mussoorie
review: Must see place, both ways cable car option is good if you are travelling with kids @ 120 per person net. Very crowded and heavy traffic congestion on weekends. Try to visit in morning for avoiding rush

title: Extemely commercialized, not worth it..
review: I visited kempty falls on my trip to Mussoorie. Though these are natural falls, it's extremely commercialized and is pretty much like a small water park. You will find shops renting swimwear, lockers and changing rooms all around. But if you want to get into the water, I would suggest taking a change of clothes for yourself. Too crowded and not worth the time and drive. Better look for other untouched spots around and make the most of your time.

title: A peaceful place
review: Clean, cool and peaceful. What more do I say? It was overlooking from my room. Spent the whole day viewing it. Talk about stress relief

title: Nice falls but commercialization has destroyed the view completely
review: I have old pictures of Kempty falls which was very beautiful. The current commercialization has actually destroyed the natural view. We took a package from taxi stand near Hotel Devlok Primal. We shared the cab between 2 families. The cost was 1125 per family. It covered Kempty Falls, Kempty Lake and Buddha Temple.

title: Kempty market
review: It looks nonsense to distort a piece of nature to such an extent.

title: Short trip from Delhi via Dehradun
review: Kempty falls is one of the eye candy of Dehradun.

title: Overcrowded with mismanagement all over
review: Classic example of how an excellent view can be ruined by overcrowding and mismanagement. One may visit the place if like the overcrowding.

title: kempty falls
review: A must visit destination in Mussoorie. with mesmerizing beauty chilled waterfall surrounded by green valleys from four sides. kempty falls are around 10 km from Mussoorie. one can reach Dehradun then take a bus to Mussoorie at 60 rs and then take a gmvn bus from library bus stand at rs 200 to Kempty falls and back or hire a private taxi at rs 2000. or take a direct bus to kempty falls from Dehradun railway station subject to availability. kempty falls are divided into two segments upper an lower. and for both, you have to trek 1 to 2 km. it is advisable if you want to take bath in waterfall then head towards upper segment water is more clear there if lucky you can see monkeys on trees. you can also get costumes at rs 20 and lockers at rs 50 and tube at rs 50. changing rooms are there for ladies at rs 10. and for stomach lot of shops are there offering tea, coffee, corn, Maggi as well as all cuisine. But remember if you go by Gmvn bus you will get only 2 hrs to explore kempty which is quite less because one can spend 3 to 4 hrs there.

title: Beautiful waterfall!!!
review: Nice relaxation for layover while on long route... but not maintained enough.. dint felt like spending much time!!!

title: Beautiful
review: Good for photography. Water is not not clean. Not maintained stairs and surrounding. Do bargain for stuff.

title: Amazing water fall
review: It is worth going at the amazing water fall and it is really very good. This place is absolute heaven and so beautiful to look at this place.. Must visit this place for once in your life,  it is absolutely mind blowing. There is a rope way facility which takes you at the bottom of the falls and the price for one person is 120 rupees for both sides. Kids loved it. It gets very cold in winter. Kempty falls is worth going.

title: Nice
review: Very nice waterfall very good enjoy there very good for shopping sport I buy something for there is very reasonable price

title: Skip this one
review: Its pretty far from Mussorie. if you have already paid for a car then its ok. Otherwise dont spend money on this. Falls is surrounded by concrete structures,  old clothes and polythene bags. Not sure why even travel companies take  tourists there.

title: Lovely Waterfall
review: Wow! Great attraction in Queen of Hills Mussoorie. Just 15 KM from the main city the road and approach is also excellent.

title: Not as much fun
review: The journey to the falls is not worth it at all. The falls are dirty and not fun at all. Avoid your visiting.

title: In poor condition and polluted area
review: Definitely not a place to revisit anytime soon. The allure of a waterfall is what brings tourists out all the way here. But the environmental damage and unkempt area is a disgrace. The Indian government needs to do a better job protecting while managing this tourist attraction.

title: Bad
review: Kempty falls is now just pond with water falls. It was not maintained has doesn't have any natural charm. Not worth the visit.

title: Must See falls
review: Kempty Falls is a must see place around Mussoorie. You have to step down many stairs (more than 100) after you park you vehicle. And have to climb same number of stairs after your enjoyment.

title: Hyped
review: The falls had less water in March by the time we went. It is quiet a small area where a pond like thing collects the water of the falls where people wete getting wet. I expected it to be really big falls but it is a small waterfall. But we still enjoyed the spot.

title: Familytrip
review: It's a nice cool calm and natural place with a great view around.watrfall is flowing in a very natural way . We get many nice locations for perfect clicks

title: beautiful water fall
review: it was very awesome to view such a nice water fall during my recent visit to hotel Madhuban Highlands, it is just 25 minutes drive from this hotel.

title: Too touristy.
review: Too touristy. At times it is dirty as well. No proper parking. The place is full of beggers.

title: Skip this waterfall
review: Kempty Falls is located west of Mall Road and is about 10 kms away.  This area has become too commericalised and there are shops all around.  The area is not too clean either.  In summer it becomes a water park.  A beatiful waterfall that is n longer worth the visit.

title: awsome Kemy fall love u
review: what a beautiful is this water fall, must see place without seeing this place the trip to mussoorie is incomplete. On the way is Madhuban Highlands good place to stay and stop for a short break for a meaql etc

title: Overhyped
review: Have heard a lot about this place but did not amuse much. You have to walk down a lot to go to this place. This is a small waterfall that comes down on a pool-like area where water assembles. People take a shower here. Not very interesting place.

title: Need some maintenance
review: Though the fall looks good but the area around need maintenance and should be cleaned regularly.. it's a tourist place so it be better if it could be maintained properly

title: Great view
review: A good view of the falls can be possible only when one climbs downhill. From the top we can only see a glimpse. The Maggi over there is a must try.

title: Chilling under falls
review: The main local attraction is kempty falls, approximately 20 km from Mussoorie this is always filled with tourists, the water is clean and pure, having a bath under the chilling water flowing through the body is unexplainable. Must visit

title: Not a big fall and far from Mussoorie city
review: Kempty falls are a bit 15-20 km from main Mussoorie city. Falls are also not that big with almost zero maintainence and cleanliness at falls bottom. Taxi will take 2000+ rupees to reach there. Not worth the money spent.

title: Very Best...
review: This place is really awesome.The falls is not very big but the speed with which the water falls is very high and cold too.The temperature of the water is negative.Still I took a bath and I was shivering too much.Apart from this they also have several other water sports.Para gliding, Balloon bounce, Ropeway and many others.While travelling from mall road to kempty falls there are several sight seeing pkaces with wonderful mountains.There are shops along the way to kempty falls selling amazing stuffs.I liked the ropeway as it was cheap to travek.Though the distance was not much but it provided a wonderful adventure.

title: Worst, over hyped place of Mussoorie
review: This place Kempty falls is a over hyped spot & not at all value for money. We went there in a taxi which charged 1560 & the place was a waste of money for us. So please skip this if you come for short time.

title: Avoid!!!
review: This waterfall was a major disappointment! Right next to the road and poorly kept it looked more like an over flowing sewerage pipe! We spent the best part of two minutes there, which is two minutes of our lives we will never get back! Such a let down!

title: Heart of mussoorie
review: Kempty Falls is one of the best Falls in our India.It is just awesome and the Heart of Mussoorie.We enjoy it.

title: Its so disheartening
review: I was visiting this place after a gap of 40 years. I had such good memories of Kempty falls that this time it was a rude shock. the administration in collusion with builders has completely destroyed the serenity of this beautiful tourist spot. This is a glaring example of what we are doing to nature in India.

title: Nature love
review: It is a very good place for nature loving people it is situated in the middle of the mountains which makes it more attractive it is good to visit there

title: Good place
review: Good place to visit. This place has become too much commercialized. A lot of shops have come up. There should be a check on the number of shops opening here to preserve natural beauty.

title: A beautiful spot made dirty
review: Unfortunately my experience with most of the places in and around Dehradun including this one has been that these places which were once a treat to eyes are now nothing more than a disappointment - they have been made dirty by encroachment, shops and cheap crowd. Don't waste your time for this place.

title: A beauty destroyed by mankind
review: Got very disappointed and hurt to see what we humans have done to Nature. This is the best example of this. Such a beautiful waterfall simply destroyed by Mankind. Instead of taking measures to preserve this, I suppose the Government and people there have destroyed it for their monetary gains.

title: good place to visit
review: its was good place to visit

title: 'Difficult to reach' falls
review: You are suppposed to walk a long way downwards through stairs before reaching near the falls. While going downwards, you will find the road covered with shops on both side. Shops containing all kind of things one can find in a local market. Thankfully there are shades & seats for the visitors. So one can take rest while walking such long distances. One-time-visit!

title: Beautiful waterfall in mussoorie!!
review: Kempty Falls is a magnificent waterfall and recreation area set in the lap of a green valley. It’s a favorite hangout of local residents, who come to cool off in waterholes, have fun with relaxed boating activities and enjoy scenic picnics. Inflatable rings are available to rent and present the chance to float lazily on the shallow water!!!

title: not good experience
review: Kempty fall is a place where you can visit in summers it is basically a artifical water fall and a big pond its far away from dehradun and only place to visit in its locality. pond is always full of crowd and you need to fight for space there are no facility for changing rooms, lodging and fooding facility. better to visit water park where you will get same fun with hygiene and also with all facility, you also no need to go particular kempty fall, you can go any water park and enjoy the same even better than kempty fall.

title: Beautiful waterfall
review: Kempty fall is really adventure here also we go buy rope way . Most beautiful is upper part of kempty falls transparent water and small waterfalls. Very beautiful view

title: It's huge waterfall in this area
review: I have been there just to see it because I have heard that this place is amazing I found it good too. But most good time is to visit it in summer around march to October or any time in morning till afternoon if you want to make a fun in your tour . So suggest you to go there good place not bad .

title: Nice view
review: This was my second visit to this place. The view of the fall was awesome. A good number of shops are are also here, which sells locally made items.

title: nice place and waterfall
review: nice place to visit.. the cable car ride is just fun.. nice waterfall worth driving and going so far to see Kempty water fall

title: An attraction beautiful but overrated
review: Kempty Falls is a natural waterfall and the site has efficiently been commercialised. A large number of shops have sprung up in the region, and cleanliness is not good. Moreover, we found during our trip, the place kept too high in the to-do lists of the tourists. The efforts that it takes to reach Kempty Falls from the city and the price hat has to be paid for entry and the joy one can extract from the place are not in proportion.

title: Perfect visit!!!
review: Superb and fantastic place to visit. We visited last month. And such a very nice place to visit. Fantastic falls.

title: Clean and chilled water but average place
review: Waterfall is huge and its water is very clean and chilled also but it is surrounded by many small shops. You can find local market near the fall. You can find many adventure activities there. So, if you are adventure junkie so you can try that. This place is very crowded.It is one time visit place

title: Not worth a visit
review: Not worth visit. Visited earlier also and that time it was really pleasure but now there is nothing worth coming to this place.

title: Vacation
review: Fine place to stroll.

title: Scenic
review: Great and scenic, must visit for nature lovers and enthusiastic travellers, conveniently located from mussorie,

title: Had a great experience of this waterfall
review: kempty fall is one of the most beautiful waterfalls. we enjoyed a lot at this place. But there is many stairs to get down to the fall that was also enjoyable. we did shopping from here for my son.

title: Not Bad..
review: We reached Mussoorie by public Transport and then we had two options either to take taxi with a package around 2k or bus which takes 200 per head for atour to kempty falls. the bus is a two way ticket. nice experience with cable car. Maintenance is average.

title: Blah
review: We went to Kempty Falls towards the end of December. While the weather was just about perfect and chilly, there isn't much to do or see here

title: Kempty Falls Mussorie
review: Kempty falls is   situated about 16 km from Mussoorie town and can be easily reached through road. Beautiful view of this waterfall is spoiled by a number of  small shops and construction work around it and lack in cleanliness . Even at the base of kempty falls there are shops and temporary structures. One can use steps to reach the base of water falls or can use the cable car, that is close to the starting point of steps  This place is good for 1-2 hrs trip .Santura devi temple is on the way to Kempty falls  .View of  Shivalik range of Himalayas and valley below ,from temple is beautiful. There aren't   any big restaurants but have many small shops offering snacks.

title: camp + tea falls must visit
review: camp + tea falls according to foreigner before freedom they came here for for enjoy these three things far from city in peace heavnly place of uttrakhand,no words for this place only u feel yourself when visit, few km far frm mussorie only these two three  things famous in the name of mussorie kempty falls is one of them

title: Too overated
review: One can miss the kemty falls as it's too overrated instead of coming till here and looking at the falls suggest to walk around the mussoorie roads

title: Natural Spa
review: Nice place where you can take a natural spa treatment as water falling from a height which serves massage. Avoid bringing kids with you as well as not suggestive in the time of winters.

title: must visit if ready to take a dip
review: Kempty falls is worth visit ONLY if u are ok to take a dip in chilling water else u can skip this place as its faroff from mall road and as there are many other places to just click photos...Btw... once u are inside water ... u wud not like to come out... its awesome... clean and super chilled water

title: One of the most dirtiest places near mussorie
review: Kempty falls had been the biggest attraction around mussoorie but in recent times this has been the most dirty n unhealthy place due to non maintenance of the fall n surrondings.
