Water in the fall is so smelly n dirty and shopkeepers around it are busy in selling the same swimming costumes multiple times a day to the visitors ,clearly a loot

title: Ok ok !!
review: Nothing much .. but if you like waterfall , it’s good . The view is good . But you have to walk down a lot to reach below the fall .

title: heavy Traffic
review: We got stuck in heavy traffic and finally decided not to go, As later we realised our decision was gud not to visit, Its heavily crowded and commercialized

title: Kempty falls
review: Kempty fall is situated in the outskirts of the town .The place is over crowed and has rope way  and other water activities.There is no proper parking and the place has no proper eating joint.

title: natural waterfall
review: Must place to visit , in summers -issue of traffic jam issue and parking. Visit early morning of first half

title: Kempty the fall
review: Kempty fall is a place where you can enjoy at any time of season . Now it has lot of shops surrounding .

title: Not upto the mark
review: The water fall is part of nature and should have been kept naturally but lot of construction around make every possible diversion to move your focus away from the waterfall view.

title: love u kempty..
review: it was a thundering experience in the chilled water of the kempty fall , but it makes us crazy to be under that fall.me n my husband spend a beatiful three to four hours long time in that super chilled romantic water n the crowd was superb with families, couples, college groups , frnds groups etc.

title: Overrated tourist destination
review: It takes forever and several traffic jams to reach destination.

title: The famous falls !!
review: The famous falls are good for the people who like viewing water falls and a chilled temperature .But reaching the destination is little uncomfortable as you need to climb down a lot of stairs .There are lots of little roadside shops which sell some eatables and other ornamental things.You can rent a swimsuit if you wish to enter the waters otherwise its a compact place with no other attraction.There are network issues as well.Spending half an hour is enough .

title: Nice place , too cold weather
review: It's changed a lot.Now it's looking more artificial.Some new construction is going on.

title: Natural delight...
review: Breaking the stereotypes of cities n hectic lyf the place offers eye pleasing view of how beautiful nature can be and soft, light, and mesmerising view will surely give u a fresh feeling. Located at 6400ft above and just 30kms away from mussoire this is must visit for all types of people.

title: Nice place to visit
review: Avoidable. A lot of stairs to travel to reach the falls. Can be a avoided in the month of December. ..

title: Enjoyed
review: We enjoyed very much there, stalls for eatables, with higwire trolley , parking available outside, no entry ticket required, and water was very child of the fall

title: Crowded place
review: Taxis charge exorbitant. Better to avail ropeway. May be worth seeing post monsoon. Beauty lost due to stalls

title: Enjoyed a lot
review: Emmm.. loved this. Fall water was sooo chilled to dip into it but still as many were in the pool Me my sis n my mom just went into the water like anything. We really enjoyed a lot. Swimming costumes, trousers n t shirts n shorts are available there for rental. So if you haven't carried your own stuff it's completely fine. Every shop has there own changing rooms as well locker facility. You may enjoy there a lot. We enjoyed there a lot. Selfies were own... :)

title: For a extreme fun
review: You can choose this place after a hectic day, water is extremely cold however one thing i didn't like in this place the crowd, People are not here with well behaved.

title: Nice place to hangout with FRIENDS
review: it was a nice experience at kempty falls, though it was not as clean as I thought, but it was good, it think you can go there in all seasons, you can also SWIM there.

title: Normal experience
review: If you want to visit start early as its way is crowded on weekends. It is just an outing but not that outstanding that one should mandatory plan.

title: Awesome Place to get Full Refreshment
review: Place Kempty Falls we enjoyed with great enjoyment. Simply awesome place to visit. You will find yourself connected with the nature. The water fall attracts a lot. Weather will prevent us to make a jump into the lake but as the step goes into the water you won't come out till totally exhausted. Enjoyed nice time.

title: Nice view
review: Had a good time. Very nice view. You have to walk 300 mtrs to reach it. Rest very good. Kids loved it. It gets very cold in winter . Be well geared up.

title: Fall for it
review: I went mussoori for the first time and i must say Kempty falls is place like nowhere else.  Its a pleasure to watch the waterfall coming out from inside a hill.  And the scenery is just a treat to the eyes

title: Handshake with Nature
review: Here the water falls from a height of nearly 50 feet. To visit the site of the waterfall, you would need to climb the stairs and reach to the top where is fall is located. You feel connected with Mother Nature at this place.  We enjoyed playing in water here.

title: Must go!!
review: This is a must place to go with family!!

title: Good place to spend an hour
review: This place is okay type . When we visited there was maintenance going on but overall average with one time visit .

title: Nice place
review: Good place to visit, speacially on summer, natural beauty, beautiful mountain and fountain, but the only problem Road and parking, not enough space for parking so if you going to visit there please keep ready for jam.

title: The Mussoorie visit!
review: The fall is no doubt beautiful, but there are better places in Mussoorie like george everest if you have less time and you cannot cover all the spots. We were lucky enough to experience the season's first snowfall on the first day of our stay at Mussoorie..the second day was sunny and we took a walk from library square to camel's back. The view was beautiful. I suggest you to simply take a walk around at Mussoorie and experience the calmness of the hilly paradise.

title: Sure not to be missed!
review: This is a must visit place in the town. The water falling from the mountains is so cool and chilly. The rental shop guys are really nice but make sure not to fall into their catch and clear everything before the transaction. The food is also good. Overall a good place to visit.

title: Very Nice Water Fall
review: Very Nice Waterfall It Is Photozenic. Nice Seenic Beauty. Must Go There. Best For Couples And Group Travellers

title: A Tourist Spot Hyped Much
review: Kempty falls is indeed a beautiful tourist spot, but very limited and a lot of walking required. At the beginning, some options for swimming, boating and zip line are also offered. To reach the main waterfall, you definitely need to walk up the steep slope/stairs. I feel it is much hyped than what is actually is.

title: More hype than anything.
review: A very average tourist destination. The only good thing is the drive to the falls and the little zip lining at the spot. The waterfall is beautiful by itself but is ruined by all the man made selling extravaganza around it. The place has very limited space and can get crowded rather easily. Overall nothing extra ordinary and you won't be missing much if you skip it.

title: Kempty falls
review: We did a day trip on local bus trip had a lovely time and everyone who worked there was respectful and willing to help in anyway lovely scenery and falls quite impressive

title: Coolest!
review: Initially I was bit apprehensive to take a dip but once u go inside it’s simply amazing. I wish it was bit well managed but ok to visit once.

title: Kiran Gorava
review: Very good water fall and during off winter season one could enjoy in water fall. Travel is litle longer and one needs to preserve energy

title: Kempty falls mussoorie
review: It is worth going as the fall is full of water and it is really very good. There is a rope way which takes you at the bottom of the falls but the rope way closes at 5pm hence those who want to avail the rope way should reach kempty falls by 3pm to really enjoy the place. Kempty falls is worth going

title: nothing great
review: Travel at leat 45minutes from hotel to find nothing there not worth going also they charge you entrance fee once we entered on return they shut gate down we had a terrible time getting down to get to our tempo traveller . looks like lot disputes within the people at kempty fall & entrance people who take entry  fees

title: Falls
review: To enjoy the roadside mountain view, its an excellent trip. One will mingle with the nature and forget all the worldly matters.

title: Kempty Falls
review: t was my second trip to kempty falls. Though I would say it has degraded over the years. There are other better waterfalls in India.

title: Nice
review: The main attraction of mussorie but is very crowded and they have commercialised it.but it's definitely wroth a visit.

title: Nature destroyed
review: What could have been and probably was , a great natural water falls, some strange constructions have destroyed the natural aspect completely.

title: A beautiful falls surrounded by concrete and crowd
review: If u r in Mussoorie then it is a must visit place. Take a car and visit it. On weekends expect lot of crowd. A short ride by ropeway takes u to the bottom where u would find the falls gushing down . People are seen to take bath . It must have been superb years back.

title: Fun
review: Fun place to hangout with family/friends.

title: Beauty of nature
review: Kempty Falls is MUST SEE place of tourist interest on list of visitors visiting Mussorie

title: Beautiful place
review: This place is absolute heaven..  water is so cold.. and so beautiful to look at this place.. all i can say.. is just visit this place for once in your life.. its absolutely mind blowing

title: Awesome experience
review: My friends and cousins took a bath in the waterfall,although it was too chilled but their experience was awesome ;)

title: Great experience
review: Kempty falls is a great place near to Mussoorie where you can easily take a bath in falls... there is a rope ways facility so even older people can go there and can enjoy the beauty of kepty fall... there are some attractive shops there!! The atmosphere near the fall is best.. and government is also developing the place near to kepty falls..

title: A tantalizing view
review: The place is teeming with tourists. You can have a good view of the beautiful water fall. You can also take a ride in the rope way.

title: Nice
review: It is one of the popular attraction in mussoorie.can be seen from far away.in rainy season it gets dangerous.one can have adip in ghis cold water.ropeway service is available here.

title: great but crowed
review: place was great and a must visit place in mussoorie. but it was much crowed so you can not enjoy. boating in artificial lake was also good. restaurant was not great and was not clean. we take a taxi from mall rad 1550 rs rent.

title: Nice falls, but spoilt
review: A nice waterfall, spoilt by unimaginative constructions and business activities around it, making it look more like a park than a naturally beautiful waterfall. It is still worth a visit, though.

title: Water fall..... Picturesque
review: We friends had a awesome time in this famous n very well known waterfall.

title: Lovely falls ... but highly dirtied by the plethora of commercial units/shops in the vicinity
review: I had been to kempty around 2008 and recently during 2017. It is a lovely natural space for people of all age (those with knee or walking problems may assess the possibility before going as there are many steps to climb). However the area could be maintained in a much much better and organised way. The many shops and eateries ruin  the natural surrounds.

title: Had been with family
review: It's decent trekking experience. The water-fall is beautiful but I think, it's been too commercialized and too many shops and restaurants around it, which makes it very crowded

title: Gud place but bad croud
review: Gud place but very bad croud food was not very gud so so food is available just to fill something very famous is not available

title: Good outing
review: We visited when the bridge construction was going on after the floods. So with a little inconvenient at time. But make it sure to visit.

title: Lovely place near mussorie
review: Kempty falls is one of the great and lovely place near musorie. Both kids and family can enjoy in waterfalls, boating and kids play. One can spend easily more than half day. But water is so cool when we visited . Also, the water flow in falls is very fast. I would say that this is the must visit place in mussorie.

title: Must visit place but avoid winter time as the water is very chilly you cant even stand there for 5 minutes
review: very beautiful place, one should definitely go there during visit at mussoorie. should avoid winter time as water is very chilly

title: "MUST VISIT TOURIST ATTRACTION OF MUSSOURIE "
review: Kempty water falls is situated about 15 km from mall area. It is the best place to visit in Mussourie perticularly if you are with young children.There is facilities of Roapway to go down the fall. Good facilities of swimming costume and life jacket. You can have a beautiful photographs at Kempty fall.

title: Much ado about nothing
review: Over rated spot... the place is unmaintained.... even the falls lack much glamour.... way to the ropeway horrible

title: average falls
review: the area around the falls is in terrible shape, its just a 5 min . worth stay but you pay Rs 100 for Mussoorie , 18 KM to get back to Dehradoon. Not a worthwhile visit.

title: Ok for weekend gathering
review: I have visited Mossouri n Kepty Fall in October. If you expect a great view of fall u will be disheartened. It's beautiful but by no means breath taking or overwhelming. There had been and landslide and way to the fall has been constructed with a iron bridge which is risky.

title: Yiur trip to Mussoorie will not be complete without a visit to Kempty Falls
review: Located on the way between Dehradun-Mussoorie road, Kempty Falls is a beautiful location to take a dip in the water falling from an altitude of 4 metres . It offers a mesmerizing panoramic view as the water falls from a great height. The pond formed at the bottom of the falls make an excellent spot for swimming, fishing, and bathing. There is also a cable car ride at the Kempty Falls sight seeing point . However, as was suggested to us  by a lady selling bhuttas on the way side, we climbed up several steps on the left side of the road under construction/repairs to have a view of the Falls from the top that left us quite mesmerised .  However, the car parking charges of Rs 100 are very steep  !

title: Once upon a time excellent waterfall compromised by encroachments all around
review: Located 15 Kms away from Library Chowk . Private Taxi tariff as well as parking fees are too expensive, suggest include this with GMVN Sightseeing Tour starting at 10 am  ( @ Rs 200 along with Santhura Devi Temple). 500 meters walk from parking spot, restaurants & souvenir shops all over.  Can be reached after steep descend along the steps decked with stalls on either side in 20 minutes   OR directly by Rope-way Cable-car ( Gondola) in 2-3 minutes. Chilled water of waterfalls can be enjoyed. Swimwear & changing rooms available on nominal chargeable basis. But the charm of this lovely natural waterfalls is lost due to encroachment by vendors all over leaving hardly any open spaces to enjoy the natural beauty. Allot 2 Hrs at least for this spot & can be clubbed with Santhura Devi temple on the way.

title: Just to see the falls
review: The place is under renovation and has gone through a sea change since my last visit around 15 years back. There's cable car to go down as it requires lot of walking if you want to go down and walking back will be difficult even for young ones. But it has also seen construction around it with lots of waste being thrown by these restaurants and Dhabas. Visit this place just to experience it. If you are in Mussoorie there's nothing much to do otherwise.

title: Nature lost in Encroachments :(
review: While the place is very mesmerising with the falls so beautiful but I was very sad to see the number of encroachments around the area. Only a very small portion is kept free to see the falls, else every other place around it is encroached by the greedy people wanting to run their business around the falls. The government obviously hasn’t done anything to stop the encroachments with the construction allowed within 1 ft (300 mm) of the falls.

title: Amazing waterfalls
review: We stumbled on the waterfalls whilst travelling down from Musoorie and so went to see it.  The park was almost empty but when we walked up the hill to the falls it was breathtaking worth a visit.

title: Awesome
review: It is a beautiful waterfall which falls from a height of about 40 ft from a mountain.This fall is located on way between Dehradhun-Mussoorie path.The site is also popular for swimming and fishing activities.

title: Nothing great
review: Falls are visible from a very cost proximity. Quite a walk from the barricade to the main area. No point clicking pictures as it's the start of the fall where you stand . Just the hills add to the beauty

title: Great fall getting over with charm.
review: one of really amazing places that we have come across, needless to mention it's in mussorie and most of people who travel definitely go here.

title: Fulfilled
review: Natural beauty of this great waterfall is divine. Although it is hard for one to observe it entirely. Greed is wasting this place. Even you can get bed memory due to misbehave of local dealer, parking situations and bad traffic.

title: Normal
review: Not as great as hyped earlier it was amazing now fall is not so huge but still crowded as its still an attraction near mussorie

title: Visit to Kempty Falls
review: Good place to visit and 11kms from Hotel Sungrace. Its in Kempty Fall road. A little far off ftom Mall.

title: Holydaying
review: Super view, chilled water can't stay you  long in campty fall, nice weather..Huge water fall give u awesome background for clicking pictures.

title: Not much water in fall
review: its average, better to go Yamuna river bank. Crystal clear and chilled water. one can spent many hours there. Better to take attire so that to njoy a bath in river. Water is not so deep.

title: Nice place
review: It's nice place but was very crowded. Probably that time when I visited it was crowded.

title: This famous waterfalls has lost the natural beauty
review: This place is now overly crowded. Commercialization has destroyed the natural beauty. Some construction work is going on, so condition is wretched. Overall a poorly managed attraction point. I visited this place earlier also. But this waterfalls has lost its charm.

title: Nice Place
review: Kempty falls was top of our Mussorie list by going though the reviews present in Trip Advisor. It is few kilometers further from Mussorie. Once we reached we were charged with Rs 100 parking charge. There was construction going on near the falls and quite crowded. You may find it difficult to park your car nearby the falls as the parking slots are filled up quickly and there is chaos of oncoming traffic as the roads are narrow.

title: Too much commercialization has spoild this place
review: Why I am saying too much commercialization. In order to do the entry you need to give toll of rupees 50 then for parking rupees 100 and then if you want to go down through rope shift  120 rupees for up and down. We have expected a lot but was disappointed. To the surprise the main point of Kempty fall was empty. However there are plenty of people surrounding those places. But the view in the exact location of Kempty fall is good. You may go for a bath also there are changing rooms but not hygenic enough. There are few swimming pool also which I will suggest not to go for.

title: Nice place
review: This is a nice place to to chillout with friend or family i came here with my family and its a really nice place you can take a good views from here best place to roaming in mussoorie...

title: Good falls
review: The falls were really in full flow in September. The falls are around 13 km from mall road. Construction is going on. Be careful about parking fee as one person on the way from mall road will collect parking charges of 60 rs for kempty around 1-2 km before falls and give you a pink slip. He is fraud. Because once you reach the falls another person will collect 100 rs as parking fee and he also admitted the fraud. Really felt cheated. Otherwise mother nature has made the falls really beautiful.

title: Amazing Falls
review: Kind of natural swimming pool...enjoyed a lot in water...u can get swimming costimes/tube etc at the pool itself....lockers are also available for cellphone and other things....I guess topl places to visit if you are in Mussorie

title: 😏
review: lot of work was happening at this time and taking kids was rather risky. very narrow passage and no railling to feel safe

title: Nice
review: Nice but could be maintained better. Veg food available nearby! The changing rooms and public conveniences should be improved to attract more tourists.

title: Decent waterfall
review: The path to Kempty falls is good. We took cable car to reach the falls and my kid enjoyed a lot. Coming back to the falls, it is relatively smaller one but it has lot of area where you can stand and take few picture. Overall it is one of the place you can visit during your stay in Mussoorie.

title: Ahaaa!!!amazing
review: Kempty Falls was amazing. Our viait to thia fall was really full with musti. Lovely nature around this fall.

title: Have a bath here
review: The visit to Mussoorie is incomplete without visiting Kempty fall. It can be reached by public transport near library end of mall. You can take cable ride here to go upward or downward. As you go more and more up, the water becomes more clearer.

title: good view from far
review: some things are best seen from far. as you go nearer to this beauty you see the plight of this place. how people have littered and the beauty has splintered . once upon a time this was beautiful place to sit at .. enjoy the views.. dip your feet and your drink in the water... it still is beautiful... nature will always be.. no matter how much we shame it and ruin it and rip it apart. let me not disgrace man more.

title: Cool and lovely place to visit
review: Lovely place to visit in the summer.

title: Awesome place
review: It is about 20kiloneter from the mussoorie and it is easy to reach there. Kempty fall is very beautiful place and water of fall is chilled in the summer also. It is the must visit place near mussorie

title: Lost Its Charm
review: The place has lost its charm because of over commercialization. The original waterfall is hardly approachable. The place is too crowdy. The beauty has been lost behind n number of encroachments

title: Good place
review: Nyc place to have fun with water love to go again all they have natural flow of water from a height , when u go there u will feel great

title: Lost paradise
review: Lost its charm and it's become too commercial. Too many small time shops. Never visit this place . Water is dirty and too much of efforts to reach this place. During season gets too crowded and no parking space.

title: Show-off point
review: Too much hyped. It's just a show off point where you'll see plenty of couples. Too much crowded too.

title: A natural beauty spoiled by humans
review: We were shocked to see the state of the nice and huge waterfall. The drive was really nice, but the way swimming costume rental shops were placed around the fall, it just makes someone to feel terrible. What a waste, the Government needs to intervene immediately to save this natural beauty.

title: Sid
review: Well I can only say we have everything in our country but we just don't care about our gifts and resources.

title: Awesome place
review: Must visit destination for anyone coming to Mussoorie..had a great time at Kempty falls..would like to come again..

title: Nice place to visit
review: Its a good place to visit. Lot of crowd was thr and have few street food stalls available. Must visit place. Being a delhight it was quit relaxing when v visit this place.

title: Over crowded and dirty
review: We've visited Kempty Falls three times during the last 20 years, most recently in May this year, the clean surroundings and tranquility have gone haywire progressively. This time around we found all sorts of waste polythene bags, pan-masala stains and what not. Not in the list of 'Places I Like' anymore.

title: is it worth it
review: I may not be wrong to say of all the faux passes this beats all. I have seen many waterfalls but this did disappoint me. avoid it.

title: Not worth
review: The fall is really good but not maintained at all , lots of work to be done with regards to this place from the authorities

title: Full fill your dream of bathing under a water fall
review: very good place to enjoy bathing under a waterfall with family. Very safe place. Costumes and tubes are available on rent. Also there is facility of changing rooms. Rope way also available to reach down to the fall.

title: Awesome trip to Kempty
review: We went in a group of 15 at kempty fall.  the place is 28-30 km from mussoorie.  The rope way is bit costly for a down tracking of hardly 1.5 km.  Water was very chilled.  We ate bread omelet n Maggie there it was amazing.

title: Stands out even being crowded...
review: Its beautiful and has its own identity... But it's too crowded... Thanks to the glowing water or else won't even think of steeping in the water... A lot of Indian cuisines available around to hog after a climb up from the fall... Even has a rope way which makes it easy for elderly people for transist.. but too much crowd makes it even more dirty... not a must visit... But the journey from the ghats towards the fall is amazing... I njoyed it the most..

title: Awesome but not maintained
review: Awesome.but the maintenance and facilities should be better as it is considered as the main attraction of the city.

title: Just chill
review: One of best spot to enjoy the greenery and chilling water falling from a height and capture good moments value for money

title: Mr
review: Super stay

title: Kempty Falls
review: Mussoorie is a wonderful Hill Station. Its location is very easy to reach just 32 KM From Dehradun. Kempty Fall is the main attraction here. People enjoy the fall and surrounding views.

title: Nothing special
review: The water fall is surrouded by buildings, so this is not really the right place for those who search for nature. There's a small way on the left just after the small bridge. Continue to climb on that way to see more natural landscape.

title: good place but much crowd
review: when you come mussoorie you can not back without visit here. we booked a taxi from mall road. 1550 rs. dont come in june its very rush there

title: Not maintained
review: The water falls is good but the place is not maintained at all !

title: Overall it was a good trip
review: We had come to this day on the last day of our trip. Though this place was crowded enough  we still enjoyed taking a dip or two in this place.

title: Awesome Place
review: It is very beautiful place approx 18km far from mussorrie.Must take a bath when you visit there.The water was very clean and their were many stalls of vendors selling sweet corn.Their were many restrorants.Must go upside to the falls.

title: lovely falls
review: Actually I love water falls and this one is just amazing. one of the best attractions in  Mussoories. Allas! badly maintained as usual by govt.

title: BEST ATTRACTION IN MUSSORIE
review: All travellers to Mussorie have this great attraction in their itinerary.A visit to this hill station would be incomplete indeed without hobnobbing with the Kempty waterfalls.A few kms from my hotel,this spot is most sought after.Standing near the falls and listening to the mellifluous sounds of the  gushing crystal clear water cutting acrossw the rocky terrain is so soothing for the mind and the heart.The sight of the falls is so mesmerasing.Standing at the side of the falls on the high hill road offers a kaleidoscopic view of the sorrounding hills and the habitats.

title: Commercial activities have spoilt this place
review: Beggars, hawkers and criminal looking roadside vendors are all that you will see here. Rowdy crowds, women and children yelling. downmarket college crowd is that you will face. Highly avoidable.

title: Water
review: It is a water fall located near Mussoorie.it is just totally fantastic.water is pure there is a small natural pool near the falls which are fantastic.

title: Must visit place
review: This is different from other falls in the sense that one can vath in this fall.clothes n lockers are available. Bathing in a fall when there is rain around is a wonderful experience.

title: Kempty Falls , a popular tourist desitination in Mussoorie.
review: Tourists visiting Mussoorie never miss this attraction.Kempty  Falls is a very popular destination in Mussoorie. On 9th June, we were on our way to Yamunotri Dham & we were passing by this way. It is on the Chakrata- Barkot road, 15km from  Library Bus stand & is situated on 4500 ft asl.You will get bus, share taxi from Library stand. The stream of water is coming down from high hills to down, thousands feet below.However, during this hot months it was very thing.One can visit this spot on return journey from Yamunotri Dham.You may swim in a pool near, the water of which is fed by the spring water. You can reach there by cable car or just walk down. You will get snacks in near by food joints.

title: Need more space, too cramped
review: Firstly it is an amazing place to be, the huge waterfalls are just fun to watch. The place however is too cramped to reach in there, just too many shops around and narrow lane.

title: Lost the Natural Beauty
review: The area was full of shops which killed the natural beauty of the location. It is not worth the drive.

title: Falls
review: Good place but have made it too commercialised... other better place in the area to explore like bhatta falls

title: Visit to Kempty Falls
review: The entire place has been commercialised now. But it is still worth a visit. Take your swim wear with you so that you can enjoy your trip and spend some time inside the water.

title: Trip to Kempty Fall
review: If you are travelling to kemty falls then make sure you visit it during winters and summers. It's a great place to visit with family and ensure u r carrying extra clothes along. So that u can enjoy to the fullest.

title: #kempty fall
review: Good place but commercialised a lot, over crowded with people and beware of monkies specially if you are carrying food..rest kinda ok type..

title: Worst place
review: Request you to not take a personal car to visit this place. Packages start from 1150 per car to visit kempty falls and 1550 to visit Kempty lake. Car doesn't go till Kempty lake. Extra money they take only gives extra time to reach kempty lake which is not at all required. To reach Kempty lake you have to pay 100 rupees entry feee which is again a loot. So basically there is no visual appeal after you visit this place. There are only shopping area that is seen around and places to eat. This point is basically made for taxi drivers to earn and loot people. There is taxi union which have fixed pricess and at high rates . They take all money in advance as they know after visiting the plc people wil not give money as it is not worth it

title: Beautiful water Fall Encroached
review: Nature has given Kempty a beautiful Fall but the locals have made it a 'Dhobi Ghat'.They hire shorts and shirts to tourists and then hang them around,to dry, the encroached water pool. Not worth the trouble unless the authorities clear the encroachments and restores it to the Nature.

title: Average place
review: Not my recommened destination . The water is little dirty and fall is pretty average . Too many tourists. Cab takes a good amount of money .

title: Good Place
review: This falls is good but to many steps to reach there from above or vice-versa. So, for senior citizens it is not recommendable.

title: So bad- Too much commercialized
review: Too much commercialized n construction sorounding the falls has destroyed the beauty of the place. Not much left to be seen.

title: Poor management and cleanliness at kempty fall
review: Cleanliness was poor

title: Kempty is never empty of Fun
review: From our hotel to Kempty fall, we drive down by our own car. It was really exciting rather thrilling journey. After reaching Kempty fall, we have used the rope-way which is suggested as while climbing up after enjoying at Kempty staircase can be very tiring. After reaching the Kempty falls we changed our clothes and got ready for the fun in the water. children enjoyed a lot. After spending good time there we came out and had hot maggi at one of the restaurants. Even we had the lunch and started our journey to visit the municipal garden that accommodates a Wax Museum too.

title: nice place
review: The Kemty falls is a nice place to visit if you want to swim in the cold water or if you want to go to relax. A place where both young and old can have fun.

title: Fabulous spot
review: When in Mussoorie, don't miss going to Kempty Falls. Keep your cameras handy because the entire trip is full of beautiful views of the Himalayas. From street level, avoid going by the gondola ride, just walk the steps. It's more fun walking there

title: Worth only if you are filled with energy.
review: This requires a lot of physical level of your body.

title: Natute reiuned by mad rush
review: Hell crowded place ... Fall is good place is hell .... Only for those does not have any issue with rush...

title: Picnic
review: Good fr tym pass..Bt nw the place is nt well maintained.. Youngsters con enjoy..Bt no facilities like changing rooms etc..

title: Beautiful place
review: Amazing place .

title: Lovely Half Day Visit place
review: Good place to chill off in nature's lap. On weekends it's quiet a rush there.

title: Very crowdy and dirty place
review: In the peak season,thousands of tourists come here to take a dip in the waterfall. There are hundreds of shops, and during summers it becomes very crowdy and dirty. It also took us many hours to reach, as roads were jammed by thousands of cars and taxis.

title: Family picnic spot
review: Half an hour drive from the city. Picnic spot for family tourists. Few restaurants located there which are not that great. Can avoid this place as there is nothing great about it apart from the waterfall.

title: Raw Beauty of Nature
review: Your trip to Mussorie Cannot be complete without seeing the Beauty of Kempty Falls . Scenic & Vibrant .

title: Best time to visit this place- April-june
review: First and best suggestion is to Visit this place from APRIL TO JUNE..

title: Decent falls
review: Didn't have too much water but decent enough for a few photos. Climb the stairs and you get a mini pool. There are a few shops that give tubes for kids so that they can get in if needed. Good for a few photos.

title: A view to watch
review: The Kempty Falls which is situated on the hilly tracks of Uttarakhand, India, 13 km from Mussoorie on the Chakrata Road. It is nearly 1364 meters above sea level, The Kempty Falls and the area around is surrounded by high mountain ranges at an altitude of 4500 feet.Kempty Falls was developed as a tourist destination by a British officer John Mekinan, around 1835. The name Kempty is probably derived from the word 'camp-tea', A stream of water running throughout the year starting from the south west of village Bungalow ki kandi moves north-west and falls from 4,500 ft. Splitting into five other cascades, the water falls a further 40 ft..The best place to visit the place is in summer.It is very cold in winter.But the view can be enjoyed in any season.

title: Kemty fall one of the famous picnic spot
review: Kempty fall is near to mussoorie which is a very famous hill station.  People coming to mussoorie aslo visits kampty fall . It's also a adventural place and people enjoy this huge water fall and it also have swimming pool in it it's good place for photography.

title: Worst place
review: Worst place to visit . Too commercial maintain place.

title: Cold water and must visit fall in Mussoorie
review: Good place to chill and beat the heat, cold water falls from the mountain. A person can be present inside the water to hours. Person can reach there using stairs and also using rope way. shops are present to take home and remember the beautiful memories. one can eat maggie,momos which always a special part of hilly areas.

title: Kempty falls
review: I visited this place during May end and found to be overcrowded, We have taken ropeway while going down the falls  and the scenery was nice

title: The majestic falls!!
review: Probably the best time to visit these falls are in October - November when there is not much rush. I visited in June last week and the place was over crowded!!

title: Love
review: Well maintained... You can feel the waterfall and enjoy the weather ... U can also have a great pics ..once visited you will fall in love with the place ...

title: Nice place to bath. But overcrowded.
review: This is a nice place no doubt. But overcrowded. And the ropeway is expensive 120/- for round trip and 100/- for coming back. compared to that of in Gu hill which 100/- for round trip and at a higher height too. There is a waterpark also. Also adventure sports like Flying fox vs Superman. But if it a crowded day then going there and coming back to Mussorie can take entire one day and can spoil your journey. On the way to Kempty fall see the Company garden. One can go to Dehradun via Kempty fall bypass.

title: Very Very Beautiful But Not Clean
review: Kempty Falls is always going to Attract you with its beauty and scenic views. This is the most Commercialized Place in Mussoorie. Visitors love to visit this BUT visitors do not take care of its beauty. They litter here and there.  Still People love to dip in the fall.. Its Charm and Amazing beauty calls you everytime.

title: Not good and crowded beauty is lost
review: Kempty fall is iconic tourist place of mussorie but it is now lost its beauty as much of construction by local shopkeepers in and around the fall. They have encroached the surrounded area in very near. Now there is no need to go to kempty fall while visiting musoorie.

title: Beautiful place but not cleaned
review: Kempty falls is a nice place to visit

title: Family place but over crowded and highly overrated
review: Kempty falls is the main attraction when you hear about someone visiting Mussoorie. So i was also excited to visit the place when i travelled to Dehradun considering it is just a 35-40 kms drive from dehradun. First of all going on long weekends and national holidays can be horrific as there is long traffic JAM both ways going to kempty falls and coming back due to all the people around Delhi and NCR like coming here as the nearest hill station. Secondly the place is Ok types. Its a small waterfall and you will get more traffic in this area as this is the only attraction in mussoorie. The changing rooms are also pathetic if you want to change and enjoy in the waterfall. When it is overcrowded in holidays or long weekends you should better take cable car slide directly to the kempty falls instead of going on by foot. I would say this was my only experience there and won't like to go there again any time as personally i did not like the traffic and overcrowded environment.

title: Very bad.. Nature converted in to business..
review: Disnt liked at all.. The fall has been commercialized and made a swimming pool which is available for money...

title: Below Expectation
review: Kempty Falls has lost all its charm which once it had.It is a beautiful fall where water falls from height of approx 40 ft.But Very crowded due to over-commercialisation. If you want to spend some good amount of time in the pool made by fall then only I will suggest you get down to the base of fall.otherwise its waste of time to go all the way down and climb up in return which takes almost 45 mins.better to watch from the road side. You can skip this point there are other better places in and around Mussoorie. .Or may be in offseason you can find less crowdThere is a cable car to and fro from the base of fall with some fees.

title: Kempty falls
review: It's an perfect example of how a nature's Gift can be spoilt by Greed of men and negligence of Administration!...My heart was filled by sorrow when i visited the place ,say,nearly after 20 years and found it in a hopeless condition with encroachements all around...filthy environment... a shabby looking playing pool even worse than many of current water parks around India!...Shame on you Environmentalists!...what were you doing when all this detoriation was going onn???

title: Overcrowed
review: The falls are far from being impressive. The place would benefit from some serious cleaning as it is currently simply filthy. It was also overcrowded when we went there with almost no access to the falls.

title: Feel the Cold in Cold temerature
review: The view of the Kempty fall was amazing and the good thing is that  the temperature was cold there but water was much colder than temp.

title: Water o water
review: It started training when we reached Kempty falls which led to sudden fall in temperature. My two and half year son was shivering but soon clouds were gone and left behind awesome weather for us to enjoy the water pools and hot tea with maggi. All who love playing with water, this place is a must for you.

title: Nice fall..
review: Very nice fall. Not too big in terms of water but very clean water and chilling cool also... there is water ride to enjoy..

title: Worst Experience
review: The fall just looks good in pics. The place is really dirty, stinky and terribly crowded. Will not recommend to go in hot and humid weather with kids.

title: Beautiful view
review: Nice place to be with your love ones. Thanks to guruji travels we could able to see such beautiful places.

title: Not worth the Hype
review: We saw this falls, from a restaurant during lunch. Saw on the way as did not get parking place, was very crowded. Not much water. Not worth to see this falls if you are coming only to see this. But for a time pass if you are in Mussoorie you can take a day trip. Expensive as usual for any major tourist place.

title: Full enjoyment
review: Excellent experience in water fall with family... good place for shopping especially for ladies and kids.... very nice place to take photographs... very supportive behavior of local folks... overall great....

title: Horrible !!!!
review: This is the worst waterfall site ever !!! Extremely dirty and filthy. Do not waste your time and go there if you are expecting something wonderful. There are few things to do around but not worth all the effort.

title: Enjoy visitng this place
review: It's 13-14 kms from Mussoorie.....You can book taxi from the taxi stand......It's a good place to enjoy the time with your family members.....

title: Lovely view
review: I have been there for the first time and enjoyed the nature's beauty in kempty fall. Though water is not so clean to take a bath there but still the surroundings are excellent for eyes.

title: Beautiful place
review: Kempty fall is very beautiful picnic spot here. It is about 19 km from Mussoorie. Very enjoyable and full of entertainment.

title: Picturesque but people bathing can be an eyesore
review: Nice place for taking photos and boating. It has places to eat but people bathing in the falls in their underwear can be unpleasant.

title: Nice place
review: Kempty faal is a nice place awesome view i love it i have enjoyed the kempty faal with my family wheather is so cool osem place

title: Ugly Touristy Place
review: This is a classical case of how tourists can spoil a place. Filled with filth, beggars, snake charmers and rowdy tourists. Poor waterfall is hardly a trickle now and is over shadowed by Coca Cola and potato wafer signboards and with 'Bhutta' hawkers. This place is specific to typical, low on education and civic sense 'tourists' and not for well read travellers.

title: Not good as You Expected
review: This place has been too much commercialize that the beauty has diminished over the years.

title: Good place
review: 1st time saw a natural falls made into safe water play area. well maintained. they can keep less shops

title: Not much fun.
review: Fourteen kilometers fro Mussoorie on Chakrata road is the popular tourist/ picnic spot. Though much hyped but it has lost charm because of commercialization. Those who have not seen water falls earlier may still find it interesting.

title: Waste Of Time Foul Smell
review: This was my 3rd visit to Kempty Falls

title: Nature in its true from for your pleasure
review: A travel beyond Mussurie will take you to a tourist spot which, if you look at from the point of view of the number of people visiting, you would find it most conjested, but if you have travelled till there with the vision of soaking in nature, then you are at the right place . Set in a small vale, the Kempty Falls tower above you and flow down to meet a few spots of places where people take a shower of the clean and clear natural water. The ropeway and mountain sports are the other attractions.  Besides these, it is the beautiful mountains that attract and the visuals that you carry back are such a pleasure to the eyes and the mind that the heart feels the justification of the travel .

title: Very crowded
review: Very crowded area. Water is very less and a lot of people are there. Good in off season. Bhatta fall is far better than kempty fall. Spacious and less crowded.

title: Kempty fall is worst !!
review: Worst place to visit , too much crowded , not worth at all !! Very very unhygienic place , better to just relax at some where near Mall Road and chill

title: Popular Waterfall
review: Everyone must go there if you travel around Mussoorie. It is famous for it's Waterfall, in summer vacations Hotels rate raise high and services too. But for the first time visitor, it is good

title: Kempty falls
review: Beautiful place to be full of markets, changing clothes is a challenge , but altogether it was a good experience

title: Familiar place
review: Nice place to enjoy in water with family. Food outside available is good, Specially in Green Dhaba. Please put off your gogels.

title: Kempty fall
review: This is very nice place.

title: Good place
review: Good place but needs a lot of Patience because there is huge traffic jam. Must take taxi from the paid service because looking for parking there is a huge problem.

title: Kempty Falls
review: Falls Over crowded. Man made lake for boating. Too commercialized. Not a must see. Ok to skip. Falls itself pretty.

title: Place to enjoy
review: The place is having natural water falls and few stages ; level of depth is not high , its only 3 feet around. if you love with water this is place for you.

title: Not great at all
review: There is nothing awesome about these falls that makes it a must see. Heavily crowded with all kinds of people jumping into the pool to cool off. More people in the pool than water. Filthy place.

title: Beautiful Fall
review: Kempty falls as its name is one of the main attraction of mussoorie. If you go to mussoorie, you should must visit there. You have to walk down  along the shops on both the sides to reach the fall. You can also took the ropeway to visit their. Fall is very beautiful but this place was being destroyed by the shopkeepers increasing day by day. Govt. should take notice of this and maintain the beauty of falls.

title: nice place
review: We spent a night in cottage near Kempty falls.  so walked to this spot.  falls no doubt are really good but maintenance is not up to the mark

title: Refreshing
review: If ur looking out to travel in rope car, take a dip in the super cold water and try out some adrenaline pumping activities it's a must visit

title: Nice place.
review: This fall is nice but the area where the water falls and flow downward is too small. Otherwise it is nice place.

title: Beautiful and Natural waterfalls
review: We  visited this spot about 3pm in the evening... On the way to kempty falls,we had mountain  views and the falls flowing amidst the hills from the top looked so White and milky.We could not stop taking photos...Our car stopped at the stand and we had to walk through the sloppy way to have a look at the falls.The weather was cloudy and so cool.It was really a great experience to see water falling from such great heights...its Nature gift... So wonderful...We enjoyed a lot having some snacks kept at the stalls nearby.We wanted to stay sometime but It started to rain and so we had to return...but..

title: Crowded Place - Indecent visitors
review: The journey to Kempty Falls is not worth it any more. One has to wait longer for traffic to move, long ques on steep hills is not a good proposition.

title: Best trip
review: This is a very niccccc placccc in mussoorie

title: Poor Managed...
review: One should not waist his/her precious time and resource by visiting this place as it is managed poorly. Too much unhygienic place...

title: Was The best place when we went to Mussoorie
review: This place used to be my Fav when we used to go to Mussoorie in my childhood, but now the state of affair is not so rosy.

title: Total let down
review: Kempty fall has not lived up to my expectations. On the way to it v were quite excited. Spend significant energy on foot also to reach here. Spend currency for ropeway but moment v reached to the water body we found it heavily crowed... dirty and chaotic.

title: Excessively commercialized, please avoid
review: Arguably the most popular tourist spot in Mussoorie, this place is in a sad state now. Known for its beauty and grandeur, this waterfall is a shadow of its former self now, thanks to excessive commercialization.

title: Too Crowded and exploited by humans to the farthest extent.
review: I didn't like the place at all. For a person  like me who spent most of the time in the foot hills of Sahyadris and enjoyed plenty of waterfalls such a   waterfall  like Kempty falls has nothing to please me.

title: Nice Waterfall
review: Excellent bathing facilities below this waterfall with great sightseeing and ropeway facilities. Other watersports were also available.

title: Avoid........Proceed to Yamuna Bridge instead
review: This is a  great example of how over commercialization can kill a natural wonder. The falls have been totally hijacked by uncountable shops and changing rooms that have taken shape around it. The small pool under the waterfall is at a time occupied by more than 200 people if not more. It makes you feel like an overcrowded water park.This place has really turned into a mess. Better to avoid. If someone really wants to enjoy the splashes of pure water  then they must head towards the Yamuna Bridge which is 14 kms ahead of this place..

title: please avoid
review: highly over rated!!!.. very crowded.. going there was such a waste of time and money... we were really disappointed.

title: DESTROYED PARADISE
review: This place is just awesome but govt, shopkeepers and tourists have been destroyed this paradise. ..gov't should care this place otherwise in coming years no one will come for visit..this place has potential to become an independent tourist station..but it's only possible after careful intervention of authorities. .

title: Too much commercial
review: Too much of shops surrounding the fall has totally damaged the natural view and charm of the place. Not a vet nice place for true nature lover.

title: Too much walk to reach , but worthwhile
review: I remember the path that kept on going down with stalls in between and the kempty falls upper portion in sight. The path is really troublesome if you have young children with you , they will almost certainly be exhausted half the way down.

title: Good!!!
review: One of the main attractions of Mussorie besides weather.. Must go.. It's a bit far from main mall road but since not many places of interest here,  u can include it in ur iteneary.

title: Mussoorie trip
review: Excellent

title: Not much attraction
review: Kempty Falls used to be main identity for Mussoorie. But this point has very poor maintenance nowadays. Shops around has ruined its attraction.

title: Waterfall
review: It's a natural water fall. Good place to visit. But to crowded on weekends. Approx 15 kms from mussories

title: Very commercialised
review: Although the fall is beautiful and the water is clean, the water becomes dirty as soon as it reaches the pseudo-pool as the water flow is blocked reducing it's speed. The shops have made the place overcrowded and chaotic. The market outside is nice. The ropeway is overpriced.

title: Majestic falls
review: We reached this falls from mussorie by a rental bike. When you reach this place, you could see many photo stalls where people would be calling you for taking pics in traditional wear. If you are interested in pics then its the best thing to do here. They will charge you based on the pic size. The waterfall is majestic. You could get into the water also.

title: Kepty falls visit
review: too crowded - in case you want to play in the water fall water then you can go with your kids. Cable car takes you up and down to the falls from the road Rs120 to and fro. Nothing much as scenary etc. Too noisy and too much of traffic on the approach road. One needs a lot of patience to go through the traffic jams.

title: Nice spot
review: It is the oldest picnic spot near Mussorrie at the distance around 15 km. Many shops are there to serve food. You can spend 3-4 hrs with your family and friends. Water is chill. It's very crowded specially in weekend. Best to use the  rope way to reach on the top. We enjoyed a lot there.

title: Nice visit
review: Nice outing,once in mussorue,u shiuld pay a visut,preferably before noon.chair car has been installzd unnecessarily...helpful to people with knee ,spine problems

title: Waste of time.
review: Waste of time. There are three to four artificially created reservoirs of water one draining in to the other, no bigger than the size of an average swimming pool.

title: water fall
review: This is good water fall for those who have neverseen any fall before, but the road is narrow and steep , but kids enjoy bath there under the water fall

title: Amazing Water Events
review: This place is awesome for a swimming pool lover and nature lover many activities are there must go if you visit Mussoorie

title: Overrated
review: Very crowded, sparse water in the falls, too many people splashing around in the shallow pool.

title: Waste of time
review: Government has spent 4.24 crore INR, very dirty place, all around plastic bottles, very stinking place, private change rooms running full flash and government facilities for changing rooms are locked. Please don't visit this place, it's waste of time. Government should review where money spent and also needs to take appropriate actions to remove encroachments near this fall. These encroachments has killed natural beauty of this place.

title: Not well maintained.
review: Heard so many things about kempty fall but should say was disappointed with this place.

title: worthless place to visit.
review: I went in the month of May, found very crowded and dirty polluted water sheer waste of time. Parking was a major issue.

title: Not Great.
review: Too much commercial activity around this place spoils the overall ambience. Lack of organised parking place is another problem

title: High hopes
review: Kempty falls used to be a good pkace to go 15-20 years back when it was still not " developed" by the authorities.

title: Natural waterfall for fun
review: Nice waterfall to spend time in water. Though very commercialized and too crowded as well. My daughter enjoyed ropeway there.

title: Awesome and relaxing
review: The fall is really good specially the chilling water. You'll forget your tiring day. It is highly commercialized during the season, specially may and June. Even for changing the cloths they charge ₹10.

title: Need to visit Kempty fall if you are in Mussorie but not worth it
review: We need to visit this place if visiting Mussorie. It is approx 15 Km from Mall road.

title: Nice place
review: Nice place to visit, good view, good weather, good place to see water fountain, u can enjoy ur day with family or friends by visiting this place, i been thr with friends and enjoyed a lot. Big water fountain,

title: Bit commercialized but dont miss it
review: This is a natural swimming pool of sorts, well u can stand below the water fall but the pond below the fall is only 4 ft deep. The water is chill, so don't try going @ 7 in morning to avoid crowd. I would suggest going in around 9-10, take the ropeway at least for the way back and enjoy with ur family without any worry.

title: Main attraction at Mussoorie
review: This is the main attraction at mussoorrie. Fall was nice. Nearby food stalls are there which serve tea, coffee, maggie etc. But shopping at this place can be costlier than mussoorie's local market. They will say like you will not find this item in mussoorie anywhere, but yhe same things are available in local market. Overall, place 8s nice and should be visited.

title: Water falls one shoud not miss
review: ideal for family , safe, clean , best to use the rope way to reach this spot , long line in season , pls equip with yourselves for change of clothes

title: Might as well skip it
review: Welcome to the overhyped attraction in Mussorie. The water is dirty and the people become rowdy as and when they enter the pool. Ladies can enter in their sarees and males can be in their under wear. The sight can be pathetic. i would not recommend this place.

title: Kempty falls
review: A camp and a cup of tea/coffee by the Britishers and hence the name... Kempton... It's a nice fun and activity place.. We decided to go towards the deep down side of the falls,as guided by our driver, this place was full of fun activities and adventure sports... To begin with there was a swimming pool, there was a lake where you could go boating, there were adventure sports like zorbing, bridge crossing, Burma bridge,etc.. And then there were the mighty falls and their pond where you could take a dip and relax in the chilling knee deep water... Click endless selfies, family pictures to cherish.. A restaurant serving quick snacks etc, in all a nice place to spend three to four hours.. And if you are a trekker... Then it's your paradise as you could trek your way up to the top of the falls n enjoy again...

title: Too crowded
review: This place is too crowded and mostly people or should I say that guys from Delhi or Adjoining Areas come here to booze and enter the falls drunk and make the place less exciting

title: Wonderful location
review: the feeling here is great, this place is bit small but when you see the water fall its worth it. you can buy tube from there to be in water. water us bit cold. tube at a price around 50-70Rs for an hour or so

title: Wasted nature
review: Nature has been articulated with modern concept and the result is not good at all. The trip has not given any inner peace. Only the children has taken bath in the artificial pool.

title: Mr.
review: This is nice spot close to mussoorie you can dive in side the water  one time u can visit the main focus now appears to be the short ride

title: Absolutely waste of time
review: Please do not visit this site. The falls are nothing compared to many other across India. Unnecessary travel of 25 -  30km and huge crowd every where.

title: Tamed waterfall with good shopping
review: The waterfall was bit disappointing as shops have been constructed all around the area in which water is falling. This makes the water fall timid. However, the shops around the waterfall offer great deal. They sell beautiful artifacts at pretty reasonable prices.

title: Very high falls bit commercialized now
review: The water fall at this place from very high mountains and its impossible to stand under water. However one can stay near the fall and enjoy swimming in still water. Awsome place.

title: Beautiful place which is overcrowded
review: I visited this place in May 17. Place is very good but its over crowded; much commercialized place with many many shops, you hardly get feeling of natural waterfall.

title: Avoid. Highly over rarted
review: This is one destination that has been over rated. Over crowded, dirty, swarming with touts and other agents, one returns with a very bad experience. The falls are best enjoyed from a distance on the approach road when you can see the two stage falls in its full glory. Near the falls you have hundreds of people jostling and pushing to take bath under the falls. Avoid. There are many other locations nearby which are more scenic.

title: Mr navpreet singh bhatia
review: The place was very crouded and dirty..... good restraunts near by to eat and enjoy the sound of fall , better to when its not crowded,

title: Nice place , excursion tour from Mussoorie
review: Must visit while you are in Mussoorie, suggest choose upper side of fall fro bathing, as its less crowded and you get clean water with all the requirements, like changing room, locker, bathing costumes, you will find 2-3 average size ponds with water depth as 3-4 feet, kids will also enjoy at this place, not at all risky, its fun as you will see small water falls filling the pond with water and clean water as the water is running and coming from uphill

title: Devastated by Garbage, Plastic and Greed
review: Kempty Falls is one of the worst picnic spots I have ever seen. A natural waterfall has been diverted through narrow drainage like channels.

title: Three tire falls a treat to watch
review: This is some 25km off Mussourie town where we stayed. Beautiful winding roads to reach the Kempty falls. From a distance you can see three tires. One above the road level. goes below an falls again twice. you have steps to go down but we preferred the cable car which is less tedious. you can take bath under the fall. There is lot of place to walk around in the property. There is a swimming pool and place for other adventurous activities

title: Best place to visit in mussoorie
review: This is not a very good place to visit overall but an awesome place if I consider only Mussoorie.

title: A beautiful water fall
review: Located on the outskirts of Mussoorie at about a distance of 13 KM, it is a place worth visiting. You can enjoy cold water bath.

title: Decent but overcrowded
review: Its a overcrowded place. Though you dont have many options so you should come here but still i would say that this place is bowlers close to nature and you will feel that you are in a giant pool with a water fall which comes out of nowhere .... A visit is good. Not sure if you would want to get into the pool

title: Average
review: An average place where u can have fun wid yr frnds for a limited time. Not recommended for yuoungsters

title: just avoid Kempty falls, pathetic place
review: Over rated and pathetic place. Just avoid it, even if you have nothing else to do, take a stroll.....

title: good but crowded fall
review: good place but very crowded and messed up place ......lots of traffic jams etc ....no good quality  food joints ..

title: Nice but over commercialised
review: This is a nice spot close to Mussoorie that has been developed further by the authorities.

title: Kempty falls is no more a fall
review: Nothing worthwhile to see. Do not waste your time, money and energy to go there. The roads were choked with traffic and took a long time to reach and return.

title: Purely commercialised fall
review: its a ordinary fall i personally suggest dont waste time to go there,I felt it is ready made fall to attract tourists.

title: Environment
review: Dirty environment. Too much rush and congestion. Attitude decline. You do not have a fell of Hill station.  For  one visit it is ok.

title: its okay. waterfalls is nice.
review: its okay to visit kempty falls. its very much congested. the water is also dirty. we need shorts or costume which we have to purchase or buy on rent from there.

title: Awesome fall to visit
review: Hi everyone, i visited to Massorie many times but when i went to Kempty fall i love this place this is really awesome

title: Average and overated
review: This is the most crowded waterfalls of them all. It is very very very crowded and is way too overated. Try the other falls instead.

title: Worth a visit
review: The place is too far from main town. The only attraction is the falls and the ropeway saving u feom the uphill and downhill walk . Good to visit with family az well as friends.

title: The Tourism lifeline of Mussoorie
review: It was a great evening at the falls. The water was really cold. But the place was really overcrowded.

title: Unique experience
review: The positives : Its a nice ice cold water-fall. The very first time you touch the waters, you feel that you just can not get into it, forget about standing right under the waterfall. You should slowly get acclimatized to the water temperature and then dare to go under the falling water, take it on your head, shoulders and have fun. Its an unique experience.

title: Filthy
review: I don't know why I visited kempty falls. Totally waste of time, so much traffic that you will end up in sitting car only. I must say to avoid this place.

title: Kempty falls
review: Ok place to visit. we went on sunday. The cable cart was closed. There are lot of small shops where you get lot of options. There is boating available.

title: Used to be good, but is not so clean these days
review: I visited Kempty Falls when I was a kid, and I remember loving it. The views are still great from here and the drive from Dehradun to here is beautiful. But currently the place is crowded and dirty. The water at various spots was littered with chip packets and empty water bottles. I wish the authorities clean it up because the spot has a huge potential.

title: beautiful water fall
review: kempty waterfall a must visit if you are in mussorie. extremely clean surroundings. a very popular attraction among the tourists. you can enjoy nice dip and bath in the water falls.

title: Nice Fall but commercialised
review: Beautiful Fall coming up from high on the hill. It takes 45 minutes to reach from Mall Road. Water is so cold. Only concern is it is commercialized a lot which makes it dirty and unhealty.

title: Open Pool for everyone 🏊
review: I'm glad that I visited here. Just a perfect place. However I didn't like the crowd much. Maybe I visited with my girlfriend that's the reason I didn't like it. But there was a mix crowd like cheap crowd and middle class.

title: A cool place .
review: one should visit this place for the sheer beauty of the place and moments of enjoyment in the cool water.

title: chilled water place
review: 19 km far from mall road you can take car, gmvn tourist bus to reach this place . lots of shops serving facility ( lockers, swim costume ) on chargeable basics. fully chilled water

title: not very great, just a normal fall with lots of stairs
review: its also not worthy because in rainy season almost everywhere in India you can find better fall than kempty fall, while one has to walk a lot, it’s a lot steps down

title: Avoidable
review: We had been their in May-17 and found very less water, lot of crowd and too hot sun. Overall not worth the time and money.

title: Unique experience
review: Please carry your own swimwear, thought available for rent or purchase.

title: Not for family
review: Kempty fall is for boys not for family. I travelled with my family and could not enjoy the fall as all were boys making noises. So I advice don't waste your time there better visit some other place

title: Not a Great place
review: The place is in a scenic area but the water is just a trickle.  Not maintained at all and made worse by the tourists who have little regard for the ecology and the nature's beauty.  Littering is a norm..not worth the travel on and roads

title: Kempty is like Humpty Dumpty..Nothing great here
review: I didn't find it worth visiting...Parking was so difficult and private parking man just take due advantage of the mad rush here (helft charge..I paid 100 Rs..). I stayed there for harly 10 min...Don't go with something HIGH in your mid about this waterfall. Atleast what I saw was poor and much inferior to the waterfalls I have seen so far..Nothing so great, better go to Gunhill point and enjoy the scenic Himalayas once you take ropeway from the Mall road

title: Was Beautiful But Now Poor
review: Too much crowd. Too much untidiness in the central lake of kempty fall. It was beautiful once, now it's just a dirty pond in which everyone is bathing and making it more and more dirty.

title: average spot to see
review: just nothing to see over there... very average spot with paid very costly car ride......avoide to see this spot..

title: Nice water fall
review: It awesome we enjoy a lot the view of kempty falls is great .One of the star attraction of Mussoorie. You must visit this place in evening. The falls is however not a large one

title: Dirty n crowded
review: Nothing great about this waterfall, though the fall is nice but the the place is always so over crowded and people have really made the place very dirty by throwing wafer packets and cold drink bottles etc in the fall.

title: Fantastic place to enjoy fun time with friends
review: I visited Kempty Falls last summer with my friends. We enjoyed a lot there in the cold water. Road from Mussorie to Kempty Falls is in good condition but usually huge traffic jam is there on the way. We booked a shared taxi from Dehradun. We started our journey at around 10 AM. There is a famous temple known as Prakateshwar mahadev on the way. We spent about 20-25 minutes there and then continued our journey to Kempty Falls. We reached there at about 1:30 PM,purchased the ropeway ticket and got down to the Falls in less than 5 minutes. We took bathing costumes on rent and spent about 1 hour. The worst thing about it was that it was too much crowded. But at the end visiting Kempty Falls was a great experience.

title: Beautiful Falls but Dirty
review: The falls is beautiful but very mismanaged. Surrounding is very dirty not only because of the management authority but also by the tourists.

title: Not that beautiful
review: The fall is nice but the place is dirty and overcrowded. But me and my friends still enjoyed a lot. Place is beautiful but should be maintain properly.

title: Over Hyped
review: Tourists who come to Mussoorie visit this place for sure, and that is the biggest drawback of this place. It makes this place so crowded that no one could enjoy. Its a very very normal below average waterfall, and everyone visit this place as if they are going to see Niagara. There is garbage all around and too many vendors. You may enjoy taking bath in the pool right below the fall, only if you are lucky enough to get the space. I wont recommend this place to visit.

title: Must visit to complete your Mussoorie trip
review: It takes around one hour from Mall Road to reach Kempty Falls.  From the parking area you need to walk around 500 mtrs to reach to the point from where you can take cable car to reach to falls. Cable car ticket is Rs. 120 per person for both side.

title: A Beautiful Water Fall
review: Situated approx 20 KM from Mussourie....a visit to Mussoourie is incomplete without a visit to Kempty Fall...A beautiful fall..almost resembling a silver fall..An artificial big pond is created down below where one can swim...we visited in April, 2017...the water was very cold..we brought our own swimming costumes for children...however, the costumes are available on rent as hundreds of tourists enjoy swimming there in the pond...very crowded...one can reach there by coming down through Cable Car, ticket Rs 120 /- per person...otherwise come down through staircase..10 minutes walk...while returning, one can shop at numerous stores ..may purchase local made wooden souvenirs....

title: Avoid. The place has lost its charm.
review: The place has lost its charm and has now become a tourist trap with dirt, filth and germs everywhere.

title: One visit for sure.
review: What a view it is! Very beautiful & gives you a very good feeling being a part of nature. It is a natural scenic beauty. You can go & take a shower under it if you are interested.

title: Fun with Friends !!!
review: It's a bit overcrowded fall. Suggest everyone to go upstairs rather than downstairs. You can enjoy swimming, bathing & enjoying the beautiful water fall of Nature.

title: Wastage of time
review: Unhygienic, pathetic, crowded place. Total ignorance of govt towards nature. Please do not waste your time of traveling 18KM extra from mussoorie for this thing, rather go to George Everest's house (great view there)

title: Must visit place
review: A waterfall can be so beautiful is realised wen u visit kempty falls in mussourie. Although a bit tiring in going down and walking up. Still that can be countered using electric trolley. Beautiful place to visit

title: A fantastic picnic spot
review: Kempty Fall is a fall which has water through out the year. There are different places / spots where facilities for bathing / changing and storing clothes are made available at different levels along the fall. The spots on the upper side of the road were less crowded and the one down below, near the lake, was very crowded with lots of people having bath - fun and enjoyment. It was a place, on that day, full of energy and vibrancy. You could walk down to the spot or take the rope way, better to do the later if you have children - seniors in your group as the climb back is quite steep. Lot of restaurants, small road side eateries and shop are available. Good place to have a half day picnic.

title: The best place to explore in Mussoorie
review: A small place where you can enjoy the natural fall. The water will be too cold but enjoy. You will find the swimming costume and changing rooms for ladies at the very low level at the cost of Rs. 50 each. Locker is also available and cost is Rs. 50. The water is so pure that you can drink directly from the fall. It is worth visit and should enjoy.

title: Conjusted
review: Shopkeepers have made fall area  conjusted compare to few tears back and they have monopoly,parking problem in peak time

title: Horrible don't go
review: It was filthy with so much crowd a d garbage. The traffic was horrendous.. I would never recommend this place to anyone.

title: Good Picnic Spot !!!!!!!
review: A picnic spot to pass your time along with bathing in the falls . There are many places for bathing and changing clothes where the fall is situated. The place can be reached by Walking downhill or by ropeway . A ropeway should be preferred as it is a steep walk downhill and uphill.The best tourist place in Mussoorie to visit.

title: Chilling
review: Life time experience. We visited in Dec so it was really cold. The water litterally will froze you but its must do activity. Do visit this place

title: Touristy Trap!
review: The water falls is a beauty to sight. But the entire place is so commercial with shops and eateries and their waste/rubbish strewn everywhere. You might as well just enjoy the view from far away. Give this a miss unless you've never seen a water fall in your life.

title: Not worth it!
review: We went to Kempty fall as a part of our package by the taxi driver, it was not worth at all. The couples went with us were also unhappy and had problems with the maintenance of the place, the water was smelling and it was a bad experience.

title: Over-hiped, over-populated
review: Once upon a time, Kempty Falls might have been a good place to visit (as suggested by my friends who visited Kempty in their childhood) but now its one of the most pathetic place in Mussoorie. The MDDA and local business owners have successfully ruined the beauty of the place and turned it into a filthy narrow and congested swimming pool. As I visited in summer the falls was narrow and not much water in it. But the pool (artificially created) at the feet of the falls was having more than 100 people bathing in it. The viewing points were full with people from swimming costume shop bugging for the dresses and all.I could barely see the falls in that crowd and off course lots of pushing and nagging are going around specially if there is a young girl in the group. Too many shops are built in that small place which has totally ruined the natural beauty of the place

title: Congested place
review: good natural place but very congested. may be because of the peak season and long weekend. Nice falls though....

title: Kempty fall visit
review: About 23 kms from mall road it is a beautiful natural waterfall.often very crowded water is chilly and crystal clear.No need to take clothes as lot of shops give on rent and have changing rooms.

title: Not ssooo happening
review: Went their with my family. We were 5 adults.

title: Nature's Delight
review: Make sure to visit this place, even if you visit Mussoorie for One day. Infact, if anyone has come to Mussoorie and dint visit this place, has missed the Best spot in Town.

title: Lovely Cold waterfall !!!
review: Approx 20 km from mussoorie mall road, its a lovely waterfall followed by a awesome travel of 20 Km. water is usually cold as sunlight comes up only in the morning there.

title: Great waterfall, must visit
review: 18 Kim's from Mussoorie, this is a must visit during ur stay there. A rope way takes u down to the base of the waterfall, where the water forms a small pond for u to play/swim. Rental clothes are available from multiple shops, but the water didn't look very clean to get in.

title: kempty falls  : freezing experience.
review: -water was freezing cold...

title: Good View
review: Good place to visit. A lot more people then you get in a water park. Can't click a good pic alone with your family. The rope way is a bit expensive.

title: need 4-5 hrs to discover
review: in mussoorie 3n/4days you must spent 5 hrs to kempty fall. only good falls in northern India where you can enjoy with your family safely.

title: Osm place
review: Osm place to enjoy the beauty of nature. Can go with friends and/or family as well. Few more activities available nearby as well.

title: Masti
review: It was awesome place we enjoy a lot .Doing full MASTI here with college friends . Unforgettable moments.

title: Lost its charm highly avoidable
review: Undoubtedly the worst experience in Mussoorie.

title: Nice waterfall to have a bath.
review: Nice Waterfall. You can take a bath but water is very cold.

title: Osm place for the enjoy
review: It was Osm place for the enjoy and masti. I doing full enjoy with friends. all time cold water  like a winter.

title: Fun to watch and bath
