review: Very good fall for taking bath. They have created natural pools where you can hire clothes to take a dip. Very good location and nice place to visit.

title: Lost beauty
review: Once upon a time this falls was a really beauty but the entire sourouding is now commericalised.

title: Made It All The Way to Postage Stamp Status
review: I have had the good pleasure to visit the Falls several times.  In earlier days the place was a total mess of strewn People waste/rubbish.  Given the annual revenue  in tourist laks the local government finally got the message 'clean  Kempty Falls'. Today there are additional things to do all as a result of the presence of the Falls.  However, a visit just to stand and view the cascading water or dip you toe, immerse your body, is all the reason needed to stop by.  Perhaps you could stop for. "Camp tea" a suggestion of the origin of its name. Enjoy.

title: Too commercialized, too artificial
review: I have been to this place twice. But now this is hardly a worth to visit. The fall is confined to a small flow of water, yet very crowded. Avoid

title: Huge water fall
review: The water wall lies in the way to Nainital and is just simply awesome. The water is very cold and very clean

title: Empty Falls
review: Not at all good. There is no water fall seen as it is surrounded by hundreds of shops which just reduces it to a man made swimming pool with lot of people in and around it having water coming from the hill.

title: Maddening crowd...
review: You can visit this place if its the 1st time you are stepping out of your house for a vacation or haven't seen a waterfall in your life.

title: Kempty is fun
review: Kempty falls is a great n in my opinion the only place worth visiting in masooriee in the non winter seasons. The water is cold n real fun to njoy wit a group of friends n the place is well packed wit hawker n shops offering lockers n swimwear. Do njoy the rope gliding nearby. Cheers

title: Loved it
review: Cold fresh water falling from a great height.. One can enjoy swimming and bathing down the fall is very overwhelming..

title: Very congested but still enjoyable
review: Had visited this place with some couples ans had an amazing time under the waterfall. The place becomes very congested during peak season so avoid going at that time.

title: Good hangout for buddies
review: Great attraction to visit during the off-season but I'd not recommend to visit with elderly people or children, unless they're appropriately secured (and have trekking/training shoes). You can either descend to the waterfall on foot or take the cable-car to and fro. There's also a small boating lake separately located near the fall. It would take about 30-45 mins to reach by car from Library chowk and you can enjoy the view along the way. One of the drawbacks of the place is the rapidly deteriorating quality of water in the falls lake where there are a host of unnecessary constructions vis-a-vis commercial stores, changing rooms, locker rooms and food stalls. Although we managed to locate a few hidden gems with natural streams and flora away from the hustle and bustle of the falls.

title: Very attractive fall, must visit
review: To reach there, shared taxies are available from Mall road. if you are water loving person you can take bath in fall's chilled water; but be careful as stream flow of fall is very intensive. you can take cloths on rent. if you are nature loving person , you can try to search origin of Kempty falls. small restaurants are available there. Very nice place for all age group. But take care of child. Also you can Buy Wooden goods; as lots of shop available there. Taxi halts there for approx 1 to 1.5 hours. take you medicines with yourself.

title: its a part of Mussoorie without it mussoorie is empty and everyone visit here
review: Kempty fall is the most beautiful place of Mussoorie and here are many beautiful scenery to see and enjoyable moments

title: Small fall
review: Waterfall was less in March otherwise in and after rains its one of the most frequented place, beauty in waterfall

title: Short Family Vacation
review: We had combined a marriage attendance with short break to Mussourie. In Mussourie we had planned for visit to Kempty falls along with other local sight seeing. Kempty Falls is one to must visit with its pure white water flow from an good height. Surrounding maintained well and good access. Also good cheap food options around the attraction. We had egg maggi which was awesome, along with other things we ate.

title: Kempty Falls
review: It's actually a beautiful place and an attractive brook at that. One can reach to the destination by car. However, once there, the steps etc are a bit cumbersome, at least for senior citizens. The area is not at all well maintained - rather can not be, I suppose. Almost a dumping ground for lot of plastic etc. Tourists are to be blamed and while reaching to falls using cable car path, one gets to view the sorry state of the surroundings.

title: Must visit once
review: I can say if you are in mussoorie guys, please don't miss it, just 15 kms from the town.

title: Waters
review: Good to enjy and swim also safe, so go there n have awseme experience nice good Kool etc.akkdnsnxnxnnddkppr dnnndkxnndjdjjtos zjjrkkfnjdodbsj

title: good outdoor fun
review: much improved as compared to few years back . lot less risky now , it was fun going inside the water , we went in colder season so it was chilly inside the water

title: So cool, but crowsed
review: Quite the trek down steep stairs with many people and vendors. Very cool to see and the ride there has spectacular views. Not good for claustrophobics for sure since the walkways are very narrow and humid. Was a great experience if your willing to take the steep walk!

title: Crowded and Dirty
review: We crossed Kempty Falls on our way to Sainji - the corn village. It's always crowded, dirty as a bunch of people take dip in the water, litter around and make a lot of noise.

title: A nice place spoilt by commercialisation.
review: I remember being there when I was a kid. People still could take a dip in the pond where the falls ended. However this time it was horrible to see shops all along the walk down to the falls. Even all around it the shops selling all kinds of stuff just negates what could have been an exhilarating experience.

title: Dirty and Messy
review: The entire charm of a waterfall has been robbed by the commercialization around it.The water being collected in the pool for people to bathe is dirty and so unhygienic.

title: Not worth visiting
review: Very crowded place with shops and hawkers. Entry to the Falls is very steep for elderly people. Rope way facility was there but it was not operational due to regular maintenance.

title: water fall
review: its nice place to visit, little dificult for old age people to reach there as we have to walk up and down

title: Nothing much
review: This fall is good to visit during monsoon or post monsoon season. We went in February and didn't see much its quite far from the main town.

title: Beautiful Waterfall!
review: Myself and my family visited the Kempty falls last weekend in Mussoorie. Unfortunately it was raining and snowing hence we could explore the complete area. The ropeway was also closed due to snowfall.

title: Nothing great about it!
review: Rather than going down Kempty falls, we took the road less traveled by...the one that led up and not down!

title: Difficult to reach with senior citizen & kids
review: Good place to see with beautiful falls but very difficult to reach with kids & older person. Too many stairs down to reach the fall.

title: Beautiful Water Fall to View
review: Long drive away from Market place. Have to walk down more than 1km & return with climbing by Steps. Not recommend to take Fall bath, looks to be unclean, closed with many shops around, Bath dresses available on Rent

title: Good Experience But Difficult to Access
review: Good Experience But Difficult to Access

title: "Not worth  the effort"
review: The place is not really worth  as we stayed in  jharipani Castle we visited jharipani waterfalls  which was a 2 km trek and was really a great experience as the resort manager arranged a guide and a packed lunch. .......................  .

title: Falls
review: One needs to go down quite a bit to see the falls (which means one needs to climb up as well in return)

title: Amazing kempty Falls
review: I had gone to mussorie past may 2016 with my family for visiting in summer holidays.i visited many places included kempty falls.but i think that its amazing to all of those.what a scenerio like a heaven.great falls.hope visit again in forthcoming summer holidays.

title: Avoidable
review: This was a complete waste. It may be also be because of the season. May be the falls are full during monsoon or some other season. But we regretted wasting our time there.

title: Nice place
review: Climates of the valley is so romantic cold air

title: Not worth that 25 KM trip
review: It is around 25 Km trip from Mall road. It is sorta decent but nothing special either. You see the waterfalls. Water is so damn cold that you cant get down in water. All you can do is take some photos. There is cable car to take you down, they charge 120 bucks for both way trip.

title: Average for those who've seen Falls in Maharashtra !!!
review: This site can be avoided since the falls are fine, however if it comes to the beauty of the Falls as compared to the ones in and around Lohegaon, Lonavla etc or Munnar etc it isn't worth the trip.

title: Once star attraction, now pool of litter; overcrowded
review: We visited past week here. It was just not worth. There are too many shops surrounding the falls and its a pity that its a natural wonder being exhausted like that.

title: Don't waste your time here !!
review: This place is ruined with garbage and all the surrounding restaurants, the water is now polluted with all the misuse people make of this kempty falls, if humans didn't ruin it.. it would have been a most beautiful sight to see !!

title: take a bath in freezing water if you can
review: it is situated 13km from mussoorie .

title: Waste of time
review: From what my parents tell me, they have significantly reduced the size of the waterfalls and catchment area. Total waste of time.

title: bad one!
review: overcrowded waterfall with all the local delicacies being offered in and around water area. not recommended.

title: Enjoyable
review: One of the star attraction of Mussoorie. You must visit this place in evening. The falls is however not a large one

title: Not Scenic At ALL ......
review: The falls are beautiful but are surrounded from one side with shanties which is an eye sore.  One can try some activities such as zip line and boating around.

title: Nice picnic place
review: Visited kempty falls third time on February 2017

title: Average Falls
review: This is an average fall, but its highly overrated place. It has a small lake where water keeps falling and people take bath. It has ropecar facility, which is expensive, and so better to walk down to lake.

title: Litter
review: Full of poped up slum kind of shops....it is a very b'ful fall but....way too many tourists with no infrastructure.

title: Average Falls
review: It is around 15 kms from Mussoorie.It has small lake, ropecar facility.It has many shops.It is a crowded area.Overall It is a average Fall

title: Excellent place
review: Nice water fall from hotel approx 22 km in Summer you can take bath all this are easily available must see

title: nice place to visit only in summers
review: kempty falls Mussoorie ke must see place mai se ek hai, yaha par natural water fall hai jo summer mai jane ke liye kafi acha

title: Okay place to visit
review: Nice place. But manmade restrictions on the natural fall is disappointing. Many steps to climb, so not for sick and old or really small kids. There is nice cable car which can be used to get till the kempty falls. nice food and tea stalls and small shops with fancy clothes and decorative materials.

title: Waterfall with Chilled water
review: Its best place to visit near Mussorie. It took around 45 minutes from Mussorie to Kempty. Road is curvy and may gives you some temporary headache. So please take precaution. Water bottle.

title: Ordinary
review: Ordinary not very good due to lots of shops and lack of cleanliness.one time visit ok. Can be avoided to explore other places.

title: Ok for One time visit
review: So I will be there this weekend .

title: Great falls
review: It is one of the best place in Mussoorie. If you bath there you feels like got a water therapy. Dress and tube is available to rent.

title: Unnatural falls
review: This falls is on Mussoorie Chakrata road.

title: Must visit
review: Though i'm hydrophobic but still i enjoyed  that place. Things are bit costlier but that not much high.  Food was cheap there.  But try to avoid those photographers they insist that you atleast click 4-5 pictures and loot a huge amount from you.  Otherwise that spot is a wowwww....!!!!

title: Waste of Time
review: i found this water fall very ordinary. the worst part its so much crowded lots of shop , many people. even if you are planning to visit there half hour is the maximum.

title: on the way to sankri, good breakfast halt
review: nice waterfall, eateries on main road are veg. can get very crowded.

title: Nice to Visit
review: I got the chance to visit Campty Fall in January during 26th January long weekend. Though it was mesmerizing, but I could not explore it at its best because of crowd even in winters. The height and fall of water just stole my heart. I would say the best time to visit Campty Fall is in winters so you can enjoy in the water that I missed out.

title: Natures place
review: We visited this place. It was really beautiful and natural. Me and family member enjoyed it. The weather was really cold so did not spent much time.

title: Beautiful
review: highly commercialized but a scenic place. take the rope-way and just enjoy the scene with some hot chai and maggi...

title: It's not good place anymore
review: It used to be a good place to visit with family and friends,but this place is in terrible condition now,dirty and garbage everywhere,plus it's very far from library chowk

title: Dissatisfied
review: Well I come from a state which has around 15 waterfalls big,  small but all of them gorgeous.  The biggest disappointment was the artifical human plague built shops nd other commercial activities which has diluted the natural view of this waterfall. This was still better around 10 years back but going future, I guess we might miss the pristine beauty of a magnificent waterfall.

title: An avoidable nuisance
review: By far amongst the most overrated tourist attractions in Mussoorie...too much of a crowd, too much pain in car parking and for what? An apology of a waterfall...

title: Nice place
review: Beautiful waterfall approx 18 km from Mussoorie. Easily accessible.

title: Crowded during Peak Season
review: Avoid during Peak season as it is extremely crowded. During the off season it is dry. So don't visit and let nature retain its beauty.

title: Best one but Commercialization of place is ruining its beauty
review: One of best waterfall to enjoy but due to commercialization of place has ruined its beauty i would like to recommend if you love to nature u must to go upper side from water is coming and hope one will enjoy much than fall at lower side n if u take bath n wants to enjoy commercialization u may go old place

title: Superb!
review: Kempty falls is nice place to visit. Its truly nature sense. Its amazing view of falling water. Unfortunetly, we went in winter (jan 2017) so couldn't take advantage of swimming, but people says that there will be crowd in summer.

title: Must visit place
review: Famous place in the vicinity, right in mid of Park.  Truly the favorite spot for lot many people visiting Mussoorie

title: Humpty dumpty kempty
review: It big waterfall near Mussoorie good place for family. In summer it's best destination for friends and families.

title: Amazing falls
review: The falls are just breathtaking..Since it was really very cold ,we couldnt get into the water.. but its still worth going..

title: Kempty Falls
review: Was a good experience. The water in the falls was freezing cold. In case you really want to have an experience of hilly water first hand you can always take a dip. The place is safe. The view is also good. You may also find changing rooms near the falls, but do carry extra clothes if you are planning to take a dip.

title: Nice place for hangout
review: It is a very nice place for hang out in all season, whether you go there in summer or winter. It is a nice place for family trip, romantic or hangout with friend. You can enjoy some good time there.

title: Lost it's sheen...Kempty
review: Fall has gone...all commercial activities are done now...lost the old charm...avoid if you can...disappointing

title: Waste of time
review: It is too crowded and serpentine queue to reach. Worth a miss. The road from Mussoorie has heavy traffic and when you approach this place, after seeing the traffic, will definitely think as to why did you decide to come here. Avoid at all costs

title: Fresh water and waterfall fun
review: Bus is available for Kempty Fall, pick and drop facility with same bus and they give 2 hours time to make fun enjoy and return on time to bus for going back. There are many shops for food, shopping. Nice place for hangout with friends. It's too crowded i.e. the problem so cleanliness is not guaranteed.

title: Worth a visit
review: Kempty is a small town about 1 hour from Gandhi chowk by car.

title: Fun trip
review: Nice place to visit for nature lovers and enthusiastic guys, real natural beauty and most importantly fresh and pollution free environment

title: dirty place with trickle of water
review: its no longer a gush of water..it now comes as trickle from a green pipe..has clothes strewn all aorund & ppl taking bath in open..not worth the trip..

title: This is true definition of nature..
review: This was the amazing place I visited in my whole life the water was so chilled and the climate was incredible I love that place most likely place in my memories..

title: Nice place but need to maintain cleanliness..
review: A very nice place to visit.... climate is super awesome. Ropeway is available which takes you down. If u want to avoid that then you can take a walk.

title: Scenic place
review: The falls are so beautiful. The views are scenic. Unfortunately the place has not been kept clean thanks to careless travellers.

title: Amazing Place.
review: You can't miss this place, infact it is the only place in mussoorrie you can enjoy for whole day. waterfall is too awesome and they have other sports as well, ita little down but dnt worry they have cable car option too.

title: Photography place
review: Loved to go there, clicked few pics. It was raining so it was leas crowded. There is a option of ropeway to reach the bottom but we walked though it's not easier to come back through bigger stairs. But this place is must visit.

title: Lot of construction
review: Lot of construction around Kempty Falls degrade its beauty. One can enjoy it if you come late evening when all the shops close.

title: Can be avoided
review: It will be an insult to all famous waterfalls in India or across the world if Kempty Falls is termed as a waterfall. It is simply a skeleton water flow from height. To go the falls either one need to go through narrow hawker infested steps or pay money for cable car.

title: Don't miss this - its awesome
review: What a fall it is, super chiiling water and surprised you in its own way

title: Overrated and boring
review: Hardly any water left in the waterfall, and is extremely boring. There's nothing to do around there.

title: Nice picnic spot for a day
review: It is nice place to visit during the day and if you Carrying swimming costume then you can also have bath in natural spring

title: One of the best location near Mussourie
review: Nice and cool place. Nice place for photography. Take cable car from the car parking for both down and up. Cost Rs 120 per head. Swimming costumes are available if you want to get down into the crystal clear water.

title: Nature's miracle...
review: Beautiful, brings you close to the nature only if you are happy with our governments who pay no heed to develop such natural beautiful places attractive...

title: highest waterfall
review: about 15 kms from mussoorie, Kempty falls is a must attraction when in mussoorie. the sheer size of the falls is mesmerizing. there is a cable car that takes you to the lake below where weather permitting you can take a dip too. it is a great place for some awesome photo op.

title: Great landscape
review: I have come second time at this place. Many thins have changed. Things have become quite professional. But still worth coming once if you visit masoorie.

title: So so.. No improvement over years
review: Unchanged in the last 15 years!  Still unclean and disorganised.  Lots can be done with such a beautiful location.. give to a private party to run!

title: Cool cool
review: Awesome water falls and fun come in bathing in these water falls and you get a good location for photography and an attractive place

title: Gushing cold water
review: there are 3 levels of this falls.

title: average
review: crowded at peak seasons and dirty with bits of rubbish floating around and rowdy gangs of drunks crowing the whole place. leaves a bad taste if you are going with the family

title: Popular place of visit
review: Person can do swimming in Kempty fall they give swimming costume on rent, We enjoy a rope way and also the boating.

title: If in Mussorie, then worth visiting..
review: The waterfall is actually located far from the mussorie city, around 16 km from the main city. So one need to hire a cab or bike to go there. There are also bus service to that place.

title: Kempty Falls : Must for travellers visiting Mussorie
review: Kempty Falls would be on the list of travel junkies, visiting Mussorie as the aura of this fall is simply amazing. The cool breeze and water is a delight for people.

title: Kempty Falls -- Good attraction -- developments bad
review: Visited after 36 years.

title: Wste of time
review: It's a big waste of time. Traffic jams and nothing great the waterfalls are dirty.

title: Public  swimming pool
review: I am afraid to say it not more than a public swimming pool totally commercialized with not much to enjoy

title: Pathetic place.
review: To put in one sentence: The falls itself are splendin but Kempty falls the overall place is pathetic (unclean & too commercialisation). Jeeps charging 50 per sear ply from Mussorie. Entry is free to the falls. There is a cable car (2 min journey) which takes you down to the falls from the main road charging 120 return ticket. The experience of cable car was too avearge. The falls are natural but they have built artifical pool around fall so people can bathe and around that area old & (read: yuck) buildings thrive selling food and costumes for rent. Further downstream of the falls lies heaps of garbage. 1/2 hour is all that I give to visit this place. Foreign nationals can totally give this place a miss.

title: Beautiful falls
review: I have visited this place at least ten times by now. This is a very beautiful place. You can jump into water and play. But the space is very limited so it is a bit too crowded during the season. From November - March, the water will be too cold and it may not be much enjoyable to jump into water during those months. It is better to use the cable car. Otherwise it will be too tiring to walk through the stairs.

title: Beautiful!!
review: A beautiful place but let me warn you that it is atleast 5 degrees colder near the falls, so carry warm clothes. We went in the evening which further added to the chill. Nice place to click photographs. Worth visiting

title: Average Water Fall in Mussoorie!!!
review: Around 8-10 km from Mall Road.

title: you can spend as much time here !!
review: picture perfect waterfall. Ropeway to enjoy. and a natural pool for swimmers. must visit and bath in summer... however in winter is upto you!!

title: Needs maintenance
review: We visited Kempty falls during August. The falls was totally obscured by mist. We decided not to climb down as it was crowded and seemed very dirty. There were a lot of vendors selling eateries and other items. Needs a lot of maintenance and people should be fined for littering.

title: Cold out there
review: Water was very cold but refreshing. I can't feel a thing when I came out. Changing rooms are available and hot Maggie with other dishes are also served.

title: Beautiful Water fall
review: The free of cost view of the waterfall is amazing. Always crowded and the shops outside the fall are way 2 many. Nevertheless the view of waterfall compensate  all the shortcomings.

title: nice falls
review: you can take a ropeway if you dont want to walk down the hills or walk uphill during returning.The falls are very nice and also u find many stalls selling hot cup of tea coffe and also maggi and many more.

title: wonderful place
review: best waterfalls ever visited.. can play in water.. very safe and easily accessible. ropeway adds on to the experience

title: Good falls in not so good surroundings.....
review: The falls were a wonderful sight to behold, but the surroundings are littered with dirt. This just spoils the beauty of the falls. It's about 20+ km from the mall and after this long journey, it is nice to view this beautiful falls. Let's hope the cleanliness improves.

title: Nice place to visit once
review: I recently visited this place and since there was not much crowd, i enjoyed this place. I suggest to visit during off season. It is a good place to visit once you are in Mussoorie.

title: enjoy natural water park
review: Kempty fall is in mussoorie with drive of approx 45-50mins from mall road.

title: Beautiful falls
review: The water is clean. View is great. But surrounding is very dirty.

title: Great Falls
review: Kempty falls are a must visit for anyone visiting Mussoorie.The falls are 30-35 mins drive by road , the drive is nice with good view of the doon valley.They have made a ropeway to take you down closer to the falls, for people who have difficulty in walking.The 2 way ticket costs Rs120.00 per person..

title: Over crowded, but one time visiting place
review: Hello, although this place is now a days overcrowded. Lot of travellers coming here and waste management is very poor, however fall's view is pleasant and perfect for pic lovers.

title: Terrible..ghastly .. eyesore
review: Its a small , quaint falls as it used to be. too much commercialization has allowed ugly shops and lockers to come up everywhere. Its such that, you will struggle to get a full frame long shot capture of the falls without these structures getting on the way. the ropeway is a steal at 120 for 2 mins ride through garbage strewn bushes and backyards. Overall a filthy experience for people who prefer natural setups. But i guess it can be fun for kids with intention to take a dip in the man made pools there. Its no longer a natural falls, its a man made pool now.

title: Great Fun for Kids & grown-ups alike !!
review: Must visit if traveling with the Kids... And is equal fun for grown ups too... there is a propensity for traffic jams as you near the place with the numerous Taxis n tourist buses... there are two parts of the falls...upper and lower.. the lower one is more crowded..especially on Sundays n holidays.. the upper one is quiet and is recommended. We explored the upper one by chance.. and what a great time we had..just US..one family for good about 02 hrs..Kids jumping around and bathing in the falls.. Strongly recommended.

title: Nice view, and nice waterfall to relax...
review: Its very exciting waterfall cold water falls from this waterfall and tourists enjoy swimming and bathing in this waterfall its very relaxing, tourist from delhi, haryana, punjab, rajasthan are frequent travellers because of short distance of about 300-500 kms. When in plane area summer temperature is high tourist came to hill station like manali, shimla, mussorie to enjoy and relax. Must go if came to mussorie its 35 kms from there.

title: Beautiful gushing water
review: A must visit in Mussoorie. Once at the gate, there are cable cars that take you down to the falls which are charged at Rs 120/- a person up and down.

title: Must visit
review: Best place in Mussurie. If you don't go there. You r definitely missing something in your UK visit. This fall is one of the best water fall in India.

title: Overcrowded, but worth a visit once
review: Kempty falls is the most crowded place in Mussoorie during peak season. So, keep a check on traffic before visiting there, otherwise you might get stuck in a jam for hours. Nice place for shopping for ladies, but things are over priced.

title: Great view point
review: This Place is Worth a Visit for a Picturesque View Early in the Morning or at Sunset timing. Has all Amenities around with some Monumental & Man made attractions.

title: Nice falls
review: Clean water. Can easily bath. Come in shorts and enjoy the falls. A good place to be in Mussoorie area.

title: Nice Spot
review: Good place to relax and take a dip in water. Best enjoyed with friends or a group. Ropeway is available to come near the fall @rs 120 per trip per person.

title: One time Visit
review: More than the falls it is the walk up to the falls which I liked. A lot of scenic location en route. You can also have some fun time in water when u travel along with friends.

title: Breath taking view in the lap of nature !
review: Must visit attraction when in Mussoorie. With addition of cable trolley service, it has become more convenient and easy for senior citizens. Plenty of shops have now mushroomed near the site. Nevertheless the attraction of Kempty falls is still the same.

title: Biggest Falls in Mussoorie ! Though crowded- One time visit
review: We went in November and weren't expecting it to be having sufficient water, but it was almost in full flow. One can take a plunge in the water. The natural pool in which the water falls has been bordered with concrete which makes it relatively safe.One can take swim shorts and locker on rent in the shops around it if one is interested in taking a plunge on the pool. The rates are very reasonable. There is abundance of shacks which offer hot tea, maggie and paronthe. One has to walk down quite a bit from the parking to get to the falls. Also, cable cars are available for convenience on paying a nominal fee.

title: Beautiful location
review: The roads are quite short and across. Approximately 90 minutes ride from mall road. The cab charges around 1400 Rs for return trip. The scenery at falls is awesome.

title: Nice fall
review: It is good to watch natural fall.but now it has been commercialized.they have created a pool around the fall for safety.you will find clothes on rent.please take ropeway to go down as there are a lot of steps.

title: Must visit placeq
review: Visited in month of Nov, nice waterfall, chilled water, nice view. shops are available to shop handicrafts, must visit place in mussoori

title: Breathtaking view but a long way down!
review: Kempty falls is huge and therefore looks amazing! The view is breathtaking!  Unlike most of the falls that I have visited, this one was the largest. Also the fact that you can actually go down where the falls is, makes it even more fascinating for the masses. It  has therefore being turned into a small swimming area also where people can go down and enjoy the falls. But that is also a problem as people have crowded the area, its becoming congested and polluting! There is also a hanging bridge in front of the falls from where you can see the falls clearly. One thing that is a difficulty here is that, it is located down the hill, you have to climb down a lot of stairs (100s of stairs) to reach Kempty falls. There is also ropeway to take you down. The way downwards through the stairs have seating arrangements besides the stairs for people who get tired and can rest for a while. There are also several shops selling bags, and other handmade specialities of the region.

title: Great falls !
review: Nice falls ... but its so dirty all over ...not maintained well.

title: Breathtaking View
review: Most popular attraction of Mussoorie and rightly so. Must visit place. Its long way down through stairs so best is to take Rope way. Boating and Shikara is alos available

title: Chilling Moments
review: We took the rope way down as we had family consisting of aged people and children with us. Initially it took a while to decide whether to take a dip or not. Once I stepped in, There was no stopping. The chilling water was so good that we didn't feel like coming out. Going under the direct fall was one hell of an experience. Loved it and enjoyed it with my daughter and other family members.

title: Good but not as per expectations
review: When we heard it from friends and it was my first time seeing a fall from so close,we had huge expecations but it didnt live up to  it.ok place to be in.not clean and messy

title: Journey which I will never forget
review: This is a journey which I will never forget in life. First when I was offering Puja at PRAKASHESWAR temple, then never imagined that within next few minutes I will be visiting  such a heavenly place. While driving towards the fall you will get to see the Himalayan range on the right hand side. On reaching the place you will get few Dhaba sorts of hotels, consider having your breakfast there, then on stepping forward you will find a long staircase made of natural stones, follow that path and climb upon the hill, you will get a very close view of the Kempty Falls, you will be mesmerised to see the natural beauty, stop there and spend some time, in the middle of the waterfall few tables are there where couples can sit together and click few snaps, I have a secret wish, I wanna get married in the area of the Kempty Falls where me and my wife would be surrounded by the hills and near the waterfall I will smear her forehead with Sindur :D the Kempty Falls will be the witness of my marriage. Please Please visit in that area. However, the ropeway and the adjacent artificial swimming pool have nothing to do with the great scenic beauty of the area. Thank you.

title: Disappointment
review: I was really excited of visiting the place but was really disappointed when I got there !! Was expecting a lot from the place and it turn out to be bummer  I only liked the view enroute to Kempty falls ..

title: Waste of Time
review: Not that great......

title: Lot of walking but scenic waterfall
review: The Good:

title: Waterfall ... as advertised
review: Looks exactly like all the pictures. Downside is that one goes through shops, then a cable car and finally reaches the base which is again full of the ubiquitous Maggi and tea shops.

title: Falls look good - one time visit must
review: Its a nice experience standing near the falls and enjoying their breeze and sound. There is a small pond for bathing in the natural stream. Besides this there is 'Flying Fox' adventure sports close by - a must for all adventurous people out there. Flying over the valley gives goose bumps but it is exciting. You will have to look for that place as they have not advertised much.

title: Jst another sightseeing
review: Jst another waterfall u shuld better visit guccupani in Dehradun. So nt sch a grt place.u can have lots of eating options here bt they were nt hygeinic.

title: Kempty falls
review: good place to visit specially after good rain fall..  nice view & nice place to spent 2-3 hours with friends & family...

title: Like any other waterfall
review: Visited the waterfall during the month of November (not a peak season) and hence found it to be less crowded. Its a good place to hang out and taste a few bits at the road side stall. However, if you want to have a good view of the entire waterfall, i would suggest to stop you vehicle a few meters before the parking, on the opposite side of the waterfall. You also have numerous stalls offering photographs of you in traditional attire

title: Can take a bath and enjoy
review: Walk across ridge just mind blowing. Can take a bath. Visit before 1500 hrs. Only 16 KM from Mussorie.

title: a tourist destination but a let down
review: a let down. don't expect much. it's lost its charm due to over crowding in the area with buildings and shacks.

title: Crowdy place
review: We thought kemptyfalls trip will be good but there were crowd & dirty every where.  Go in off season . Fall was good.

title: 15km Journey, average place to witness
review: We zeroed in this attraction to visit after reading the good comments people mentioned in the website. This place is famous only for the waterfall plus nearby small street food joints. A good excursion to utilize few hours with family.

title: Chillingly beautiful..
review: To be able to judge this waterfall, you must feel it closely. To feel it closely, you must take a long chilling bath in this waterfall. If you don't bath in here, you won't be able to take back this as memory..

title: Disappointing Kempty
review: Too commercialised , they have turned the natural fall into a swimming pool ..it's filled with dirt and wastes .... Better to aviod

title: Not my kindda place
review: Didn't enjoy the place much as it is too over crowded.I personally prefer more quite and peaceful locations, this wasn't my kindda place!

title: Gosh!!! The place has lost its natural beauty
review: I visited this place after 22 years but even after assuming that 22 years is a hell of a long time and things would change, I seriously got a shock to see this wonderful place loose it to blind commercialisation. Instead of preserving the immediate surrounding places the entire development has happened immediate surrounding. That also is so shabby and unplanned that you really feel bad. But inspite of all the mighty fall will still make you feel wow. I visited in off season and that too on the Diwali day so the crowds were missing but on a crowded day it would be very difficult to enjoy in such a cramps place especially if you are with small kids. Anyways if u r in Mussoorie u just can't miss it and be prepared for the rush.

title: Nice place !
review: It is one of the place , where all cab drivers and tourist guides will take you first. A bit crowded place . There are small pond like structures made for bathing. Swim in natural pool. Water in ponds is coming from small waterfall.

title: Its a beautiful, cozy waterfall
review: Going through the cable car and going so near to the waterfall has been very romantic, tiny drops of the water sparkles on your face is very romantic.

title: Beautiful place but not well kept
review: The falls are good but the area is littered with plastic and also the shops made around the falls are not done systematically and aesthetically. This Killa the beauty of the nature

title: It was OK ...
review: Not recommended to old age people until they use LIFT service..

title: Give it a miss
review: A very crowded picnic spot. There is an artificial pool where people can take a dip. There are a lot of food stalls around.

title: Nice but over commercialized
review: They have made a swimming pool sort of an arrangement at the Falls where tourists can have fun and enjoy the falls but the water becomes very dirty. There is bridge from where you can view the falls from a distance and also enjoy the mild water sprinkles from the falls. Given all this the place is still worthy of a visit.

title: Excellent
review: Excellent and refreshing... Must visit place...

title: too many chickens spoil the broth
review: the natural view is being destroyed for the sake of money and business, bathing and swimming should be done at the last stage of the kempty falls

title: Very commercialized
review: Falls are hardly visible among the crowd that visits it even in winter months. There are man made pools and boating lakes which are simply for money making. There are better places to go

title: Overrated place with not much to do
review: First of all, you have to travel like 1000 steps to get to the place. From the start you will see shops, shops, and shops, nothing else. At the bottom, you will see a small pond as big as the couple of jacuzzi's. Everything is expensive there and if you want to waste couple of hours do visit it.

title: Very touristy
review: Nice drive to the falls with beautiful views across the mountains but very disappointing when you get there as it is very touristy with shops and cafes in abundance and the falls are really not that spectacular

title: Awesome
review: It was a great experience of moving around and see water coming out of Mountains. You can Also enjoy Bathing and adventurous atcivity......

title: Kempty Falls
review: The falls have a unique appearance. Not too high and the volume of water is moderate in October. The approach is lined with all kinds of touristy shops. Personally I preferred to go to the falls early in there morning.

title: Visit To Kempty Fall
review: One can go and see Kempty fall and return for the sake of viewing it.

title: avoid this place in busy season
review: the entire area around Kempty has become too crowded now and you will get the feeling of a municipal market over here....especially in busy season

title: must place
review: if you are in mussoorie you need to visit kempty falls. not only visit you should enjoy the ice cold water falling n splashing from a good height.

title: Nothing great.
review: Much hyped place. A waterfall on the way side which has been commercially exploited for tourism purpose. The spots where the fall water is stored is used for bathing and not kept well.

title: Great falls.. View mesmarizing.
review: One can get in to water at the bottom, like mininpool. Spring water looks clean. Many shops supply temporary  changing clothes/rooms etc. Family oriented.  Tea stalls have gorgeous views.

title: Kempty Falls is lovely
review: The water in kempty falls is very very cold, even during peak of summers.But still we could not resist the temptation of taking a dip in it. The water is clean, but these were a lot of people taking the dip, just like us. We trekked to and from Kempty fall and enjoyed the experience.

title: Trip
review: Definitely not worth a visit....visit this place only if u have time to waste....one of the worst waterfalls I have ever seen

title: must visit place in mussorie
review: for me this was the only sight seeing place i liked in mussorie, this is a must visit place, located about 15 kms from mussorie, very relaxing place, and a beautiful waterfall.  there is a ropeway to go down to the falls.

title: It is Differant
review: The water Fall and pool arrangement is very nice

title: Good visit if you are in Mussorie
review: Nice place to relax and enjoy the waterfalls. Visited this in month of Oct 2016 morning at around 9am. I heard this is a very crowded area. Luckily the day we visited there was no crowded tourists nor vehicles. Spent around 3 hours peacefully and had garma garm chai.

title: Excellent Waterfall experience
review: It's a symbolic place to Mussorie as visiting it is mandatory if one visits here. Good place for kids and youngsters especially but generally enjoyed by most. One can approach by walking for 20 mts or take a 5 minute cable car to reach at the water fall. Though not so clean place but still enjoyable.

title: Too commercialized
review: The falls are good but its too commercialized around for you to enjoy the view. The rope way is too small so don't waste your money on that. Too many eating and shopping options around.

title: Kempty falls - Nice but Not utterly beutiful
review: The fall was in full force when I saw it. The sound of water splashing to the rock is very soothing to the ear. Although I did not like the environment. The place is not well maintained. A fully commercial place as I have seen now. You can merely fell the nature. The bathing system and the shops and lockers are too bad. People are destroying the beauty. We have stepped down and climbed up by rope way.

title: Kempty Fall is highly commericalized
review: Kempty Fall looks like small swimming pool and surrounded by many shops. Whole area is commercialized and do not have natural appearance.

title: R u lover of nature spark?
review: The Kempty fall is just 7 t 10 kms away from mussorie, if u are visiting mussorie it is the must go place to have fun with friends family and couples.

title: Lacks hygiene
review: Long drive from town , really not worth the effort to just see the falls. The swim there seems very unhygienic.

title: Nice place to visit
review: i didn't go to the actual fall, ( i saw it from afar and it looked magical). i just visited the town: the typical mountain village where one can find food, drinks, and souvenirs. If you run out of things to do, this is a place to visit.

title: Crowdy
review: Don't visit on weekends and holidays.

title: Its just another fall
review: Decent place if u want to dive in cold water, I mean reaalllyyy Cold, just moderately clean, too crowded and nothing so special except eating hot Maggi sitting next to a water fall. And if you still want go than go to the upper part of the fall which is not that famous, primarily people go to the bottom part which is really crowded and has some activities too although we didn't go there.
I suggest this place as a must go if you are going with crazy friends but can avoid with family.

title: Good Choice
review: Nice place to visit, nice views from the hills, enjoy the cold water, but needs to maintain the fall cleanliness, rest beautiful.

title: A beautiful falls has been destroyed by people
review: I not sure why it's in top 10 within Mussoorie, it shouldn't be there. People in this earth are destroying natural beauty and this is one example to prove. Everywhere in this falls,  there are lockers/rooms to change dress (off-course, you could say it's a swimming pool) and you could see price tag everywhere (seems like, you have entered a shopping mall - what the hell management wants to do there). Please keep natural beauty as it's - don't try to alter it. It's a fantastic falls and you'll enjoy it if shopping malls (Hope, you understand what does that mean) are not there...

title: Overrated
review: Yeah, there's a waterfall. But most of the stuff around it is man made and isn't really worth it. Most folk would have seen a larger waterfall if they travel often. Skip it if on a tight schedule. You wouldn't have missed much. Too crowded too.

title: Overrated
review: Too many people selling stuff, offering swim costumes and locker. Like a temple. Not good for young couples. Better for middle aged couples.

title: A perennial water fall worth a visit
review: There are 2 ways to reach the fall. You can go to the top which is a small 2 min treak above the main road and you can go to bottom of fall using rope car for which there was a big queue. I went to top and it was definitely worth a visit. Dont expect it to be a very big water fall. Its a small one and safe for kids to swim in a small puddle. The water is potable mountain water and you can have a bath too. There was a shop that rents out swimming costume and air tubes.

title: Only the Indians can make a pool at the end of a waterfall
review: While in Mussoorie the Kempty falls is a must visit. I have never seen a pool at the end of a waterfall surrounded by restaurants. Amazing.

title: A must see on Mussorie Trip
review: Kempty Falls is a perineal water fall and has good amount of water throughout the year . It is below road level and there are around 300 steps which you have to first climb down and up.  There is a small ropeway also available few steps down from the road if you are not good with steps . Didn't use it though . There is a market on both sides of the steps which sell arts and crafts . Also swimming costumes are available on rent for both men / women near the falls if you wish to take a swim and are not carrying any.

title: Avoidable
review: It's not the same fall it used to be A decade back.

title: Kempty falls
review: Must place for a visit. Around 15 km from Library chowk. must take a bath to really enjoy it. Also cable car available for going down.

title: Nice Fall, wasted by crowd
review: Nice fall. However, too much crowd and commercialization of this place is ultimately taking the charm of this place. Enjoy the cable car ride to and from the fall.

title: Kempty Falls.
review: It is a fun place for youngsters and the adventurous. There are rows of shops selling trinkets and various souvenirs for the tourists. There is also a cable car which carry you from the road to the Kempty Falls but there is also a pathway where you have to climb down steep stairs.The Falls look lovely but the place is crowded and congested with low maintenance.

title: Over Commercialisation has spoilt the natural fall
review: Visited after 30 years and felt sad at its condition.Though we have a rope way now the concrete jungles around the fall couples with shops selling & drying under wears all around gave a poor image of a natural beauty. Elephant fall in Shillong is much better.

title: Crowded
review: Go if it's one thing you want to strike off your list. You need to climb down the mountain to get there. Rope way is available at 120 two sides. But Kempty falls is crowded with people taking a bath, very commercial.

title: Average experience.
review: Too much of crowd just destroy the great view and feel of nature/water falls here. Overall an average place for visit.

title: OK
review: Its ok, Good if you are going with friends. If you are with family and kids then I dont think u'll like this place. Too Crowdy.

title: Kempty Falls.Mussorie
review: A beautiful natural spot has been ruined by a surrounding concrete mess.Overall very poorly maintained with clothes hung out for drying around the viewing gallery.One can only imagine how beautiful it must have been at one time.

title: Natural Beauty covered with commercial ill made shops
review: Kempty Falls are as famous as Mussoorie itself so all the travellers cannot resist and come flocking to these falls. But, when you reach the falls,(about 3 kms away on the mountain, you can see the falls below you, right in front), one is in for rude shock. The beautiful natural falls are totally covered with small tea and tourist goods selling shops. The site of these encroachment is so awful that traveller feels cheated on the name of these falls.

title: Very good place
review: Wonderful  this place and  when i reached kampty falls i saw a  very beautiful  place.i enjoy best moments.

title: Overall a Good experience
review: This place is just a good place for tourists to have a rope-way a ride as well as to view a falls. The falls is not very big but still the view is enjoyable. This place also has a lake at the bottom which provides swimming and boating facilities.

title: please carry extra clothes to avoid extra charges at the sight
review: go take bath in cold water and enjoy. the rope way charges is 120 per person for both side and one way 100 rs. there are shoddy changing rooms for those who are taking bath with cost of 50 rs. but you dont have option if you wish to enjoy the water fall to the fullest.

title: No longer a fall but a commercial place like a fish market
review: What was used to be the falls once is nothing short of a fish market with hoards of vendors eating up the stairs to reach here. Plus some water activities, food joints, monkey etc. There is an option of cable cart but the distance is short for it to be useful. If you have issues climbing down and up then go for the cable car.

title: Hooligan Attraction
review: Approx 14 Kms. from main city,private and share taxi are available to reach this point to enjoy some cool bath in summers rather than clicks some photo shoot,the bath point can be reach by gondola from the main road.Its just fun for kids rather than hooligan crowed shouting.There is no proper place to change your cloths.The price of everything is over priced.Yes the only best to watch the water fall falling in many streams.

title: so crowded...but nice..
review: kempty waterfalls...can have a very very chilling day out with the water...but too much of crowd... but still it is a worthy one..

title: Awesome Place
review: Best place to visit near Mussoorie. Water was really cold and enjoying maggie with tea near water fall was too amazing. Must visit place.

title: Nothing spectacular, extremely croudy
review: This falls is located about 5km from Mussoorie. You can walk down or take a hand cart ride to reach there. The place is extremely commercialized and crowded. There is a natural pool in which the water falls, which can be reached through stairs or a ropeway. The pool offers bathing in the fall. But there is so much crowd in the pool you can hardly move. As a veteran traveller and nature lover, I shall always avoid such kind of place. But if you are in Mussoorie, you can go and have a look.

title: too crowded ..
review: place is very good.. falls are beautiful but its mostly over crowded with people. water is not that clean. avoid visiting on weekends

title: hardly a water fall
review: this place now has become very very commercialized . would really not recommend to regulars of mussoorie.

title: Very crowded and over hyped place.
review: This place has now become a over hyped one. though earlier it was a nice place to go.

title: Overrated
review: This a bit too far from the Mussoorie and also way to over-hyped. The place is too crowded and the food is over priced and not very good. Lacks cleanliness.

title: Crowded but must visit
review: As this is one of the most famous places of Mussoorie, it is a must visit with a waterfall to have a bath. But it is very crowded and seems risky to bath. You can also enjoy Maggi available near it.

title: Could have been better place
review: I went there first time in 2010 and again in 2016. In the past 6 years this place has undergone tremendous change. This place is no more close to nature. It has been surrounded by several shops. It seems to be an artificial fall now.

title: Avoid if you hate commercial scenes at natural places.
review: Located on main road. This place is frequented by every tom, dick & harry tourists unless someone has prior knowledge about it. Highly commercialized and unkempt place with loads of people most of the time.

title: Must Visit Place with Friends
review: It almost took 30-40 mins to reach Kempty Falls from mall road. Place is very over crowded however you can surely enjoy there even if you will just hear the sound of water falling. Must visit place for group of boys who can actually enjoy the chilling bath.

title: "Kempty Fall"..A Tourist Paradise..!!
review: Kempty Falls is one of the rarest places which can be an ideal destination for families, children or even backpackers..Having been situated at a distance of near about 14 km. from Mussoorie and approximately  44-45 km from Dehradun, it's an ideal place for zealous travellers..The origin behind the name “Kempty” has been generated from the word “camp-tea” during British rule, since it's been said that they used to organise their tea parties in here. Being surrounded by supreme mountain peaks, the transportation is pretty hassle free in order to visit Kempty Falls since Buses and taxis both are available straight from Mussoorie and Dehdarun for this purpose..The temperature over there is very cold..Moreover cool bridge and bath under the falls can be termed as 2 major attractions..It's like nature has bestowed all its treasure upon this particular place. The only thing I didn't like is lack of cleanliness..I hope in coming days Govt tries to work a bit on this issue in order to clean up the place..Ideal time to visit the place can be April-June or November is what I feel. It’s been one of my most enriched experience..

title: One should fall to Kempty falls.
review: As the title suggests, one should fall to kempty falls whenever he/she falls into mussorie. This is one of the heaven on earth.

title: Overly croweded
review: The place has lost its natural beauty coz if over commercialisation. No doubt fall is awesome but it's beauty is superseded coz of the construction there. Avoid if u r expecting sum natural fall

title: good fall closed to town
review: A great escape around Massurrie specially in summers when you can enjoy the chilling water in temperature of 35. a great natural fall  for adventure.

title: Can visit once !
review: Nothing so exciting , it is in a small covered area  plus very much commercialized and moreover too much crowd in a limited  space is a complete no no .

title: Very crowded waterfall
review: We were expecting to find a natural spot but it seems more like a pool. We visited this waterfall during the weekend and it was very crowded.

title: Terrible place, give it a miss
review: Small water fall, surrounded by people trying to convince you to rent horrible bathing suits. People swim in there and make a lot of noise .

title: Disappointed- Seeing it after 25 Years
review: I have a pic of my baby years sitting in front of the majestic falls (probably 100 ft then) and when i visited the falls last year, I was totally disappointed seeing how the the commercial aspect of the place has made the falls loose its beauty. It just seems like an artifical fall now.

title: Place is very crowded
review: place is highly crowded.. but if you wish to enjoy the falls and have a little fun then do it visit it. water is overall clean. avoid weekends its very very crowded

title: Waterfall to get into
review: Awesome to get dipped in low temperature water. Soothing place to chill out. Make sure you bring changing clothes otherwise you can rent changing clothes which was all around the falls. Rope way cost was Rs.120/- for a round trip. Must visit place.

title: Average
review: GREAT place to visit. Its been WONDERful EXPERience FOR US TO VISIT even in rainy season. Liked it very much.

title: Good place to visit
review: Kempty falls is located at around 15-16 km from Library chowk. You can hire shared taxi for just 60/- per person from around 500 mtr from Library chowk - Kempty falls road.

title: Over Crowded
review: Though the place is small and over crowded, the  Ride to this place is amazing in the ropeway and nice shopping stalls and to click pictures. Dont miss the adventure park beside the Fall

title: Should Visit This Place In Off Season....
review: Weather was awesome and we enjoyed car ride. We had taken ropeway ride and fall was looking very good , The best tie to visit here is off season, in peak season the place is flooded with tourist, The scenic views itself make it worth the visit. Now to the falls, its pretty good too....

title: Fun!!!!
review: Nice place...water is totally chilled!!!!

title: Crowded, dirty
review: Concretised and rubbish! This place needs a clean up. It's become a tourist trap over the years. Do yourself a favour and avoid this till they decide to clean it up.

title: Total Waste of time and money
review: Very very cheap crowd, looked like a public swimming pool. Very poorly maintained. A big NO to visit if you are hygiene freak.

title: Good place to visit and chilled water
review: It's good place and some one can take chilled water bath.

title: Kempty Fall
review: Kempty fall is situated near Mussorie, it's the main attraction for visitors. During my visit, it was crowded and only paid parking available that time. Waterfall was nice bt there was no cleanness.

title: Good place
review: As other tourist attractions in India this place is also loosing its natural beauty due to encroachments.  In tourist season you may hardly find place even to stand and look upon beauty of fall.

title: Not worth the visit
review: You will regret your visit to this place. It was so dirty and crowded.

title: Water,Water and Water !!
review: It's one of the best places to visit in Mussorie.

title: Beautiful Waterfall
review: while in Mussoorie, Once need to visit this waterfall.Its around 30-45 mis from mall road. If you want one can bath on the pool created at the bottom of the fall.Its a long walk to the bottom of the fall but one can use the Ropeway to go up and down.

title: Crowded and dirty
review: This place is crowded and is dirty. The cable car price is high and you don't feel like spending time at kempty falls because there is not much to do there .Will not go there again.

title: Overrated Place
review: The place is brimming with people. Its been converted into a water park with everything from floats to costumes available in the shops. The market around is okay for your souvenirs but the place could be given a miss.

title: Not worth visiting these days
review: It used to be a great place with scenic beauty and stuff but now it has turned into just a money making spot for most and the crowd is mostly unbearable.

title: milky white falls
review: Kempty falls are further at a distance of about 13 km from Mussoorie and is one of the most popular spots for tourists going to Mussourie. And the road between Mussourie Mall Road and Kempty falls is so dreamy and beautiful, dominated by the scenic landscapes of lofty Himalayan mountains, lush green  vegetation, clear sky which will surely make you fall in love with the nature.

title: Smelly
review: This point is worthless

title: much hyped than actual
review: The fall it self is beautiful but the base of the fall has been made customer centric and tents have been made for people to bath and buy stuffs. Its more of water park than natural attraction. Due to the commercialization it is too much crowed.

title: Birthday celebration
review: Nice place for hangout with family and friends but avoid rainy season otherwise awesome place must visit

title: Nice water falls
review: Probably the other famous tourist point apart from the mall road. You will usually find a lot of rush here. Just a waterfall.

title: Enjoy
review: We had visited kempty fall in July with my frns the fall is good .. And kids had enjoyed and there we had eaten in magie point and have fun.

title: a must see place during trip to mussorie
review: go there early morning when few people are around. has a section above the level of motorable road and a section below the level of road. I was happy to go up and climb stairs above the road and spent quality time in the morning watching the serene falls

title: Mussoorie Trip
review: Nothing much to do here apart from taking a dip. Over crowded during most of the times. Try to visit early morning.

title: Bad
review: the water is dirty....so i didnt go there but passed by......its your choice of course but just not my type of place.

title: Average place
review: Kempty falls is an average place.

title: Good for sightseeing
review: The falls are impressive in height as in number of visitors in the pond below. I wouldn't recommend any westerner to swim in the pond as I expect it to by quite dirty but swimming utensils can be hired for Rs.20-40 with changing rooms and lockers readily available near the viewing point. Also floaters for less skillful swimmers are available at your disposal for a very small price.

title: The E....mpty Falls
review: Things at the falls could have been better but it is sheer Govt apathy and slack admn that affects our tourist spots.....the main purpose of most tourists coming here is (especially men )is to get water under the falls and have a couple of drinks ........and make noise this kind of revellery is disgusting.....it spoils the fun of otherwise a fulfilling enjoyment one can have by having an invigorating shower under water.................been her twice but the same story is repeated.

title: Best waterfall to enjoy in it
review: I believe this is the biggest waterfall you can comedown to and u can enjoy in water up-to your chest..  Highly crowded as its available without any sight seeing charges.. But safe for everybody..  Having a cup of tea at the tea shop just beside the waterfall with a drizzling atmosphere created by this fall is an amazing experience... A place where everyone should go.. Great.!!

title: Interesting location
review: Falls themselves are not anything spectacular but what is interesting is the drive there and the hill station town perched on a ridge. The houses are India's version of Clinque Terre. In fact they are more interesting as they are built on stilts and platforms, quite an engineering feat. The falls are a very popular swimming hole for domestic tourists and there is an extensive water park there with a variety of rides to choose from suited for families.

title: Nature Beauty
review: One of the best fall i had ever see. The whole trip frommussorie to kempty falls is unforgettable for me

title: Beautiful place
review: The most beautiful place of mussoorie.

title: Fresh air
review: It's a nice place for pick-nick with family or friends. The water is cold and the view is fantastic.

title: Such a Amazing place for natural Swimming pool
review: This place is one the highly attractive point of Mussoorie. If are in Mussoorie, then you have to visit this place. This entire location is wonderful. But keep capri as swimsuit and bikini are not allowed here.

title: Must visit in Mussoorie
review: The ropeway to fall start only at 9am. If you going there early morning you will have to use stairs. I suggest go to company garden first and then go to Kempty fall. If you go early there you can enjoy more because it will be less crowded that time. There is cheap locker facility (Rs 50) and clothes (Rs 20) and floating tube for kids (Rs 50) available on rent.

title: Its Raining !!!!
review: Ropeway was not working,,Due to rain the entire place was messy.HAd to walk down to Kempty Falls.Couldnt take bath as its all muddy water....

title: Swimming Pool with natural richness
review: Amazing place to visit but traffic are more in day time. But when you reached there you fall in love with natural beauty. Trail also there. Water fall is the main center of attraction.Taxi service charge more money there expensive.

title: Congested Now :(
review: Once this place is occupied by nature and now, all concrete shops has been built and narrow down the fall area. The beauty has been ruined; but still have attraction to take a dip in cold water inside the fall.

title: Famous fall
review: Fall is worth watching. But so many shops near fall makes uncomfortable. Cant spend very long time there not much place to move.

title: Must visit
review: Its worthless to visit Mussoorie if you have not seen the Kempty falls. Just spend some time in the freezing water, its so refreshing.

title: best place to visit near by mussoorie
review: kempty fall is best place to visit near by mussoorie.

title: Disappointing
review: What a letdown! One look at the crowds jostling for space in the small pool underneath the falls would make you go as far away from the place as possible. Road to the falls is prone to traffic jams. The winding path to the falls is jam packed with shops and tourists. Definitely a no no during the tourist season.

title: Worth a visit....
review: One of the highlights of mussoorie but could be very crowded. The  cable car ride was a good experience for kids. Falls though is okay but again too many people can spoil the fun.

title: Nothing great occupied by shops only
review: you will feel cheated by going there. no one can enjoy this place. you will feel wastage of time and energy in going there. all surrounding place is occupied by shops and small hotels.

title: Rainy day
review: The day we planned to visit kempty falls was very cold there was heavy rain night before that day.

title: Not Exciting Anymore
review: It was crowdy and worst part is the stairs required to go this place which will be unbearable for Old age and Kids. Random bags and filth can be found everywhere. Only the best part was natural water coming out and nice view.

title: Awesome Place
review: Located approximately 15 kms from Mussorie  one can easily get a cab or bus ,a nice place to chill with beautiful views

title: Waterfalls of Mussoorie
review: It is only adventurous place in Mussoorie. Its about 15 km from library square. There you can see a big waterfall coming down into a big pool of water. People go there to bath in fresh chilled water. There are many restaurants nearby which offers street food. You can see hundreds of people taking dip at one time. It is also little crowded so only boys can go there or girls with there family.

title: nothing great
review: the place is more of commercial purpose, not a great waterfall what we see at south india..no comparision. overall thumps down.

title: Enjoyed alot
review: Cool water, though not clean. Perfect summer vacation it was. Do purchase the tube and float in water :)

title: Great Disappointment
review: It is surrounded by lot of buildings which destroys its beauty.  In my opiion this can be avaoided if you have seen falls. We found far better falls at yamunotri

title: Good place to visit.
review: I went early in the morning at kempty falls. Its about half n hour from my place of stay at barlowganj. The lake and falls were mesmerizing. After some walk, I took a ropeway service for going to kempty fall and lake, otherwise it takes too long by walking. Ropeway charges Rs. 120 per head to and fro.

title: Wow
review: Nice fall good place to visit also. Close to Jw Marriott. Really enjoy time with friends.... litter far away from mall. And to much traffic on the way

title: Good But Crowded
review: One of the most over-hyped paces in Mussoorie.

title: terribally dirty filthy
review: Very dirty place, not managed well. It is main attraction for tourists, but but but. Its dirty, dirt all over. Should be clean

title: Enjoy in falls
review: its nice place for every one.all enjoy in doing fun in this falls.to do bath in falls is really wonderful.its nice place .

title: Empty falls : Oh Mussoorie !!!
review: Had a chance to be here way back in 1981 as well as 1985. So had decided to revisit after a long gap.

title: Disappointed
review: Such a waste of time n money do not visit

title: An average place to see.
review: Its a very attractive place near mussoorie. Its around 15 kms away from The Main Mall Road. Now there are two falls one is down stairs and other one is upstairs. People there is no management. There is dirt and Garbage all around. The govt. does nothing and just charging tourists money to enter kempty falls etc. There is a fee of gram panchayat some thing like that to enter kempty falls. Pond is very dirty you wont even feel like to enter there. The govt dont take any action to get this falls clean and beautiful. You will see waste, plastic, bottles and all kind of garbage there. I have there so many times and don't see any improvement.

title: Pathetic
review: Once you go there their will be a parking of 100 rs for your car and also there are terms and conditions of few shops there to park car in front of there shop but you either have to click photos from them or have food.

title: Not well maintained, dirty, crowded
review: Before coming to this place we have high expectations, but it's not that great how it looks in pics. Garbage is spilled randomly, not well maintained. Though people are welcoming and weather is really good, this place didn't meet my expectations.

title: Good Waterfalls with a fabulous view from all 3 sides
review: It's a nice looking waterfall which has a view from all the 3 sides. Since it was raining we didnt go near the falls but had a view of it from the opposite side. She looked wild and beautiful with the mist surrounding her. Its a nice place to visit when you are @ Mussoorie

title: Tourist trap symbolic of how to spoil nature
review: Seldom does one visit a place that has no redeemable quality. Unfortunately Kempty Falls is in that category. It is an advertisement for all that can be done wrong in a natural setting. Random construction that obscures views and has already triggered rock slides blocking the natural path of water, garbage and plastic bags everywhere with the stench of human filth overpowering anything that nature can offer, very poor parking and traffic management, plus some of the cheapest cheesiest amusement type attractions that one can possibly imagine. Boating in swimming pool sized slime covered man made ponds, or swimming in the same, or spitting or washing dishes.........

title: Not to go by pics displayed
review: In Photographs it seems to be an ideal water fall, depicting nature at its best. But in reality it's not so. People take bath at the end of fall. It's not even photographic place. Taking cable ride is not advisable since its not worth the cost.

title: NATURAL BEAUTY
review: It was very crowdy and the timber trail was out of order. So it was very difficult for older people.

title: A good waterfall commercialized in the worst imaginable
review: The waterfall has a nice view, a cable rope way to it. But once you reach there it is as bad as it gets. Shops all around the waterfall. The government has not controlled anything. The water is blocked and did not look clean.

title: Too crowded during holidays
review: A must visit when in n around mussorie but damn crowded these days due to summer vacations in north indian schools

title: Great place for Family Holiday
review: Though it is a crowded place since lot of people come here for holidaying during summers. But it is good in June-july month when monsoon just arrives. That way you enjoy the pleasant weather and have fun in the falls.

title: Bad experience
review: 10 years back kempty fall water was so clean that you could see the pebbles in the water but these days they have made it like a swimming pool where most of the people pee in the water

title: Terrible Place
review: What we get there is crowd, crowd and crowd,..Not a good place if you r with kids..You will have to walk a lot and water is dirty there...

title: Holiday
review: The water was been blocked, not flowing out. Not recommended for children who don't have good immune. The water was very dirty.

title: unmissable
review: its a mammoth twin falls with a huge pond beneath.one way can be opted for rope way as the path is rather steep.

title: Go for Water Fall & Cable Car!!
review: We were group of 15 people and gone there by traveller..which was stopped 1,5 km from the waterfall...its better go by car...as it wil drop you at the main entrance....Crowd was not good...it took 30 mins for cable cars the line was big.....downstairs the water was not clean and so we stayed there for 30 mins and then came back...on the way there were lot of small eatries and resturants are there where you can have maggi or food you want....overall it was ok ok experience.....can go there for time pass and water enjoyment....can try zorbing also....

title: Kempty falls musoorie
review: While at musoorie.we went to this place.people messup.bathe as if the first bath.even use shampooo.soap.shops hire out dresses.

title: Disappointing
review: From a waterfall perspective, it was quite a disappointment. Crowded, hardly a pretty site, somewhat dirty. We did not go all the way down as did not feel like it. But lots of swimming pool kinda things were there at the bottom. Have seen much much better waterfalls and would not recommend the place.

title: Must Go to Kempty to See Peak Season Rush in Mussoorie
review: Definitely visit kempty to have boating and swimming downside to kempty falls. Remember to hold hand of your kids in peak season especially during weekends of summer vacations.

title: Worst place to go in Peak season
review: it was worst experience to go to Kempty fall in peak season as it has no natural rocks as before and now looks like a cheap swimming pool for all. It was very crowded and you could barely put your feet in the water. we just paid for Parking, Trolley, took 2 pics and came back.

title: A nice site to visit
review: It is situated on convent road at a distance of about 8-10 KMS from Gandhi Chowk.

title: Once an exciting place to be at is now a total spoilt one!
review: I was at the Kempty Falls after a gap of almost 30 years or so and was really shocked to see that what this so called 'Development' is doing to the best of our places!

title: Visit only if u love water falls
review: During my visit to kempty fall, i was very excited but then level got down as i reached the place. You go down by a trolley which is fun, but after you the waterfall you feel just ok. People bathing there, eating and littering, etc this made me leave as soon as i reached. Never went back again

title: Waist
review: I won't suggest this place to anyone...This place is biggest waist of time and energy...The water is dirty.They have made a pool of water coming from fall..To reach you have to go down for about 150 stairs..they place so crowded...Not worth a penny....Don't even think for kempty at all

title: Skip it ..if visiting in peak season
review: There r quite a many steps.Traffic jams all around.Nothing to do for oldies and small kids or those who don't want to go in that crowded pool of water

title: Worst ever experience
review: Worst experience of life. Disgusting atmosphere, so crowded ( that not a problem but how they are spending time and be into water). Foul smell like urine and sweating was in air up till 300 meters. Could not stand for more then few min . Just spend time to take few pics and video to tell people how dirty water was and

title: Crowdy!
review: Its not too good... No proper changing rooms... The waterfall is good but other services near the fall are not upto the mark!

title: Good but extremely crowdy
review: Though I didnt stay much, this place is known for the beautiful waterfall but only flip side is you will get no parking unless you are extremely early

title: Full-fledge fun
review: Probably the best place to enjoy in Mussourie. The area is small but full of fun. There a small water pond and a big waterfall. We enjoyed a lot. Families, kids, couples can be seen having fun, swimming, clicking pictures and enjoy food. Would definitely recommend if you are in Mussorie.

title: Good waterfall
review: It is very good waterfall and water very cold there (warning ;)).

title: It was a beautiful waterfall once.
review: I remember this was one of my favorites when I was a kid. But, now this place is too much commercialized and all muddled. This beauty has been destroyed by the activities around. Changing rooms are not at all in good condition. Food joints are available with local snacks.

title: Leisure Trip
review: Awesome place to visit. Must go site when you are in Mussoorie. Ropeway facility is also there and that too at very affordable price. Even it's safe for children as well as they will enjoy a lot.

title: Must visit
review: Definitely should be a part of your itinerary and enjoy the pool also with hot Maggi. You can do boating, adventure sports and enjoy cable ride.

title: Wonderful scenery view with ultimate weather
review: The visitors must go and enjoy amazing natural waterfall to snap with your close love.

title: Too crowded
review: Dirty water ,too crowded ,expensive parking ,bad food ,small waterfall etc etc . If you have nothing to do then also find something else

title: AWESOME WATER FALLS
