review: we can play we can dance ....water lovers having peak level enjoyment im damn sure about this. its too cool

title: Nice place
review: Kempty fall is a nice place to visit and relax but it is heavily crowed these days, overall a good experience.

title: 14 km from mussoorie
review: Its located around 14km from mussoorie and biggest water fall near by mussoorie. Its a must visit place if you are visiting to mussoorie.

title: Time waste
review: The place was too crowded and the water was too dirty. The route to the falls is so suffocated with hoards of shops clamped on both sides.

title: Over hyped Attraction of Mussorie
review: Due to heavy commercialization the actual essence of kempty falls is lost. One can enjoy a small ropeway to get to the bootom of the fall.

title: AVOID
review: Just avoid going to this place ...ask your local Cabie to take you further ahead from this place which is perfect !!

title: A long way down....
review: First and foremost there is a long trail of vehicles on both sides of the road jostling to reach this quaint waterfall which is already too full of half naked people from all walks of life enjoying a bath like they are doing for the very first time in their lives!

title: Nice waterfall !!
review: No doubt it's crowded place and dirty water in the pond. But waterfall is really beautiful.

title: Nice place to visit
review: If you want to visit this destination just reach there by 7.30 am so that you get comfortable parking of your car. Further the ticket of trolley is for 120 and not expensive so that you can save climbing about 250 steps. Go take bath and enjoy the destination

title: Very Disappointing - Too much rush
review: Things have changed a lot at Kempty falls , too much rush and lots of shops and vendors. Doesn't like this place may be due to peak season.

title: BIG NO
review: It is a mess!! It is all filthy and smelly!!  A beautiful natural waterfall has been destroyed with all the commercial activity around. A BIG NO!

title: Avoidable
review: This was my second visit to Kempty falls ( first was in december 1999 ) and i was disgusted with the overcrowded and pathetic conditions. All types of people were bathing in the falls and the encroachments of rental stores and eateries right besides the Falls has taken its beauty away. Parking is also a big issue and this place is strictly avoidable.

title: An Artificial Piece of Trash
review: first of all, all this hullaboo about kempty falls makes it your first point of visit in mussourie as it is just 17 kms from the city and just while reaching there you realize what a grand mistake you have done by visiting this artificial piece of trash. highly saturated with traffic, uncleanliness at its peak with thousands of visitors packed in a small place and finally to top it all you come to know that the water coming in the fall is no more natural, its being supplied artificially. I would rather ask people to skip this place and visit any other place in mussourie, you can even opt for company bagh over this =.

title: Must visit, but too crowded
review: The place is regarded as the best destination, but it is so very crowded. There is so much chaos and hullabu that you cannot enjoy the place with clicks and pics. Better not to go on weekends and try to visit the place on the weekdays in the early morning hours if you want to enjoy the beauty of nature

title: cool
review: it was a good waterfall , here we can go from the hill by walking and

title: Crappy place...do not waste time
review: It wasn't meant to accomodate so many uncles in their underpants. Extremely extremely crowded and overrated. Total waste of time. Better to chill at the quiet Yamuna Pul

title: A beautiful spot spoiled by commercialisation
review: I visited kempty falls after twenty years and I wish I hadn't. At least my memories wouldn't have been tarred. The waterfall has been surrounded on all sides by shops..., the pool has been divided into parts, one public and other paid. The water is good cool and fresh but blatant commercialisation has taken away all beauty. The only positive change is the cable car has made easy to approach

title: Kempty  hills
review: It is worth visiting but not on weekends as too much traffic in case u r on weekends then ensure that I reach there by 8 am to save Tym

title: Kempty Fall
review: Apart from Company Garden and Mall road , another place to visit in mussoorie is Kempty fall., ropeway here is also good

title: Good place but very crowded .......
review: The place is good, the water fall is impressive, but very very crowded... simply loose the charm... too much commercialized...

title: Over rated
review: Overcrowded. Nasty place...Avoid it..Long irritating traffic jams..overpriced parking..overpriced pathetic food...dirty water..antisocial elements. If u wanna witness all of these at one place...visit Kempty falls.

title: Dirty & Crowded
review: Sad state of the beautiful falls. I wish they would close the swimming area. It was so crowded and dirty and I was shocked to see people swimming in that dirty water . They were spitting there and swimming fully clothed..YUckkk... the govt. should do something about the beauty of the place

title: Too crowded.....Can be skipped
review: First the way to kempty falls is through local market. One should be careful to observe the small signboard indicating right cut towards stairs failing which one has to travel back uphill. One needs to take stairs or can opt for trolley (Rs. 120 per person above 3 years for both ways). However, once reaching it seems like a small pond with more than 100 persons immersed. Totally commercialised with pants being sold, air tubes being rent for 50 Rs. for 30 minutes, photos being clicked etc. Circus type environment. Weekends are even worse. Visitors should be restricted and its originality should be restored failing which in near future people will be ill in taking dip in this fall.

title: Not worth d pain anymore
review: Scenic fall spoiled by human presence

title: Awesome experience
review: Must go kempty falls if you in mussoorie in months of summer and get cool. but It is very crowed place.  you must go kempty falls and send some time in chilled water in summer. It about 20 km from mussorie. Journey to it also beautiful there is many awesome view in the way. And company garden also in the way.

title: Over-hyped, highly commercial
review: This is one of the few places in Mussoorie which I found to be very over-hyped. Set in an extremely cramped place, this waterfall is more of a tourist's bathing spot rather than a scenic point.

title: Mussoorie means Kepty Falls
review: Kempty Fall is approx. 1 hour journey from Mussoorie main.  When you reach there, you have 2 options, go down for water fall or go up for the same water fall.  Suggest you go up for the water fall, its nearby and easily approachable. Have bath under the water fall and enjoy.

title: Enjoyable Experience
review: Good place. Enjoyed visiting here. Had good experience in kempty fall with my daughter. Its surely a Children favorite place.

title: uuugh!
review: I have beautiful memories of the kempty falls from my childhood which were completely shattered when i visisted this time...

title: dirty too crowded
review: it seems Govt or staff is only cared about money , water was very dirty with cigarette  stab and dirt all around .

title: Good but not worth of money to reached there
review: Kempty Fall is located one hour journey from Mussoorie. When you reach there, lots of people there under the water fall and enjoy. One thing I want to say don't disposed garbage at there and pollute it.

title: Awesome place
review: Awesome view...

title: pure mountain water
review: It's a natural beauty where visitors can hang out. This is well maintained. Children will have more fun. It is one of the must visit place in Mussoorie.

title: Good place in off season
review: its a good place. but in season its over crowded . the way to reach there is really good. water fall is quite good.if u want to enjoy car ride then go there

title: Too Crowded
review: This was my second visit to Mussoorie and nothing has changed in terms of the people visiting the place.

title: Awesome place but overcrowded
review: We had visited in May end by car, weather was awesome and we enjoyed car ride. We had taken gondola/ ropeway ride and fall was looking very good but after reaching there we got some disappointment as it was overcrowded and noisy. Anyway we gone in water it was freezing and we enjoyed.  Should visit this place in off season.

title: Too crowded
review: The place is heavily crowded!! and the fall.. they made a pool out of it wouldn't recommend on saturday and sunday specially

title: Kempty fall is a mess
review: Coated in the month of June. Place was extremely crowded and dirty. All the people are taking bath in a pool of water aur the bottom of the water fall. Found it to be unhygenic and highly commercialised.

title: Not so exciting
review: Not So exciting, It just a waterfall with natural tank, which allows people to dive into water. Chair lift is small but good.

title: Too little to enjoy after too much of effort
review: Jammed road from mussoorie to kempty..takes hours to reach.Not really worth it unless you have a full day to spare.

title: Good waterfall...Avoid the peak hours if you can
review: We visited this fall in june 2016. We were already late and it was 6:45 pm by the time we reached there. I would say that if you are planning a trip to mussorie in May June, then avoid visiting this place during peak hours i.e from 10Am to 5 Pm.We actually felt better visoting it at late hours. Less crowded and less traffic. Fall is good and lot of small shops to explore more. Better than Sahastradhara

title: Its a beautiful waterfall
review: Good place but you have walk a bit too much,getting down & again climbing is tiresome.

title: Waste of time and money!
review: Avoid if you can! Its so crowded that you can only see dirt in the water. The only saving grace is the fall which lies at one corner out of chaos created by humans

title: DO DOWN BY WALK.....FALL FALLING FROM UP...
review: Exiting visit, very natural fall with full of crowd... so many leisure activity there.. While returning..may use ropeway....

title: Not a very pleasant experience
review: We visited the falls over the weekend, maybe that was the reason it was too crowded. Although, police was trying to manage the traffic n people but it was too crowded n unpleasant. Falls were fine l, water was clean n cold. Reaching the falls from Mussorie took too much of time due to heavy rush on the roads, it took almost whole day.

title: Nice but too crowded
review: This is the nearest point in mussoorie. The fall is nice with little pond where you can take dip . There are shops around pond renting swimming costume / rings for kids and change room . Don't expect five star change room but can serve the purpose.  There are many nice and clean small Dhaba serving all kind of foods . The only problem is too much crowded and lots of cars continuous honking and making difficult to walk from parking to fall . There is rope way also to reach to pond . We visited during pick season and faced too much crowd .

title: Good experience.
review: It is a must visit if visiting mussorrie. water fall experience here was best in entire vicinity. Almost all requiered gears are also available at this spot, which is quit good.

title: Very good
review: Kempty fall is very important and main place of mussorie.. When we went mussorie we always spend time at kempty fall.. Good place for chilling in chilling whether...

title: Just OK but too crowded
review: Located approx 15 Km from the main Mussoorie, it's one of the key tourist attractions. The falls are just average and the place is too crowded with people and the vehicles especially if it's a weekend. There are far too many local shops in case you want to buy cheap souvenirs. The drive is good and recommend that one stops on one of the roadside stall and enjoys Maggi with some nice views of the valley.

title: 13 km from mussoorie
review: Its located around 13km from mussoorie and its a bigest water fall near to mussoorie. Its a must visit place if you are visiting mussoorie. Crowd is not so great so if you are luxury traveller then you can avoid this place.

title: Crowded and commercialized, yet good.
review: A good place for a family picnic. This place offers everything for a family day out Ropeway ride, waterfall, shopping, number of eating options, and some adventure sports also. So, if you happen to visit Mussorie, do keep a day for Kempty Falls visit. Its totally worth.

title: Poor experience
review: Absolutely poor experience here.Dirty water where people "enjoy " ( !) .Nothing to do here.The kempty lake they market here is a classic tourist trap.Don't pay Rs 100 for "entry" to the dirty lake downstairs.dirty pool,dirty toilets as well

title: Mussoorie
review: Full happy memories sweet dreams and full anjaiy ment and to return the trip and so special thanks to you veman kumar so thanks for the Raju tailor GHANPUR warangal dist

title: Normal and not so great
review: very messy and a lot of people in to the pool during the peak season. Good waiting onto the rope way as well if you want to take that for going down..Water in the pool is chilled and you get costumes, floating tubes etc as well..

title: another good palce lost to commercialisation
review: this is a very beautiful place but now lost to commercialization of tourist places with absolute chaos at the place & no maintenance, all sorts of rowdy people frequenting this place, i will not like to take my family here, water quality is bad but that is mainly because of the misuse by people. horrible situation, if only we could manage our tourist places well......

title: Too commercial
review: The place looks like river Ganga in Banaras during kumbh mela. Scores of half naked people jumping in the water pool under the falls. It has a swimming pool and boating area as well but its all man-made and the actual falls is nothing but a large stream of water, nothing spectacular about it. Avoid!!

title: Nice place to chill
review: This place is around 14 km away from Mussoorie. With limited connectivity, taxi association charge exorbitant. The other eceonomical way to reach kempty falls is through a shared jeep. The jeep stand is maintained by "Jeep Bolero Association". It is around 200 m away from Taxi stand. It will cost Rs. 60 per person to reach Kempty fall and same fare on return. Taxis give only 1 to 2 hrs stay, but jeeps are available all the time.

title: Not worth trouble
review: There is nothin to see at Kempty Falls. In fact such small water falls are in plenty on way to any hill station.

title: Terribly crowded
review: No water. Very desperate crowd trying to get pictures. Extremely crowded. Travelers are very insensitive towards nature. Lots of plastic strewn all over. Sad sight!

title: Adventure in fall
review: Lovely place to visit. Nice fall love to swim their. Kids have fun in water .good place to visit if you visit musssori

title: Like an oasis in a parched land
review: A must visit tourist spot in Mussoorie.This is my third visit to this fall and I along with my family members enjoyed our short visit to this place.The fall emanates from a high hill and rolls down/ falls at the plane land.Young people enjoy  very much.They line up at the spots where the water falls on them.Shere force of waterfall has created a reservoir/pond wherein people ,particularly youngsters heartily take bath and indulge in pranks

title: Beauty in Hills.
review: Kempty fall amazing location located between lap of hills. The way to Kempty fall will give treat to your eyes. Beautiful mountains,  greenary, zip-zap roads. We visited there last november (Kind of Off season) which means better place for parking, no need to stand in long queues for cable car. But few things need to be improve like cleaniness in and around the the pound of Kempty fall. Changing rooms are pathetic. Govt need to do some work as it's a main attraction of mussorie and attracts foriegn tourism as well but overall it's a place where you feel you relax in shadow of nature and it makes you forget all your workload, target and deadlines at work.

title: Waste of time
review: Place is very much crowded. It has got no scenic value. Will feel like in the middle of a festival. Far away and will be waste of time.

title: Rsspite from sizziling hot summer !
review: I live 35 km. away from Mussoorie,yet kept postponinig visiting Kempty Falls on one pretext or the other, that we can visit anytime ? After staying in Dehradun for the last 40 years we finally visited this natural spot 14 km.away from Mussoorie this April and found this place a hidden treasure in the lap of Garhwal Himalayan foot-hills.This is a superb place for natural solace seekers.The only problemin reaching there is the dearth of PARKING SPACE!.

title: Kempty Fall is only a remnant to the name it had 10 yrs back
review: Actual Fall has been layered in 3 stories, created with small pool for public to enjoy as swimming pool. The Natural feeling is been demolished and seems to be a commercialized place for earning

title: Beautiful falls
review: Kempty falls, one of the most tourist attractor falls of the country. One can find peace within while travelling upto those beautiful falls. Don't miss it ever if you go mussoorie.

title: Not worth the hype!
review: Its just a tiny little waterfall. At the fall, there are people who bathe in I. But it's become so polluted that no sane person would want to go there. Also to reach there, you have to wait in line for hours for cable car, or if you are fond of walking, you can always walk up and down. But why waste your time.

title: An over rated and over crowded place!
review: The crowd destroys it all at this place. I don't understand why so many people come here as there is not much to do or see at this place. If you are looking to have fun, do not come visit this place, it's not worth an hour drive!

title: not the good place perhaps
review: Did not like the place since its made dirty by people and also they have created man made pool which looses the beauty of natural water fall leading to commercialization of the place,,, They also have rope way to go to the falls.,.. overall the place is not kept properly by authorities ,,, and perhaps very few places in mussorie which is loosing the charm

title: Good for tour
review: This place give you lots of fun, happiness as well as enjoyable adventure. Good place for tour with friends. Facilities of that place only ok because of much higher products in cost otherwise good place. Alsa as they were placed at far from main city approx 16 to 18 km.

title: Natural beauty exploited! !
review: Although the falls are beautiful but it's really overcrowded and unhygienic with no proper tourist amenities,  moreover not much discipline. Still one can have fun with family.

title: kempty swimming pool!!
review: its not what it used to be. the falls are now pretty much a swimming pool now. the water is cold and refreshing but the no of people present there isnt. commercialization has shrunken this natural beauty to the size of a swimming pool. if u want to visit this place, please go early morning because otherwise u would find getting place inside the fall pretty difficult. bathing suits and clothes are available for quite cheap a price at the falls itself!

title: Not a place worth visiting
review: The only way one can reach this place is by bus or by his own transportation! One you reach the location where kempty falls is situated you will have to go down a long flight of stairs or you can take the trolley to reach kempty falls! Going down the stairs you will encounter many local shops selling lots of local goods! You will also find games in some shops! Going down the flight of stairs is a breeze but mind you the coming up the flight of stairs is a pain! Once you reach kempty falls you will be encountered by many aunties and uncles in their desi swim wears and the small pool where the water falls is highly crowded! Food here is average nothing special! You get Maggi at every point here and the rest are Indian chaats! If one thinks that this is a quiet place with a beautiful view then you are mistaken! It is highly crowded and very noisy!

title: Highly Glorified & Poor Attraction
review: I have seen numerous natural water falls in my lifetime and this ranks the worst of the lot. Full of unruly travelers and surrounded by a whole bunch of shops offering accessories for bathing in the falls & in the process turning it into an open gutter. This attraction can be reached either via a rope way or a flight of steep stairs. Full of slippery tiles around the pool which has been formed at the base by the shops having covered the falls from 3 sides.

title: A small fall with huge crowd
review: small fall which is nearly 20 km away from mussoorie. There is option to take bath,changing rooms on chargeable basis.

title: Nice place, can be better maintained
review: It takes more than an hour reach Kempty Falls from Mussoori town through winding roads.

title: Crowded and polluted
review: Kempty falls used to be beautiful, but now it's just a crowded tourist trap filled with people and trash. I wouldn't waste your time going there.

title: Average water fall
review: The view of the water fall is not great. You can take a cable car ride, but we did not. There is a small pool at the base of the fall, where you can play and click photos.

title: Good fall with crowded
review: It is 15km away from mussorie. It takes 30 min from mussorie centre. Overall good fall but crowdy place as people are bathing in the fall.lots of restaurant and local shop nearby. Ropeway is costly. If one have to enjoy visit kempty lake...below the kempty fall as It is less crowdy.

title: So -So
review: Highly commercialized lot of shops around the falls. Not so scenic with lots of people bathing in the small pool .

title: very popular tourist place
review: very popular tourist place, always crowded with visitors. relaxing. should be visited. it needs more care.

title: Too crowded
review: Even though we were advised not to visit kempty falls, we decided to visit the same as it was one of the top rated places to visit in mussoorie

title: Javed
review: Very nice place must visit once you go to mussoorie. Natural Water fall and good place. Kempty falls we liked very much.

title: Lost its charm
review: 1.Highly Commercial.

title: Nothing great about it
review: Crowded and nothing fascinating about it. Just an ordinary waterfall and a very small boating space.

title: Good place for natural shower
review: Really a nice place though pretty far from mussorie  and may need a taxi or hired two wheeler to reach as no local conveyance available except for few city buses

title: Nature lover's loss
review: What was a mesmerizing spectacle has been reduced to a large sized bath tub by crass commercialization. Will never visit it again.

title: Dirty, Unkept and Crowded
review: The only reason I can fathom anyone going here is due to the hype created by users online. There is nothing to see other than garbage and dirt and the cable cars aren't worth the money and line. I was greatly disappointed. Please do not go even in curiosity provokes you. It's a waste of good time and money

title: super waterfall
review: This is a brilliant waterfall. Made really accessible using ropeway now. The force of the water is quite high, and the authorities have made it safe by making sure that the depth doesn't exceed 4-5 feet in most places. Stones are properly placed on the bottom and it is well cemented on the sides.

title: A Free Water Park
review: It is situated 16 Km away from Mussoorie , down side.

title: HORRIBLE
review: I wish Trip Advisor had an option to give negative rating, and I would do that.  What may have once been a lush flowing waterfall, is now nothing less than an artificial swimming pool with a silly huge shower on top.  There is dirt and filth all around.  Walking down so much for this disappointing thing in the name of a waterfall is definitely not worth it.

title: Enjoyable
review: The Kemtpy fall is most tourist attraction of Mussoorie...it's water neat and quite... I had visited Kempty fall in last 2 week ago... it is the main tourist attraction of Mussoorie...the fall located at distance of 18 kms from the town... always lots of crowd in it...you forget all the physical pain in the water...you can have a good time swimming in the water... it is so beautiful place... don't forget to see this place if you are visiting in Mussoorie. i had great experience.

title: Over Commercialised
review: Just Visit for the sake of going. The shops nearby has just destroyed the natural beauty of the place. It has been converted into an market. Water in the fall is very very dirty. Not worth the visit.

title: Poor
review: Nothing to see there, hardly any water left. When I went in childhood it was a beautiful place but now it's ruined too much and not worth going

title: Nice place
review: Good,cool,neat and clean place and water. you can have a yumm maggi there. beautiful view from this place.

title: Mesmerising place
review: The best tie to visit here is off season, in peak season the place is flooded with tourist. Water is very chilly still you can find people swimming in water. Sit beside the fall and have a maggi and do shopping on your way back.

title: Over commercialised pool
review: Nothing natural in this place a small stream of water with a pool below it in which 100s of people bath together. Surrounded by concrete platforms in which you get cloths on rent. Absolutely waste of money.

title: Old Charm Waterfall
review: This is a place we have all been to in our childhood. The falls are same with the same intensity and same volume of water. THe thing which has changed a lot is shops around this place.

title: Not very good.
review: We went there to see. It is nice if you have enough time. Actually there are only many shops with the same products. You can't see the beauty of nature. If you come down there, you will find a nice little lake filled with swimming people. Surrounded by many many shops.

title: it was a long ride
review: good falls, but too much commercialisation has spoiled its beauty.there   as to be some concern for environment.

title: empty falls ,budget shopping is plus point
review: it will be better if you are travelling with girl friends, wife not to take bath in kempty falls because the changing rooms are not safe,you will sense the environment there,,you understand what I mean so just be a spectator and enjoys the view.there are two path to kempty fall one is down you can take cable car to reach there it will cost you Rs 120 per head the other is just above the bridge,you need to climb 20 stairs to reach that place its the starting point of kempty fall,the water is more cleaner there,you can ask a shopkeeper near the kempty fall site how to go up instead of going downstair,we did all the shopping in kempty fail market which is on the way to kempty fall located down in the mountain,the rates were rather economical then delhi and mussorrie mall road eg Rs 150 ladies sleepers,Rs 100 Ladies handbags,Rs 50 artificial jewellery,bangles,necklace,rs 100 kids toys etc.we reached by using garwal mandal tourist bus which charges Rs 275,timings 9.30,10.00,10.30 am ,you catch from library chowk near to statebank ask your hotel guy the exact location.

title: Not worth visiting
review: We went in the month of April. It is an average fall. If you have a lot of time, you can visit this place also. Otherwise it is not worth visiting.

title: Wonderful cold water to enjoy after a big hot day
review: It is the best fall just 15 km away from Mussoorie. rrangements are made in the huts around Kempty if you plan to spend the day in exploring the beautiful falls. It is a must see point in Mussoorie. Avoid going here during the Monsoon due to the heavy flow of water. Bring the dress for dipping in and splashing the water on. Dress is also available on rent if you go in the water to enjoy the pool.

title: COOL WATER WITH WARM FOOD
review: I was there in summer days(April) so its very relaxing and cool experience over there, Best place to visit in Mussoorie, the only thing which is lacking is that don't have proper changing rooms for ladies... other wise the place is awesome and don't forget to try rope way there, it have nice view:-)

title: OK types
review: NOt as great as was explained by people there, felt of wasting time going there. Could have spent better time at the hotel.

title: Public bathtub
review: Toooooo crowded, looks like a public bathtub, spoiling the natural beauty, highly overrated, better avoid

title: It used to be beautiful waterfall, but it has taken a different shape now
review: Waterfall is good but the crowd makes it bad for families around. It has become a congested place,parking in peak season is also a problem. Food joints here are not hygienic.

title: Great massage in waterfall
review: Take a bath in the fall and stand below the falls. A great experience and shoulder massage. Also ahead of water fall further down you have boating. Carry your swimsuit and towels

title: Please avoid
review: Heard as one of the top spots to visit in Mussorie as per Trip Advisor reviews. You may visit if you are : (a) Group of drunk Bachelors (b) never seen a water fall (c) like bathing in overcrowded public places with hundreds of eyes hogging  (d) don't mind filth littered around the places you bathe. (E) lastly are fond of traffic jams and love driving never ending whirly wooly roads on hills

title: Needs improvement
review: We visited the most common and talked about tourist spot in mussouri.its something 15 km off the mall road..The falls are breath taking we took the ropeway down ..but when we reached down the sight is pretty sad..There is so much of commercialisation around the falls..looks like a pool party rather. .would recommend trying the pond that is above the area rather than below..OK for a first time visit ..There are plenty of eating options along the way..

title: Crowded with unruly people.
review: Typical touristy place, a long drive from Mussoorie. The main fall is very crowded and has lots of unruly tourists. There are many streams above the main fall, where its less crowded and clean. If you plan to go there anyways, look for the less crowded smaller waterfalls upstream.

title: Its not kempty...its empty falls
review: Pls dont visit during summer time..its a waste of time. Also its been commercialised. The pond below the waterfall had dirty water although the water from the fall was looking clean.

title: Bad place with worst people
review: There is nothing for family... Natural water fall is converted into swimming pool... Place is full with vulgar activities... Shops owners are there to loot you... Everything is overpriced and behaviour of locals are very rude and unprofessional.

title: One time visit is good
review: The fall has plenty of water to pamper tourists in different heights. The water very clear and mostly devoid of litter. But the thronging visitors and selfie-mongers don’t allow to sit back and take in the serene beauty of nature.

title: Filthy
review: I went in summer vacation and it was too crowded.No parking place for vehicles.water of the fall is very dirty and is tooo crowded.Even in summers the water is quite cold for small children.

title: Highly overrated
review: Highly overrated place - its too overcrowded. Also, if you don't take the ropeway (which is more than Rs. 100), then there are lot of steps you need to walk.

title: used to be better
review: over crowded, hardly any water, lot of commercial establishment around it just takes away from everything. Avoid this place not worth it.

title: Enjoy the pool
review: Only place to visit in mussoorie but you have to enjoy the bath.take ropeway and have fun with your friends or family just under the fall.

title: Best spot in Mussoorie. Don't miss.
review: Once you go visit some place, you will not go for the second time to the same place.  But Mussoorie is an exception. You will love it every time provided you live in 300 km radius.  Kemp try waterfalls, is the main reason to it.  You will enjoy going there every time.  Most entertaining place. But nowadays parking is a big problem if you go late. I recommend you to go reach the place around 10am in week ends.  But the sunlight will get focussed around 3pm in the falls so that somewhat it is warm.  Still you can't resist playing in  the water. Last word, you will like it.

title: over crowded
review: cold water but full of crowd.. It is commercially developed.  Market is very good.. you will purchase unique gift from shop on stairs.

title: Worst place
review: So they have commercialised it badly. U wil just see shops there and they have destroyed the natural beauty of the place. Plus it is always overcrowded like hell. The water was very dirty. Please avoid if u visit. U can visit bhatta falls or jhadi paani instead!

title: lot of congestion of vendors
review: went there but there are lot of problems like parking , congestion of vendors non availability of bathrooms

title: Small and nice fall
review: It is small fall and its made such a way that tourist can play in water and enjoy.

title: An average waterfall with too much of crowd
review: The drive to Kempty Falls from Mussoorie is quite good. From far off it looks like a small waterfall with no specialty. However when you go near, you can enjoy a cold water bath in the falls with lot of crowd. The area is not well maintained. You may be disappointed if go with too much of expectation. Just relax and chill out.

title: Fun place but crowdy
review: If you wanna enjoy cold water in summer this place is for you,  you get to shower under the fall and can swim and play with friends in nearby swimming pools

title: Snow Fall -Kempty Falls
review: Its great opportunity to visit Kempty falls which is a giant falls I come over first time.Good safety things also provided to swim in falls for all age members.If required separate pool also there with same water to swimming.Pick up the ticket and enter the fall with rope way is amazing forever.After falls driver there also some restaurant for food which feels average but taste good after falls ride.Little rush in week end and holidays. Nice journey.

title: Best place to visit
review: went for holiday with office friends, Have no words to say, Just loved this place, got all the tiredness flushed out in just seconds, best romantic in entire mussoorie

title: Once
review: we had first time experience to bath directly from natural water once it should be enjoy but you have to carry your bath accessories like swimpant,Towels etc remember water is extremely cold in pick april.

title: Highly overrated.. crowded and too much commercialization
review: In my opinion this was worst place to visit in Mussoori for us. Due to too much commercialization and so called area development every thing at Kempty Falls looks artificial. They have made kinda swimming pool with tiles all around waterfall that looks disgusting and kills the natural look of it.

title: The only Must Visit place in mussoorie.
review: The best place to visit in mussoorie. We visited the top of the fall and it was amazing. The water was very cold. There is a small pond where you can swim as well and enjoy if you are with kids. Best place to enjoy with family or friends.

title: No more a fall but a small water park.
review: The fall exists in name only. You will find only a thin stream of water coming down. Road to the lake at the foot is closed. you have to take rope way to reach down to swimming pool size lake.

title: Nice
review: Easily the best in Mussoorie. Lots of shops, funzones for adults and kids alike. But i was bit surprised but lack of food options.

title: Just hype
review: A totally commercialized place with lots of crowd. Nothing special but still remains the main attraction in Mussorie sightscene itirenary.

title: Overhyped place in mussoorie,better to avoid/skip this
review: As soon as u enter kempty falls region ,u will b welcomed  with chaos n traffic ,cars crawling with no parking space .Kempty pools too r overcrowded ,filthy n plastic bottles floating . if possible avoid this place n utilise time somewhere else.

title: Kempty falls amazing
review: we went here in the afternoon ..water is chilled ...market place is good...we found cost of items is cheaper than mall road...there is roap way top go down ..

title: Crowded Kempty falls
review: Visited Kempty falls and it was crowded. I would not recommend the water tobe hygenic for bathing. Other than the water fall the surrounding are ordinary

title: Must visit
review: Its a bit crowded but a nice place. Enjoyed bathing under the fall. Cold water. A lot of paid changing, locker rooms on the spot. Can also rent clothes for the bath. There is a ropeway that does a round trip. One way trips are expensive. About 250 stairs down from the main market where all cabs stop.

title: wonderful falls
review: It was awesome, chilled water, a huge crowd, fresh air, provides a good experience which cannot be forgotten. A direct fall of water seems to be colourful and falls like a heavy rain on the head. Overall it was best place and nature has its own way of hypnotizing people there.

title: Fun but crowded
review: Its d only thing worth sesing in mausoori n hence is crowded all d time. Other facilities like lockers and food is available at a  reasonable price

title: Not Worth the Time and Money!!
review: Unorganized, poorly maintained by the management as well as the tourists also

title: very congested ... could have made better
review: the place is beautiful but very congested.. commercial people don't give u much space. scenery is good and water is very chilled.. can go for 2 hrs. but nothing much to do there

title: Kempty Fall visit
review: We traveled in April , its not that clean, it was earlier , no fun now in taking bath under fall. lot of shops opens with snacks and throw waste near by.

title: Popular sightseeing place but nothing much to do!
review: Kempty falls is a very popular destination and suggested by many, but i failed to find it interesting. Its just a waterfall with many shops around it. Not much to do besides going there for a dip, which i saw a lot of families enjoying.

title: beautiful but dirty place
review: it is beautiful place but not maintained by government.during my visit we found lots of dirty thing liying around us no tourism management no control over food quality were serve by kiosk .if someone wants to visit this place must go only for natural beauty .not for any thing else.

title: This is the place to be
review: This is probably the best place in Mussoorie and if you want your trip to end on a high note, this is the place to be. The tickets to the place sells out pretty quickly so keep an eye on that. The place holds every necessary thing you would need, it also has rope-line trolleys for your convenience, therefore no worries as to what to bring or not. Other than the fall, you should also explore the stairs leading to the origin of the fall and have a little trekking experience too. So, just reach there and take a dive of your lifetime.

title: Pathetic
review: Fully commercialized and dirty. No cleanliness or maintenance.

title: good decent
review: its a decent place to visit, its also called an attrection but in railny season its the best place to visit

title: Popular place in Mussori
review: It is very popular place but not well maintained.  Water falls is very good but crowded with people taking bath.

title: Awesome place
review: Very nice place. But try to reach there early if you late you would face heavy traffic and parking problems

title: Not for family
review: Not for family

title: Never Ever
review: Its a complete commercial place. I visited this place after 28 years. It was a dream to visit again. But all went in vain. Its sooooo much commercial.  Not worth visiting.

title: Miss it
review: Horrible experience !!

title: Ok place not too good...
review: This is a OK place to visit if in mussorie around 15km from mussorie. It has a water park also below the falls

title: Nothing as heard
review: The place has been so commercialised that the shops are right below the falls and  it's nothing bigger than a swimming pool.

title: Good Place
review: Nice place for picnic and get together, we have enjoyed a lot with all the friends, a must visit place for anyone coming to Mussoorie.

title: Keep Away From This Place
review: Only to be enjoyed by locals. Highly advise to only go here if you have nothing else to do. Not as good as it seems in picture. Plus, very unhygienic.

title: Happening place
review: Very beautiful waterfall you can enjoy it with hot noodles and momos. You can also have Gondola ride, boating and also you can swim in pools of different sizes. Wood crafts are also available at a reasonable cost.

title: Absolutely commercialised
review: In case you are looking for natural beauty than avoid going to this place. Rather would suggest to go little uphill and check the source of fall. Many man made ponds of natural fall water is stored for bathing. Good fun to explore the other side of memory falls. Please carry proper shoes in case you are willing to climb up n down. Clothes are available to take bath in. Rope way for people like me... Rs 120 per person both sides.

title: Worth a visit!
review: First of all you get to see real falls in all the seasons which is a god start. Administration has done a good job to build structures so that people can safely take a dip. There are several commercial establishments around offering you rental swimming equipment and attire. Few seasoned tourists bring their own. Reminds me of public bathing ghats in india. There is a pretty average place for swimming and boating. Several places to eat Maggi and have a hot cup of tea and coffee.

title: Chaos Killed Nature's Tranquility
review: Although the waterfall is quite scenic, the place has become way too commercialised. Case in point, at every tier, there are shops that ware swimming costumes and floats and they have created artificial embankments for people to act rapturous, and get photographed while doing so.

title: Lovely Place
review: We went there for the 2nd Honeymoon along with the other couple. The place is a must watch. Continuous water flowing, It was really hard to come out of water.

title: Disappointing
review: The waterfall is surrounded by tiny eating joints which spoils its beauty. The water below the fall seems so dirty.

title: Full masti
review: Its a must visit place along with friends.

title: A Natural Water Fall
review: It a water fall close to Mussoorie i.e.  only 14 km away. The place has the potential to draw more tourists, Scope of improvement is there for roads, toilets and restaurants.

title: Pure joy with nature!!!
review: Be sure to choose the portion of the falls on top of the road for crystal clear water and less crowd. Tourists to maintain some discipline and keep the surroundings clean.

title: Place has become more of a commercial hub now
review: I visited Kempty falls four years back also and revisited it during my recent family trip. This place has now become very much dirty and there are hawkers and shops all around the pathways. At a single empty space you will find a heap of disposed plastic packs/ glasses/ bottles etc.

title: Best place in whole mussorie trip
review: Nice place, requires more cleaniness. Must visit once, but its getting very crowdy. Great waterfall view, chill out time can be spent here.

title: Kempty Falls
review: Excellent place to visit. Amazing experience under waterfall with friends. This was the first experience, it was awesome.

title: Kempty Falls
review: The actual falls is really nice and worth visiting but path to the falls is very touristy as its filled with stalls selling craft and other touristy items and the pathway is also a bit littered with rubbish sadly.

title: Kempty fall
review: Very commercialised and dirty...They have ruined the natural beauty of kempty ..Till couple of years back it was okk but now u won't find any relaxation there.

title: Place must to visit
review: A place must to visit during mussoorie trip. easy accessible by ropeway for thise who want to avoid stairs.

title: Short trip, not impressed
review: No great shakes. It's a small water falls and over commercialised. Surrounded on all sides by shops and eateries. No view of nature. Surroundings quite dirty.

title: commercialised to the level of nausea
review: it is nothing but an ugly destination. water fall from 20-30 meters and a small pool, one quarter of an Olympic size pool, in which 70-80 people are bathing simultaneously. Yuk.

title: Too crowded
review: While the falls are lovely, the people kill the place by dumping garbage and packets of chips and plastic bottles all over the place. Plus, be prepared for a load of traffic as the road is narrow and no one waits....

title: Not worth all the hype
review: Those who haven't see waterfalls in different parts of India will find it very amusing. It's an average waterfall. The waterfall itself is spectacular but the artificial pond made for bathing and swimming is untidy and muddy. Ok for all those photographs around the fall. Better to avoid the bathing in pond.

title: You will enjoy only beneath the fall.
review: It's the most famous place in mussorie. Very crowdy during peak season. It's not a clean place. Nothing much to shop and to eat. Only way to enjoy is beneath the fall under the water.

title: Not worth the visit
review: You can very well skip this place if you have seen any other water fall earlier. The man made pond just under the waterfall where ppl have bath is small and unclean. You will not feel like stepping in. Good for a single photograph nothing more. Water amusement parks in cities are better.

title: PLEASE DO NOT GO
review: Aweful place full with loads of garbage. Too many people to see a waterfall. The cable car is too highly priced and the stairs are not comfortable at all. Please miss this place.

title: Awful sight
review: Visited Kempty Falls after 25 years and was totally aghast after seeing the complete devastation of this beautiful place, it used to be.

title: Nice
review: We went early to avoid crowd.. Nice place , can sit and relax.. have food and enjoy nature. should visit.

title: Great place and breathtaking views
review: When you are in Mussoorie please visit Kempty falls - a must see place. Only 17 km from Mussoriee. You will love the drive

title: Water Fall -superb
review: Kempty fall is some 16Km from Mussoorie. Hill driving through narrow road, but you will love the drive. First time visitors must visit this place. Lots of eat stalls and restaurants are available here. In recent times due to commercial activities cleanliness is not maintained. Earlier this was very beautiful spot. You can get wet under the fall and can get swimming costumes on rent and makeshift changing rooms are available (on payment basis). Maggie is the one thing you should not miss at this place, you may like to eat.  Enjoy your visit to QUEEN of hills !!!!

title: Awesome Place
review: It was an awesome place to visit here. Cool and calm place. Views are awesome at waterfall. This is really good.

title: Kempty falls
review: It is an average water falls. Lack of maintenance and cleaning of the pool (very small & shallow) is evident. The cable car ride of about 100 mtrs charging Rs. 120 per head for hardly 5 minutes ride is a bit higher. The narrow path walk down to the main falls is nice and better option than the cable car, for tourists in normal health. It is more a commercial place than a tourist spot.

title: A cold water swim and great pictures
review: This place is a delight for the ones who love playing in water bodies. Quite safe and fun. However, it will not be appreciated by people who have a taste for natural beauty, because kempty looks quite artificial even in all its charm. But for the photo lovers, this is a must go place.

title: Horrible
review: Dirty, ugly, smelly and full of garbages

title: Has lost its beauty over the yrs
review: It takes 1420rs and half hr to reach Kempty falls by cab. However once you reach the destination the fall may look dismal and the spot not that inviting. The cable car charges 120 per person for a to and fro ride from top to bottom, one way is 100. Along the way there are many vendors selling wodden stuff and interesting tit bits for kids. The prices are better than mall road Mussourie. The fall itself is not that mighty anymore. People can take clothes on rent and take a dip in the cold water at the bottom. There are a few stalls selling snacks and quick lunch options. The recent addition is flying fox which a few youngsters were indulging in.

title: good experience only if you travel in trolley but isn't clean
review: the experience was good. They have started the trolleys over there but the trolleys move a lot if first time in trolley you might feel scared. The area near kempty falls has become quite dirty. But still a good experience.

title: Very crowded
review: Avoid if you don't have any plan to get drenched in the waterfall. The place is generally very crowded as well.

title: not a good place anymore
review: It used to be a good place in the past but not anymore as its heavily  commercialized & always overcrowded,not well maintained & cleaned

title: kempty fall
review: its very great place which shows us a natural beauty. we can see here the water fall and enjoy with friends

title: Natural waterfall but crowded!
review: This is one of the best attraction in Mussoorie. We went there on bike, and I recommend it to explore Mussoorie on bike. Find a way to go little up side of the fall, where is less people. The hot and spicy noodles makes more joyful. What I don't like was some shop keepers set up their tables in waterfall area for the unique experience but people are throwing garbage there.

title: Lost its charm
review: Some years ago,  the falls were a beautiful place to visit. But not today. The place has been encroached by private hoteliers and it looks more like a water park. The pristine beauty is lost and I personally feel that the long trip to Kempty is no longer worth the trouble.

title: Superb waterfalls
review: I liked the place. This was my first visit to Mussoorie. One has to agree there is nothing awesome or great about this place.

title: Awesome
review: Awesome experience and scenery view of hill and falls. I was disappointed there just because there parking rates are too much...

title: Avoid in winters
review: Long but scenic drive from Mussoorie, when you finally arrive you realize its commercialized, feels like you are near a water park. Visitors have littered the place, and it needs cleaning. Its great fun in summers/monsoon, better to avoid in winters.

title: Nice water fall
review: Water fall is good. One can go by cable car or also walkway which gives more good view of fall & can enjoy shopping on the way.

title: Too crowded..........
review: I had a bad experience as its very crowded always and secondly the pfotographs bother you to death,for photographs even if u say a blunt no.....spoils the whole experience

title: Average fall with commercial activities surrounding it
review: This was earlier a very beautiful spot but now when we visited its still attracts the same beauty but there are lots of shops that have come up, I assume that since this is the most visited place in the area that was suppose to happen, If one would like to take a swim then you can get swimming costumes on rent and makeshift changing rooms are available which are on chargeable basis, Do have Maggie and tea at any eatery near the falls, They have also created rope way which charges 200 rs both ways, but still its not point to point you have to climb up and down some 20 stairs before and after rope way.

title: Worth a visit
review: The strangest thing about visiting Kempty Falls, however, was finding ourselves surrounded by Indians who not only wanted photographs of us, but wanted selfies of us posing with them. It was all very good natured, and we found the people here a lot more chilled out and mellow than in the rest of India, but I never expected to be miner celebrity.

title: Was so good earlier, but now its not so good
review: Kempty Falls is on of the famous attractions in Mussoorie, about 20 Kms far from city. The place is very crowded usually. The falls were used to very high previously but not management have reduced the size and area. Some betterments are also done but the previous original look and feel was good. Now it seems as some artificial water fall.

title: kempty falls
review: Sorry very disappointing, lack flow and one of the worst falls i went to see.The only sight was the view and weather was fantastic. If you love tandoori food go for the street food at the mall road called "The Bar BQ Friend"

title: Good place...Monsoon attraction
review: We visited the place in mid-monsoon. Good point. Neat and maintained. Its safe too. Half hour drive from mall road. Surrounded by many shops. Eating options are available. One can enjoy in swimming in well constructed basin of waterfall. You can buy/hire swimming cloths from nearby shops. Overall one can spend 3-4 hours in rain/waterfall/basin. Cable car facility available for going down and coming up. Stairs are also in good condition. Can take photos in traditional costumes.

title: Moderately high waterfall & an enoyable place with family
review: We took a shared taxi from near Library chowk for Rs. 60 per person and it took us slightly over half an hour to reach the place. To reach the falls, we had to walk downstairs. The way is lined with many small shops selling all tourist stuff. There is also a trolley facility to reach the falls, if one may not like to walk down or climb back. It does not take much time to reach the falls even by foot.

title: Fantastic
review: Excellent place to enjoy whole day with kids

title: A lot to walk
review: The falls are good but its a long walk through the steps. The area around the fall is small and highly commercialised hiding the natural beauty of the fall.

title: Best waterfall I have seen ever
review: Kempty Fall is one of the most attractive place located near Mussoorie. It is very clean place and safe for kids and families to play in water fall. I visited this place in August month. Kids, young, elder family member, friends will enjoy playing in waterfall. Around waterfall there are lots of hotel to fulfill your tongue's test in minimum budget. There are some hotel in Kempty village there you can stay also. If you are visiting Mussoorie ensure that you are not going to miss beauty of this place :-)

title: Can visit place for couples but groups can have a lotta fun
review: Can visit place for couples but groups can have a lotta fun

title: Nice Natural Waterfall
review: This is one of the best attraction in Mussoorie. The natural waterfall is too good and you can spend some quality time over here. But you need to take lot of steps down to reach the waterfall. Also there is option of cable car which is convenient for old people. There are lot of shops all around and eating places are also there.

title: Good waterfall with ......
review: I hate to say this but I visited this place many years back and it was all natural. Now there is so much commercialization and so many buildings that the fall is somehow becomes something else.

title: Not much attractive
review: I visited by bus at kempty fall location is good but its normal waterfalls nothing special in it. Please do not higher taxi for this you can visit there through public transport which is very cheap and this facility is available at bus station mussoori.

title: Weather is best thing to enjoy
review: Weather is best thing to enjoy in Masoorie, Kemty fall is like a normal fall nothing special. Poorly maintained but must visit. You can park vehicle anywhere, parking people insist you to park vehicle for particular place. Enjoy "Bhutta" in chilling weather especially in after some showers !

title: Piyush
review: Very disappointed... The fall is like a shower, don't keep expectations.. If you interested to go tracking or with family would be slightly exciting for children to do the cable cab ride and that's about it.

title: Nice place but lengthy stairs to climb.
review: Nice place to visit but lengthy stairs to climb, otherwise it's a good place.You also get hot street food on the way to waterfall.

title: An amazing place
review: This place is a must for those visiting Dehradun and / or Mussoorie. The waterfall is beautiful and so lively. The best part is you can literally be standing next to it and photographing yourself - while the brave ones can take a dip in the cold but absolutely crystal clear waters. And try using the cable car - will save you the trouble of walking up & down - it is quite strenuous...

title: Chillz's at Kempty
review: Kempty Fall is a must visit place in mussoorie. One has to step town a bit to reach there from parking. But you will find the way quite interesting as both side is packed with small shops. You can also enjoy few games in between the small pathway. When you reach the core you will feel the real chill. The breeze is very cool and one can enjoy the thunder shower bath there :).

title: Dont miss this place
review: Good place dont miss it

title: Very good to visit during March but not in summer vacation
review: I visited this place twice (March and May). I found March visit was far productive and interesting then may due to rush in may time. Enjoy the fall and some rides. I will recommend to go by stairs while getting down to Kempty fall and come by cable car.

title: Average!
review: Kempty fall is not like that we trakked the hills and then found a beautiful waterfall.Its not like that,its a shower waterfall,you can enjoy bathing in the fall and you can get the costumes and clothes at rent(not much) here! But its not what nature lover wants to see!

title: Hallmark of Mussoorie
review: An ideal place for visiting with friends, felt refreshed after visiting here, the cleanliness of surrounding can be a cause of concern, rest is very good.

title: Nice fall , but very crowdy
review: This is a attraction of mussoorie , but this is very crowdy . It require walk of about 2-3 KM , due to high traffic and car parked .

title: Incredible job by nature
review: Nice place to visit 15 km away from mussoorie library u can take a personal taxi or sharing jeep. There are so many eating joints and shops are there you can enjoy some adventure activities and cloak rooms and swimming dress also available If you want to feel freezing water.

title: very crowded...
review: very crowded, not very well maintained, not my type of place. No one can be blamed for it though, its because its very popular and of course the location is to reach.

title: Commercialization of the Falls
review: The Falls itself is quite beautiful, but perhaps to encourage tourism a small pond-like swimmimg pool has been artificially created, spoiling its natural beauty. One can go down on foot, but older people will have to go down only a few steps to the cable car, which will take you down near the falls, then after going through a labyrinth of lanes, one suddenly can see the falls. It's about 12 kilometers from Mussoorie.

title: Best place in Mussoorie
review: Its a wonderful water fall, with awesome view and shore. Its like a natural water park. you can get clothings on rent, can experience timber trail of 200 m which is quite short. If you ever visits mussoorie its a must visit place

title: Good But Not The Best
review: This waterfall in mussoorie was good but will not like it so much if you have visited the big and "not so crowded" ones.This place is converted into a market by the dense commercialization . The private lake on the opposite side is not so good.And yup you can eat maggi there AND EVERYWHERE ELSE TOO.

title: Awesome View
review: This place has an awesome view but is too congested due to shops built at the bay of the fall. It could have been much better if the place has no shops adjacent to the fall.

title: Leisure trip
review: Poorly maintained and lots of rubbish.didnot reqd to visit .stay in hotel and enjoy the property.

title: Its a high light of Mussoorie
review: Its a very fantastic but we could not enjoy it as Visited in winter, so much chilled water.. but fantastic views.. Rope way is also good.. Took corn and Ginger Masala tea in the street food vendors excellant overal..

title: The Best
review: If you have been to Mussoorie and not been here,then your trip is incomplete,best views of the waterfall,it may be crowded and may be dirty with the littering around, but that still doesn't take away the charm of this place.

title: Average
review: A waterfalls accompanied with markets and a rope way. Expectations were high seeing the images but not so good when visited it.

title: Nature never cease to amaze us
review: Visited on 3-Jan-16 early morning at around 8 am and believe me, this was a wonderful decision ... there was no one around... and when I say no one, it means absolutely no one. We didnt even find one person who could click our pics together. Actual falls is about 5-10 mins walk down the stairs.

title: Beautiful and nice picnic spot
review: The water fall and ponds were attractive. Young children enjoyed a lot. Boating and swimming. Ropeway is well maintained. The real attraction of Mussoorie

title: chill thrill
review: Its quite windy at the kempty falls. the cable car ride is a good one. besides one must take the flying fox to go around kempty.

title: Only ok
review: Nothing special no ropeway was working u need to go down stairs now the fall is very small & unhygienic

title: “Nothing Exceptional and too much commercialized”
review: Very good water fall but totally commercialized.Chilled water and nice market around. U will love to have a bath here. Its quite steep . Kempty falls is 13 KM from Moussoorie on chakrata road with 1364 meters above sea level, its give great view of water falling and good place for water activities. The drive was scenic. The area around Kempty falls offers services for swimming, rope-way and water rides.

title: Fun destination
review: After many years I had recently visited kempty fall now changed a lot having fun activities

title: Clean and clear place
review: The place is away from the main city and due to taxi union problems, u might have to try harder to get a cab and reach but this place is a must visit .. Make sure to walk down till the waterfall... U can also avail cable cars.. Good place..

title: Average place
review: Being the top destination of mussoorie tourism we also opted for kempty falls.we enjoyed driving car to this place more than the kempty water fall frankly.Its a highly crowded place with all fascilities like ropeway,restaurants,marketplace for shoppings.there is a well maintaibed pond at the bottom of this place which charges Rs.100 as entry fee was the best experience at kempty fall.There are shikaras,paddle boats and good clean surrounding to spend time.There is fascillity to pay Rs.200 and taxi will drop you back to the parking uphill.

title: scenic beauty
review: you enjoy scenic beauty of the waterfall and also ropeway ride here.a very good experience is what you get here.highly recommended.

title: Kempty lost its charm
review: I was pretty disheartened to visit Kempty Falls as it has not only become a commercial place, it is not much beautiful either. I could see cable car services transporting tourists up and down but its not a lovely place. The childhood memories of Kempty Falls are much lovelier.

title: Nice place plan to go in summer
review: This is place where really need to go summer ... Go eve time and and enjoy ride ..  U can't do with group small place but once visit place

title: Example of humans destructing nature
review: It's not even a waterfall,  some water gushing out of stone and the hills are surrounded by buildings. There are far far better waterfalls in India.  This place  might pop up as a tourist destination when you visit mussoorie but please don't visit.

title: Commercialised
review: Very famous in Mussoorie though this fall has become very commercialized of late. It is often crowded and noisy.

title: Nice Place..
review: A lot of tourists visit this place making the atmosphere lively(sometimes crowded). Though small shops have creep up all over the place..it somehow manages to retain its charm.

title: Had a fine time.
review: Kempty falls is a good place to visit. The water is clear. However, it usually is crowded. I went during December so crowd was minimal. All in all one should definitely visit this place. Also the food you get there is quite yum. One needs to take a small cable car ride to get to kempty falls. It was fun.

title: must visit place
review: a must visit place when you visit mussoorie. here you can sit and admire the beauty of nature and relax. the falls make you mesmerised

title: Holiday
review: So so... not found much interesting apart from some shopping and walking around 314 steps from the ground level.

title: Beautiful waterfall. Highly commercialized
review: The waterfall is beautiful and there is an artificial pond created to collect the water. Tourists can enjoy a dip in the icy cold waters. The waterfall is surrounded by mountains on all sides. One has to descend about 200 steps to reach the waterfalls. There is the option of a ropeway also available.

title: Most happening place in Mussoorie after Mall road
review: This is a must go place if you are going to Mussoorie. The place has everything, natural scenic beauty, adventure sports (like flying fox), ropeway, bating, maggi points and a good crowd. Don't miss this place for anything.

title: No wonder it is most visited place in summers for experiencing amazing waterfalls
review: Waterfalls looks the same way in photos. The water is fresh from the mountains with nice small shallow pool in which people from all age groups can enjoy. There are small eateries around where you can enjoy warm team and maggie :)......You can also gets floats and swimming costumes at minimal cost. We went in November when the water is quite chilly, but even then people were enjoying in water.

title: Horrid!!!
review: People come here for a bath in the falls. Its difficult for the ladies as there are so many hooligans and bystanders staring! Nothing great about this place. Once charming place is now destroyed by crazy commercialization and ugly bystanders! A must avoid place!

title: Unkempt totally
review: Had heard so much abt the kempty falls but was shocked to see the way it is.Not cleaned n maintained. Plastic bottles, wrappers n all sort of rubbish lay here n there. Cleanliness was a major issue. The place would appeal , if the cleaning part is taken care of. A good place for picnic.

title: Not much to see
review: The flow is not very fast in winters and there is not much to see there. There is just a waterfall with a small lake which is more of a puddle than a lake. But considering the fact that there isn't anything else to see in mussoorie you can go here

title: Over hyped
review: Very crowded...hardly a fall..can just drive past for a view. If you are driving it's  hard to find a parking spot.

title: dirty
review: very commercial & not clean place.Waterfall should have natural beauty.too many step.You have much better waterfall in Maharashtra & south india

title: Naturalistic
review: Very nice tourist spot and favourite of mine. Visited three times and want to do more visit per visit. View of the fall is graceful and refreshing to have bath in it. It is little crowdy place.

title: Photo scenic spot
review: You can reach the Kempty falls by paying Rs.120 for a two way cable car from the main road. You can enjoy the scenic beauty of waterfall. Most people visit for that one beautiful picture.

title: Good, not the best
review: kempty falls is like small n sweet one..best thing is that u can go very close to the starting point of the fall..chaat on the road side was very tasty..

title: Must visit
review: Kempty falls is the most famous tourist spot in mussoorie. The water falls from a high spot into the artificial made pool. People jump into the pool and enjoy. There is a rope way near it which takes you to higher place. When we visited it was under renovation but now it is complete. So go and have a blast this summer.

title: A Splendid Waterfalls !
review: The Kempty falls are situated on the hilly tracks of Uttaranchal, India, 13 Kms from Mussorie on  the Chakrata road. It is 1364 metres above sea level. The Kempty Falls & the area around is surrounded by mountain ranges at an altitude of 4500 Fts, which adds to it's beauty.

title: Only the old one was bold
review: The imagery of kempty fall as i heard from parents is very good. But today it is just average. Not very beautiful. It is now a swimming and a market area.

title: Beauty fullplace
review: Its a beautiful a place as one of the sight seen in Mussories advisable to go in summer. One of  very famous point in mussories.

title: Crowded Place and good waterfall
review: It is around 14 kms away from Mussorie on Chakratta road so you need your own vehicle to go there. It is a good waterfall, but it is very crowded place. You can go on foot to fall and also can use ropeway to reach at the fall. There are many shops which offer clothes that can be used to go and enjoy in the fall. No to go on the weekends and also parking space is an issue at this place.

title: Best Place of Mussoorie
review: This is Best Place of Mussoorie, You need vehicle to reach this place. Try Tours organized via Bus by uttarakhand government.

title: Good View
review: Kempty falls is known for clean water and a great view. However, the place is crowded and approach road is full of vehicles which are parked haphazardly. Restaurants and stalls fleecey you with poor stuff.

title: Waterfall love
review: Kempty fall is a waterfall situated around 30 km from Mussoorie easily accessible by taxi and bus from the library side taxi stand at  the end of Mall road. This place has eye relaxing beauty. After reaching the waterfall area one needs to take a cable car to reach the falls. The other way is by walking down the hill on stairs from the market which i prefer and u will see different types of shops selling local hand made products. From souvenir shops to woollens to wooden shops and many more and u can bargain also.

title: MUST VISIT
review: if you r visiting mussorrie then its must ti to visit kempty fall because i can chalange it will be the best waterfall you have ever seen.

title: Must go place if you have time 3 to 4 hour
review: Great waterfall can easily spend half a day. Awesome road-side chats available. It is good to have your own vehicle for visit.  There is a ropeway to take you to the bottom half, but there is also a trek at the opposite end. This is more enjoyable here artificial ponds bathing spots have been created.  All the bathing spots were crowded with so many people taking bath there are, where you can hire change of clothes.  I loved the marvellous nature like this, cold water, fresh and so much of enjoyment when you visit such water land where you feel like enjoying….. Taking bath in icy cold water with clicking with camera

title: Avoid
review: Much hyped, a total disappointment when you arrive.

title: Ordinary
review: The best of Mussourie is the great landscape and the walks in and around the city. But if one wishes to go for any sightseeing one is taken to this falls. It's a good time pass for sure and mainly for the kids. But take your car some miles ahead and enjoy nature's bliss more.

title: Visit Kempty Falls early in the morning !
review: We reached very early to visit Kempty falls. We had to walk down the steps and it was very scenic.The pathway is surrounded by nice shops selling artifacts , tea and snacks. The water falls are very nice and they have provisions for swimming. There is also an area of amusement.

title: Average
review: As we have visited dudhsagar falls in goa we found it ok ok as it is nothing in comparision of dudhsagar falls..we visited on 15th november....nice view to click pictures and have a bath...

title: Great Falls
review: Though I have seen the Niagara falls from the US and the Canadian side, Kempty Falls was also lovely. I enjoyed the Falls. The pure and cold water was exhilarating. Hundreds of people had come here even though it was mid november and quite cold. They braved the temperature and jumped into the pool formed by the Falls. There were hundreds like us who took pics near the Falls. It was simply too beautiful.

title: Overcrowded
review: Kempy falls are the most visited spot in Mussoorie so the best thing to do is reach via trek through the woods. Make a brief halt and disappear!! The main road has a major parking issue and you really would like to avoid it.

title: Average
review: Comparing this fall to Jim Corbett or dudhsagar fall would be inappropriate.

title: Best Spot in Mussorie
review: This is arguably the best spot in Mussorie complete with great views, splendid water fall and cable car. I have seen people complaining about too much commercialisation, but I would still say its a great place to visit as I enjoyed it a lot.

title: Nice fall
review: We went there on 3 nov. When we reach there the trolley was under maintenance. So we face difficulty going down with children.

title: Just an ok place to visit once
review: Kempty falls used to be a very good place but this time when i visited i was not that happy. The route is so congested and once you reach there the place is not that neat and clean. Its ok to visit once if you have not been there as its a star attraction in mussoorie.

title: Serene!
review: These falls are quite serene. The growth of small shops offering small eats and tea can be an eyesore. There is a entry fee of Rs 50 per person for entering here. There are also shops that offer clothes on rent for people to change and enjoy the falls first hand, in case you did not plan on getting wet in the falls.

title: falls is good enough, but dirty
review: the water flow is definitely very scenic. has pools also. but very dirty. this seems like local dustbin. the lower pool is most dirty. one should not get into that. though the upper pool is comparatively clean. ropeway ride was also not enjoyable.

title: Beautiful place
review: Beautiful place near mussouri. a must visit place. best season is summer. have to climb down. very painful while climbing up if cable car/ rope way is not working

title: Beautiful but .....
review: The water fall is just awesome. but I will say little commercialized . I wont say dont visit . It is really very beautiful so mus see once at least if you in Mussoorie. Its only that was a bit more crowed and more commercialized. It better to take the rope car ride to go down and climb up if you dont want to get very tired. But yes a must visit .

title: Mesmerizing Water Fall but ruined by nearby establishments
review: Kempty fall is a truely mesmerizing water fall some 16km away from mussorrie..but the presence of so many commercial shops all around have ruined its natural beauty..Administration should look into it...really surprising one of the main attractions of mussorrie have been completely overlooked...There is a ropeway but if physically fit one can easily take stairs that are lined up with shops...overall 10/10 for natural water fall and 0/10 for its surroundings..

title: Kempty Falls - hyped up for nothing
review: The Falls - if you look at it separately, is worth watching. What is an eye sore is the pool at the bottom, which has been turned into a swimming pool and a couple of small ponds nearby fed from the waterfall which are used to fleece tourists in the name of water park and boating. Add to that, a bunch of steep steps to get to a overpriced ropeway, and you have the perfect tourist rip-off.

title: Average place
review: I remember earlier it used to be a star attraction of Mussourie. Now its too artificial and looks almost like a indoor waterfall. Our country has much bigger and better waterfalls than this.

title: Nice spot
review: Its a bit far from Mussoorie town. The drive to this place is nice and picturesque. there are good number of eateries around this place.

title: Give it a skip..its overcrowded
review: The cable car ride was the only attraction for the kids..otherwise it's not worth the visit to kempty..although the drive from hotel to kempty was pleasant.:

title: Nice view point
review: Nice view point and big water falls..last time i was not able to go there.I have visited 3 trice..people and young kid can enjoy.

title: नाम बड़ा और दर्शन छोटे
review: The saying 'नाम बड़ा और दर्शन छोटे' is right for this place. It is a good place for picnic but not for nature lover as at present nature has been abolished from it.. It is not more then a swimming pool. But good for children.

title: Not a huge water fall, as i thought it by name.
review: Kempty water fall is very famous as i heard it lot of times, but when we went there, we saw it was just a normal water fall though it's coming from the top of the mountains. But the place where all people used to take bath is very normal place, and highly commercialized. But it was a good experience. Water is too cold, but once you got in then it's okay for you. Don't be there in water for long time you might get cold. After talking bath you can have hot Tea.

title: Overhyped place
review: This otherwise good place is poorly maintained and it seems everyone is interested in getting their share of money whether it is stalls or people who rent costumes. Cleanliness is a big issue and tourists are at blame equally. It was so over crowded that I could see little water in between people that many people were into the water. Rope way was good but this place needs some cleanliness and discipline. Everyone does what they will to, throw things wherever they will. Overall I feel place is overhyped

title: Nothing Exceptional about this Waterfall
review: This fall is located downhill about 15 kms away from the Mall. Nothing spectacular about this fall, not too high either. The place is overcrowded with stalls and vendors which makes it too commercial a place, and perhaps robs it of its beauty and serenity. One can hire robes and towels a  nominal rate to take a dip at the bottom of the falls. There is no entry fee, but the minimum  Car Parking charges, as in most places around  mussoorie, was a high Rs100.

title: Excellent Falls very exhilarating
review: The fall is natural and good. The approach and the Bath areas should be cleaner.

title: NOT A GREAT FALL
review: We were very excited to see the Kempty fall. The moment we arrived we were upset because this is not great fall like Niagara falls, it's a very small ,narrow fall, and  also very crowded by nearby construction. It lost its beauty due to the garbage sitting around it .It could be better if local authorities would take care of the maintenance in the better way.

title: Very beautiful
review: Always take a trolley to this place. Parking is difficult to find. You won't get good food nearby. Extremely crowded.
