title: Too much comercialised
review: Too much overcrowded and commercialised no more a tourist spot but supermart. There is no proper parking available and the taxis to n fro are overpriced.not even worth the money ot effort to visit this place

title: too crowded
review: earlier it was fun going there. but now with al the shops in the surroundings. itjust feel like u  r in a pool. does not feel close to nature

title: Superbly Overrated
review: So it is on the way out of Musoorie towards the mountains if you would like, but I can see no reason why you would go there except to waste a lot of your time sadly.

title: Small fall to enjoy
review: small fall with the pool below it. can take a bath and enjoy the purity & coolness of water. shops are around it to provide you cloth for bathing on rent. can spend 1 hr

title: Must Visit
review: When you are visiting Mussoorie then Kempty Fall must be in your list. Though the place was over crowded, we enjoyed the falls. The water was too chill.

title: Very average
review: Kempty falls is said to be the main attraction in Moussorie...But the crowd and the management made it terrible...I was lucky enough to be there at around 10 am and found the place peaceful...I really oppose the idea of swimming and disturbing the natural beauty artificially...

title: Very good water fall but totally commercialised
review: The waterfall is very good bu they have opened so many shops and so much construction that natural beauty is not there. Earlier it was very enjoyable

title: Beautiful Fall
review: Chilled water and nice market around. U will love to have a bath here. Its quite steep . DO take the gondola if ur with elders or with kids.

title: One word WOW
review: The most amazing holiday , this is the first water fall where people can enjoy bath , i had bath and what a cold water , Beautiful scenery ..beautiful moments

title: Mediocre waterfall, extremely commercialized
review: This waterfall is located at about 15 KM from the main town of Mussoorie. The road to this place is pretty scenic. Now about the fall; very much average, extremely commercialized and over-crowded with gruesome crowd-management. If you are looking for a ride on a picturesque route, visit this place. Else, not worth the effort!

title: Average Sight
review: The sight is average when you have seen the beauty of Kashmir. It is good for average tourist only. The distance from Mussorie may be a hurdle to visitors who like to see this.

title: superb falls on a hill station
review: been here long back with a friend when we visited Mussorrie, Rishikesh & Nainital. One of the finest point to be at Mussorrie. Can be reached using shared taxis and couple of other points can be clubbed with Kempty Falls.

title: Natural falls
review: Kempty falls are around one hour drive from the Library point in Mussoorie. Beautiful falls created by nature and made dirty by man.....to reach the main falls one has to go walk down for 10 minutes from the main road....apart from the cascade one can see the hanging garments of people who stand below the fall in water, which appears quite gross.....photographers are ready to be hired for various clicks....small food stalls are in abundance ....During the tourist season, car parking might be slightly difficult due to over rush and not very wide road...

title: Horrible
review: I have visited this many times and bathing in that water fall use to be a good experience . But my last experience was bad. I mean people have thrown broken beer bottles in the pond, so I was afraid to enter into it. And there were many other type of trash there to. And the water felt polluted. It felt more like an artificial 'fall' this time, even when I know it's not.

title: Worth a visit needs lots of improvement.
review: Kempty is just 10 kms from Mussoorie. It is a nice water fall for having fun with family and friends especially in summers water is cold and refreshing under the natural spring water fall also it has a small pool though not very clean.

title: An enclosed waterfall!!
review: Completely surrounded by market. The pool under the waterfall is not a clean one and very small. Overrated place.

title: Great Fall, but a little more crowdy
review: This was my 2nd visit to this destination & I was thinking that I would get bored as I've already been here but the place didn't disappointed me and the reason was the level of water was more in June as compared to my last visit which was in December, 2 years back. Well, my recommendation would be to visit it in rainy season because, the more is the level of water, the more excitement it creates.

title: not to visit
review: lot of stairs and not clean . dirty and smelly place.people bathing and doing urin at the same place .

title: fantastic falls
review: Loved the place. The falls are absolutely beautiful. The place.was not very crowded due to off season which made it look muchh better. One of the best place at mussoorie. Enjoyed a lot.

title: Beauty
review: Beautiful place, but toooooo much crowded. Better take the rope train on return... climbing is too hectic and very slippery when it rains. Shops on the stairs charge you very high prices for below average materials

title: Best Waterfall that we have ever seen in India
review: There is rope way facility to reach the falls or you can walkdown the steps to reach the falls. Near the waterfalls facilities available like lockers to keep your valuables when you go for swimming into falls, facility to change your dress etc. These are provided by private individuals with some charge. They charged 40 rupees from us for locker and facility to change our dress. Water in the falls is so cold but so pure as well. Water in the falls is around 4 ft depth. Must visit place in Mussorie.

title: Excellent place to spend time
review: Kempty falls is 13 KM from Moussoorie on chakrata road. with 1364 meters above sea level, its give great view of water falling and good place for water activities.

title: Disappointing
review: The pictures and the reality doesa not match at this waterfall. The base has been totally commercialised, with little left of nature for your t savour. The cable car fee (which takes you to the base in a  five minute ride) at Rs 120 per head may be way too costly for most and was not found worthwhile by us.

title: must visit....
review: great cold water..........hahahahaha....location is also perfect and government has developed the place also for the better

title: Beautiful Falls
review: Kempty Falls was an hour drive from the Mall Road, Mussoorie.  The drive was scenic.  The area around Kempty falls offers services for swimming, ropeway and water rides.  Lots and lots restaurants around the area and leading up to the fall is lined with shops, some offering swim suits on rent.  Although the view of the fall is mesmerising but the littered shops have totally damaged what should have been a place with white cascading water with the backdrop of greenery.  So if you happen to be there, just concentrate on the falls, you can forget the rest.

title: Admist nature...wonder place
review: A wonder full experience...must visit... cable car available at 120/- per head for both ways. If you want a locker room for storage purpose then it is available at a cost of Rs. 40/-. Really enjoyable place.

title: Kempty falls..not a place worth visting...DON'T GO GUYS
review: Kempty falls have now become really commercialized.The area is completely crowded with hawkers who will overcharge you for everything.The pool is surrounded with shops and really congested.Smelly due to crowd.

title: Good place to spend an afternoon!
review: Waterfall size - Small

title: Kempty falls
review: Nice place to experience waterfall. Adventure sport of fox fly across mountain at Rs 300. Visit company garden and wax museum too while being in mussorie.

title: Not recommended
review: This is a very average place with all the tourist traveling from buses lined-up. very average place without any good eataries and places to relax.

title: Nothing special
review: A very average place and reaching it requires walking down the hill through stairs. If you are not planning to take a dip in the pool (watch as the water is not very clean in the pool) down the waterfall, there is actually no use going to Kempty fall. Also note you need to climb back up lots of stairs when you return, or you take the cable car (Rs.120 per person)!

title: Amazing Place for nature lovers
review: Good place to visit with family & friends, After shower in main fall, Even you should move upward 3-4 step from the main road to explore more nthis place.

title: Didn't expect waterfall in Oct
review: Great Place to be around Mussoorie!! Parking is a challenge and locals are not very friendly.. But the place takes you back in the lap of nature!!

title: Nice Water fall.. Jaded by excessive commercialisation.
review: A cross country trek to Kempty falls starts from the JW Marriott hotel complex. It was a 2 hour long not too difficult trek.  We trekked across Kempty village, which is actually where the English people in the colonial era would have a Tea Camp (Tea camp- camptee).  We reached the point where the Kempty fall originates & saw the crystal clear water. A foot dip in the falls is most welcome. We also passed Gharats or flour mills powered by hydro electricity generated by the stream (Pan Chakki). As we walked along the stream, we felt one with nature & could not help marvel at the peace and calm of the place. As we neared the “Kempty Falls”- the tourist spot we got acquainted with the filth and dirt created by tourists.  There is also a ropeway which takes the tourists to a water park, which is very crowded.

title: Waterworld
review: Nice place for water sports and adventure. Stairs Uphill from road take you to a smaller but more beautiful falls than the original down one

title: extents of exploitation. way too commercialised
review: Wasteful trip. Paid 1000 bucks for taxi via kempty stand taxi union. Regretted the decision. Rather go through garhwal vikas nigam bus seva which charges just rs 250.

title: not very great
review: its a average place..and a bit far from mall road..the point from where the taxi will leave you, to reach the falls you have to get down using the huge stairs..there is also a option to use a ropeway...but if you use the stairs, the climb back up is exhausting..overall a average place..

title: Natural beauty devastated by mankind..
review: I was shocked to see how commercialization can ruin natural beauty. They have a swimming pool tilled d entire natural waterfall. Its full of dirt filthy and drunken people in d pool. Locker rooms, drinks, wet cloths and stink that what one will find here. Its really awful to see how mankind has spoiled the naturally beauty.... Will never visit nor recommend people to visit this place

title: Pictures of Kempty Falls lie!!
review: Classic case of bygone beauty!! Approach to Kempty falls is lined with shops and hawkers. Not a natural and peaceful spot as expected! You will charged a bomb for parking. Human exploitation has spoil this natural spot a great deal!!

title: Good to go but don't stay there for too much time.
review: Another place which is not that tempting and exciting. There is a water fall and a small man-made pool, where you can enter and go near to fall. Water is damn cold but bearable. One should see this once but don't waste much time here. Maximum time suggested here is 30 minutes.

title: Over hyped
review: It is located 17km from mall road. For parking nearby, they charge rs 100 which we found ridiculous. You will be greeted by a number of monkeys on your way down the fall site.

title: Kempty falls not like earlier days..Highly commertial
review: Kempty falls have now become really commercialized....The area is completely crowded with hawkers who will overcharge you for everything...The pool is surrounded with shops and really congested... Since we reach mussoorie....Its just a place to e tick marked as one of the important landmarks.... There are better things to do like parasailing and going around places like company garden....

title: Exiciting and cool
review: Reached here at 4:30 pm there is no rush , so it is very good for us to take bath in cold waterfall.I think evening time is good but before 5:30pm

title: Nature and best
review: Nature and best. But commercial activity may ruin this place soon. Take some cloths for bathing, you can take swimming costume from local vendor outside the falls. Boating is also available at this place.

title: Poor
review: did not like this fall though. It was dirt and filth all around.

title: Average Waterfall
review: went during the long weekend and that made it a pathetic as I experienced, the place is not great in terms of natural beauty but has fun value due to the rope away and pools down the valley.

title: its ok just for the name sake
review: Nothing great, there are better water falls, the place is over crowded and dirty, takes away the pleasure of enjoying the place after driving that far.

title: Loved this place
review: This was my second visit at kempty fall and first with my wife. On my earlier visit i found the place very much crowded and a bit dirty(May be because of weekend visit). But thus time we visited on week days and there was less crowed compared to my last visit. The place was awesome and we enjoyed a lot. Lockers are available at 40-50 Rs, keep your belongings there... even you can hire t-shirts and shorts and 20 rs each and enjoy the waterfall :-)

title: Not worth anymore
review: the place has become commercialized n will be crowded..you wont have a calm hilly experience...it is all dirt n shopping only...20 km from mall road...

title: Not good to visit anymore
review: Now it is not worth to visit Kempty falls. The water stinks and the place is not maintained. Moreover, there is a lot of waste around the area.

title: Average place
review: Very crowded and the water fall is also very average. Less scenic beauty. I recommend Dhanuti over it.

title: Kempty Falls near Mussoorie
review: We had visited this spot in Oct 2014, and it was a memorable one.  We opted for the bus tour which covered 3 other tourist locations around Mussoorie.

title: WARNING
review: Just don't visit Mussoorie during a weekend.  Traffic jams and long waiting period for any activity will spoil your weekend.

title: Good place to visit
review: there are not many things to do at Mussoorie but Kempty falls was a good 4 km trek from our hotel and we enjoyed the place.

title: Good placr to visit
review: As we visited in the month of September, we luckely didnt get the much crowd so we enjoyed a lot. But many people told us that during peak season time this place becomes overcrowded and fully commercialised that one cannot enjoy the visit.

title: Good
review: Good not as always luxurious because all categories are bathing in there together no privacy

title: Lovely natural scene, but over populated.
review: Great natural phenomenon, but too many tourists leave trash and pollute the environment. If you go, take care of the environment.

title: Journey is more enjoyable than waterfalls
review: GMVN conducts half day excursions to view points around musoorie by bus. Journey by bus is comfortable and safe. It starts around 10 am in the morning near library square. The road to kempty falls is spectacular..through the green mountains and clouds. You will witness the best views of mussorie. Ropeway is available to reach the waterfall. Swimming costumes  is available near the falls for ladies and gents.

title: Can be avoided
review: This are not falls but small rivulets. There is watersports nearby but the roads are bad / Pathetic.

title: Beautiful fall, approachable
review: It is connected by decent road from mussoorie, place is beautiful, full of fun. Has good eateries nearby.

title: Good place
review: We visited this place in 2011. Have lots of stalls, the falls is beautiful and if you wish can take bath also.

title: Must Enjoy the Fall
review: It is very enjoyable and lovely place to visit. Without going to kempty fall your trip of Mussorie is worthless. Every moment you will enjoy of Natural Fall with fresh water.

title: Awsome
review: Must go place if u love water parks...but if u are feeling even a lil cold catched then stay away...and u can do a lot of things apart from having fun in water...

title: Very crowded & over commercialized
review: No doubt a nice place but unfortunately too crowded & the place has borne the brunt as well. Try to visit during weekdays with lesser crowd expected.

title: Nice place but  not so well managed!!
review: Mussorie's weather makes this place very tempting but after hiring a taxi for over 1000 bucs and trolley over 100 bucs doesn't seem to be worth of this average looking water fall. It's nice but nothing amazing except weather around it!! Don't use ropeway as its complete waste of money..go by stairs and have fun!!

title: nice water falls
review: You can refresh yourself with nice falls of waters which are naturaly coming from mountains and make us to play with water.it is really enjoyable

title: Lovely Stepped Falls
review: In my first vist to mussoorie, I had skipped going to Kempty. In  my experience I find the attractions near tourist cities are far too over-hyped. However, I must reverse my judgement for Kempty. Not only the location is very beautiful, the waterfall is stepped so that people of all ages can enjoy it. While bulk of the tourists head down to the dual cascading area, older people who like more shallow waters can head upwards where the falls are milder but more pristine. I am not a water person myself, but, with bathing suits on rent even I was tempted into dipping into the waters.

title: Nice fall
review: Car parking is bit problematic thing near Kempty fall. The cost of parking is very high. You can either go to the fall via steps or electric trolly is also provided Rs. 100 per person. You can enjoy at this place in group.

title: Not worth the effort....
review: I love Mussorie for its pleasant weather and scenic beauty,buy this is one of worst of all waterfalls i have ever visited. Naturally its located in a very scenic area,among the hills,but people have made it very much commercial and have constructed too many shops around it, thereby taking away its charm. The ropeway ride is good, but it should have been constructed a bit away from the waterfall. This place can be avoided if you are in Mussorie. And for people who have not seen a waterfall in their life, can obviously give it a try.

title: Fun Place to be
review: You have to witness hell of a journey to enjoy this place. Mostly you will be stuck in jam and have a hard time parking your car around this place. Then a rope-way will take you down to this place welcoming you will be array of small shops and vendors.

title: Commercialised water fall
review: A natural water fall where one can take the pleasure of body massage by standing below the stream of gushing water. The area is completely exploited by small vendors and the authorities must have allowed this to happen for local politicians gains. It is a pity on us.

title: Horrible ...
review: Crowded ... dirty ... no more words ... not well managed ... sorry ...

title: Kempty water fall
review: person who loves to play in water will surely love this place. Fresh water from mountains falls here and you will find good number of peoples enjoying here. Must visit in mussoorie

title: wouldn't call it a must visit place !
review: This is a moderately appealing  waterfall site situated about 15kms from the town. The place turns you off with haphazard construction and poor crowd management hampering the natural beauty.There is a cable car and a water park near the falls. Add this onto your itinerary only if you have enough time in hand and no better options.

title: A must visit
review: A must visit with great road ride, enjoyed a lot. For more personal space you must climb further above and enjoy fall without crowd. Fun and enjoyed the quality of water.

title: Kempty Falls-- Please go with zero expectations !
review: This is a nice nature destination around Mussoorie-- you can stay there for a couple of hours and enjoy light eatables there. Nothing very great but one-time visit is not a bad idea.

title: terrible
review: really disappointed to see this place. it is the perfect example of how we are destroying nature. I have seen this place with raw beauty many years back. But now I feel like crying after looking the condition of this place. commercialized fully and dirty to the limits.

title: Good place to enjoy nature
review: U should have to be there atleast once if u want to enjoy natural falls . But it should be more clean . If u want to enjoy your mussorie tour then  you should be there for atleast 5 -6 hours . Overall good place to enjoy natural waterfalls

title: No words to describe the beauty
review: I agree that it is tough to go to the Kempty falls, but when you are in the water, forget everything. the water is cool and gives you a wonderful experience you cannot forget.

title: Poor maintenaince of a natural beauty.
review: We were there on the family trip of Mussoorie in March. There is nothing special in it. Like all average fall in India it also lack proper maintenance.But i must say everything there was commercial.

title: Place to Go
review: Nice Place having very good fall , just one thing is that their should be some rules to take bath in kempty falls , people are not using swim costumes

title: Crowded, comercial waterfall
review: This was one good place i liked to visit often as a kid, but it now crowded like other mussorie attractions.

title: Love this place.
review: Kempty fall is like cheery on the cake for mussorie :-).Having so much fun with chilled water and enjoy the rope way.

title: Not worthy
review: It does not look natural, commercialisation  ruined the beauty with passage of time. Too much rush just for a waterfall.

title: Chill location with waters
review: Good location and enjoy lot under water.its fully chill location.go there and enjoy this location.fully fun zone.

title: Nice place to have a bath..
review: Its a very beautiful place and must visit place..... Its around 20kms from city. One should hire taxi. One way vehicles are available.... but you have to return back early...

title: Definitively visit again
review: I Can't explain the beauty of the water fall. I love to visit the place where I get comfort in this September I get the chance to visit mussoorie with friends and visit Kempty falls. Its not easy to reach this place but when we reach and see the beauty of the area we forget every trouble. awesome place with chilled water and foggy atmosphere.

title: no more a place i would wanna go
review: full of dirt and stink

title: Must visit place in Mussoorie, avoid peak seasons due to overcrowd
review: It is a well developed area with market and food stalls near the Waterfall.

title: Nice Place to visit
review: Nice place to visit on mussoorie trip.  Could have been more clean and tidy. Overall very good. Scenic beauty on the way is awesome.

title: Gorgeous waterfall but way too overcrowded
review: If you want a decent experience that at least pretends to be natural and untouched etc., attempt to climb all the way to the top. Assuming you've stopped at the usual place that the Uttarakhand state transport buses stop at, you will be climbing up the stairs until you reach the spot at the top. From there, there's a relatively hidden set of stairs on the side of the changing room leading to another level of the falls. We went during the off-peak season and so we were the only ones there. Eventually some others came in, effectively ruining the experience. However, makes for a wonderful experience overall.

title: coolest falls
review: Oh my!!!! It was pure delight visiting kempty falls. I visited it in December and to my surprise I actually felt warm in musoorie than in Delhi and it was such a relief to visit these falls.

title: Crowded and built up
review: The waterfall itself looked very pretty from the opposite slope as we drove in, but up close it was somewhat disappointing.  Too many shops selling tacky souvenirs.  One has to go down a fairly long way, and also come back up - not for the faint hearted or weak kneed.  Also too much concrete and paint around the pools, not an unspoilt natural attraction.  Poor value for effort.

title: SO SO Place
review: Highly Commercialized with poor maintenance, at least  45 Minutes drive. Nothing Special. If you are ready to get wet take extra cloths.

title: enjoyable place
review: we enjoyed chilled water fall bathing , expensive food but enjoyed the place,it has good nature beauty.

title: An overrated beauty now spoiled by Us.
review: It's a nice fall, but now not so beautiful because of so many tourists, which come here to enjoy, but forget their garbage here. But even then u can come over here n take a dip in the icy-cold water. Trust me, once inside, u vl love it.

title: Awesome place...
review: We enjoyed chilled water fall bathing as well as the place,it has good natural beauty. The place is so crowded, But even then u can come over here n take a dip in the icy-cold water. Trust me, once inside, u will love it.

title: Average Experience
review: it was a most worst experience in the Mussoorie is way to Kamty fall. we went to up side of falls . it was beautiful.

title: Over commercialized
review: Place is over commercialized.

title: Place i must visit
review: In between our trip kempty falls is one the main place which we have to visit, and we enjoyed so much here at Jhil no. 3, the chilled water makes us relax its time of april, so we enjoyed so much in water. on the top this seems like very beautiful place, sometimes when cloud comes then it looks like a heaven.

title: Natural Waterfalls
review: Good spot near Mussoorie. You need to walk through some steps to reach there. Great place for having fun and taking bath in chilled water.

title: Nature at its best
review: Its a nice place for all age groups.Natural waterfall..full of fun & also very safe.for Old/aged & kids trolley service is there to get down to falls.

title: must see
review: Kempty falls was a highlight of my stay in Mussoori, many tourist were swimming in the pool under the falls.  There were many shops and restaurants on the way to the falls.

title: Kempty falls
review: If u want to hv the real full view then visit during rains...around August. Hv the best biew from kempty view point.

title: Disappointment
review: Not a good place to go as over Crowded,not clean and hygiene

title: Good place if in a group & want to enjoy bathing in crowded place
review: Pros

title: Woooow feel
review: In Mussoorie, it is the only place I like most, chilled water,nature at its best attitude really  make you feel woooow. Its a must visit place and surely you will love it.

title: Not worth visiting
review: This is not falls in true standards. It has been commercialised beyond expectation. The only solace is that if you're visiting as a group you can enjoy the dip in the pool creating by the water falling from a height.

title: Nature Spoiled by Tourists
review: A beautiful nature's spot spoiled by tourists and local eating joints. Trash and filthy smell everywhere.

title: Urban disaster
review: Kempty Falls, once majestic, is now partly hidden by scores of encroachments by shanty-shops selling all types of goods. I wonder how could they be allowed by the local administration to spoil the view ?

title: Kempty Falls
review: This place was on our bucket list on the next day of our trip, its around 45 minutes drive from mussorrie, roads are not so nice to drive on. One advice, when reach here, just park your vehicle as soon as you get the place, dont go much inside, has parking and traffic problems. Many small shops rent lockers to put your stuffs inside and also provide the swimwears. People enjoy the fall, the negative thing is its too crowded.. Not to special or unique..

title: Excellent
review: This is a very good waterfall in the mussoorie and a excellent look of waterfall and it's water is very cold bathing in the waterfall is a very good experience  ( maza aagaya) if you go to mussoorie don't miss that

title: Trolley ride enjoy
review: It is a good tourist spot near masooree. It has trolley and water swimming pool for all. Charges are OK but big traffic problem. Shops are many but expensive

title: A very good place made worst
review: Though very good natural beauty but its spoiled by bad tourists making it very dirty. Its better to visit other less known water falls

title: Not well maintaines
review: It was an ok ok place. Crowd was not at all good, and the place is not at all  maintained, authorities must make proper arrangements as kempty fall is d place which comes in mind to visit while planning to go to mussorie

title: Can be missed
review: again far from the main city, though most sought out point in Mussorie. Very expensive parking, entry tax etc. offers few adventure activities.

title: There are  2 part
review: Upper part is exiting, I was not sure to visit that place, went any how, upper part is isolated with very few visitors, nice and picturesque. The lower part is bad, the rope way charges are very high as compared to the experience one can have. Crowded, not recommended in season time.

title: Over rated place
review: Kempty falls is located 13 kms from mussoorie, but it takes atleast half an hr to reach. There you need to get down through a ropeway. Now everything of this, just to see a small tiny waterfall. If you don't want to take a bath under the falls, then don't waste time and money.

title: Terrible experience. Not recommended for couples.
review: Terrible experience. Very crowded place no hygienic and robbers. Not recommended for couple or females. Instead of this go for other falls.

title: Miss it if you can!
review: Visit this place at your own risk! It is one of the most unhygienic falls I have ever visited! It is so crowded that there is hardly any space o keep your feet down. Miss it if you can!

title: splashing good fun
review: These falls are a few kilometers drive from Mussourie through great hill scenery.  The falls look good though difficult to see as you approach through a tunnel of tourist shops, but the more spectacular attraction is the sight of hundreds of people splashing around enjoying themselves in the big pool at the bottom of the falls.  If you forgot your swimming costume, there are plenty on hire!  If you cant swim, there are plenty of rubber rings on sale!

title: Simply Terrible
review: Don't get fooled by the word FALLS. This is no way comparable to one.

title: No natural beauty...  U will see only Kachas... Banyians...  Garbage
review: Worst place ever to visit ....  Natural beauty destroyed mercilessly to develop tourism....

title: Wonderful
review: Beautiful waterfalls with plenty of shopping nearby...playground with cable car too...fun place with many snackfood options

title: Lost sheen of old times ......
review: We visited the Kempty....long back on a school trip...that time view was more natural ....and amazing feeling of natural ....fall....now the things have been converted  into commercial hub....water is muddy and pond size has been reduced ...but not to miss the fall if going first time.....

title: Used to be nice
review: They have ruined it with development around it and all the garbage around it.40 years ago we always visited this place. We used to walk to this place from Mussoorie. We use to have a picnic there. Now place developed so much and without any control. There is so much garbage around the fall. It looks filthy. We sent 5 min there and came back. I was so disappointed.

title: Waterfall for njoyment and adventure
review: The waterfall is nice, beautiful and large, the water is collected in artificial pools for swimming and njoyment. The fall has small water parks with boats and rain dance.

title: Dirty falls, perfect recipe for getting sick
review: You are better off to jump into your neighborhood sewage pond than get in the water here. The water quality is really bad and that does not deter hundreds of folks getting into the small pool at the foot of the falls. Added to this misery, there are a bunch tiny shops renting used shorts. Yuck. Not my kind of falls.

title: Beautiful
review: Its fun place to visit! But nothing extraordinary! Its a water fall. Beautiful and nicely maintained.

title: A Very Dirty Place
review: I feel its just a hype given to this place. It was overcrowded on the day we went. But this is nothing great as a place as well. Completely filled with lots of shops, restaurants and roadside vendors. They and ofcourse people who come there have have completely dirtied the place. Its full of filth near the falls too. You'll not loose a thing if you don't see the place.

title: Beautiful!!!
review: A fantastic spot fro a perfect day.. enjoy to the fullest with beautiful water fall.. Boating is also available and it was such a fun for all of us during our visit..

title: osm place
review: love that place

title: Chilled water fall
review: Water fall is awesome, however to me it seems they lack safety measures. But anyways it was a nice fall and we enjoyed a lot bathing in the fall. Very much commercialized which adds to ease and simultaneously it's also polluting the place.

title: Created by nature, destroyed by human greed
review: The falls would have been a wonderful sight provided it wasn't made ugly by people trying to make money. Unclean, too crowded and very expensive.

title: Good to see!
review: Approx. an hour journey from hotel we reached here and it was drizzling. You can then walk up to fall on very neat and clean tile footpath. You can enjoy lots of small souvenir shop on the side of footpath. There is small bridge in front of the fall where you can take photographs and selfie.

title: Enjoyable place
review: When we went to kempty falls it was raining since morning and we waited for 2hrs before we started from mussoorie. But the weather became beautiful with slight drizzle and lots of fog on the way.People discouraged us to go there saying it is very dirty. But we had so much fun when we reached there. No doubt water of the fall was muddy but it was great and coming forcefully. The total atmosphere was festive type and everyone was having really good time so we did enjoyed a lot .Must visit place.

title: Family and Friends Day Outing
review: This is good place for day camping/outing with friends and family as has eating joints, waterfall to take a dip and some rides section for kids with a cable car ride facility.

title: best waterfall in uttrakhand
review: this is the best attraction in mussoorie and this waterfall is full of nature beauty and it seems like milky water and little bathing area is also made to take bath and for little shops are also there for food and shoping and while ropeway is also provide.

title: A terrible Place
review: The pool made just under the fall has dirty water. Boating area is bad too n they charge and entrance fee to go inside though it's minimal but waste. The only decent activity was the cable car from the car park to the falls.

title: No need to visit.
review: Tiny waterfall, unbelievably crowded... just don't go there... That is my opinion. I unfortunately haven't seen any other waterfall in India, but I am quite sure there must be some a hundred times better and more picturesque.

title: Search your best place
review: Man made structures (shops, rope-way, etc.) and too much of people has destroyed the natural beauty of a beautiful falls.

title: Awesome view
review: It is a beautiful waterfall, which falls from a height of about 40 ft from a mountain.Its fun being there and to see a waterfall. There is good facility for bathrooms to change and there are good restaurants to eat too.it's a great place to visit like you have reached heaven on earth. The atmosphere here is very cool, Kempty Falls is just awesome, love watching it and area around is also good. Very attractive place and should visit it once.

title: Awesum place...
review: Visited dis place in month of June dis year wit my wife..scenic beauty...awesum place..d atmosphere was cheerful..do visit it if u visit mussorie..and enjoy bathing under d kempty falls pure water...locker facility is available to keep your valuables near d falls...

title: kempty Falls in October 2014
review: I was there in October 2014. there was some chill but it was awesome to be in kempty fall. Better to have your swim dress if you want to go. Other option is to rent it out. Feeling was not good to take cloths on rent as we don't know how many already used that. Stairs were not so clean. But you forget everything once you are in kempty fall to take a shower.  Water is clean and you will have a very good feeling. other wise there is nothing I liked in mussoorie. Dhanaulti is Good to go.

title: Beautiful but too crowded
review: My friend and I visited the place in June (peak season). The waterfall is really beautiful, but the place is too crowded. Getting to the place was also a hassle as due to excess traffic along the thin road. Carry a set of clothes if you would like to bathe under the falls, although locker facilities are available.

title: View was beautiful but water was dirty
review: View of the place was really beautiful and calm but i went in rainy season and thus its

title: Prime Example of Destruction of Natural Beauty
review: Had visited the place somewhere in July'15. We had visited Tiger Falls in Chakrata a day before and mesmerised by its beauty. So, our enthusiasm was high when we reached their. However as soon as reaching close to to the falls all expectation came crushing down. It has become just another water park where people come bathing and even by that standard it is not very clean or organised. This is one place one should skip during their Mussories trip. Rather than taking this 45min ride from Mussourie it is better to take 1 hour drive to Dhanaulti and visit the Eco Park

title: Biggest waterfall in Mussourie
review: Visited this place last month and it was so exciting and fun to see this big waterfall. There was lots of traffic as it was the weekend and the main approach road was full of traffic then we took the bypass road to reach the city then then reach the water fall. The place is full of restaurants and shops. There is a ropeway which can be taken from the road and which goes down to the base of the waterfall there they have the big tank of water and place to eat. You can have a shower at the waterfall and take the pictures even. There are plenty of small hotels near Kempty fall. Kempty fall was named as this because before the Indian independent it was the cantonment for British army so they used to have Tea parties at the fall. CAMP + TEA changed to Kempty Fall.

title: Indian version of natural swimming Pools
review: Water fall into a pool does indeed make it a swimming pool.It has been converted into an entertainment Park with Zorbing, rappelling, flying Fox Rope. Park your vehicles for an almost 600 metres downhill trek amongst the flea market offering everything starting from wooden easy chairs to Air Guns to apparels...basically everything,Generally they don't do bargaining but no harm trying. In case you want to avoid the trek opt for two way cable car rides at 120 INR/person.

title: crowded water falls
review: place and falls as such is beautiful , but pool where the water fall collects is really crowded and water also looks dirty .

title: Good but very croweded.
review: Kempty falls is nearly 12 km from Mussoorie. The place is good but very crowded and very poorly managed. There is nearly 15 m high fall but looks dirty due to empty chips packets drink bottles etc. Nothing much is done to clean this place.

title: get chill in kempty
review: beautiful n so chilled n amazing but be aware in rainy season, but then i feel its the only time for low crowd, prefer weekdays  there are lockers also available for keeping our clothes.

title: Nature
review: Gushing Waterfall set amidst nature, perfect place to spend quality fun and entertainment time amidst bustling town. Avoid going in rainy season

title: Can be skipped
review: One of the examples of how man destroys nature and beauty. Over commercialised and nothing extraordinary. If u are willing to walk the path less taken and move ahead, there is a serene spot. But there are much better waterfalls around.

title: Good but TOO crowdy
review: This could have been an excellent natural point but too much commercialization has stolen the beauty. Only when you inside the pool (Fall) you will have awesome fun. If you are not planning to get wet then I won't suggest this. One handy tip is try to take your park your car as much as near to fall and please follow your lane.

title: Over crowded, but good place
review: Like all good places in India this too is highly crowded during the peak season, but otherwise it is a good and fun place,

title: Absolutely Pathetic
review: What used to be a spacious water fall is now a small water body surrounded by filthy and stinky shops. The changing area is absolute dirty. Since it was also season time it was more like Haridwar. No beauty. Completely avoidable.

title: Good place
review: Cherish your time keeping all your worries aside. Facilities like boating are also available with some good food options. All in all a nice place to visit with family and friends.

title: Skip this place
review: Summary: Go there if and only if you have to go to cover a point mentioned in your "where to go in mussorie" catalog.

title: Good for kids
review: Kempty falls is a good place to visit when you are in mussoorie. It is just 40 minutes drive from mussoorie. The falls are really good to see and having a bath in it. The locals have developed a good market to eat and to shop near the falls. But the area of the place is highly overcrowded during peak seasons. There are some other places in mussoorie which have worth visiting more than the falls. But if you are going for the first time to mussoorie than you should visit this place. You can also take ride of a short distance cabel car.

title: Huge Mess!!
review: The waterfall has been deprived of all its charm and sereneity due to unplanned construction, highly unpleasant commercial activity and lack of tourist amenities. I do not find it attractive and do not muster the courage to approach it. Just its view from roadside is enough.

title: The main attraction in Mussoorie
review: The waterfall is beautiful, when in mussoorie this place is a must to visit. Though with time the place is losing its natural beauty owing to innumerous shops selling clothes with changing rooms, chaai and maggi etc surrounded close to the waterfall.

title: Natural Beauty converted in Dirty place
review: This place has natural beauty a water fall,but that can be seen from various high points,while driving from Mussouri. Once on main road,near approach point, one will be hounded by photographers,than approach to Ropeway,passes through several cheap products selling shops with salesmen shouting. Ropeway trolley brings to fall,surrounded by several makeshift type shops,selling/renting costumes,and with small changing rooms,lockers etc. During my visit,I have not seen any garbage container any where. All type of garbage can be seen dumped in all corners.So after  disappointed by seeing such filthy site,we decided to return.

title: Fantastic Place..Waterfall
review: Very nice atmostphere of waterfall....Romantic for couples. But bit dirty even after there were dustbins there, but many food sellers there were througing garbage here and there...Overall very good place for every age group..

title: Awesome
review: I traveled here in 2014 . After Mussorie you need to travel 15 kms hardly for this destination. You must visit this during the Monsoon season. This gives a natural beauty to the place and you will definitely enjoy. Can have a great bath under the fall , play with your kids, colleagues . Can enjoy the boating here. Nice place . I traveled here twice and planning to go again

title: good
review: A beautiful attraction of Mussoorie and every one should go there to enjoy in the kempty falls. very cool water. fantastic.

title: Not good
review: I found the place over crowded and unhygienic. Very badly managed and total loss of time and money. You spend half of the day on road to reach this place then struggle for parking place. Not a place for family and kids

title: Interesting place
review: Guys in month of june or july try to go to kempty fall early morning. you won't get much traffic on the way between 8-9am. you can get taxi at fix rates around Rs. 1020/- near library chowk specially for Kempty fall. Or you can visit any place at different charges mentioned their. You have to walk around 1 km down from nearest parking spot to visit Kempty. Stairs or via ropeway @ 120 rs per head (your choice :P), You will get lockers & changing rooms down their easily in all shops downside. Locker @40 rs in total & changing room @10 Rs. per head.

title: Great Place
review: Fun for every age,, Its round 14 kms from mall road and you can easily get a taxi for the same. Best time to visit would be during Monsoons

title: A place for fun seekers
review: Beautiful falls..A car trolley takes you down to the place where u can enjoy in the pool alongside the falls...

title: Not worth driving 17 kms to see filthy area
review: We had places Kempty falls on top of our attractions list, but our long 17km drive on winding roads,  then riding the overpriced ropeway ( ticket Rs 120 per person), then climbing some steps, we reached the observation bridge in front of the falls. The waterfall is nothing great. Below the falls, is a small circular pool where some crazy people were bathing in what looked like dirty contaminated water. Difficult to understand why people should use this place for bathing risking their health?

title: Beautiful Waterfall but Not Maintained!
review: Waterfall is very beautiful. But the place is not at all Maintained. There is garbage everywhere. There are lot of shops leading to dirty place. Most IMPORTANT- Try to reach Falls before 9am or there will be a huge traffic jams.

title: Wonderfull
review: Kempty fall is 12 km far from mussoorie town, its a natural water coming from jungle.

title: Cool place
review: I visited in the month of december and it was chilly cold in the kempty fall. The water is very clean and the artificial cemented tub is nicely created. Good place to chill

title: Most attractive place
review: We visited Kempty on 25th June 2015 by own hired vehicle and went to Kempty Fall by Ropeway (Rs120per,person for up-down or Rs100 for one way). We enjoyed very well with clean n chill water. Mast place...

title: Kempty water fall
review: Biggest waterfall of mussoorie enjoyable in lat ejune or after masoon with a good water flow.But the natural beauty of place is kind of ruiuned with commrecial shops around it.now water fall in artificial pools created which just ruined it.With so many people bathing in in same pool ,its just puts you off.But enjoy the waterfall  and cable car ride .It's too crowded in peak season and need slight time adjustments to early morning or late afternoon for better enjoyment.

title: very commercialized... :(
review: I've been to this place when I was too young and I remember enjoying the fun in fall.. but now entire thing has been taken over by commercialization.... no fun.. just hotels, shops etc...

title: COOL
review: It was superb many years back and now, its very convenient as reaching there thru ropeway is very comfortable, more, prices are reasonable. But problem is, in the way market disturb and tube vendors/other local shopkeepers occupied maximum place resulting no space to enjoy such a beautiful fall. If tourism deptt. opens their own shops and remove all the local/un-authorised shop/vendors, this can still be very beautiful.

title: Kempty falls! Must see
review: The Kempty falls are an attraction in Mussoorie. One must visit it during the monsoon to njoi the weather and the chill in the air. However, the falls arent very deep.

title: rejuvenating experience
review: this is one of the most famous waterfalls in India.. one should must try once when on a trip of queen of Hills Mussoorie.

title: Nice place
review: The waterfall is nice. The water directly comes from the glacier. don't go there in winters. You will miss the real fun.

title: Awesome falls... feel the power of water...
review: Kempty Falls, situated at an altitude of 4,500 ft, is one of the popular tourist places of Mussoorie. It is a beautiful waterfall, which falls from a height of about 40 ft from a mountain. This fall is located on way between Dehradun-Mussoorie path.

title: Not for the higher middle class
review: The falls are good!!

title: Cool water on a hot day
review: Though extremely crowded, its just worth going there and enjoying a short dip in the chilly water on a hot day.

title: Please dont go.
review: It was the worst part of Mussorie trip.

title: yuk
review: Very very disappointed...it was so crowdy...there was no place to step...n it was smelly all over because of the wet costume hanging all around....but below there was a small water fall which we enjoyed but sad to see d used bottles wrappers floating in water...why people forget to use dustbins

title: Good place
review: A must visit place. Romantic place and lot of shops to shop for. Spend some quality time in down side too.

title: Heavily Crowded
review: Cheap Crowd & Heavily crowded , Dirty Water on the falls, Wasted  5 hours to visit the place , Please avoid it

title: The best attraction in Mussoorie
review: This was the most advised place by all our friends when we had planned to visit Mussoorie and thankfully we did. The falls is beautiful. Water was crystal clear so we didn't worry about its hygiene and played in it. Come prepared with a pack of clothes and towel. We didn't, so ended up buying spare clothes on rent at cheap rate. There are fast food stalls too to satiate your hunger pangs.

title: Visit to Kempty falls - a must to all tourists
review: A brief journey in hired car brings the tourist to the falls area. The beauty of the falls can be explored in two ways. A short climb along the side of the falls brings one to a flat pool-like area beyond which the water leaps bellow. To go to the bottom of the falls, where there is a nice recreation area with water sports, there is a ropeway.  there are quaint shops and eateries near the ropeway.

title: Disappointement
review: Its a bad session to check out Kempty Fall, as there is hardly any Water and also it became more commercialize and over crowded,

title: Avoid
review: Poorly Maintained. Hardly any water in the Fall. Too crowded with insufficient parking place besides badly managed. Place stinks. NOT WORTH THE VISIT

title: no longer worth
review: This place is just marauded by the crowds, no beauty left. It's dirty, littered with eating shacks who have no option but to dump their waste in the area and the roads are bad. Avoid

title: Too crowded
review: Due to summer vacations, this place is not at all recommended to visit. I went there and there were hundreds of people in the small pool there. Go before/after summer vacations.

title: Its just a little fall but something to see in the area
review: The falls was an anticlimax for me after travelling to the Americas to see falls, The drive to the area was entertaining.

title: Fine One time outing
review: The place has been mishandled by the authorities of uttrakhand, this used to be the go to place at not so distant past but it has lost its charm, with increasing traffic and tourists every year, it is not so good place for families

title: Terrible Place.. Waste of time and money
review: This place cannot be called as a fall. It's a pathetic place to visit. Don't go even if u have nothing to do... Totally overpriced.. Filled with cheap vendors around the fall killing the fall beauty. I wonder how come people take bath in such a dirty water. Very unhygienic place.

title: Can Skip
review: Not so great during June. Can skip. Takes atleast an hour to reach from Maussorie. Water fall with hardly any water.

title: FAMOUS BUT AVERAGE
review: People who visit Mussoorie  often visit Kempy Fall also as it is one of the main attractions.However it does not look attractive as it was about 17 years ago.The water inside the main pond where people were taking bath was dirty.There were too many tourist this summer season and the place was full of crowd.Traffic jams are there during noon/afternoon everyday.

title: Very crowded
review: at the main falls there was no space to even enter the water, trash all over, enjoyed the boating and the kids liked the plastic ball experience on the water

title: Too much crowdy in peak season
review: Try to go early in morning to enjoy the full time and explore nearby areas . We took a bus tour which had stric time so we reached in quite a good time. Nice place and properly managed. Govt has fixed the rates for all things so its no chik chik and bargaining.

title: crowded place spoiled by unplanned development.
review: falls are good to see. overcrowded. highly commercialized. good for one visit. you can shop here . prices are better than mall road.

title: You feel like Shiv Ji
review: Kempty falls is a actually a pond with a great fall. You must take swimming costume otherwise you can also get it on rent there. Don't take a tube unless you are accompanied with a small kid. Do get under the big water fall you just feel heavens. The water is so cold. that its great and fabulous. But if you are standing by the pool you wouldn't understand why people are so happy inside.

title: Over crowded
review: Please avoid visiting the place during season. We could barely enjoy the beauty of the falls and we're more worried to guard ourselves from tripping or getting pushed!

title: Too Crowded!
review: Getting to the spot was first a challenge, as traffic jams are common thing here. Then finding a parking spot is another challenge. Since the Ropeway is there, it is easy to get to the Bottom of the Kempty fall, but the place is very crowded, and one needs to have ample time to enjoy the place.

title: not great
review: cannot be called a waterfall

title: Summer break
review: Over all nice experience , but it's too crowded , ropeway was nice and kids enjoyed and we don't get an opportunity to but 200 calories !! ,

title: great site
review: it got difficult getting there due to off season.. but route from mussoorie to kempty is scenic and awesome.. its crown of mussoorie

title: worth going
review: this is the place where you can enjoy if you have never been to any falls and if you are in mussoorie.the place is very crowded on saturday and sunday.

title: Good place to visit, go in early morning
review: Like: Place, Falls, Eating outlets

title: differnt mussoorie
review: kempty is for all age groups.. adventure activities for children are great...romantic boat ride for couples... waterfall is icing on the cake..

title: Must Visit
review: Good place to have natural shower and enjoy boating etc. You have take a trolley to get there. Need not worry if you forget to bring your swimming costumes as they can be easily hired from here.

title: It used to be a beautiful place but now commercialised
review: What a beautiful natural wonder this is but beggars everywhere and excess of garbage thrown by insensitive tourists have put a blot on this place. Hope it comes back to its old glory, visited it long back with my parents and what a place it was.

title: Commercialization destroys the nature.
review: Too small to cater to such no. of tourists. and the shops around are a mess. I would suggest rather going down to the spot one should go up in the hills a bit and find a place to enjoy the waterfall. However still it was not very bad.

title: Good waterfall
review: Very good waterfall,, reach there afternoon time and enjoy bath there with chilled water,, better option is take one day traveller bus, they cost 250rs and go to massorie lake, kempty fall, dehradoon fun alley also...

title: Dirty & commercialised
review: Been here twice seen it when there were less beggars , filth & dirt. This place might be commercialised but not taken care properly.

title: amazing
review: kempty falls is beautiful but large crowd makes it little bit unhygienic to take bath. We had boating in nearby pond and enjoyed cable trolley ride down to the fall.

title: Beautiful Falls
review: The view of the falls was mesmerizing.

title: promises wonderful memories
review: Trip to Mussooire is incomplete without kempty falls. Friends or families,fun is unlimited. Though the quality here has degraded due to crowd but still its always good. Neat ,clean and cold water where you could swim . Great experience

title: Avoid
review: It's not worth the effort. Not coz it's not good. But it's so crowded that your heart will yell to get out of that place sooner than you enter.

title: I had fun
review: If you are looking for colors and smiling faces this is a place to be..if looking for hills with peace, may be this place is not for u. There are tourist in colorful dresses (which one gets on rent from there) and cheering and splashing water at each other. If you are out on a holiday with family, you should definitely be here.

title: TOURIST TRAP
review: The Kempty falls should be named Empty falls -- don't fall for the tourist trap it is. Dirty, crowded and totally commercialized. No views.  Pathetic.

title: Great Place
review: Great place to visit.

title: Its an empty fall
review: Its now an empty fall, once it was a very popular and scenic tourist spot but now it looks more like a artificial rather than natural fall. Small stones fall along with water.

title: A lost Glory
review: I visited This Place 10 years ago but ever since Charm of people to visit and revisit this Place has ever increased.

title: Nice Place to spend a few hours
review: I would suggest climbing up rather than going down in the rope way. The pools at the top are cleaner and more fun. Do take a dip in the water, it will refresh you completely.

title: Can be avoided
review: A good waterfall which has very dirty surroundings. Can be avoided if you are not too keen on taking a shower under it.

title: Instead go for bhatta falls
review: Photo Parking will cheat you a lot....its better to park in parking area (Rs. 100)....Very crowded.....rather I would recommend Bhatta Falls.....not at all crowded but same fun.....

title: Ok ok
review: Visited Kempty falls in June and then I regretted... This place is over hyped and crowded like Delhi. No space to drive... Long jams... Park ur car 2 kms away and then walk.. If u lucky u get parking nearby.

title: Nice falls
review: The place is a bit crowded but is a good experience for the first time traveller,   There is a ropeway that takes you to the b ottom of the falls where there is a pool created by the falls.

title: Not an Outstanding Fall
review: Kempty Falls is amore Hype than Substance. The place is no doubt scenic .But Poorly managed.The Parking is chaotic.The Place is dirty.You can use the Ropeway for going up and down and avoid the steps.The View from below is worth.Go if you have nothing to do in Mussouri.

title: a bit too commercialised but has good efforts by officials
review: this place is well made, it has a pool made of fresh running waterfall right in the middle of a forest and you reach it by a ropeway, it siunds thrilling and its a good view to watch , the waters very cold even in summer and makes you wish to dive right in but when you see through what amount of trash thrown by the shops and locals , the water has been running , the water seems very unhygienic to bathe in. i feared i might catch any skin diseases , so i didnt bathe, just took photos of it. but lots of antiques, wooden artifacts to buy and must click photos. :)

title: Terrible - Do not go
review: The entire area is turned in to a cheap place where semi nude people are dancing around. the problem is the sheds are dirty and not well maintained and the real beauty of the place is killed because of these man made structures around the water fall

title: Freezing Water Gushing Down the hills - I loved it - Kemty Falls
review: Kempty falls is a destination which you cannot miss while on tour to mussorie. It is 13 kms from Mussorie & has lots to offer for tourists. You can enjoy playing in natural pool of rock formations on the upper side of the road where you get to see gushing water down the hills. I suggest to go to the upper side of road as the place is less crowded & you can really enjoy the water falls even if travelling with kids. Avoid getting into the waters if you do not know swimming as it is a natural pool & slippery. You have rope way to go down the hill wherein a pool has been constructed, however this place is very crowded. You get lockers on rent, changing rooms & safety water tubes at nominal charge. Rope way cost Rs 100/- per person. Though you have many stalls available at this tourist attraction offering variety of food & drinks, my personal opinion is to avoid taking food or drinks at this place due to hygiene concerns

title: all hype but an epic let down
review: The water fall otherwise a natural one spoiled with severe lack of taste in commercialization efforts. It's an utter chaos with thousands thronging the artificially built pond underneath the fall which in the first place was not required to be built at all. The scenic beauty of the place whatsoever has effectively been spoiled. Only few options of eateries that to poorly managed ones make the place a big disappointment. A total waste of time, efforts (to reach) and money. To make it worse you are blackmailed to pay through the nose by the local taxi association to reach the spot. A BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!!!

title: Do not expect much !!
review: When someone says falls, you expect the falls to be huge, but this was going to a pond which was not even a little deep.

title: Nice  waterfall
review: Nice waterfall,but the place is overcrowded.Avoid going there on weekends otherewise a nice attraction in mussoorie

title: Scenic but littered :(
review: The good part is the setting of the falls - pretty scenic. The cable car makes the walk down the valley a bit easier. Congestion due to narrow roads and many vehicles makes the approach road bad. Spicy and tasty chat on the way will tickle your buds.  People throng there for lazing on floats in the water - just like in a water park. Busy, crowded, littered but scenic.

title: cool during summer
review: i have been there with my family , it is main attraction when u travel to mussoorie , aprrox 17 km away from city and by car or taxi you can travel to kempty

title: Nice ways to give up your Heat
review: Kempty fall is close from mall road. and good to enjoy if you are with your group, buy some channa or kheera and then go for the fall. The deeper you travel the better the fall gets. Its a cool place to lay down in summers, but don't jump to much over the rocks, as if something happens, help is far away to find.

title: Excellent Site
review: Had lots of fun.Chilling Water & Small Man-Made pounds for having bath. One can simply spend 3-4 hrs very easily.

title: Brilliant to visit in summers
review: The place is always welcome in summers with the cold water.

title: Very Nice and Very Chilled water
review: Do visit this place........clean water and very chilled right from the rocks. It's not much far from the mall road. has a nice shopping arena but missed out trolley to reach the falls, thats tiriing.

title: Best picnic spot in masoorie
review: You should never miss this place when you go to masoorie. Conveyance is very limited if you dont have own package. Taxi will be costly so better to take package tour otherwise taxi is available any time. You can enjoy water falls and nature here.

title: White Water Fall
review: It's very high fall and white water. Its very good and awesome location filled with lots of shops.

title: Amazing waterfall with extreme fun in enjoying family bath
review: While in mussorie u just cannot miss this place which is always crowded by tourist.

title: Dirty and over crowded but you can still enjoy
review: If you wish to enjoy this place make sure you are wiiling to talk a little more. Park your car at the parking . Get to the bottom most level of the water fall .Take the rope way till you the last of it then walk a little more to get to the artificial pond at the bottom. Order food before you get into water because are going to get really hungry and food here takes time. you can enjoy water zorbing and boating here along with the water fall. remember to carry extra clothing and wear good foot ware as the slippers often get washed away with the water flow and shoes get drenched in water making it difficult to talk back to the top.

title: Good place but overcrowded..!!
review: - This is one of the falls in Mussoorie.

title: Maaza aa gaya
review: it was hardly 30-45 min journey from mussoorie to kempty fall, park your vehicle after that you have two option 1. Walk downward towards kempty fall 2. Ropeway (100 per person) . Choose a locker vendor (prefer taking your own clothes for the swimming purpose).

title: Lost its value over the years..has become a Mela !
review: Kempty falls is sort of a must go if you are a first time visitor to that area...i wouldn't suggest it to anyone..unfortunately its become a picnic spot..theres no natural authenticity anymore..from shops/rides/overcrowdedness, its a disappointment when you actually reach there..

title: Just too crowded
review: An otherwise very nice place that anyone would have simply loved 15 years ago is now an arduous journey away and simply invaded by the incessant crowds from the plains. Avoid the pain and let Kempty falls be unless you absolutely must go there.

title: completely ruined by man
review: a beautiful waterfall now completely ruined by all the monstrous concrete jungle which has converted the base into a swimming pool for the tourists to take a dip in. the natural beauty is completely lost. the ropeway is also an eyesore for all the wires that are dangling everywhere. but then a trip to mussorie is not complete without a visit to this waterfall.

title: Heart of mussoorie. ..must must must visit
review: Definitely appealing. ....

title: Small trip
review: A very good place for hangout. Pls bring your swim suit n towell....beautiful waterfall. Easy to reach via vehicles

title: Water fall with very cold water from mountain!
review: Must go place! Bit crowded post noon! Reach at around 11 and leave by 2! Distance is walkable but if you can't than there are cable cars too!! Get into the water! Do carry swimming clothes (not the shorter one as the place is bit crowded and it includes cheap guys too) Carry your towel, there are changing rooms and lockers on rent to keep your belongings.

title: A must visit fun place in Mussoorie.
review: Its 13km from mussoorie. So first ensure that you have a minimum 3 to 4 hours of time window to explore n enjoy this place ..public transport (shared taxi and ht buses) gives you only 1.30 to 2 hrs to stay there so its better to avoid them. Also its better to avoid in peak season of summers as it become a crowded place during these days(May - Jun) and its difficult to enjoy the bath when hundreds of eyes glaring you :) A lot of shops all around but a beautiful waterfall scene will make you feel pleasant and a chilled waterbath will make you more pleasant .Overall a must visit place but try not to make your trip to mussoorie in peak season.

title: Too crowded with businesses
review: Once a lovely destination for a hike, it has now become overcrowded with ugly little restaurants that ruin the view from the village on the ridge, now known as Kempty. When I compare it with some pristine waterfalls in other countries where the environment is valued, I realise how sad Kempty has become. Money-making comes first here!

title: A disappointment
review: There was nothing to see actually, i felt like why !! And also that's it. Recommended only if you have loads of time, else visit Dhanaulti twice

title: Okay place to spend a cpl of hours with kids
review: nice route to go Kempty falls. But the actual place is highly commerialised as usual with any tourist spot in Mussorie.

title: wonderful place
review: Not to miss this on your trip to mussorie.  I think this is the brightest spot in Mussorie.  You have natural water fall. You have to carry your shorts and if you dont it is available on hire.  Just jump into the water and spend quality time.

title: Water water everywhere
review: This the place to hang out in mussourie, we loved the overall ambience,serenity of the place.

title: Kempty Falls
review: About 16 km from Mussorie on the way to Yamnotri.

title: Tourism spoiling Nature
review: I had been to Kempty falls almost 20 years back and had a faint memory of beautiful falls. Now it was a mistake to go there waste so much of time and money. It is 12 kms from the town and then you pay Rs 100 to go down the rope way  to see plenty of man made pools and swimming costumes drying around with a lot of muck. The fall is hardly visible due to tourist facilities  and hotels, infact from the road it looks better and if one wants to go close to the fall its best to go a little up from the point where the road crosses the fall

title: beautiful falls
review: nice falls. you can take bath in the falls. It is for the family. Lot of eateries around. Good food is available. The rope way is enjoyable though it covers small distance.

title: Nice natural beauty
review: This fall very nice but all surroundings are very much crowded with shops. I was unable to find out small place to sit and take the enjoyment of fall. Every minute at least one vendor will come and ask for photography or food items. Finely I went in downside paid voting from where I was able feel the beauty of fall.

title: Enjoyable Water Fall
review: Nice water fall and you can enjoy in water. Avoid heavy season otherwise you will not able to enjoy. Lot of tourist in Mid May but still could go up to water fall.

title: Truly awesome
review: Hello, this is 15 km from Mussoorie town and you should never miss this when you are visiting Mussoorie. The chilled water, tubes will be provided, changing rooms, lockers, dresses are available for rent. Its not deep everyone can play and enjoy.

title: WAS BETTER NOW ....
review: Might be good if visiting the first time, but I have seen the best when visited in 1996, after that it has become very dirty and too much commercialised..

title: Great Waterfall
review: Its a great Waterfall  It Is Good For Pucnic With Family Nowadays It  is open only wednesday, Saturday and Sunday  There Is Ropewsy Ride Available Also

title: good
review: the water was very cold there but the view of the water fall was breath taking. all the facilities are available there like tube, change locker food etc.

title: Mussoorie Holidays
review: You should at least see this in Mussorie as Mussoorie don't have many worth site seeing points. You take bath in small water body created. You get costumes on hire.

title: Check weather before you travel
review: Good views (screen saver view ) but constructions are spoiling the entire place. Plan to have leisurely time and do not rush through.

title: A very big no
review: There was a time when kempty fall was a place to visit but now it's become more of a trash house with the most Indescent crowd around . Do not think of going even if you have ample of time to spare. All the wrappers and plastic bottles floating in water is all that you should expect and not to forget the lecherous men with eyes popping out at the sight of women in their wet clothes . A very dirty and filthy place .

title: Not exciting
review: I went to Kempty falls on 25th of April, 2015 but was sad to the state of this fall. It has turned it to more of a market place and less of a place for sight seeing. Ride to the Kempty falls was worth travelling that far. If you have chance to avoid then please do .

title: Disastrous!
review: The drive to Kempty was much more fun than the actual spot. As usual, the entire natural beauty of these famous falls have been marred by buildings/ shops literally 'stacked' one on top of the other along the steps leading to the base of the falls. You can take a dip in the Falls, if you buy a pair of 'knickers' as we were offered, have an icecream and take a ride in the cable car.  The view of the Falls itself is now obliterated thanks to the buildings on both sides of the plunging waters. Pity!

title: escape from the day heat
review: Approx. 20 kms from the town, the drive takes roughly an hour  with road repair work in progress in bits and parts . If possible avoid weekends.  Is a long walk from the parking lot , before you actually begin the descent. The entire way down is lined with shops so can you can shop around while catching up on your breath, especially on the way up. Ropeway option is also available.

title: Wonderful palce
review: This is really a nice place to visit with friends, family or couple.

title: Commercialized Place
review: The government has totally commercialized this place with shops all around the way and also shops around the Kempty fall. It's no more a nature's place.

title: Avoid At All Cost - Uttter Waste of Time
review: I have rarely visited a natural landmark which has been so disgustingly altered to cater to so called tourist than this. Instead of leaving this beautiful water fall alone it has been surrounded by ugly buildings. Trash everywhere. On the bottom they have turned the place into to cheap makeshift water park where local tourists flock. People every where. Loud noisy. Trashy.

title: Good falls but not maintained
review: the falls was a good place to visit but is very dirty and not maintained well. also the crowd is not very good, but if you have your own group then it is a amazing place to be.

title: Falls
review: A wonderfull and awsome place to enjoy the nature.  Liked the falls very much.  Children also enjoyed this place.

title: its good time pass
review: its good for time pass and enjoy with family. there is nothing much adventurous in it..but u  will enjoy.

title: Water fall
review: Not worth to visit as not much water was there to give a water fall. Much better to stay in the hotel and enjoy the beauty of nature and hills in view.

title: Kempty falls
review: If you are going in summer must go. Though it has become very crowded and Taxi driver fleeces you yet a visit.

title: Too commercialized, Didn't look like a real waterfall. If you are desperate then it may work for you
review: The waterfall is too commercialized, instead of the natural pool you see man made pool with the waterfall pool around it..The area is very small and is too crowded..Not to forget the freezing water.

title: Okay but nothing extraordinary
review: We went there because it was one of the sites to see in the area but was not that impressive.  If you have seen any real water falls, this is ordinary.  Only difference here is that you  can go swimming in the pool below if you wanted.

title: Waterfall!
review: Its refreshing to go to this place when you are in mussoorie. The small maggi points surrounding the falls adds on to the fun because after coming out of the waterfalls one feels very hungry. A good place to have fun with fqmily and friends.

title: not good just ok
review: it was not like a natural fall. just ok. many shops, restaurants, near the fall.  go bhatta fall. it was totally natural.

title: Waterfalls in Himalayas !
review: Kempty falls is one the few waterfalls known to exist in Himalayas. You can take 15 minute drive from mussoorie and then a 5 minute walking descent to the fall. The view is photo ready.

title: Ok
review: Nice but lot of crowd. A visit is good and have a cup of tea with some hot maggie by the local restaurant

title: Dirty cheap and too far
review: It takes 1 + hour to reach this dirty pond. The falls are very scenic but you cannot enjoy a swim as its dirty toilet water. Its tooo commerical with people dirtying this space every second. a Ropeway charges 100 rs to this spot , its simply not worth. Its more of a shopping mall than a site seeing spot

title: A decent waterfall
review: Have to walk a long way down to see the fall. The fall is barely visible with shops on all sides :( and the place is fully commercialized

title: Fascinating
review: We visited this place for first time and found Good had created so that can not be imagined ever and people built things on them to make earnings.

title: Most accessible falls.
review: Situated about 16 kms from Mussorie,this attraction can be reached by steps as well as cable car.

title: Just a pleasure experience
review: Kempty Falls is approx. 2 kms from Main Mall Road. It is awesome. Being at Kempty Fall is a pleasure to cherish  forever.

title: Must visit
review: Good big falls to visit.

title: Too commercialized!
review: Though commercialization is necessary from an economic point of view, I feel Nature should be left alone to itself at certain places. Who, for example, wants to see a swimming pool at the bottom of a natural falls? Spoils the entire sight of it. A couple of shops here and there could have been just about enough. Good as a local picnic spot maybe, but for people who want to see Nature at its best, this is not one of those that will make you happy. Stairs and cable car make for easy access.

title: Beautiful
review: Visited The Kempty falls in March... and guess what there was lots more to do than watch the falls.... this time we took the return bypass and drove down... nice road... and went down to the river... it was a lot more prettier there with no crowds... the kids jumped in for a swim... small fish darting around... the beer got chilled in no time and the ground sheet was spread... a great afternoon... wish we could have spent more time there... but there some seedy hotels that we chose to ignore... a must do if you want to have a great family picnic away from the maddening crowds above & in mussoorie....

title: A waste of time.
review: Dirty filthy not worth visiting. The whole place is in a mess and is filthy.You wont miss anything if you dont go here, A waste of time.

title: Over rated
review: A highly commercialized attraction; pretty much destroying the whole concept of natural surroundings.

title: Only good if you wanna take a bath under the falls
review: First, its just not good if you have elderly people. The falls are some 200 steps down from the road. The place has cable car which is 100 rs while going down and 80 rs while coming up. The natural pool has dirty water under the falls.There is a smell of damp cloth all around as the shops sell swimming clothes and costumes. Cabs from library will take Rs 1020 for a to and fro trip and will wait for 1.5 hrs at the Falls for you.

title: Is this a joke?
review: Skip this place! The visit was a disappointment. The place is dirty, the 'waterfall' if you can call it that, is just a trickle.

title: Not worth visiting
review: Not worth visiting. Very badly managed and not clean. Should be avoided. Only good thing is the cable car.

title: Falls are always majestic
