review: Waterfalls are always a treat for your eyes. So are the Kempty Falls. There are quiet a lot of shops on your way to the falls, that sell caps, sweaters, antiques, artificial jewellery, etc. Also there's a lot to munch. Only hitch here is that the place needs to be maintained and cleaned properly. Its a tourist attraction for God's sake!

title: disaster
review: visited this place after good 10-12 years. Though i expected some urbanization, but OMG.. it was horrible!

title: Hyped touristy place
review: It's almost 15 km from Mussoori , will rate it as a much hyped commercial place, due to overcrowding of restaurants and other concrete structures.

title: pretty falling water..
review: head to the falls via the cable car...dont take the walking option..

title: Totally Chilled in Mid December
review: I was there in mid Dec 2014 with friends. we hire a cab from library chowk and reached here. driver drop us far from the Fall. but we reached easily by following people.

title: Lovely Falls
review: We took a short drive to these falls from our hotel and it was totally worth it.

title: Nice falls
review: nice falls. Not far from Mall road in Mussorrie. You have a rope-way to climb down near to the falls.

title: kempty falls
review: Very good location to visit.Kempty Falls surrounded by high mountain ranges 4500 feet, are a good place for a picnic or for spending a couple of hours listening to the music of water in the midst of the surrounding greenery.

title: Worth visiting
review: Full of enjoy, fun and masti. Kids enjoyed lot. Lake has facility of boating and water ball that was a fun for kid. For us to sit riverside on stones a amazing moments

title: wonderful
review: we are visited with family in October 2014.. wonderful amazing view fall and very chilled water. very enjoyed this place with family

title: One Of The Better Places in Mussorie
review: As you don't have many places to visit in Mussoorie, It is a good choice to go Kempty Falls.. However, you will be able to enjoy more in Summers (Apr-August) as you can go under waterfall & enjoy in the waters..

title: Beautiful Falls from a distance
review: Gorgeous Falls, a bit over commercialized up close.   We were there in February, no crowds, and easily navigated.

title: The most famous attraction in Mussoorie
review: Its a big waterfall available in Mussoorie. They also have trolleys to take you up and down. But one should check on the timing before you go there.

title: Quite good place but crowded
review: This place is quite good to visit, if you have bike, ride from mussoorie town to kempty fall is great experiance. the main place of kempty fall is crowded, If you want peace and silence go ahead towards downside the hill, you will find the water flow. Go there and take bath in chilled water.

title: Great view of fall. But sometimes it become overcrowded.
review: You can enjoy as much as you want by having bath in under the fall.    But sometimes during peak season it is too crowded and dirty.

title: Highly commercialized
review: Drive is good and comfortable  ,but if you think this is some place where you can find some prleace and tranquility back out immediately. If you are traveling with kids and family ulyou night enjoy but again typical example of commercialazation.

title: Lovely place but bit crowded.
review: One of the best place in Mussoorie. But its crowded. However its nice place to chill. Distance from Mussoorie is around 15 KM.

title: KEMPTY FALLS
review: Although this fall is a bit far still its worth visiting.THere is a ropeway to reach it. THe water falls from a good height and is clear.ITS safe to venture in the fall as the w3ater is not too deep, There are changing rooms for people to enjoy it. Worth visiting.

title: Not worth the visit
review: This was our third visit to the place. The ropeway was under repair, so it was difficult to go down and return up. Not too dirty - my entire impression about Mussourie that it is quite clean, with many dustbins lined everywhere - is it the Swachhta Abhiyaan? Shops selling cheap knick-knacks line the way - there are an enormous number of colonial benches for travelers to rest. We also went down the lake and did paddle boating, but again it was way down and the climb up was tiring.

title: The most Beautiful and Romantic Water-Falls of Mussoorie
review: Nothing to mention more... Just fantastic, just perfect... never miss to take a good camera there... you should do photography going down the Kempty Falls - by the Ropeway - What a Feeling!!

title: Good place near mussoorie
review: Good place to visit in the summer if you are in mussoorie. There are other small falls as well before the mail fall so try to catch those.

title: terrible
review: dirty, unclean, pathetic place to go.. i hated it so  much! there's garbage lying all around, smelly stairs, keechad everywhere. didnt enjoy at all.

title: the main attraction of mussoorie
review: it is the main attraction of mussoorie, but a lot hyped place as the waterfall is very small and the rush makes it look like a pond. the parking is a problem.

title: One of the options
review: Good to see this falls. Nice slipproof steps from road to falls. Short ropeway is also there. Bridge and water discharge lake sown could be maintained better.

title: Great views and buildings on hillside
review: The falls themselves are spectacular but looking at the buildings perched on the hillside is amazing architecture A must see.

title: Awesome Experience
review: I crashed my car on my way to Kempty Falls but at the ned all the tension was gone. A lovely place to visit. Food is a bit tasteless but still manageable. Bathing in the spring is a must.

title: Nice Fun
review: Kempty Falls is around one hour drive from mall road in Mussoorie. If you are in Mussoorie for more than 3 days, then you can enjoy for some time at Kempty Falls. It has changed a lot if I compare it what is used to be 15 years back. They have now changed it into a pool type rather than falls. It is around 15 kms from Mall Road.

title: Pathetic & Dirty Place.
review: The water in the lake is so filthy that one can catch numerous diseases. Totally dirty and pathetic place to visit. Badly managed by the local authorities. The local shopkeepers overcharge everything thinking that the tourists visit this place are fools. Would never recommend anyone to visit this place, instead one should visit other scenic spots near mussoorie.

title: Amazing waterfall and lovely hilltop scenic view
review: The empty fall really offers a splendid view ,along with a pond where you can bath. There are shops who were lending clothes for bath. The place is bit crowded and messy though.

title: Totally touristy and disgustingly dirty
review: the falls are good , however haphazard development and loads of tourists have made this place a ramshackle & dirty area overall , infested with monkeys who grab whatever is in your hand , although one of the famous attractions , it is best avoided , you'd be wise to visit the landour area which is much prettier

title: simply amazing
review: mussoorie is known for some great tourist spots and one the most important is the kempty falls....The cascading falls with the crystal white water playing its way to the bottom and merrily splashing on the rocks is a site that will leave you spellbound !

title: Small and Quaint
review: The gondola ride was ok,, the area is littered with trash every where and cleanliness is definitely missing. But the Falls themselves looked nice and quaint. Very pictursque, excellent back drop for a sweet photo

title: not so good
review: the falls are good but people want to take your money just for visiting it...please be prepared for shelling out money for even entering the area.

title: Extreme commercialization of a natural wonder
review: The falls would have been great if it was left in it's natural glory. It has been changed into a man-made jacuzzi and that too not something that you'd want to jump into. Too many shops around and not a great atmosphere overall. If you'd just want to go there to check it off your list, then go ahead. Not something that you'd like to break your neck over.

title: Overhyped..over commercialised place
review: Well..if u have time..then please skip this place. not worth of spending 2000/- for a taxi to go there. unplanned parking ...over commercialization makes it a mess

title: A cute one
review: Not a huge fall but still manages to do wonders for eye.can touch the falling water with your fingers.u can dance with the pouring water.a scenic beauty.

title: Go to see the place only nothing else there
review: Poor hygiene and maintenance of the area. Dirty all around. No maintenance  and beauty of the area. No charm.

title: dirty
review: nothing much to write about this place except that it is dirty and highly commercial...not recommneded

title: Can give a Miss
review: We went to Kempty falls with high expectations but were sorely disappointed. The falls need to be viewed from the bottom of the road and the approach is via cable car or stairs. The place is completely covered with food stalls and extremely dirty. If you have seen other falls in India, you can give this a miss.

title: Avoidable if this isn't the first waterfall you'll be seeing.
review: (Seriously) over-crowded, over-commercialized, poorly managed, unkempt/dirty, middle-aged men playing in the water in their VIPs, smelly...avoidable. Not even recommended by the hotel management in all honesty.

title: A Damp Squib
review: Went all the way and with lots of expectations to kempty Fall beyond Mussoorie. But was disturbed to see that it was just a small waterfall. The place is crowded with shops and dhabas, small eating joints. Un planned construction has ruined the natural beauty there. Wish they would leav it un touched and remove all constructions.

title: Falls..????
review: I went to this Kempty Fall on 15/1/15.  This place is about 25 kms from Mussoorie.  I felt it was a waste of time as the water was very less.  You have to climb down some 200 stairs to reach this falls or you have to take the service of cable car costing Rs.100 per person.  Nothing special about this place.  you could avoid this place.

title: Crowded and Dirty
review: Kempty Falls is one of the major attractions near Mussoorie since times immemorial.

title: Awesome waterfall, must visit
review: Huge, gushing, beautiful waterfall that is about 12 kilometres from the main city. You can choose to go down the stairs to reach the bottom of the falls or take a ropeway ride, which by the way is pretty expensive at INR 100 per person for a very very short ride. Shops on the way to the ropeway ride offer some amazing hand crafted items, you may need a keen eye to fish out unique items at very reasonable prices and way below what you will get on the main mall road. Lots of options to eat around the base of the falls.

title: Nice view of fall
review: Beautiful view of waterfall, nice experience of boating, sight seeing, nice view of mountains, ropeway is also available to go to fall...

title: Enjoyed the nature en-route
review: Took a taxi from Mussoorie taxi stand to this place. Quite enjoyed the way...mountains with tall and canonical trees. Ropeway takes you down to the waterfall pool area. Took bath in chilled winter afternoon and soon there were many who followed. Even I saw many local people lending clothes to wear for bath at Kempty at Rs10-20.

title: Beautiful stream
review: The place is beautiful to spend some time with friends and family. The stream ( which I was told comes from Himalayas but I doubt it) has a nice flow. Since its was winter and very cold when I visited could not get chance to dip into the water. But anyway if you are here then its must visit place.... take a cable car ride ( 2 way cost INR100/person). Lot of veg restaurants and small eateries around here...

title: Nice place to spend time but nothing much.
review: It's a nice place to spend some time with family or friends. There is this waterfall, some local shops etc but nothing very special. Should visit if don't have any other plans. Try going in a dry and warm weather to enjoy the waters. I visited in a very cold weather, my bad!

title: Must watch if you are looking for a sight seeing in Mussoorie
review: You can avail Govt. Tourist Buses or Taxi from Kempty Taxi Stand.

title: Man Made Ponds on Waterfall
review: It's a good place, with a few activities like rope way, boating and flying (yes, you can fly there) apart from the waterfall and the opportunity to take a dip in it! Must go place...

title: nothing like a fall
review: I had visited this spot around 10 years back. There was a beautiful water fall here at that time. But i was shocked to see that the water had disappeared and water was trickling down the hill. This spot used to be the best tourist spot in mussoorie,but now it was very different. Though lot of people were coming here but most of them were disappointed to see this famous water fall.

title: nice place
review: the place is good as is the drive from Mussorrie to the falls. however, August is not the best time to visit this spot. but too much of construction has been done and the place does not looks natural.

title: the falls has lost its originality
review: I  have  visited the place after 20yrs . the place has lost its beauty &  originality .   it is more man made than original . has more shops than the falls

title: It was ok not great
review: It is only a good place if u like to see water fall and swim in chilling water with your friends. There are many local shops offering food and drinks near by. Overall experience was ok.

title: Water Falls
review: It is good water fall with cool water, we got very difficult to stay because of cool breeze.  It was very crowed and resort lake also good below the kempty falls.

title: Nice place to visit in Mussouri
review: The water falls is quite good. The water looks pure white. However taking a bath in it will be out of question as the water is sub zero almost round the year

title: Location is good but not very clean
review: Location is good but not very clean. Upper side is okay and still a bit clean but lower side is very dirty.

title: A very refreshing fall.
review: About half an hour's distance from Mussourie and in the valley . Beautiful waterfalls . Stairs to climb down or ropeway. Ropeway very expensive INR 100 for 1 mnt. Instead can go down by steps within 10 mnts. Many shops down the way does not make going down and up boring. Be wary of monkeys , very notorious, snatch food items from hands.

title: Perfect picnic spot
review: Surrounded by mountains , kempty falls are definitely a travellor's paradise . For those whp want to spend time beating off summer heat in north, its d perfect spot.  Have bath under the ftesh water falls n feel the nature mother and its sheer power.

title: Best Gift of Nature to LUCKY MUSSOORIE
review: Kemty fall is one of the best  natural waterfalls in India, with full of amusement events .................

title: it is a Natural pool
review: Very nicely build pool under the fall. Just wondering how people took bath in that chilled weather.But the stairs are full with shops both the side so you actually dont feel the pain while climbing up.

title: Amazing place
review: A amazing place.

title: only place to be in mussorie
review: this is probably the only place in mussorie where all the tourist come. Its crowded, dirty with all sort of garbage thrown here and there.

title: Naturality lost
review: I had visited this place during childhood and remembered the natural rocky pond at the bottom of this fall, but this time was shocked to see that everything has changed, place had been converted into picnic spot with several shops around.

title: This place sucks
review: Unbelievable to see so much commercialization. Shops and shops and shops, terrible view. More Maggi than water!! Seems like an artificial waterfall.

title: Hyped
review: very hyped place...did not find it as exciting as had heard about it. There are much better places if you really wish to see water falls

title: Step directly here
review: Next name to describe mussorie is "Kempty Fall". Very crowed. But enjoyable place....Need proper maintenance to maintain its charm.

title: Nothing great, waste of time and money
review: Not to be called attraction, nothing is left, place should be called dustbin, so much of litter at this place, everything natural has been destroyed, just waste of time and money travelling to this place as we have to travel 14 kms upward from mussorie.

title: Good Place but cannot be visited every-time
review: Good Place but cannot be visited every-time, very costly private parking, restaurants are limited with average quality of food.

title: An average waterfall but the crowd and dirt makes it poor
review: Sincere advice to travelers, in case you have been to any good fall then avoid it. This is a very ordinary falls but the crowd at this place and dirt makes it very less appealing.

title: waste of your time
review: kempty fall used to be quite a nice attraction but due to the inflow of so many tourists this has become one of the worst....huge crowd throng this place and have literally made this a dustbin...all you can see is the litter all around...first you have to park your car kilometers away and then you have to descend those slippery stairs full of shops on both sides....when you reach there it is nothing but filth...dirty toilets ....dirty changing rooms....there are zero facilities that are on offer...highly avoidable...

title: Enjoyed the beautiful water fall
review: I drove from dehradun in the morning and reached this place in one and half hr, around 40 kms from pacific mall, rajpur road.

title: Different experience
review: The fall is indeed very beautiful but needs some cleaning as we could see some clothes floating in water, the locals/government should keep a check on the same as this can ruin the beauty of the falls.

title: Can visit
review: Condition of the pool is very bad. Food Shopkeepers rude like all the local shopkeepers.If you find something in any collectable items on the stairs you need to do a good bargaining. But trust me you'll not get those things which they have anywhere in that rate. You can crack good cheap deals if you love quality bargaining ;)

title: Kempty Falls
review: Very nice location.  You can even walk down to the falls if you want to skip the ropeway. Very nicely located picturesque place. Highly recommended.

title: Mussoorie-weekend trip
review: You can visit on weekend. You can hire a taxi from delhi to mussoorie or take a bus/train till dehradoon. From dehradoon take bus/taxi till mussoorie. Take early morning bus (bus services from sun rise to sunset). So many hotels you can bargain if you are going on off season. there you can have locale taxi to visit the Kempty fall, muesuem,  municipality garden, suicide point. However there are so many but one is famous :).

title: Natural fall looks like artificial fall
review: Due to lot of civil construction Kempty fall looks like artificial fall rather than natural fall. The rates of rope way are excessively high.

title: Kempty Falls so Gigantic and awesome
review: We went to Kempty Falls hoping a larger waterfall then what you see in Mumbai but were surprised to see the most gigantic waterfall with such a gigantic height. We spent almost two hours looking around to find a place to get a touch of the crystal clear water. There were so many shops around where we could get water and food. The place is so well-maintained that we could find dustbin, toilet and other hygiene arrangements too.

title: Very good view and water fall
review: Excellent and amazing view of water falls. we enjoyed a lot being there and the water was cold .. so we could not take a dip...but loved the place..

title: Beautiful falls with dirty encroachments
review: This place is the only salvation for mussoorie tourist after camel back road.except this there is nothing to enjoy.i had a huge expectation by seeing website reviews.it cheated me.still is ridicule to hear mussoorie as queen of hill.haha.such a worst commercialised himalayan hill i have ever seen.

title: Average place
review: A visit to Kempty Falls is usually part of the itinerary while on a visit to Musssoorie, but it is nothing special. Several better falls jot this part of the country. Facilities/amenities here are nothing great either. Visit it if one has the extra time, but if one skips it, no loss.

title: Nice fall...
review: One of the best places to visit....Nice water fall with a small pond....you need to walk down lot of steps to reach the fall the other option being cable car....

title: Not what it used to be
review: It has changed a lot. Once beautiful place and must go destination if visiting Mussoriee has turned into a garbage dump. With high speed of development, and huge influx of tourists, polybags have seen there way into this beautiful place. Waterfall is now used by local restaurants to dump their wastes. Overall i would say it has lost its charm.

title: good place to chill...
review: we had travelled during holidays period so we got a huge crowd at Kempty falls..it almost took 2 hours to reach there becoz of jam...

title: Awesome time at Kempty Falls
review: Kempty Falls Mussorie was one of the best tourist attractions in Mussorie. When we were said, it is around 12 km from Mussorie on ghat road, we thought it is not worth. But after reaching there and seeing the atmosphere and the beautiful falls, we felt that our decision to visit was correct.

title: Good experience but nothing else around
review: Hi,

title: nice water fall
review: Not a very large water fall but good enough for you to get some photos around for your memory. There is option for water sports also. You can safely get very close to the water fall. Also the approach to the fall optionally involves a cable ride which is must in my opinion.

title: Enjoy the lovely water fall"
review: Kempty Falls is located in Mussorie very near to Dehradun.  Whenever you have a plan to visit Dehradun do not forget to add this lovely place in your plan.  Mussorie and Kepty falls both can be covered in 8 hours duration.  The journey towards Kempty Falls so thrilling as the ghat road takes you to the heights and wonderful locations all around with greenary.  On reaching Kempty falls you can find rope way to go near to the falls.  We familiy 4 visited this place during hot summer May 2013 and enjoyed a lot.  We could not close our eyes while watching the beauty of this lovely hill station and surprising how so much population living over there.  Make your visit directly to Kempty falls then return to Mussorie water falls.  There is a nice rose garden in Mussorie with a good restaurent too.  Before going back Dehradun   please also make sure you visit Tibetan Temple on the mussori hills. Must see place in Uttarakand.  Krishna Duvvuri Abu Dhabi UAE

title: In the arms of nature
review: Liked the beauty of nature, the fast flowing chilling water, the small artificial lakes all around that make the place more pituresque. disliked the number of shops that have cropped up. they have in away destroyed the beauty of the creation of nature.

title: A MUST VISIT
review: Its a very nice place to visit and the trip remains incomplete without being to this place.

title: Awesome Place to Visit
review: Simply an awesome place to visit when destination is Mussoorie.... Scenic beauty on road towards the Falls and the place itself is superb, excellent treat for the eyes... Loved the place

title: Reviewing without Visit
review: We were in for Kempty falls as i had visited with my parents some 15 years back.I was warned by many people that the place has been exploited commercially to very unimaginable extent & lack basic facilities to some extent.We dropped our plan to visit this place as located in Mumbai,we have been to such places nearby mumbai very often.

title: E(k)empty Falls
review: You drive for more than an hour to see 'Kempty Falls' and what you get is a waterfall like any other, cascading down to dirt and filth. Mussorie is a sad story of a hill station that has been allowed to go down the hill, literally.

title: good place to see water falls
review: I visited in oct'14 with my family.

title: Good Falls
review: The Falls are beautiful. One can take bath. Unfortunately natural surroundings are finished. The falls look great when we visited in late sixties

title: Superb waterfall but highly commercialized
review: Must be very good in summers when one's able to enjoy the heavy fall directly on your head.

title: Nice fall but over crowded
review: kempty waterfall is nice view with falls but it is over crowed.too may shops and concrete around the falls spoiling the view somewhat.long run walk.cable car available.

title: deserves better
review: The waterfall is definitely worth a trip, but the whole terrain around is disturbingly commercialized to the degree, that a visit becomes strenuous from looking for parking space to tackling ever growing crowds (worst during season Mai till July) and then remembering the actual good time despite all hassles. Go prepared, but go.

title: Not worth esp if you have seen 'waterfalls'
review: After seeing magnificent waterfalls elsewhere, this is a disaster.  Esp all the dirt around, as we Indians do not keep our surrounding clean

title: Enjoyment. True Enjoyment
review: its like 15-20 kms away from main  mussoorie but no doubt its one of the main tourist attractions there. The scenic beauty is nice n the fall is no doubt amazing cuz ur not expecting a good big fall in a crowded hill station. You can buy local goodies from there n there is a trolley facility as well. Down the corner when u reach, there are locker facilities n also people give u rented swim outfits...but it will be better if u take ur extra clothes or swim outfits cuz it may not be that hygienic.....alltogether its a nice n enjoyable experience

title: Must experience the falls for sure
review: Mind blowing ... Amazing experience.. Really thrilling.. Water is so chilled out there.. Really refreshing experience .... Its so fresh right since it's from the nature ...to Watch the falls is an excellent treat for the eyes and experience the purity of water is rejuvenating and refreshing experience

title: Cascade of mussoorie - Kempty falls.
review: Not the most gorgeous of all magnificent tourist spots nestled in the Himalayas, Kempty Falls has nonetheless always been an important spot or anyone visiting Mussoorie-Landour. Simply

title: Nice location
review: Located about 15 km from the Mall Road in Mussoorie. Good to see the water leaping down to the pool below where people can take a bath. There is a ropeway available to take tourists to the base of the waterfalls.

title: Party
review: Its a lovely place to see. You can enjoy bath and wear traditional dress here. Must visit when u r in Mussoorie.

title: Fantastic
review: There is a cable car that goes to the top.  We went on foot, which is the best experience. Takes about 25 to 30 minutes to get to the top on foot without rushing. Views are lovely at the top.

title: Boyfriends beware!
review: I suffer from vertigo, so I have mixed feelings towards spectacular views. I always like local colour, so the locals playing 'carom' resting on an oildrum, the stall lined descent to the cablecar... If you are visiting with your girlfriend beware! The couples I saw, the girls were intent on sneakily pushing or forcing their boyfriends into the pool at the bottom of the falls.

title: Empty-Kempty
review: If you are used to seeing water bodies (like me), Kempty Falls is a disappointment. The approach road is inadequate to handle the traffic, especially on weekends/holidays/vacation days. There are horrendous buildings all around, the expected litter and muck from too many tourists and the 'Fall itself not much of a water fall really. There is a cable car facility to take one down to the bottom of the Fall, but be sure to buy tickets for it before 4.30 pm, Thereafter the babus at the counter close shop and go home (official closing time: 5.00 pm).

title: Must goooo
review: Wow..wht a fantastic place.i went there early in morning..i really enjoyed a lot..and above all thank god all shops are closed..so i enjoyed very much..cool dude..very good place

title: Been better and could be better
review: The waterfall is very very beautiful in nature, the clear water runs down from multiple stages but it was the improper constructions that ruined the whole things, not to mention the very poor waste management, so many rubbish here and there eliminating our desire to take a dip.

title: Nice, but could be more developed.
review: The road to Kempty Falls from Mussoorie was great and very picturesque. The Fall itself was great. I would recommend walking down to the fall, and coming back in the cable car, as the shops lining the way make it a nice experience. One thing we(me and my family) really disliked was the amount of garbage scattered around. It was really sad. This place could be really developed as an awesome tourist destination, and I would recommend the government to do so. Also, travelers should not be allowed to throw waste here and there.

title: Mini Waterfall
review: It’s a tourist mad house and quite commercialized, dirty and waste of time. Won’t recommend to others unless you don’t have anything else to do, seen lot better waterfalls at other places.

title: Good but lot of crowd
review: The road to Kempty Falls from Mussoorie was great and very picturesque although its not in a very good condition but i must say very scenic. but lot of shops and chaos of the vehicles parked and lot of commercialization near the falls is the only draw back.

title: nothing great
review: it was just another water fall with average height ..nothing great to attract if you have seen many more. The place is crowded with commercial shops trying to sell you something or other. The rope way too is below average covering hardly a distance. small joy for kids actually. thats all

title: Disappointing
review: Very small fall and dirty too... Govt. has not paid any attention towards its up keep. Traffic and commotion makes it more difficult to stand and watch.

title: Good place ruined by visitors.
review: Kempty Falls are situated about 15 km from Mussoorie on Chakrata Road towards Dehradun. It is about 1400 meters above sea level, surrounded by high mountain ranges, It is a good place for picnic and spending some time. Taking a bath under the falls is very refreshing and you should carry an extra set of clothing. You can use cable car to go down for a bath and come back.

title: terrible
review: is this a waterfall...yes it is quite sad...very far from mall road...just avoid the long travel for this

title: Its a beautiful place
review: Nice place to spend with family & children. You can take the ropeway, in summer you can do boating, swimming & lots of activities.

title: Go if you have nothing else to do
review: The water fall is around 15 km from Mussorie along winding road. I heard a lot about the falls and were visiting a time after monsoons, so I expected a decent water fall. However, the water fall is hardly worth visiting. The place is crowded with tourists, one will not be able to see much of the waterfall from road. From road one can go up the cemented stair, to small artificial pool of water, where one can dip their feet, the place also have changing rooms, but its better to avoid swimming though not dangerous. There are many eateries along the road. Eat only if you land up feeling hungry, otherwise Mussorie is better option. The ropeway is located 500m downslope. You will get better view of the falls. But, then it takes you down in the valley, where there are small pools, which are hardly worth visiting. The place has been comercialised in hapazard way, resulting in loss of beauty of natural falls. if you have seen waterfalls at Sikkim, you are in for huge disappointment.

title: Good place to go- but not during public holidays
review: Waterfall, ropeway, swimming, boating, fox flying, food, shopping, senery- the set up is right for a good outing. but avoid during public holidays. very crowded during dussera holidays and infrastructure crumbling under the stress. The access road is jam packed and unnecessary delay of 1 hour to come and go. else a place worth visiting

title: Paradise lost...
review: I went to Mussorie last year in April and visited the *tourist destination* - Kempty Falls. Again this year I visited the same place around the same time. No difference was observed between then and now, the same crowded road up to the place and the same jostling for space to get a view... Though the falls itself are quite beautiful but having visited almost a dozen such other falls I did not find it much to pique my interest.

title: A nice location
review: The falls are about 15km from Library and the route is winding and quite scenic. There is a ropeway to go down to the foot of the falls and they charge Rs 100 per head for a two way trip. There are lot of shops enroute to the ropeway.

title: Nice place if u are prepare to take a dip in the icy water.
review: Mussorie does not have too Many places for day tours, and this is one is the most famous of all. The fall is small but okay. You can take a dip in the shallow waters and enjoy the water fall by standing under it. The water is very cold but you will love it. There are lots of shops around which offers you changing room and costumes on rent too if you have not got your own. Overall a nice place.

title: what.....Waterfall????
review: Come to Lonavala, near Mumbai....if you really like water falls....please don't visit and waste your taxi money....too commercialized and crowded.

title: Average Place !!!!
review: This is a major attraction in mussorrie once you are there. You have to go down lot of stairs to reach this place and the second option is to go by cable cars. Lots of shops are in the way where you can but and eat things. But not very much great place. The fall is good but there are many other better falls then this. Can avoid this place also if you have anything better to do.

title: small water fall
review: it was 145 mint drive from Mussorrie. water fall is very small and place is not kept clean. toilets are filthy. fall water is clean and people take bath. changing and Shower room is available. do not try food. do not go for shopping it is expensive. same-thing is available cheap in the city.

title: WATER -PURE ,CHILLED AND WITH FORCE
review: All said and done,everything takes care of itself once you enter the icy chilled water.

title: Fully commercialize water Fall...not worth the travel
review: It looks good from a distance and the near you get to it, you will start feeling a sense of thick commercialization around it.

title: a nice place to visit
review: kempty falls is about 15-16 km from mussoorie. a welknown place, we visited after 20 years. no kempty falls is crowded. one can use udan khatola to reach there otherwise you have to stepdown and again climb. very nice fall in huge water fall. people says water is falling through out year. changing clothes, water tube etc available. however water is very cold in monsoon and winter but very nice in summer. one must visit kempty fall at their stay at mussorie.

title: Nice place to visit with friends !!
review: Been there the second time as I have visited this place after almost 10 years . Dont even remember how it was like back then.

title: THIS PLACE IS DESTROYED.. DON'T WASTE UR TIME
review: One of those classic examples where man destroys nature, 10-15 years ago.. this place felt like heaven. The water was ice cold.. clean.. no shops around.. there were only a view cold drink seller.. whom i still remember used to keep their bottles below the fall to keep them cold. Now its a dirty commercial space.. shops lined a ll around.. plus a pathetic man made pool.

title: Average
review: Full of over excited newly wed couples with high testosterone levels that will either make you run for your life or will give you some good time to laugh out

title: Picturesque
review: Pleasant to take a stroll and eat the corn which was delicious! The toilets and surroundings could have been well maintained to attract visitors

title: good but getting densely populated
review: I have some fond memories of this place, we use to go there when we were very young, it had a lot of natural beauty at that point it was not densely populated at that time , the air was so fresh coming from foot hills of shivaling. it is still considered to be a big tourist attraction.

title: wastage of time
review: If you have visited atleast one waterfall anywhere then don’t go with the mad crowd to this fall. As this fall is on number one place in every visitor ‘s list so without knowing all rush to this place.But after few kilometers ride, long que of vehicles greet you.Alomost eat one hour of your valuable time  to reach the parking area.Then almost took ½ hr. to reach the fall if you not take the rope way.Even for rope way long que is there.Alas..when you reach the fall, you don’t  find a place in the water to enter. Within a small area thousands of tourists float and many with rowdy activities.So just look at them from the small bridge and took some photographs.For all these you lost almost 3-4 hours and this without jumping into the water. You can visit a lot more places in this time.So don’t waste your time visiting this place instead explore other places in Mussorie.

title: Picturesque
review: I have some fond memories of this place, we use to go there when we were very young, it had a lot of natural beauty at that point it was not densely populated at that time , the air was so fresh coming from foot hills of shivaling. it is still considered to be a big tourist attraction.

title: Total Disaster!
review: It is far too commercialised and one does not get a good view from the taxi stand.  We did not check it out through the cable car ride as my leg was injured and also it was too narrow a staircase with too much of a crowd.

title: Awesome Falls
review: You need to either take a ropeway or walk for reaching the main falls. The ropeway costs you around 100 Rs (to-fro) and is just a 3 minute ride. Once there, changing rooms and bathing clothes are available for nominal prices. The water there is bone chilling. You will surely find this place crowded as most of the tourists visit the falls. Hot Maggi after a nice dip at the falls is something that should not be missed.

title: Not so great!
review: Kempty fall is now not worth watching.. the place has got dirty.. water is not clean... There is nothing different to visit this place... people earlier used to visit Mussorie because of Kempty fall ( only good attraction ) but now this is not even worth a visit!  Othe water falls in mid-way are far better than this.

title: Has lost it's natural beauty
review: Kempty Falls are always on top of list for travelers visiting Mussoorie. The fall is 16 kms from Mussoorie. The construction all around the falls has marred the beauty of this lovely place. Shops around selling eatables and renting costumes are least responsible for keeping this place clean and pristine.

title: Water falls
review: A only place in Mussourie to visit especially in summers. Water falls are so huge. New ropeway adds another cause of fun and entertainment

title: Unplanned commercialisation
review: The falls are huge but unplanned eruption of shops and concrete buildings have robbed off its beauty. It doesnt looks like a place of natural beauty at all. If one wants to have a glimpse of its natural beuty, go upstairs from the main road along the fall instead of going down by ropeway or by stairs.

title: Since it was raining, the falls was coming down the hill with  somuch of water
review: Swiming at the pool at the bottom of the falls. Scenery around the falls and at the bottom as very eye soothing. When going down take the roapway path.

title: Too much public and traffic.
review: Fall is accessible from different levels, traffic is too much you need to walk out from you car if you dont have patience, not much exiting about this fall, just a usual water fall, impure water and all seen some local people washing clothes and taking bath in it. not worth watching after you travel almost 10-15 kms... from mall road.

title: no worth visiting, if short on time
review: it could have been a better place, had it not been commercialized beyond limit.   It's 15km form Mussoorie, the crowd was not very good.

title: Overhyped
review: Did not like the hype. Should be seen from a distance unless one wants a bath. Liked the ropeway. The drive up from it is painful

title: Main attraction of Mussoorie
review: Now a days it is very crowded. Try to be there as early as possible in the morning otherwise you will find very difficult to park your vehicle. It has turned into more of a water park but the view from the mountain is very good.

title: DestroyedBy Man
review: I remember going to this place around 12 years back. It was at it's natures Best. Now man has made permanent swimming pool kind of structures (4-5 in Numbers).

title: Falls with lots of activity, shopping, masti, ropeway and fullon fun. Maggy is just awesome here.
review: Falls with lots of activity, shopping, masti, ropeway and fullon fun.

title: the most important place to visit in Mussorie
review: time just flies here,we spent some 5 hours.we did boating,water ball,went inside the fall..lots of photography..loved it.

title: Beautiful Falls but nt well maintained
review: the kempty falss is still the best attraction of mussoorie, unfortunately its commercialized to the bottom. The place where u can enjoy the water is very risky as u r bound to get injured by the cement nd rods...the cable car is a good choice but nothing beyond

title: Bath At Mountain's Step
review: A must visit place if you are visiting Mussoorie. You need 05 to 08 hours of day (including travel from Mussorie) complete day to enjoy. You can reach either by car or public convenience (always prefer government transport). You can also get neat bathing costumes at reasonable rates. It's located 100-150 meters down from man road. You can go either by stairs or use rope-way cars, at reasonable price. That is natural spring water which is very good for health. In weekends it's quite rush hours. Better if you can visit on Friday and on Sat-Sun visit Mussorie Mall road, lake and company garden.

title: Kempty fall... A small fall
review: Jumping in a swimming pool with lots of people who have never been in it. Its the same experience. As a natural fall its a very nice place but the authority should have done someting for cleanliness and protection of this place. Its completely surrounded with shops. Fall has lost its beauty.... too much of ugly crowd inside the pool....

title: A must visit spot for every visitor
review: Kempty fall is the greatest attraction for any visitor to Mussoorie. Rope way service is available to reach Fall site from near to Kempty Taxi stand.

title: average
review: it is not maintained by the government. it was an average experience. nothing much to do in mussoorie all in all.

title: a nice place
review: way to up and down from kempty falls is awesome .For the scenic beauty and droplets of water coming from the spring and natural pond made by the falls is a remarkable experience

title: Classy Kempty with Huge Rush
review: With a History of British tea Camps here , its name derived Kempty. It is divided in various steps i.e., Cascades. Each & every step amaze us with different sights. The lesser know upper part of waterfall is more beautiful than the well-known lower part. The only drawback is Rush in the peak season.The best time to visit is Rainy season.

title: Average
review: This Fall is not too far from city if you don't like falls you can ignore it and if you want to kill time go for it.

title: Lost natural beauty.
review: A surely visited place when anyone go to mussoorie. But during the course of time this place has lost its natural beauty. Hell overcrowded with prolonged hours of waiting time for the ropeway. Not at all friendly for the kids. It totally becomes a shopping place. It rather looks like a man made swimming pool.  Surrounding area was dirty. In peak seasons be prepared for heavy traffic jams on the way to kempty (almost 2-3 km jam).

title: Enjoyed a lot there
review: we enjoyed a lot there but its not clean.

title: Great natures beauty - Neglected by Authorities
review: It has a all the making of natural tourist attraction but poor upkeep and lack government support spoiling its beauty.

title: Awesome place to visit
review: This is a place not to miss.we had a lot of masti at Kempty fall.Just take cool bath here and also try flying fox.Awesome fall and awesome place to do adventure.

title: excellent u must visit in slack season
review: lot of people is there. u must visit. this is only waterfall u can recah by ropeway i mean easily approchable with good facility i,e, cloth locker room changing room

title: You won't even call it a fall
review: Very bad traffic. All covered with dust. Even the fall is not worth visiting and spending time. You won't even call it a fall.

title: Good Picnic Spot
review: It was a good drive to enjoy different views. On reaching the place, one merely enjoys the swim in the falls. Good spot for activities.

title: Improved but more commercialized
review: I have visited this place after like 20 years and the place is a lot commercialized now, the good thing is the falls create anice setup for the pool where all ages people can enjoy.... and its more safer now. Go and enjoy if are a paani ka keeda....

title: Loved the ice cool water!!!!!
review: We went to mussoorie recently and we visited kempty falls on the other day.It was the end of the season and was very crowded. we went towards the upper portion of the falls and the crowd was a little less the at the bottom.swimming was allowed in the falls as the authorities had made small compartments there.all swimming facilities were available there.but here's what we enjoyed:

title: bakwaas place
review: it took us 1 hr to reach there and then we found out it was a lousy place. total waste of time, i would rather stay in my hotel room then pay 1500 to reach this place. It is not kid friendly. you have to take more then 200 steps to reach the main fall

title: Natural and enjoyable place
review: I have visited Mussoorie in the year 2012 and seen Kempty Fall. It is a good natural water fall created by almighty nature. I found so many people bathing in this water fall but there is risk of falling small stones in the flow of water which can hurt badly. But do'nt worry guys ! There is a swimming pool at some distance below to Kempty Fall which filled by the same water comes from fall and there also no risk of falling small stones.  I had so much fun this swimming pool. This makes my trip memorable.

title: Highly overated, waste of money and time
review: Place is highly overrated. I think there will be much better waterfalls in all the parts of India. Very crowded and water is very dirty. Dont waste your time and money, can be avoided.

title: Chilling experience
review: In June it is crowded experience but joy is multiplied. You will forget all your physical pain once you are in the water. It was too cold and refreshed even the bones. Nice place to visit

title: just wow....
review: Amazing experiance... sooo beautiful....

title: Crowded and dirty
review: Too many people. Nothing to see. The waterfall is hardly visible as all you can see are rowdy people.

title: Great Falls
review: I advise if you have kids go with your swimwear as you have a mini fresh water pool with a big falls from kempty fall.. Kids are gonna love & enjoy the Thanda Thanda paaniiiii.

title: chilling experience
review: kempty falls is the highest fall of north india..the water is so cold..u'll love taking a bath under it...some restaurants are very very pathetic...only visit those where people r sitting and some rush is dere...

title: Nice experience!
review: The falls are great, water comes down with tremendous force! And the water is pretty cold! Enjoy the falls, have maggi and omelette at some of the stalls. Avoid going down to the lake and play area below (if you're not a kid)! Click pics and have fun! :)

title: OPPOSITE OF CLEANLINESS
review: Very worst in terms of Cleanliness...India's one of the best waterfall from a very good height deserves  attention

title: Colorful
review: Shops / people - you see many colors.  If you can - take the steps to get down to the falls. On the way back we decided to take the cable car as it was too much for me to take the stairs back up.  Bargaining is fun.

title: most crowded place
review: in summer if you visit this fall then will be disappointed intialy from Parking then crowd at pool.No proper parking there.Beware some time you may have to walk for 1-2 km to board your vehicle.water at pool very dirty and going and coming back is very tedious.

title: Great view but lot of crowd
review: Kempty fall is the main tourist attraction of Mussourie. You can take a walk through stairs or you can avail a trolley to reach. Be prepared for traffic jam as there is always lot of crowd in Kempty fall.

title: Nice picnic place
review: Kempty fall is a nice picnic place but unfotunately it lost its natutal beauty in last few years due to heavy commercialization.. now instead of waterfall its more like a swimming pool where you can safely enjoy with your family.. water tubers are available, lockers are available, swimming costumes are available..

title: Not so attractive now
review: We visited in 1991 that time it was clean & beautiful. Now it had become dirty place with commercialisation. We didn't find it fit to take bath.

title: enjoyed kempty falls
review: its a natural god created waterfall with swimming poll attached. kids will also enjoy. will have to take a taxi from mussoorie who will give you only 1 1/2 hours time to enjoy

title: Kids Summer vacation
review: Must Visit Place in Mussoorrie. Advisable to use Floater for the kids. For adults no need of floater as the water level is hardly 1.0-1.2 meter.

title: Great place, but overcrowed
review: Kempty falls is a great picnic spot, and for my likings it is over commercialized which makes it heavily crowded, when I visited this place on 1st June, earlier this month, this is just 17 kilometres from mussorie, but last 1 km was jam packed, it took over 1 hour to get to kempty then heafty parking charges.

title: Kempty fall is terrible
review: You can off course go to Kempty falls but the weather was too hot and you need to go through lot of stairs.The ambience is damaged by so many hotels and shops nearby.

title: A Mess
review: Over hyped, over crowded, dirty and noisy

title: Commercialized place
review: Commercialized place with natural beauty missing. Surrounded by shops selling costumes & locker storage.

title: Not for the elderly or anyone with knee problems
review: My parents and I went to Kempty Falls a couple months ago, and while the Falls were indeed beautiful, it was a challenge for my dad, who has knee problems. We hadn't been warned before arriving that the whole walk down to the falls from the road is stairs, like a billion stairs. And, the taxi ride from Mussoorie is not cheap. So, I'd say if you're young and healthy  and don't mind the price, go for it. If not, then just skip it- you're not missing out on that much.

title: Small but beautiful fall
review: This fall is around 15 KMs from mussoorie in Kempty village. Village has very good taxi & bus connectivity from Dehra as well as Mussoorie. Its not a very big fall but the day I happen to be there. there was rain so water was really flowing well and crowd was less too. In warmer weather, you will enjoy the bath as well. Drive and scenary around is good. There is a rope way ride also to take you from main road to bottom of the fall otherwise there are many many stairs to come down & climb. There are good shops in the fall campus and I felt that rates are reasonable than what is quoted at mall road of mussoorie.

title: dirty place
review: kempty falls was a time waste in mussoorie.....it had nothing. All garbage was thrown in the falls.....wastage of resource!!!!

title: Enjoyed a lot
review: I really enjoyed this place, before going here I had heard a lots of bad things about this place that this is over commercialised etc. etc. but when I went there I really liked it, but few things to avoid don't waste your money ropeway untill unless quite necessary you will enjoy more while walking its quite close and rather then going at the bottom there is a mid way place where you can enjoy more as its less crowded.

title: What a SHOCK!!!
review: Was totally disheartened to see the absolute commercialization of natural waterfalls.. The entire area surrounding it has been cemented with concrete.. hoards of hawkers renting out costumes rubber tubes.. People flocking and jumping into the water with shoes on.. No natural beauty left at all.. Don't waste your time & money(Cable car) on this place..

title: Nice falls
review: This is one point that you would not want to miss out on. Plus, you get to experience some adventure sports too like Flying Fox etc.

title: please don't waste time and money
review: dirty squalid dusty crowded rip off , have not seen a worse con. once was a beautiful place now is just a con

title: experiences at kempty falls
review: nice place

title: Too Crowded
review: The natural fall is actually gone the locals created the SWIMMING POOL their.

title: MUST VISIT PLACE IN MUSSOORIE
review: Very good place to visit if you are in Mussoorie. car parking can be a problem as the place is usally crowded.

title: nature ruined
review: once it would have been lovely,but people throw their rubbish everywhere plastic bottles bags, really made me angry as it does not take much to clean up the place!

title: Trash in the name of falls
review: Once upon a time, Mussoorie is known by the Kempty falls, but now, I don't feel like going there as it is nothing but a dirty place with so many tiny shops around, which are creating lot of mess in that area and mindless construction has spoiled the beauty of falls.

title: Could be Better
review: Kempty Falls was a  very good experience, basically because it wasn't crowded when we went there. A very scenic place which has a lot of fun to offer to groups. Clothes, tubes etc are available on hire for those who wish to bathe under the falls. What was disappointing was the relentless construction work going on. Can't the authorities restrict it considering last July's flood disaster?

title: Useless trip to kempty falls
review: I would recommend not to waste time by visiting kempty falls.  There are many other good places. Its highly crowded place.  Water is too dirty. Its not worth to have a bath. Shopkeepers are too arrogant. Its not worth to spend 100 rs for each person for a cable car.

title: Kempty Fall - Dhanda Dhanda Cool Cool!
review: Kempty Fall is situated on the hilly tracks of Uttarakhand & it is about 15 km from Mussoorie on the Chakrata Road. It is a good place for a picnic & spending a few hours listening to the music of water in the midst of the surrounding greenery. You must take a bath in its cold water i am sure you will not forget that experience in your file. I visited there with family & everybody enjoyed the scenic beauty around Kempty fall. You walk or take a rope way to reach there.

title: Nice Place to Visit
review: I guess it is one of main attractions of Mussoorie. It was nice to enjoy some time in front of big waterfall. Furthermore pedal boating in Kempy lake amidst mountains was mesmerizing.

title: Must visit
review: Awesome view from the hill-top on the way. Be prepared to take a dip in the pool at the base of the fall. It is amazing! There are changing rooms and you can rent swimming costumes, towels etc.

title: Nice
review: Nice Place , But could be definitely maintained better.

title: Waterfall....
review: waterfall is very good. stairs for going down till the fall can be more user friendly. area near waterfall is conjusted & dirty. The tourist department can improve these small things to make this waterfall among the best in India

title: must visit as a main attraction
review: kempty fall is famous and main attraction of mussoorie..situated at chakrata road..approx 16 kms from libraray chowk..can reach by stairs as well as by cable car from road..100 rs. return fare of cable car..this place remains crowded always ..and if you wish to have bath there then come early to enjoy the place..not very much there to see except a waterfall..one can also enjoy a small flying fox arrangement there..

title: Water Fall
review: Nothing much to write about. Just a visit point when you visit Mussoorie. About 15 kms from Mussoorie. We were expecting to do he cable car ride at Kempty Falls but it was closed due to repairs.

title: Ropeway issues
review: The falls were nice to look at, and it was nice eating channa chaat and bhutta on the way back up, but a long walk to get there. Tip for travellers, always check if the ropeway is working before you head there

title: Attractive Waterfall
review: Kempty fall situated near about 15kms from Mussoorie on the way to yamunotri road. It is the biggest & very attractive water fall. This is one of the most enjoyable water fall, which falls from a height of about 40ft from a mountain. We enjoyed there very much. It was more enjoyable with those chatpata eateble thing just like bhutta, fruits chat, Chaana masala etc.

title: Great natural beauty turned to drainage
review: Kempty falls is around 15 kms from Mussoorie and would not take more than 1 hour of reach. It is a naturally beautiful place with mountains surrounding the water falls. But once you reach there, all you see is garbage being thrown around and the entire place which could have been a great tourist spot has been reduced to a dump of garbage. It is unfortunate that no one is keen on maintaining it.

title: Not living up to it's reputation
review: It was very dirty with lots of garbage around. There were a lot of people. The surroundings are very commercial and the waterfall can barely be experienced. The water itself was crystal clear but the surrounding garbage was a huge let down.

title: Nice place
review: After walking on mal road for a quite bit we had finally ended up at the waterfall....but it was really cold, a lot of people and dirty. It's still a nice tourist place to see, but if you're low on time...then it can be scratched from your list.

title: Not up to the mark
review: I had visited this place at least 40 years ago, when it was a virgin place, water roaring down the hills. This time it dissapointed me with shops and shanties all over the place. The beauty of the falls is also very much spoilt, by restricting the water flow at different points.

title: Weak Infrastructure
review: It can be real fun to stand under the falls , but the inefficiency of the authorities to handle the masses can play spoil sport. Huge jams are the norm on the approach road in peak season. Just an intelligent intervention by some smart govt official can turn this place to a tourists delight and a cash cow for the administration. Reach there early in the day and leave before the masses arrive.

title: You must be prepared to take a bath.
review: You must be prepared to take a bath as I found it is one more usual fall but having good arrangement of bathing. After a long drive to this place if you don't finds this amazing then definitely try a rejuvenating bath then take little food.

title: Good Fun But better walk a little up.
review: Walk a few yards up from Kempty falls to reach Molly Falls which is cleaner and with lesser crowd. Good bathing fun here.

title: Too messy and unclean
review: There is too much dirt and mess around the falls. If cleaned up and maintained properly the falls would be a good tourist attraction.

title: A Huge & Excellent Water Fall
review: Kempty Falls is situated at a distance of 15 KM from Mussoorie.... the roads a good & smooth... The Kempty Fall is situated downwards from the main reaching point... One can climb down approx 300 stairs or can a take a cable car to reach Kempty Falls... The ticket is priced at Rs. 80/- Per Head for up & down trip.... Kempty falls is an excellent place where the water is falling from a quite impressive height.... The water is very chilled & the water fall makes a soothing sound...On the way to Kempty falls & before the cable car station there are many shops on both the sides of the stairs.... Many famous items of Mussoorie can be shopped from here.... There are many restaurants & dhabas for delicious food... Kempty Falls is a must visit attraction of Mussoorie....

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful water-fall but surrounding is not very properly maintained.  Lots of commercialization. One can take the stairs or else can go by cable-car.

title: One day trip to Mussoorie
review: A small waterfall. Nice but lack of proper maintenance.

title: Excellent & Thrilling natural water falls
review: This water falls is the back bone of tourism department in Mussoorie. Hundreds of visitors visit this fall every year. This water falls is a vacations paradise specially in summer for all the tourists.

title: artificial waterfalls
review: not so good in terms of natural beauty, there are may waterfalls made in a widespread region. poor accessibility, poor and overpriced facilities, dirty water (people bath in upstream).

title: Not good experience
review: Waterfall is very nice and thrilling but poorly maintain, very dirty. Everything is very expensive. Some people don't have civic sense, they throw everything in the pool area which makes pool very dirty and unbearable.Please follow traveler show some sense and use dustbin or bag after eating chips cold drink chocolate etc. Thanks

title: Still not changed
review: After many years I again went of kempty falls last October, and it is still a disappointment in terms of cleanliness and hygiene, the natural place is now changed with massive construction. Though for old people Ropeway is now available but the then it has made the place artificial. Truly disappointing..

title: enjoyed the water fall
review: Amazing... standing under the water fall ad water falling from mountain was a beautiful feeling. Though the place was crowded but still one time visit makes sense.

title: Too commercialized but ropeway is the charm
review: I have been to this place many times, first time experienced ropeway here. 80 rs to and fro its good as you have to walk down a lot of stairs and come back again. Saves lot of time.

title: dont' a miss
review: place is good.. worth a visit.. u can enjoy with ur frnd n family in water fall. but parking is a big issue in kempty fall now a days.. hence recommended to go with your driver..

title: Only thing to enjoy in Mussoorie is weather,nothing else.
review: Only thing to enjoy in Mussoorie is weather,nothing else.

title: Excellent place-loved it (amazing fall)
review: Kempty Falls is the heart of mussoorie and I think people visit mussoorie especially to see this place. Taking rope way to reach this place and taking bath in Kempty falls is real fun. However, the distance from Dehradoon to Mussoorie is a little worry but your all tiredness will go when u take bath in Kempty Falls. Loved the place. Christal clear chilled falling water.

title: a natural beauty destroyed by man's madness
review: We had heard a lot about this place but unfortunately even in non-season month of October the place was full of filth and rubbish. Kurkure pouches, empty bottles and "smoking locals" welcomed us. This is perhaps peculiar to Mussoorie, as a hill station and tourist destination , almost everywhere, locals were seen smoking be it mall road, Kempty fall or company garden. The main area near the fall has been encroached by shops, so much so, that it seems like a small island in a sea of shops.

title: Must visit place in Mussoorie
review: Superb water fall, let down was too much commercialized and shanties, filthy surrounding, none the less must go to see water fall. Govt should urgently develop this place and improve surrounding. There is ropeway to go there at very reasonable price Rs.80/- for per person both side.

title: Over hyped location
review: This is just a normal fall and nothing exiting about it. Boating is available in Kempty Lake (which is just as big as any swimming pool) which should be avoided. The fall is littered with garbage which is another negative point.

title: Very good falls near Mussoorie with good accessibility
review: You can go to the base by car and then either by walk down through steps or through rope way. We walked through the steps. You can do some (window) shopping on the way while going to the falls or on the way back.

title: Lovely falls, best corn (bhuttas)
review: very nice place for visit. the way to falls is filled with small shops. you can take a ropeway ride also. there is a boating and swimming facility near by towards to foot of the falls. from bottom the falls look really good and you get a full view. do not miss the road side bhuttas/sweet corn and they taste great

title: Awesome for kids!
review: Not only the kids adult are really enjoy the falls. Overall good experience. Roadside foods are also cheap and good.

title: Overrated !!
review: There is just an area where one can get drenched in the falls and a cable car. There are shops and eateries with nothing much to offer. There is nothing else around.

title: Commerciallized Nullah
review: The once pristine falls have been destroyed by man's greed and excessive construction has lent the place an air of decay and greed!

title: Gushing fall
review: It is 15 km from mussoorie mall road . You can reach Kempty falls only by ropeway with a fee to be paid . The falls are the nearest ever seen . easy and safe to have a bath in it . The gushing fall is a huge one and the moment you are there you are fresh . In winter you dare to have a bath but have a hot cuppa tea or coffee and dome quick snaps . Also there is an artificial lake for those who love boating a few minutes away from the fall.

title: Good place for Couple to some extra fun time in nature
review: My favourite place from school days as I use to by trekking with school group. The coolest place during peak summer for fun in nature.

title: Good waterfall with clean water but sad surroundings.
review: The waterfalls are beautiful but the surrounding area is not at all maintained. Its pretty shabby. The ropeway is strictly ok.

title: Good waterfall with sad local surroundings
review: Kempty Falls are situated on the hilly tracks of Uttarakhand, India, 15 km from Mussoorie on the Chakrata Road. This place is located nearly 1364 meter above sea level  surrounded by high mountain ranges but locally surrounded by hat bazar shops, crowd and traffic.

title: Great Fall
review: My first visit to this fall was in 1970. Since than a massive change in surroundings, highly commercialized activities all around but fall is still clean. you can bathe or swim in it.

title: Scenec Bauty
review: The best place to visit when travelling to Mussorie & adjacent areas.do not forget to see toads in clear water.

title: Must visit place!!!!!
review: Falls & location is good, water is too cold, good place for weekend travels, Bring extra cloth , food is too costly in surrounding of this location

title: Must Visit
review: A beautiful waterfall, during peak season and in summers the water is less and too much crowing is there, but still a must watch waterfall near Mussoorie. Now there is a ropeway to go down to the waterfall.

title: Good but too much crowd
review: Place is good for children and you will enjoy a lot. But there was garbage everywhere, govt should work towards cleanliness of the place.

title: Nice spot but lot of encroachments
review: It is a nice spot but different encroachments by locals make it very crowded and untidy. It is good for half day trip

title: Must visit
review: Enjoyed a lot, there is a walkway and ropeway from the up-hill to kempty fall; Must visit for couples, and dont forget to take spare clothes.

title: beautiful fall
review: you can take bath under the falls which has a height of 100 feet and it was thrilling.  fecilities are there to reach the place by rope way also. one can change to bath dress at the fall place

title: good place
review: A very good place .... a flowing water one can enjoy a bath over there ..... a very good atmosphere for couples...

title: A Lovely Dip Under the Fall
review: Kempty Falls is the biggest attraction of Mussoorie. Truly speaking, other places are far behind this falling stream around the hill queen. Located at a distance of around 15 km. from the main city on Mussoorie - Yamuna Bridge - Naugaon - Uttarkashi Road, the divine fall gathers a large crowd. And all those who come, can't help getting into the foot-pond of the cascade for an exciting shower.  In the summers, the entire place under the fall is packed by tourists to get the stream on head. Tourists who haven't carried clothes for changing after bath (towel and undergarments etc.) can buy on the adjoining shops/ stalls. Lockers are available against a rent of Rs 20/ to keep your valuables safe. Now You can get down foot-pond of the cascade with your kids, spouse or your partner !  A fabulous bath under shower never you can forget.From the road head a fleet of stairs takes to the falling point. you can also avail all type of cuisine on reasonable rates.

title: Always love visiting Kempty Falls
review: This time the added attraction was the cable car and very clean stairs for those who wants to walk. Loved my little shower under the falls which is a divine experience. Avoid going to this place on weekends and plan to take a walk around the falls, you will love it

title: Refreshingly Cool Bathing :-)
review: Kempty Falls visit after a long time... though I was not very willing to visit at the first place since I was too tired from the Car journey since morning but it was a real refreshing treat. A must visit if you are going to Mussorie.. water is so chiled even in the summers that you wont be able to stand in the first instance.

title: Yuck
review: yikes .. this place is too crowded and filthy. people throw bottles vips packets etc all around and make so much noise... maybe this place has seen better days - but can be totally avoided now!!

title: Cool!
review: Its a cool place to visit. There are many shops around Kempty fall where you can dine and shop. The place around Falls has become little dirty with so many people visiting everyday. Instead of descending from the main road and going to the falls try ascending from the main road and go to the origin of falls. It is much cleaner and more fun.

title: Good place to visit
review: This is a good place to visit Kempty Falls. Very nice place and a good thing is that there is a rope-way to go down and up. Only problem is that the the place is not kept neat and clean by the authorities and people should also realize that they should not keep the place dirty.

title: waste of time
review: this one again is waste of time as my title suggest. it is not at all woth it to go their specially by hiring a taxi as they charge plenty for it. few years back it was very beautiful when it was natural. the waater use to fall froma very high mountain but now they have turned it into more commercial tourist place spoiling the old charm of it. also in peak season one should not go their as the road is very narrow and long traffic james occur.

title: Kempty falls
review: Not a large water fall but pretty decent waterfall. and the adjoining scenic beauty is good. If someone is visiting mussoorie then it is a must stop for travellers. It doesn't tahe a lot of time one can spend half an hour of quality time here. I visited twice and 1 hour of time is must for kempty falls as I am a bit of photography enthusiast so I spend a bit more time trying to photograph the excellent waterfall in varied ways.

title: Sheer Beauty
review: loved the place and the ambiance. a spot where one can enjoy with family or friends or just a day outing with your coworkers.loads of fun and a total treat to your eyes.

title: Kempty Fall down the hills
review: The best way down to kempty falls isnt the road but through the hills, sliding and slipping. There isnt a way made out but people often go holding on to the wet mud or the trees, jumping from one rock to another and the water stream that flows in between is just an amazing thing to have experienced before reaching to the destination. Its quite a rush place but the bath under the fall takes that away.

title: Not worth the distance
review: The place is an average waterfall, which has too many people visiting, thus making it rather tourist-y and dirty, as most tourist spots are wont to become. There are a few cute shops around where you can shop for trinkets and souvenirs. On the whole though, I'd rather visit Bhatta Falls (which is worth all the trekking), rather than go to Kempty and be overwhelmed by the whole crowd.

title: Real Good!
review: It has nice views and the water really makes you feel nice!

title: Empty Falls
review: The Uttarakhand Govt and the locals alike need to clean up the mess and get their act into order. What a mess of a beautiful location.

title: Beautiful falls!
review: Out of the way, but worth the trip! go all the way down to the bottom and have some chai and enjoy the view! Great shops with nice & inexpensive souvenirs..

title: decent
review: the road is really winding and motion sick people may have trouble!!...otherwise its a typical tourist destination. dont forget the 'masala chana"....it will tantalise ur taste buds!!

title: Dirty fall.....
review: This is a perfect picnic destination. Usually tourist from Delhi come here for sheer enjoyment and day picnic, with bath under fall with beer in hand. So many food stall are around and you can enjoy different types of food and also maggie noodles. Water was very dirty. Empty mineral water bottles, waste papers, cigarates packets and so many things were floating  and still people were enjoying their bath under fall. Some painting work was going on and painter cleaned his brush and hands in the same water and no body objected. Over all good place for picnic but ill maintained.

title: Crowded, but take a dip anyway
review: Kempty falls was crowded with children and adults floating on inflatable balloons. It was good fun, though if you do not like crowds, you might want to avoid this.

title: Place to see in Missouri
review: One of the places for tourist's attraction in Missouri. Time to spend and have fun swimming and do some shopping around. But be ready to walk down so much and have fun when climbing up.

title: Horrible experience
review: Feels like you are traveling to a concrete waterfall surrounded shops all around & dumping of garbage is also not proper which stinks at quite places. Natural beauty of Kempty falls has lost completely with time.

title: scenetic view
review: roads to fall is not good and due to lot of vehicles you may be stuck in traffic jam.

title: Wonderful
review: Kempty Fall is one of the most wonderful place I have ever visited. Incomparable beauty in Mussoorie.  It is the place where you most probably forget yourself at least for a while and might be get an illusion of heaven on earth. I wish to visit the fall again and again. Narrow roads, heavy crowd and unorganized vending do not matter.

title: Good one
review: The kempty fall as such is wonderful piece of nature's gift but again the surroundings has been spoiled thoroughly buy unorganized vending and eateries. It could be developed in to a wonderful experiance, instead of the present one, where in a gentlemen wud prefer to watch and click few pictures and take the hindola back.

title: Abs nothing about it
review: Thank God we did not hire a cab and visit this place. ALong the way to Sankri on our way to trek Kedarkantha peak we encountered the falls early morning. Nothing great about this place. Just another of the many hundred of falls in the country. We rather explored Mussorrie on foot and had a whale of a time.

title: one of the famous attraction in Mussoorie
review: If your are going in summer than don't miss to have bath under kempty falls...

title: Nature's Shower
review: Don't have to pay any thing (I mean water bill) except if you want to float on an air-filled tube.  One can take rope way to climb up/down to the main pond.

title: Lively place
review: Many things changed in this place since my last visit in last 15 years. Lot of commercialization; lot of shops have come up in the area. The welcome development from my side is the rope way which was not there earlier. You have to pay 80 INR (3 yrs +) for return trolley ticket. The place is as usual very lively and it is very difficult to ask children to stop once they are in the pool. Many other activities are now happening in this place. Parking is a problem during peak season, it is better to go on a hired car. You have lot of food options available and can buy artifacts. During summer keep it a must visit place.

title: Not worth making so much effort to visit this place.
review: To and fro you have to travel approx. 40 kms with poor parking facility, Jams etc. Long queues for trolly ride to fall, was very crowded. Avoid going there, in peak season.

title: Lost beauty
review: Uttarakhand Tourism has spoil this beautiful Kempty Falls (once). I think the authorities don’t have any kind of control over there. The natural beauty of the falls has been ruined by the commercialization, the shops have come up all around the place.

title: Worth visiting
review: This is a must place to visit.  The cable car ride is good as well. Only irritation could be noise from those enjoying their bath in the pool at the bottom of the fall.

title: nice place
review: this is one of the popular places in mussorie ,thus crowded especially in peak season.so reach there  before 11 am if u want to enjoy as the day progresses it gets difficult ie,crowd, parking etc.we reached there at breakfast n stayed till 2 pm,which i suggest is the best time to go.the fall at the top is best as u go down it loses  its charm.

title: Not worth it.
review: Well, i have been to Niagara falls, and a very different image of how falls would be.I knew they wont be that big, but then i thought thats its so famous so maybe they will not be that bad. But i was shocked to see a stream of water flowing in a small pool constucted below, where the shopkeers had kept there cold drinks to get colder. The place was dirty, full of people clicking pics, kids yelling and running.It was simply horrible.

title: For peace of mind a must visit
review: I liked about this place is when in offseason no one is there except one or two tourists there's absolutely no chaos at all.The only thing you hear is sound of spring falling from atop a tall cliff...peaceful and soulful experience.

title: Beautiful fallas worth to visit
review: Kempty Falls is little away from the city but it is worth to visit. Flow of water is quite natural and made atmosphere quite vibrant. If you have time go till down and you will have fantastic view from there. Kids will love to take bath.
