title: Kempty falls
review: I found it quite dirty because of people throwing rubbish every where and lots of offerings just thrown in the water spoiling the view.  I don't think people actually appreciate the natural beauty.

title: Its cooool
review: A natural waterfall where u can bathe like u were in a water park, my son loved it but the bottom is rocky and a pain to the feet for grown ups.

title: Highly over rated !!
review: The taxi unions of Mussoorie pose Kempty Falls as 'THE PLACE TO VISIT' in Mussoorie. But its too too commercialised to give any sense of enjoyment. Its like a tick in the box for the places you have visited, but no fun. I went in June, so was wary if the water in the falls would have dried up. But i was wrong, there was plenty of water and what a marvellous height it fell from. Would have thoroughly enjoyed if this was all in the middle of mother nature. Instead it was totally taken over by commercial ineterests & i really wasn't happy visiting the place. I would say either you can avoid going to kempty falls or maybe see them from a distance and be happy.

title: Good Place, Lots of Activities
review: Very well maintained. The locals and government seem to have made all arrangements for people to come and spend good time. One can enjoy the water falls, maggie and tea, adventure sports, boating, etc. The journey from mussoorie mall road to kemty falls is also very enjoyable.

title: Awful
review: I can only imagine how pleasant this spot would have been during the Raj days. In the name of tourist attraction, Kempty Falls has been commercialized to the extent I would dread to visit again. The crowd is partly ruffian and I would prefer to stay away from this place. If you want a dip in water, there are better options in water theme based parks.

title: Fun time(maybe)
review: Well its a good place to visit esp. In Summers as u'll love to have a splash in cold waters of Falls,but be ready to enjoy with a few hundreds. Also try to park ur vehicle a km before the place as there's a huge Jam in parking area to about half a km when u'll come back. And maybe if u go on a weekday around 9 am, u'll njoy more, just come back by 12 or 1 pm.

title: Below Expectations
review: I went with a great enthusiasm to see the Kempty fall but was highly disappointed,  It looks more like a mini water park rather than a natural fall, because of the modifications done. They should preserve the beauty instead of spoiling it, On way to the fall it will seem that it is a market, it is encircled with so many shops. It was sad to see a natural beauty loosing its charm due to commercialization.

title: Good fun for kids
review: They have made a concrete pond around the falls to allow people to safely step under the falls. Wear slippers while entering the pond as the gravel inside hurts the sole. And don't forget to end your trip with a nice cup of tea with Masala Maggie at one of the stalls overlooking the falls. Carry your own swim wear & towels. It's more hygienic (though you get every thing at a small rental there). Reaching the falls is easy using the Ropeway !

title: kempty falls mussoorie
review: Beautiful waterfall but you have to face some traffic jams on the way so start early it is around 16+km from Mussoorie. You can either walk down to the waterfall or take a cable car trip .we preferred to walk down to the waterfall and came up again by the cable car The ticket is Rs 80 per person.below the fall they have a big area /pool where people enjoy though it was very crowded.It is better to carry your own extra set of clothes ,towels etc, although they are available on rent also there.there are separate changing rooms and lockers  for males as well as females.They charge Rs10/ a nominal fee for the use of the changing rooms. but be careful when going under the falls as there are sharp stones and pebbles that may hurt your feet.In all a nice place to see if you dont mind the holiday rush!!

title: Tip: Don't go down. Climb up.
review: After the parking, the lower you go, the dirtier and noisier it gets. However, if you climb up, you'd find a nice, serene, and cleaner pool with better water flow.

title: Get Wet !
review: Go and get wet ! Otherwise don't ... ! The trolley (cable car) is also there to take you down to the spot. The view from the top is equally aesthetic as it is to a person when he is under the falls.

title: Average
review: If you're in Mussorrie you should go to Kempty not coz of its awesomeness but coz its one of the place categorized in the places to visit. There is a small waterfall of icy water, & not much. You can try a dip in the water,you'll have to walk a bit to exactly reach the place & food there isn't that great. I found it an okay-okay place.

title: Sad, but it could soon be over
review: What a petty... mining and tree felling has robbed the hills all over of the water sources, and Kempty Falls has lost its past glory. It was once beautiful, but if you still want to see some of what little is left, catch the next train or flight to Dehradoon and then take the innumerous hair-pin bends up to the Falls

title: Nature crammed by man!
review: 1.Mussoorie and Kempty falls are synonymous but beauty has deteriorated alarmingly over the years.

title: Over commercialized and no natural beauty left
review: The natural beauty of the falls has been ruined by the cemented embankments and the shops that have come up all around the place. And the ridiculous charges for the ropeway adds to that.

title: Terrible terrible Terrible!!!
review: Please don't go there one it is far off and a stream of water falling from not so high. But the problem is the commercialisation which has been done around the place. The water was so dirty that we couldn't muster courage to step in. People were making kids even pass in the water....atrocious. The authorities should be doing something about this atleast profile the place.

title: Nature Lost and Shattered
review: We planned to go to kempty falls from Mussourie. We had heard a lot about its bigness. We were badly struck with traffic as there was no traffic management and too crowded. People parked there vehicle on both sides of narrow roads on the hill and we faced jams for 4 times in 2 kms area.

title: just about average
review: When i visited Kempty falls some 6 years back, it was worth a place to visit. but my recent visit was not a very gud experience there. A lot of commercialization has happed around the place...tourists have made this place very bad in terms of cleanliness...

title: Waste of time
review: No natural beauty.It has all been usurped by mindless commercialization, market,parking. It seems that one has come to a mela with hundreds of people bathing in the artificial pool constructed at the base of the fall. No point in wasting half a day in mindless trip. best to avoid.

title: Awesome sight
review: Very good and water just gushes out of the mountains.The drop of the falls is about 30 feet .The small pool below is a great experience to play around.

title: Visit only if you enjoy getting wet in the falls
review: Visit only if you enjoy getting wet in the Kempty falls... Move two layers up and you have a good water fall from 20 feet height...  Not a place for sight seeing..  Suggest visiting this place only if you enjoy getting wet in the falls

title: still worth visiting in summer
review: like.

title: Wonders of nature ruined
review: The falls themselves are a wonder of nature. The whole visit was ruined by the numerous stalls selling wares. Walking down to the falls is hampered by these stalls and the crowds mulling about at the entrances to them.

title: Too commercialised
review: This is a beautiful fall but thanks to the long traffic jams, haphazard parking, small vendors blocking the streets etc, we did not have a good experience visiting this place.

title: waste of time and money
review: Please don't visit kempty falls.Its dirty with hardly a little trickle of water and very crowded with men bathing and washing clothes in it. Too many stalls and shops that ruin the beauty.It was a waste of time and money.

title: great fun filled location
review: The falls itself is so alive and refreshing sight. I did not expect it to have so much force in April. the water was chilling and its force was biting but after the initial shiver, it was great to stand beneath the fall and swim in the pool around. A great experience which I will remember for a long time. The swim wear facility with floats is really good. the shops also are a nice time pass. the ropeway is a pleasant surprise. There is a need for better facility for change rooms and toilets.

title: Bad place to be
review: You travel 25 kms from mussoorie down the road to see bad in shape falls. No is the answer.

title: Beauty destroyed
review: The natural waterfall is really very nice, but the beauty and serenity of the place is destroyed by manmade stalls created all around the place. It does not even appear to be a natural fall anymore because of the artificial pool and stalls.

title: Good view.. but very little water..
review: Good view.. but very little water.. so no real fun here... This must be spectacular in monsoon or winter... Cold fresh water though.. Also good "thelas" selling roadside food..

title: Commercialization of nature
review: Was totally surprised to see such commercialization of natural beauty...Water falls converted to water park...It is still worth a visit and wonder how beautifully  nature tries to keep it self available to humans in spite of all the human efforts to spoil it....

title: Highest fall
review: We enjoyed the ropeway and seen the spectacular view of Kempty falls falling from the highest peak  in to the local swimming pool which is very natural.

title: Kempty Fall
review: Nice picnic spot. You have to climb down 500 meters on steps to reach the fall. Should have half day to enjoy the fun.

title: Must avoid in peak season
review: A nice place but croweded in May and June.If you are visiting Mussoori Kempty falls is a must go place for all.Mussoori is a very beautifull place to see and enjoy holidayes but only if you have a advance booking  in hotel to stay otherwise you would have to return back to Rishikesh or Haridwar for stay. A large number of people come here in summer due to its proximity to haridwar. But do not miss Ganga aarti At Haridwar.

title: Bad falls
review: Not that worth a visit. generally parking is an issue while travelling to this place. so once you reach their you might not feel that great.

title: Waste of time and money....
review: Visiting Kempty Fall is just a waste of time...If you are planning to visit then plz plz plz drop the idea....Its better to go and spend time in water park instead of going to Kempty fall. You should rather go and visit Dhanulti. Only if you have extra time and money then only go to Kempty fall...

title: Take a shower at the Hotel instead!
review: overrated, cluttered & a pain to reach. avoid & choose some other spot instead. Parking could also be a problem. Plenty of food joints, on expected lines serving maggi, parathas & beverages

title: Poor maintanance, its dustbin falls
review: We went there on 12th Nov,2012. Not much crowded. But the way to fall was very dirty. After sitting in high price cable car, you want to see some good view of water fall. All you able to see is polythenes, water bottles, chips packets, etc. Its all disgusting and completely dirty. When I tell the hotel owners & shopkeepers they just pass the bug to local civic body. I still remember filthiness of the whole area better than the water fall.

title: Horrifically Disappointed :-(
review: My last visit to the the cherished Kempty Falls was in 1990 when I used to be a kid. I remembered that crystal clear water, the vast expanse of the naturally formed pond around the falls, the sense of peace and joy accompanying the surroundings.

title: Too crowded
review: The place is dirty. The water is not clean as it looks like a dirty pond. The upper side falls are really good ones with clean an less crowded environment

title: Inquire before you visit this place!
review: We went to Kempty Falls around the starting of March 2013 and this was really disappointing. The very first problem was searching the place, the second was parking and the third was this construction work going on there. After going downstairs, (this is not something for the old ones!) we were really disappointed to see NOTHING there. And the worse thing is that no body informs you abt this as you go downstairs to visit this place. No informations anywhere. So please get informed first before visiting this place. Otherwise you can just do some shopping from the shops nearby and get back home. Every things is getting commercialised and we are sure after this construction, there will be a visiting fees too. This time it was free, no fees but, you couldn't do anything there, just a time waste!

title: Waste...
review: It was one of the wasted times, we spent in Mussorie. Utter chaos. Very little water. Dirty all the way. Men bathing in chaddis. It was all a bad choice to go there.

title: Such a let down
review: Too commercial... Not worth watching a stream trickle down in such chaotic surrounds on the other hand Corbett falls is a better

title: Not so nice
review: Its a horrible ride to the falls. Its dirty and a waste of time. We will not recommend specially for people who think kempty fall is a must to do.

title: Not soo good
review: I felt Kempty Fall  sould not be part of any1's Itenary. Not required at all. There is nothing which is different out there. When i went, the infrastructure was not good enough to even stand near falls.

title: Amazing kempty fall
review: Millions of visitors or most visited site of the world)  so  choose best timing with the world (9am to 7pm) or without the world (7pm to 9am) as per our choice and enjoy each moment of your romantic life/spiritual life  with the fascinating flow of milky water( flow of life and sound of life) nowhere in the world nearby capital of the of the country. Pl give your valuable suggestions to Govt. Officials and enjoy amazing beauty of kempty fall.

title: Visit to Kempty falls
review: We visited Kempty falls in the morning. It is swarmed by small houses which are occupied by locals and shops. Original beauty of the falls is fast vanishing. However, attempts are being made to create man made attractions around it ( swimming pool, railings, observation decks etc). I would have loved to watch it in its original form.  THere are shops which offer  traditional dresses on rent and we can photograph  ourselves in them.

title: Kempty Falls
review: Quite,closer to nature place where you can easily spend a hour or 2 with family.However it is not well maintained in fact government should take steps to make it more beautiful

title: beautiful
review: loved the weather and the sweet corn. U can also have lunch at the roadside restaurants. They serve hot chapatis with really tasty side dishes at a low price.

title: Not that great..
review: Should develop the place more.. Its filthy.. Its just overhyped... It can be the best if maintained properly

title: Ok Ok Place
review: This is an ok ok water fall, not a very huge one. But the drive to this place is a good experience as the roads are wide enough compared to the roads on a normal hilly area. On the way you will get great views of the himalayas. but still  this place is not a must see if you plan to go to mussourie.

title: Too much commercialized & no fun.
review: All the access road to the falls is covered by commercial shops etc. It is a big mess. To climb up/down to reach the Falls you may have to negotiate about 500 steps. Too tedious. Ropeway gets crowded. If you visit in peak season, you had it. Totally disastrous planning. Visit this place in non peak season. Boating ride is a Joke. It is boating in 2 feet water & that too in a swimming pool. Yes I said it correctly swimming pool !!! Can you believe it? To get to it you have to climb up/down about 200 steps. Totally worthless.

title: Refreshing
review: Due to landslide the road is messy & seems risky , although falls are beautiful but found palstic bottles & plastic bags in the water.Overall good

title: Not worth it
review: Basic attraction despite it being so far way from town. There is nothing worth seeing there when you go there during the winters.

title: Wow
review: Must visit place near mussoorie. You can take a bus from mussoorie. or get a cab (bit costly) , but can be shared with other coulple. It was nice experience to visit there.

title: Horrible place
review: This is a terrible and dirty place to visit... This falls should have been left alone ... rather that making it artificial... also it is so dirty i wouldn't think of going back there

title: Nice experience
review: Nice place to visit during summer if you are interested in taking a dip in the fall

title: Good but so crowdy..
review: There are 3-4 falls in this place & you can enjoy this place if you choose a fall which is not very crowdy.

title: Trip to Kempty
review: The fall is good, however one has to climb up and down more than 250 stairs, or the easier way is to take the ropeway.

title: Wonderful place to visit
review: Best place to visit when you are in Mussorie, you simply cannot miss this. But you don't have many good eateries around, so be prepared for that.

title: Chilling & Thrilling !!!
review: This is basically Camp-Tea falls. During the British Raj the Britishers used to come here for their tea-party and used to put-up picnic camp there. Which became famous activity and later it got famed as Kampty Falls. Its a must must place to visit when you go to mussoorie. I was not expecting such icy water in hot summer there but its awesome. Yes it is bit crowded place and if you do not reach before 11am you may get stuck in heavy trafic of visitors (in peak season). Market in surrounding as well as the rope ways is good and adding fun in the place. Keep your changing cloths with you, you will get temp. changing room & locker there. There are few water resorts near by where you may go & enjoy the falls at leisure.

title: Not worth visiting
review: We heard a lot about this place but overwhelmingly disappointed after visiting the same. the water is dirty and highly congested.

title: Natural beauty made by GOD, destroyed by humans ...!
review: Very beautiful waterfall. you will have to take a taxi from mussorrie to reach over here.

title: Not a pleasant experience
review: The falls themselves are pretty, but they've constructed ugly buildings, and there's an open garbage in the area!

title: Our Visit to Kempty Fall, Mussoorie
review: It was a great experience visiting the famous Kempty Fall. A ropeway service took us to the fall.The atmosphere was just great and the captivating beauty of the fall made us stay there for a long time.

title: Must go place if you are in Mussoorie
review: A good place to visit in November - Not too crowded, quite a view to click pics, boating, adventure sports, cable car. Most of the standard stuff is here and but yes most of the things you get in mussorie are a bit cheaper here - u can negotiate as the crowd is lesser.

title: Dip in the cold water
review: a bit crowded.  Nice to get wet in the falls.  carry extra clothes and get warm immediately after the dip specially if you are there in winter season.

title: excellent water falls...not to miss!!!
review: great experience...must visit.Please go downstairs through ropeway or by steps.Not to miss the falls downstairs.No need to spend on ropeway.Avoid if no need.

title: Excellent
review: A must watch sight in Mussoorie.Best time to visit November.Try to go upwards by following the approaching road. Though the way to upwards not fully made of concrete but if you interested in exploring the most beautiful part of the falls must try to follow beyond the concrete roads.

title: goods place to have there
review: I Like playing kid But I dislike because I visited there when it is getting colder and i am not able to take bath in that

title: Please avoid!
review: This is the most disappointing place for a nature lover. The unmitigated construction, shanty eatouts, a cable car that is an eye sore makes for a great example of how to spoil a natural beauty. Add to this, the place is quite difficult to access during peak season and the taxis charge in excess of 1000 Rs. to the place.

title: "Good to visit during summers"
review: You can chill out in the kempty fall but its crowded with lot of people so be prepared for that. It will take around 1 hour from mussorie to reach there, plz get your food packed from mussorie if you are going there in lunch time as you wont found any good restro there.

title: Wolrd's dirtiest waterfall
review: I was shocked to see what they did to waterfall. Don't waste your time going there unless you want to see the monument of how human rape the nature.

title: Nice falls.
review: The place is nice and the waterfall looks good. A good sight-seeing destination.

title: Nice outing from Mussoorie
review: We decided to drive down to Kempty falls during our stay in Mussorie. We started early and the drive passed through some pictureseque roads with snow capped mountains seen at the distance. The 17 Kms distance was made in an hour and half, with stops for photo ops. The falls was reached through a short walk down a narrow shopping street with assortment of Chinese toys and warm clothes being sold. The foot of the falls was reached thorugh a short trip down a cable car. Overall, a nice outing

title: Dnt ever go in peak season
review: It took me around 2 hours to find a parking and again 2 hours to take my car out frm d mess.too crowdy

title: Shame such a lovely place is so ruined
review: The falls themselves would be lovely if there was not so much litter everywhere not to mention all the tacky shops and the traffic. Sadly it is not worth the trip

title: complete rip off
review: it is one of the worst tourist experiences you can have. The falls are hardly visible because of a 100 shops surrounding it. the smell of urine is overwhelming and the crowds are close to stampeding....for the lowest end tourist

title: Kempty Falls
review: The place is about 15 KM from Mussurrie.The road is not properly maintained.Once you reach the place you find a lot of garbage here & there.The ropeway trolley is a good contribution for the people having difficulty in climbing.An average place.

title: Only Fall is Good
review: I have read the trip advisor comments and I agree on its very dirty .............View of fall is good but the Area is very Dirty .....Local Government and People should think on this although it could became a Good Place for Visit

title: Natural beauty  sadly ruined by rubbish
review: I am used to rubbish everywhere in cities in India having travelled here for some years but fail to see how a fabulous waterfall with a series of pools off is enhanced by acres of bobbing plastic bottles,crisp packets and general c..p.Abandoned broken down pleasure boats competed with total detritus and people were proudly having their pics taken? Coffee shop ok with clean indian style toilets. if you are female and from Europe take your Shee wee.

title: Nice Natural Water Fall
review: Just 15 days ago i was there. Little far from Mussoorie. Nice water fall for fun with friends. Now there are some adventure activities are also possible. Cable car facility is Also available if you dont like to walk downstairs. Atmosphere was Good. I think this place need some pollution control.

title: Not what I expected
review: I was visiting this place after 20 years, my memory couldn't recall the beautiful and heaving waterfall that i had seen during my childhood compared to the very commercial and full covered with a hose pipe kinda waterfall.

title: kempty falls
review: The drive to kempty falls is very exciting and thrilling. A rope way is there too, but i preferred the steps. The beautification process turned it into an ugly place .

title: good for one time visit
review: I have visited mussoorie quite a few times and have been to Kempty falls number of times. This time I went because it was first visit for one of my friends. There's hardly any water left in Kempty falls. The only thing one should try there is MAGGI

title: fully natural
review: last week visited with family. it was somehow beautiful. enjoyment is own style. go down by ropeway. rs 80/- per member bothway up and down. other wise anybody can go down by walk its free . no entry fee. enjoy bathing.

title: Good
review: Nice to see a waterfall even after the rains are done with. Could experience a lovely cable car ride, the waterfall is beautiful but feel they could do something to make the roads a bit better.

title: Good
review: Good falls but sehestradhara is better .Good falls but sehestradhara and robbers cave in DDN are more better

title: Awesome place to visit
review: Divine weather with amazing natural beauty. Peace and nature lovers can really enjoy this place. A music of falling water filled the whole space with serenity.

title: What a waste of time
review: Pathetic place, amazingly dirty. I had visited the fall more than 25 years ago, at which time it was beautiful. This time around it was disgusting to even look at. I guess commercialisation, and number of people with no sense for cleanliness have contributed to its downfall.

title: Good
review: The place was clean and has lot of activities for family and children

title: A memorable trip
review: Liked these things:

title: Natural Waterfall
review: fascinating waterfall , but the ground place is very crowded , the place is not clean . The beauty is being killed by the encloachment of shops . We could see a lot of platic bottles floating , wrappers of eatables . I wish if the government could take extra pains to revive the otherwise beautiful waterfall before paople starts shying away from this place .

title: Crowded and filthy
review: We had taken the stairs to Kempty fall instead of the ropeway. The path however was literally covered with filth at many places. The fall was crowded and the natural beauty has been washed away by excessive commercialization around. If you have been to waterfalls earlier, I would suggest you visit Dhanaulti instead.

title: avoid
review: Whats happened to kempty...why this dirty pool which is so dirty with so many in there all the time. You can go If looking for kids fun

title: very crowded
review: If you go on a weekend and are driving to the kempty falls, just park your car at the very first place you find, don't think that i will park it closer to the kempty falls you will not get any parking. This monsoon there was a land slide next to the kempty falls and the road was also destroyed

title: Nice little falls
review: The falls are nice little one, you can take a ropeway ride to reach this place. Though people take a bath in it, would not recommend as its pretty small and since there are many people its not hygenic as well.

title: Nice place but crowdy
review: Fall itself is nice, but the place is victim of too much commercialization. And the traffic is hell. If you are on a car, be ready to park it at least 3 kms before the fall and then walk that distance.

title: beautiful waterfall
review: beautiful waterfall but disappointed with the cleanliness, there was trash all over the place. our experience could have been better

title: Not much to fall
review: Don't expect a great water fall. The drive too and fro was scenic but the fall as such did not offer much.

title: Disgusting, filthy and a blatant abuse of nature
review: Horrified... that was the expression i wore when i first spotted kempty falls after climbing down a long set of stairs.

title: Mussoorie is empty without Kempty
review: If Mussoorie is the Queen of Hills then undoubtedly "Kempty is King of Falls" - A Must visit place - Didn't loose its natural beatuty & charm despite being densely crowded,polluted by encroached shops/restaurants etc & if u don't have driver then great diffficulty in finding a parking nearby rope way so get ready for long walk as well.

title: Altered by men but still enjoyable
review: Its water is so cold and pure that you will feel very freshened up and relaxed after taking a dip as we did. The fall is intervened by road.....The whole fall from up to down has been manipulated by tourism dept and its like making several small dams and water from one dam goes to another dam downhill. At the extreme bottom of fall (deep below in the valley), there is a lake with boating facility and one can reach there by taking ropeway.....Sadly we could not go there due to lack of time and instead enjoyed dipping in water of that part of fall which was above the road. (we had taken siteseeing tour with GVNM and they provided only 2 hrs at Kempty fall). My suggestion is that if you are going to kempty fall from Mussoorie, enjoy only here, don't plan to go somewhere else during the day, as its really enjoyable and time taking, you will not want to come out of water)....They provide swimming suit (half-pant for gents Rs.10, combined suit for ladies Rs.20, towel Rs.10, floating tubes Rs.10) on rent and change room is available.

title: Uncontrolled commercialisation and waste disposal.
review: Never seen water falling from a decent height, then go there. Jharipani falls would be better if you like some amount of peace and solidarity.

title: Good Point to visit
review: The place is really commercialise these days with all the facility available there. Enjoyed a lot under water fall.

title: Highly overrated and over commerciailized
review: Better to click pictures 2  kms from the Kempty Falls as the place is notorious for big traffic jams and parking headaches.

title: Good example of men destroying nature
review: We took a day trip from Mussoorie to Kempty falls as we heard it was definitly worth it although it was a bit overdevelopped. They were far from the thruth. After a truly horrible bus trip (we thought we were going to die probably 23 times). We arrived at kempty falls just to see a chaotic pack of shops, restaurants, hotels (some half built, some abandonned), pile of garbage, concrete bridges and lame amusement parks. The place is truly ugly, and there's almost nothing left of the actuals waterfalls. As an example, the natural pool was filled with concrete, then destroyed, then half rebuilt 2m up. All this is topped with thousands of indians who seems not to realise how horrible the place has become. Definitly NOT recommended.

title: Good fall but to crowded
review: The fall is good big enough but during the peak ssn ie in summer the place is too crowed moreover it is very commercialized...i found the upper part of fall is better than lower one bcz of less crowd.....but if you are going to mussoorie there is hardly anything which you can see so Kempty fall has be in you Must visit place:(

title: Don't do it!!
review: Terrible, tourist infected, and much-ado-about-nothing!

title: The falls have been fully commercialized
review: The view of the falls are good from opposite side about 3 Kms before the place. There are shops and shops and the place is dirty. Avoid during summers.

title: A big let down
review: Our visit to Kempty falls was a big disappointment. The place is much too hyped and over-rated. Beginning from a chaotic collection of vehicles at supposedly a parking lot , leading to hordes of avoidable unclean eating joints , to the entry point of the falls complex. We had a tough time locating the small , unmarked & crowded entry point - there are no sign boards put up for tourists. This was followed by a rope-way glide down to the falls. There was filth all around us - garbage dumped on the hill slopes . It's such a sad commentary on how mis-managed this place is! The actual falls itself are pretty good , but they would have looked better had it not been for the large & ugly concrete structures built around the periphery. Too many commercial hoardings and banners limit your photographic sphere. Unless the authorities take steps to improve and upgrade , this place can be given a miss.

title: A treat to watch in the mountains
review: This waterfall was a delight in the mountain region of north India. It gives you immense pleasure to see people making the most out of it even in the cold weather. Full family got drenched and had great fun.

title: Only hype
review: Sad to see the famed falls in a sorry state. No fun to visit now. Its too commercial and has lost its serenity.

title: Sad & Polluted
review: I had visited this beautiful falls in eighties. One could see the huge falls and spend a day of liesure. It is now a traffic nightmare and fall is broken into three levels. Each level one could see heaps of trash not cleaned for months. The police is mere spectator & I could witness a fist fight with parking snarls. Very dissapointing indeed.

title: very natural
review: its, a very nice palce to enjoy with a family, but if rope way  is out of work, it may be became you bit irritating b,coz after bath in pool for 2-3 hour you already became tired.now go to upward through ladders with kids its a difficult task. over all nice place but in month of june-july its overcrowded.

title: Hopeless!
review: The much-hyped Kempty Falls turned out to be quite a damp squib. We reached there to see the place completely packed with tourists of all shapes and sizes.

title: Enjoy water fall
review: Its a good picnic spot to enjoy with family. The locker facilty is available here . You can also take costumes on rent and enjoy the kids can enjoy too with air tubes.the water level is appropriate for all.

title: Major Disappointment
review: This attraction was hyped up a lot in Mussoorie but it is just an overcrowded, overdeveloped and unclean water park.

title: A great example of how Indians spoil nature
review: Just back from Mussoorie. I could have saved my 2-3 hrs by not visiting the place.

title: susu smell from kempty fall
review: first it was so down in hot summer we went down with legs shaking.

title: Undoubtedly Terrible !!!
review: In my words, Kempty fall is nothing but a garbage collection area for the hoteliers & restaurant.

title: Natural beauty
review: This fall is beyond famous hill station Mussorie. Its perhaps on Yamunotri road. The road is very scenic with many hills and valleys seen here. While on the road, our taxi driver guided us to take some local traditional dresses photo shoot. We got these photos later on mall road shop. Kempty fall is very high fall. We could not see where from the fall is beginning. It cuts the road and flows below the road and falls in valley. In valley there are many swimming tanks made out of this water where you can enjoy and spend good time. There is rope way also to go in this valley. I have never seen before a rope way in valley ! As we had less time we avoided it.

title: Feels Good @ Kempty Falls
review: Kempty Falls as the name sounds are the water falls, where you can get wet and enjoy yourself. Again here you have a trolley car or you walk down the staircase where there are lot many shops to purchase your stuffs. Starts from wooden articles to eatables to hats, clothes, etc. Here the people are very adamant on prices and they don't indulge into bargaining. Avoid buying things from here. The same stuffs are also available at the Mall road as well. You can experience the great water falls and feel the cold water on you. A good experience!

title: Kempty fall was damm good
review: Kempty fall is a very awesome fall in Mussorie India. www.visituttrakhand.com managed my trip.Kempty Falls as the name sounds are the water falls, where you can get wet and enjoy yourself. Again here you have a trolley car or you walk down the staircase where there are lot many shops to purchase your stuffs. Starts from wooden articles to eatables to hats, clothes, etc

title: Icy cold water
review: A must visit place in Mussoorie. The zig-zag drive throught mountains is amazing. A sign on the road mentioned we were 6000 mts above sea level and we were still climbing. There is a short cable car ride that takes you to foot of the waterfalls.

title: crowded
review: it is very crowded. the vendors sell rubber buoys and other nick knacks.fresh and cool water is a great sight to see !

title: Kempty fall is not worth a visit
review: The zig zag drive to Kempty fall is awesome. Views along the way is panoramic but the destination is so filthy and commercialized that it is not worth a visit. It looks soo beautiful from the adjacent hills but going down there is not worth.

title: Dont ever Visit....................
review: The best part of kempty falls is till the time you reach dere. the drivz gud. Wen u actually see the falls, you eally feel pissed off.

title: OK
review: Nothing in particular to appreciate specially when it is so famous.Traffic management and parking arrangements were extremely poor.

title: chill out
review: The cable car takes you to the falls. This was the first time, we saw a tourist place that had provision for change rooms and clothes available on rent. That was cool. The water was chill and really freezing. one should not miss this place

title: Great fun.
review: Let me start off by saying that the route to the falls itself is a thrill. Zig zags and sharp curves surround the place. The scenic views itself make it worth the visit. Now to the falls, its pretty good too. Now if you get your hopes too high, it may dissapoint you but think of having a nice time there and you will. Make sure you do bath in the freezing and spotlessly clean water. It maybe crowded during the peak seasons which can get a tad bit irritating but there are various levels of the falls and you can choose to go wherever you please. Changing rooms are provided and there are loads of stalls here to satisfy your minimal shopping fantasies. Great place, definitely worth a visit if in Mussoorie.

title: how man can make a hell out of  heaven
review: I was shocked to see the state of this once so beautiful waterfall. Men have created a mess of this beautifull place and they have even divided this single waterfall into three. A concrete Jungle now, with smell of urine all around the fall(coming from small toilets all over).

title: cool
review: its just awesome place to chilling out,go with friends hang out,Located 15 km from Mussoorie, the Kempty Falls lie amidst a mass of hills. Sparkling water gushes down from a height of 4,500 ft and further segregates into five different falls (40 ft each) at this place. Originally, the British conducted tea-parties here. Thus, the colloquial name 'Camp-Tea' earned it the name 'Kempty'. The falls remain open to public from March to July.

title: Chaos all around
review: Rampant commercialisation & encroachment all around. The government has also got into the act by pouring concrete all around the water fall base. Looks so ugly ! Very filthy with almost all the shopkeepers throwing their garbage into the fall.

title: Really run down place.. Not worth visiting!
review: I don't understand why the people that manage the place can't do a better job at keeping it clean! Even the man made pools around the waterfall were pretty poorly maintained.

title: Nice place to visit while in Mussoorie
review: While in mussoorie it is must to visit Kempty Falls. It attracts a lot of tourist as it offers a lot - cable car ride (1-2 min.), boat ride, some local shopping and a decent fall. Went there with friends and did not miss the chance of bathing in the cold, fresh and clean water of the fall

title: Kempty falls
review: the waterfalls were smaller compared to what we have locally in LONAWALA. The rope-way is a total waste of money @ 80/- per head it last barely 3 mins.

title: Kempty Falls
review: lot of repair work - originality is lost - construction all over- it is becoming more of artificial fall

title: Extrinsic Falls
review: I loved the marvellous nature like this, cold water, fresh and so much of enjoyment when you visit such waterland where you feel like enjoying the most.

title: Avoid during peak season
review: This place is no more beautiful as it used to be 10 to 12 years ago.. Too crowded and very commercialised..... You may enjoy this place if you plan your trip during the off season but please avoid during the peak season especially in may and june...

title: Visit on time.
review: Its one of the major attraction in Mussorie, so try to reach this place by 9 am as after 10 am you will stuck in traffic jam, especially during the weekend.

title: One of the best falls in India
review: The best part is that you are allowed to actually stand under the falls unlike many others in India. The water is so cold that the local people use it to cool their cold drink bottles. A must see if you are new to mussoorie.. Its correctly said" Mussoorie aae aur kempty fall ni dekha to kya dekha" , meaning that if you didnt see Kempty fall then your tour is incomplete

title: Overhyped!
review: Crowded and dirty. Reached by a long journey on the hill roads. It's a fairly long waterfall, but the volume of water is not much. the place is so oversold that hordes of tourists, vehicles and sundry shops crowd the roadside. Toilet facilities are basic. No place to sit and enjoy whatever scenic beauty there is.

title: Overhyped
review: Basically nothing to rave about. A very average waterfall that was possibly a great attraction once upon a time.

title: Kempty Falls
review: Great waterfall, can easily spend half a day. Awesome road-side chaats available. It is good to have your own vehicle, otherwise the hired vehicles just give you 1.5 hours time. There is a ropeway to take you to the bottom half, but there is also a trek at the opposite end. this is more enjoyable, i felt, since it takes you to the waterfall source. There are bathing spots, where you can hire change of clothes.

title: Not what it is made out to be
review: The Kempty Falls is not what the earlier pictures of the place make it out to be. There were some old pictures of the Falls in Hotel Sun N Snow which show this natural fall with a certain magic and charm to it. When we went we found a totally different experience with tiled flooring on the sectioin where the water falls down to form a pool of water. The natural charm has been robbed by the human beings who try to use their silly heads to improve the perfection of nature. But it is still a popular location and should be visited at least once.

title: wat a fall
review: Whats so great about water cascading over rocks at a particular location ? surrounded by stores selling a myriad of things and small eating joints selling maggi and chat. add to that, a man made pool dubbed as the largest lake in Mussoorie with a Rs. 25/-  entry ticket per head. Its not the money. Its what you dont get to see.

title: Great place to visit but beware of the garbage!
review: It was a nice place but the garbage in and around the place is heart breaking!

title: Commercialised but worth a see
review: Lots of shops in the area. The ropeway is good to access the falls quickly. May get crowded in the peak season.

title: Good fall
review: Nice fall to watch from top to the bottom, do boating, fly like superman, rope way, unfortunately we didn't enjoy ropeway since was under maintainance.

title: Under construction -but very nice place
review: You should visit this place . These days construction is goin on  but very nice place

title: Good falls but beware of roudy half naked men
review: The falls are actually a pleasant view with a nice cable car that takes you down.  However, if you happen to be there over a weekend or holiday season and if you go there later in the day, be ready to face a rush.  You will see a lot of half clad people and some can get roudy.  Feel safe if you are in a group.  Be careful if you have women in your group.

title: beautiful
review: beautiful but very commercialised, you can get a taxi from the taxi stand in musoorrie and the driver will give you 1 and a half hours there and wait to take you back.

title: Amazing
review: Fresh cool water falls, trekked up north along the fall, all around yummy snacks - bhutta roasted and boiled with a lot of spicy masala, maggie with a lot of green chillies, chana chats and tea! Parking in this area is a nuisance.

title: Good Place, Worth Visiting
review: First: I dont like the dirty places around. Many of tourist like us has spoiled the sorroudning of this beautiful place with cups, plastics, papers, waste materials ets. It's beautiful place and must to visit if you are in Mussoorie

title: Unkempty Falls
review: There has been a lot of construction around the fall and the fall now appears as an artificial one. A lot of litter has spread around the site and no cleaning effort has been done by the local authorities. Not worth a visit.

title: Fun @ Kempty falls
review: it was a beautiful site, with crystal clear water and a fun place to be with a group. don't miss the cable car ride. its half hour ride from the mall road area, but its worth it all. It was great during the winter season. its a must go during your visit to mussoorie.

title: Great falls; need to preserve what is left of the natural
review: amazingly awesome view and waters; wish any further artificial structure addition is stopped forever to maintain the natural serenity of the place

title: Kempty falls
review: we reached kempty falls by taxi,there are bus service to the falls but it close by  1 during off season. here the taxi has union for sight seeing all  fixed rate,but i feel its more,but no choice.it is better to reach the fall by rope car which cost 80/- for 2way.if u want to go one way also the charge is 80/-. The bathing pool is very small and some 3-4 feet depth.

title: Spoilt nature - pathetic comercial development that destroyed the beauty
review: Here was a once beautiful spot completely destroyed by indifferent or ignorant development and the hoards of litter throwing tourists.... really horrible concrete structures right up to the falls and venders selling junk food and causing the constant supply of litter.

title: Looks like village fair / religious ceremony
review: in the hot summer when reached kempty falls it was a huge disappointment because of following reasons.

title: (K)Empty falls
review: As written earlier, the place is marred by irrational, unnecessary & ugly development. Half of the buildings or supported infrastructure is already eroded by moisture and already fallen/broken down and have become more of a danger for small kids. Not to mention all the garbage that is littered all around the place (plastic cups, bags, pouches, etc).

title: GO early
review: if you want to enjoy Kempty falls please go little early....so that there is no rush...

title: Avoid it
review: Utter waste of money and time. Too crowded, filthy and nothing more. It looks like a fall from a three story building. DON'T even dare to compare it with mighty Jog Falls. Go spend the 3 hours that you are likely to waste here, some where else because time is precious. Sahastra dhara in Dehradun though not great, but was better than this.

title: A Nice Tourist Attraction
review: I was living in Mussoorie and traveled for a day trip with friends to Kempty Falls.  The falls were filled with middle-aged Indian men splashing about in the water.  It was certainly a sight.  However, the drive there and the views from the area make it a worthwhile trip.  If you're a foreigner, don't expect to actually swim in the falls, unless you don't mind pushing your way through the men.  There is a man-made pond with boating as well that was fun.  A good place to bring kids.

title: An excellent experience amidst a high mountain
review: One should not miss the chance of visiting it by the special cabs and bathing and swimming in the sparkling waters.

title: Go to these falls if you want to be deluged by half dressed Indian men
review: It was a real disappointment, had to walk down this path with loads of indian tourists who push and shove you around then land up at the falls in which they were all swimming in their underwear. The men were in their boxers and vests while women were fully clothed and by swimming I mean bobbing in the water and taking photographs, while the men were trying to take as many photos of women as they could.

title: Nature at its best
review: Neverthless a hidden beauty in the hearts of mussorie.Once you r travelling from mussorie to dehradun,this falls is a stop point must.Relax,enjoy the nature,climb the rocks and even there is a ropeway to get on.You can fill your heart with memories of this place.

title: Kempty Falls Mussoorie - More hype than reality
review: I have recently been to Kempty Falls, Mussoorie. The roads are clean and it takes roughly 30-45 mins to drive from Mall Road to Mussoorie to this place. I took my own car to avoid any hassles. After reaching there we realised that getting your car parked could be nightmare. We did a tie up with local snacks shop and he allowed us to park our car in front of his shop.

title: really bad
review: I went to this place in 1997 or 1998. This used to be very clean and we had fun below and above the Kempty falls. Now the place is highly commercialized and the vendors/local administrators have destroyed the beauty of the fall.

title: Natural swimming pool
review: This place is a natural swimming pool with a hill on the back and have a water coming from top of the mountain and water is very cold and best time to visit this place is in summers and person with medical conditions should avoid this place as we need to walk down a lot of stairs. Children’s and youngsters enjoy this place a lot

title: Nature's beauty thin and narrow
review: The serpentine Road journey was worth the beauty...... But if you have bigger, wider, huge water falls.. Then think twice... It's too thin and narrow... May be worth going for a selfie or maximum to be able to tell that you visited it.....

title: Must Visit Spot in Mussourie
review: The fall is 14km from Mussoorie.  The parking is paid.  You need to climb down 100 stairs to reach the first fall.  The fall is surrounded by shops offering facility of clothes, locker,  changing room and eatables.  The stairway too is full of shops.The water is clean being the first fall.  The surface below water is bumpy however nothing much can be done about it.  Falls below the first fall does not have much  water and also are dirty due to human interference.  The bridge is a nice spot to click pics.  Kempty lake offers few adventure activities.

title: Natural Beauty
review: Kindly visit these falls before the water stops flowing down. The flow of the water has reduced from early days.The water is cold. However many shops have opened from road till the falls. One can take cable car or take stairs. With Cable car also one has to take stairs. One can have Maggi, Tea/coffee, omelette and cold drinks. Shop sells wooden souvenirs (bargain if you can).

title: Disappointment
review: The natural beauty of any waterfall can never be disappointing and the same holds true for kempty falls, but the environment in which the falls is ensconsed is a big eye sore. Plastic waste everywhere around, shopkeepers shouting out their services and products, men bathing in the water in their underwears are enough to turn you off.

title: Nice view but cleanliness to be maintained
review: Nice place to enjoy with family but cleanliness near water fall and other area need to be maintained

title: Dip in winters
review: It’s chilllllly but fun , the water level is low. So you can dip in if you want “Aaj Kuch toofani karte hai”

title: Not Worth it
review: I have visited this place again with kids and was been forced to go there
